story:
The Slivver Story: 

A few years back, entrepreneur Tony M. Galazin was making a purchase in an Apple Store. He was given an iPod to sign with his finger and noticed a visible layer of grime and grease on the surface. He realized that dirty public touch screens were becoming unavoidable and we needed a solution to the health risks they posed. To solve this problem, Slivver was invented.

Slivver is a credit card sleeve that doubles as an antimicrobial stylus, or touch screen pen. Just slide it onto any credit card and hold it in your hand to activate it. Slivver uses state of the art, conductive plastic so you can swipe, tap, and sign without using your finger. It is available in five bold colors that make staying healthy a fashion statement.

Touch screens are everywhere today, but these unavoidable new devices have an untold story of contamination.  Common wisdom says that we should not touch the toilet seat or the bottom of a shoe because they are dirty, but we have yet to understand the health risks of touch screens. Public touch screens are constantly used by sick cashiers, waiters, and customers, making them ideal surfaces for transferring disease. Scientific studies confirm this concern.      

The Impact


Slivver will be made in the USA from state-of-the-art, conductive resins that activate touch screens by touching you. This way, you can use touch screens without touching them at all. All while supporting local manufacturing.  Slivver is essential to the public as we move forward in a tech dominating society with more antibiotic resistant super-viruses everyday. Protecting ourselves against infectious disease is a priority that will gain even more significance as we continue to use screens as a means of completing transactions and communication. As a generation, it is imperative that we each take individual strides to assist in safely using the technology that is provided to us.

5% of all proceeds go to charity


In acknowledgment of all of your help we are eager to give back. We are passionate about extending the impact of Slivver's launch by having a percentage of sales go charity. With the money you contribute we will be able to donate to the color-coded charities above. By raising these funds you are not only helping us, but you are helping others. 


Raising $24,000

Research & Development:

In order to develop the thinnest most sleek design it is imperative to have the ability to test out different versions of Slivver. By working with various manufacturers to perfect the final design of Slivver I will be able to efficiently move ahead without setbacks down the road. 


Production & Inventory:

While the majority of Slivver sales will be online there will be a percentage sold via retail. That being said it is crucial that there are over at least 1,000 units of inventory at all times to supply both retail outlets as well as online orders. 


Marketing & Advertising Strategy:

We all know how important social media is in the launch of any product or service. Targeting all ages we will use various social media platforms to appeal to users of all demographics. More broadly we are passionate about using alternative marketing methods to gain exposure to those who are not on the internet through marketing campaigns that give mass exposure such as billboards, mass mailings, advertorials and press.

story:
Tune Your World

We believe that thoughts move the world.

But the world is in chaos. Destabilized. We are on the cusp of self-destruction. We're tuned into the next disaster. The next collapse.

We also have goals. Dreams. We need to make decisions. Need better ideas. We live in a world of ultrafast information. Data processing. Social media. Thoughts on glass.

Our thoughts are (often) on the wrong frequency. Tune your thoughts. Tune your world.

Future Technology is Software-free

As soon as you pick up the Tarc Skylark, your mind becomes more efficient. You think better. And because you think better, you have better ideas. We could've called it an Idea Booster.

The Tarc has been in development for 7 years and has gone through a number of iterations. The Skylark is the latest version of this battery-free and software-free device. This is an electronic device of the future, you know, less reliance on computers and fewer robots.

This is where it starts, the Tarc Skylark.

Relying on advanced sciences (eg subtle frequencies, electron flow), the Tarc Skylark broadens your mental framework. It magnifies your ability to process information. And it can elevate your mind like never before. Think of it as a pocket information booster.

The Tarc Skylark fits comfortably in the palm of your hand. Or your pocket. Even as a pendant around your neck. Reach for this thought instrument whenever you need a (natural) clarity boost.

Rise above the crowd.

The mind generates electromagnetic energy. It operates on a frequency, and everyone is unique. The technology in this device interacts with this frequency. It helps to balance your mental energy.

Better focus. Clarity. Solutions to problems. New ideas. Making decisions in life. It can improve mood and even helps with things like meditation. Any activity that involves thinking.

For some people, having a Tarc nearby is enough to access its power. We think of it as wireless biology (Wio-Bio).

A technologic leap.

The technology inside the pure copper housing is an electronic hybrid, pioneered by its inventor Paris Tosen. Tested and developed for over 7 years, the device works (best) for people who are in tune with their bodies.

  • Do you meditate?
  • Can you feel people’s energy?
  • Do you have an advanced level of perception?
  • Are you magical? Intuitive?
  • A researcher?
  • A thinker?
  • Looking for a natural way to expand your consciousness?

Tarc Skylark isn’t for everyone. Yet. We’re working on it. We’d like to continue to develop this thought-based technology. We’d like to make an even better Tarc and we want your support.

Beyond just copper.

The exterior is designed to appear clean and simple. But the science behind the device is advanced. To amplify a person’s thought without standard electronics, we had to develop an engine that modulates thought energy. But it doesn’t add energy to your mind. It augments your own internal processes. So that you remain in control.

The think engine.

No software. No microchip. Inside the fifth-generation Tarc Skylark is what we call the think engine. Actually it’s a simple architecture that improves mental clarity. Think of it as a supplemental battery. A mental support system that makes you a better you. A family secret.

Not another electronic toy.

This is not another electronic toy. There are no moving parts. The Tarc Skylark doesn't need a battery. With a unique approach to technology and human interaction, you are empowered without transistors. And when you need a little time for yourself, the Tarc Skylark is there to lift your thoughts onto a higher frequency.

Fifth generation

The original Tarc introduced the very first transistor-free thought instrument. With thought clarity and amplification, you can access new levels of information. It interacts with your energy, at a level within your comfort and ability. And it improves as you improve.

The latest developments will be incorporated into the devices. (Because we are working hard to make it better, that is, our inventor.)

A classic design. Copper.

Copper is magical. One of the best electrical conductors available. The casing is made of pure copper. Touching the metal activates the device. That’s why there’s no exterior finish to interfere with this process.

Because Tarcs are handmade, there are imperfections in the final product and sizes may be different. These differences do not impact the benefits of the device.

Copper tarnishes, and may need polishing.

Faster thinking. Better insights.

Tarc Skylark features a new think engine allowing your mind to process and manages more thoughts than ever. It supports every level of thinker and works within the user’s capacity. And as you get better the Tarc is right there with you.

Why invent a thought instrument

Inventor Paris Tosen is an avid thinker and multitasker. His efforts to expand his mind, to grow his consciousness and to tap into his genetic heritage, became a challenge due to information overload. The Tarc device was able to leapfrog those lower frequencies.

Humans rely on drug and energy formulas to enhance their effectiveness in the world. This device suggests that we can overcome life’s challenges by improving your vibration.

Better Tarc, better living.

This crowdfunding campaign will allow this thought instrument to continue its development, and it provides a new tool for our information society. It will also alleviate some of the concerns of a robot-dominated future.

The new Tarc Skylark is unique. Each device is handmade and inspected for quality. With no moving parts, the Tarc Skylark will last many years. Our models from even three years ago work just fine. (Some variations and imperfections in the final product will occur due to each device being handmade.)

Your support will help improve the design, allow us to access production facilities, and, as well, to source higher quality materials. Funding will also help us to build a better workshop.

FAQ

1. Why use copper?

It conducts electricity, as does your body. Looks nice. And has natural antimicrobial properties. (Just needs a polish now and then.)

2. Why doesn’t Tarc work for everyone?

A thought instrument is software-free. There's no On/Off switch. This requires the user to apply their mental focus and energy to compensate. And it takes a bit of practice. Not everyone is up for that. People prefer a On/Off switch.

3. Is anything inside the device?

Yes. Right now it’s a family secret. There’s a little think drive inside to push you along. The device is designed as a complete unit, each part has been thoughtfully incorporated so as to produce the desired result.

4. Does it come in other sizes?

We’ve tried other sizes and styles. For now it is available as a palm version. Power in the palm. It is also available as a pendant.

5. Does it use a battery?

You are the battery. Your energy powers the Tarc Skylark. It will last as long as you.

6. Is every Tarc the same?

The technology is the same, but due to each device being handmade there will be imperfections and size differences. Each device is unique.

7. Is it waterproof?

The device is water resistant.

8. Will the Tarc Skylark change the world?

No. This is a simple device to help modulate your thinking processes.

9. Can a device work without software? It sounds funny.

This device is powered by thought and thought energy. Thought is the software interface, which requires a person to be able to focus or to be in tune with their thoughts.

story:
Short Summary

Came here looking for a new way to extend your smartphone battery life? Well, no wonder most smartphone batteries last only 8 hours on average, after about 750 cycles (charge and recharge) the battery will be completely dead steadily going down each year in terms of overall capacity and on average, according to Forbes, they are obsolete in just 2 years! If you are looking for a way to avoid this we've found a better way to extend your battery life for years without ever needing to plug it in the wall to charge it again. Support us in our campaign to combat your dead batteries, to prevent climate change and to end energy poverty. Singularity is attracting the most brilliant minds like Drs. Paul Mason, Brian Riely and Mark Prelas to produce the B-Volt™ battery -- the battery that lasts 56 years -- that is cheap, safe and biodegradeable.

What We Need & What You Get

Through the Maryland Industrial Partnerships (MIPS) Program we will have an opportunity to produce the prototype for our initial design, which will be the B-Volt Basic™ and it will come in the 9v, AA and AAA versions while they will contribute $90,000 to the project we need just $10,000 to match to pay for the usage of university labs and staff. Any prototypes we create we will offer to our fans through our perks we have listed.

However, to build the really cool stuff, like a smartphone and electric car charger, we will need more so we set the campaign at $109,100 because we want to be able to give these things to our fans. There are perks set so you can eventually get to test and own the completed version of our EverCell™ Charger for your Smartphone and the EverSpark™ Charger for your electric car.

The Impact

Everything we have done up to this point is to put together really good ideas and theories. Initially, all money will be devoted directly to testing them out and building real prototypes we will display to the community with full length product demonstration footage. Every dollar will truly go to good use toward truly ending energy poverty for those 1.6 billion in the world who do not have access to electricity and the other 5.6 billion people who obtain energy from polluting sources of energy, like coal, oil and natural gas. 

To date there continues to be no truly cheap, high-powered and abundant alternative to hydrocarbons, especially for the third-world, till now with Singularity, Inc.'s B-Volt Technology™ the world will change for the better. By donating even just one dollar you are making the world a much, much, better and cleaner place for future generations to live in.

Risks & Challenges

We are fighting many entrenched interests to build and promote our batteries. 

The global battery market is dominated by monolithic dinosaurs like alkaline-lead and lithium-ion batteries that have mostly not changed in half a century. They will be tough competitors to beat without serious investment of money and time and will require a dedicated fan base to carry us through! 

Matthew McNey in a previous venture did not quit and saw building his sales organization through even as times were tough on him. He dealt with severe financial stress as the bank made a call on his assets. However, he was stalwart, savvy and did not quit when the going got tough and saw his team through to success. He has recruited a team of people who are just like that for this endeavor.

Though betavoltaics have been around since the 1950s never before will they have been mass produced on the scale that Singularity, Inc. is attempting and this is inherently risky. Our team is uniquely qualified to overcome logistical challenges that may arise, however, with decades of experience with nuclear batteries. We are using 90Sr, which while a rather harmless and benevolent nuclear byproduct, it is highly regulated by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) so there will be regulatory hurdles. However, Dr. Paul Mason is an expert in NRC guidelines from his former work as a radiation safety officer for the U.S. Air Force and Dr. Mark Prelas used to work for the U.S. State Department for their Arms Control unit between the two of them they know exactly how to design a battery that will follow the guidelines to build a battery that will be considered "exempt" and be treated like smoke detectors.

In addition, anticipating the legal and regulatory challenges Founder and CEO Matthew McNey and future CFO Mike Bayuk went to Congress and launched a bipartisan effort to lockdown political support for our project. Soon we will add the names of several prominent politicians to the project's growing list of supporters.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are always looking for free labor, publicity and are open to bartering using everything, but cash until we have some. You can send a DM to the CEO Matt McNey to his twitter handle @MattMcney (we also have a message service on the website at: www.thesingularityinc.com) for ways you can help outside of funding and make sure to follow him for more updates!

Here are some helpful steps for you too follow too:

Step One: Donate and become a support of our Indiegogo campaign!

Step Two: Share our campaign throughout your social media community (use the Indiegogo share tool)!

Step Three: Tell friends and family spread the word about the project and the company!

story:
XTRON is the world's first true USB Type-C power bank with high power output at 4.2A and large capacity boasting 13400 mAh lithium- ion battery cells. Ideal for business and leisure travellers, the extreme gamer, the gadget obsessed, also suitable for outdoor activities like camping, hiking and anyone who has had a device low on power at the most inconvenient time.

XTRON comes in 2 awesome colors: black & white!

 

 

 

XTRON operates with world-class USB-C smart-control ICs and charging/discharging chips from TI (Texas Instruments), the same as those found in Apple’s new MacBook 2015.

 

 

XTRON uses FR-4 (Fire Retardant 4) T6135 4-layer PCB (Printed Circuit Board) of 2 oz copper thickness for greater thermal resistance and improved product performance, achieving expected product effectiveness, whilst most other brands only use a 2-layer PCB of 1 oz. 

 

A maximum output of 4.2A recharges your devices in no time, taking you to a whole new level of high-speed charging. 3.5 hours of charging time extends your new MacBook's battery life for extra 8 hours.

 


Supports pass-through charging: XTRON charges itself while charging other connected devices, that makes XTRON faster and efficient.
 
XTRON juices up your MacBook, Nexus 5X, Nexus 6P, iPhone 6s, iPad Pro, Beats solo2, Jabra Sports Pulse, PS4 controller, GoPro Hero 4 session and more!
 

Charge all your USB-C connector devices quickly and safely, using just our USB-C to USB-C cable with premium aluminium connectors. Built into the cable's USB-C connector is an electronic marker (E-marker). The e-marker is a chipset that enables the connected devices to identify the capabilities of the cable. This feature ensures optimum performance and compatibility between the connected devices and the cable.

Note: * USB-C to USB-C cable NOT included, must be purchased separately.

 

Equipped with USB-C and standard USB-A ports, XTRON allows you to charge 2 devices at the same time with super fast speed.

The material used for the casing of XTRON is PC+ABS (UL 94-V0 flame-retardant fire rating), thus making the enclosure of XTRON flexible and non-brittle.

We have also enhanced the matte surface coating to provide users with both a visual and a tactile experience like no other, this creates a highly desirable soft-touch tactile feel with the visual ceramic-like finish to give a full sensory combination, delivering a high quality, yet durable and easy-to-clean finish.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

By carrying the XTRON with you, you don’t have to worry about losing power and fighting or running for a seat next to a power socket in airports or Starbucks will be a thing of the past.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Do you enjoy grabbing a coffee or pastry in Starbucks while using your MacBook to do some work, download music, watch videos on YouTube, check Facebook or e-mails or surf the net? Are you a frequent flyer in New York today and in Tokyo tomorrow, and then in London the next day and need to use your MacBook constantly to reply e-mails to customers, work on a presentation or search for information? As a uni student, do you often park your MacBook in the library and spend an entire day writing assignments or discussing with other classmates of your workgroup on the graduate showcase exhibition?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Using XTRON couldn’t be easier. Simply plug in one end of the charging cable to the XTRON and use other end to plug into the device you wish to charge. Next, press and hold the power button and XTRON will start charging device automatically.

 

 

 

 

 

XTRON has a huge capacity of 13400 mAh whilst maintaining a lightweight and compact design that fits in the palm of your hand.

 

 

It is a universal USB-C power bank that aims to be the only power bank you will need for your various devices as it not only works with USB-C devices, but also any Apple device with a Lightning connector as well as Micro USB devices which include: the new MacBook, iPhone 6s, iPad Pro, iPad mini 4, Apple Watch, Nexus 5X, Nexus 6P, Beats Solo2 Wireless, Beats pill, PS4 controller, drones and many more!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Lab & Production Facility

 

 

XTRON will be 100% made in Taiwan from start to finish.
Lab and production facility of established suppliers that we work with in Taiwan.

 

 

 

 

 

 


What makes XTRON the world’s first true USB-C power bank?
XTRON operates with world-class USB-C (USB 3.1) smart control ICs and charging/discharging chips from TI (Texas Instruments), the same as those found in Apple’s new 12” MacBook 2015.
Unlike some brands out there who claim to have USB-C power banks available (but do not even a physical prototype or sample to show), XTRON is the first already produced and genuine existing USB-C power bank in the market.

Where can I buy XTRON after the Indiegogo campaign?
We are mainly focused on delivering units to our Indiegogo backers. Our Indiegogo backers will be the first ones to enjoy the XTRON USB-C power bank.

Why do you set quantity limits on your pre-order?
Because we are committed to deliver exactly what we offer, at the price we offer it, and on the timeline we advertise.
Therefore, it's important for us to set quantities of perks for which realistically there is only a limited number we can fulfill.Most importantly, we want to make sure every XTRON we produce is perfect before we send it to all our backers.

 

 

How do I use XTRON?
Using the XTRON USB-C power bank is easy. Simply plug in one end of the charging cable to the XTRON and use other end to plug into the device you wish to charge. Next, press and hold the power button and XTRON will start charging device automatically.

Will XTRON charge MacBook Air or MacBook Pro?
Sorry, XTRON doesn’t charge MacBook Air or MacBook Pro, since both MacBook Air and MacBook Pro use Apple’s proprietary MagSafe connector.

How long does XTRON take to charge my new 12” MacBook?
A maximum output of 4.2A recharges your devices in no time, taking you to a whole new level of high-speed charging. 3.5 hours of charging time extends your new MacBook's battery life for extra 8 hours.

How do I choose the color of my XTRON?
XTRON comes in 2 awesome colours: black & white. There are also 2 special and limited edition colours in our Christmas Special pack perk. Simply go through the perks and choose the colour option that tickles your fancy!

I can't wait! When will you ship XTRON?
The first run will ship in November 2015. Actual shipping dates may vary. We will keep you updated of your XTRON shipping date.
story_txt:
XTRON is the world's first true USB Type-C power bank with high power output at 4.2A and large capacity boasting 13400 mAh lithium- ion battery cells. Ideal for business and leisure travellers, the extreme gamer, the gadget obsessed, also suitable for outdoor activities like camping, hiking and anyone who has had a device low on power at the most inconvenient time.
XTRON comes in 2 awesome colors: black & white!
 
 


 

XTRON operates with world-class USB-C smart-control ICs and charging/discharging chips from TI (Texas Instruments), the same as those found in Apple’s new MacBook 2015.


 
 
XTRON uses FR-4 (Fire Retardant 4) T6135 4-layer PCB (Printed Circuit Board) of 2 oz copper thickness for greater thermal resistance and improved product performance, achieving expected product effectiveness, whilst most other brands only use a 2-layer PCB of 1 oz. 

 A maximum output of 4.2A recharges your devices in no time, taking you to a whole new level of high-speed charging. 3.5 hours of charging time extends your new MacBook's battery life for extra 8 hours. 

Supports pass-through charging: XTRON charges itself while charging other connected devices, that makes XTRON faster and efficient.

 
XTRON juices up your MacBook, Nexus 5X, Nexus 6P, iPhone 6s, iPad Pro, Beats solo2, Jabra Sports Pulse, PS4 controller, GoPro Hero 4 session and more!

 

Charge all your USB-C connector devices quickly and safely, using just our USB-C to USB-C cable with premium aluminium connectors. Built into the cable's USB-C connector is an electronic marker (E-marker). The e-marker is a chipset that enables the connected devices to identify the capabilities of the cable. This feature ensures optimum performance and compatibility between the connected devices and the cable.
Note: * USB-C to USB-C cable NOT included, must be purchased separately.


 

Equipped with USB-C and standard USB-A ports, XTRON allows you to charge 2 devices at the same time with super fast speed.



The material used for the casing of XTRON is PC+ABS (UL 94-V0 flame-retardant fire rating), thus making the enclosure of XTRON flexible and non-brittle.
We have also enhanced the matte surface coating to provide users with both a visual and a tactile experience like no other, this creates a highly desirable soft-touch tactile feel with the visual ceramic-like finish to give a full sensory combination, delivering a high quality, yet durable and easy-to-clean finish.

story:
About project

This project is created with the basic idea to provide tiny, cheap and versatile PCB for ATtiny25/45/85 microcontroler, that you can leave it in your project with no regret of losing expensive Arduino board.

With the fraction of the Arduino price this small, but powerful uC ATtiny25/45/85 can be leave wherever you want. Many project can be simply shrink down to fit in to  ATtiny85 with 8k of flash memory.

PCB fit to 8 Pin IC's like ATtiny13, ATtiny15 ,ATtiny25, ATtiny45, ATtiny85. 


This small PCB fit in to the bread board, so you can develop your idea at first. And when you are ready just leave it in your final project because it is so cheap.


What is nice about ATtiny25/45/85 PCB that it have extremely narrow design that you can use 4 pins on each side of the bread board.
For compare you can see how many space do we lose with Arduino Micro.


Here is an example of classical blinking sketch running base on ATtiny25.


What makes this PCB so cool is that it is full reversible SMD and THT. It mean that depending on your soldering skills you can use one of the two options, SMD on one side and THT on the other side. You can also mixed both version depending on components in your warehouse.


Another example show ATtiny85 running OLED display SSD1306 via I2C interface.


Standard 6 pin ISP connector allowed you to program in easy way ATtiny25/45/85.


It has a really tiny size.


ATtiny85 running 2 servos.


Here is the video for How-To Shrinkify Your Arduino with detail explanation.


Each pin on this PCB is well describe on silkscreen that you don't need any documentation when you are playing with your prototype.
However, here you can find schematic for ATtiny25/45/85 PCB.

Pin of the ATtiny85 PCB.

Tech spec

  • size: 33.5 x 11.2 mm
  • package: THT DIP8 ATtiny25/45/85
  • package: SMD SO08 ATtiny25/45/85
  • reset switch, top and bottom side.
  • reversible components THT - top side, SMD - bottom side
  • standard 6 pin ISP programming connector.
  • 2 output connector with access for all pins of uC
  • schematic

Perk

Early Birds ATtiny25/45/85 PCB - limited to 10 sets

Early Adopters ATtiny25/45/85 PCB - limited to 20 sets

ATtiny25/45/85 PCB

ATtiny25/45/85  all parts

12 asseembled redy to go kits with ATtiny85 on board

1 asseembled redy to go kit with ATtiny85 on board


Risks & Challenges

Hardware project always involve risk. It is no different in this one.
 
This is my second campaign. With the first one all liabilities were fulfilled, and everything was done on time. I will make every effort to ensure that this time also this happen.

Timeline

week 46  2015 - End of campaign
week 47  2015 - Adjust design
week 48  2015 - Order PCB
week    1  2016 - PCB arrive
week    2  2016 - Early Birds ready to be shipped
week    3  2016 - other Founders ready to be shipped

Free Bonus

As a added bonus for those who pledge one of ATtiny85 perk and share this project on Facebook or Twitter with #ATtiny85 I will add one more free ATtiny25/45/85 PCB.


Thank you !

story:
Short Summary

Mobile Hang is a device that allows hands-free use of your smart device while traveling.  It is also designed to double as a desk easel to hold the device for a comfortable viewing angle.  When the device is not in use, it collapses down to the size of a credit card to fit in a wallet or purse. 

There are millions of travelers every day that use their smart device while in the air.  There are other devices that can hold their smart device, but all of them are bulky. 

This device can be stored anywhere in your luggage without needing to worry about taking up any more space than a credit card. 

 What We Need & What You Get

We need enough money to create injection plastic molds to mass produce this product.

  • Bronze Level
    This may seem like a small donation, but not to us. Every pledge helps us meet our goal. You will have access to product updates as well as having your name included in an honorable mention on our website thanking you for your support.
  • Silver Level
    Bumper sticker that says "I was the first to invest in Mobile Hang !!!", and an honorable mention on our website!
  • Gold Level
    Be the first to get the mobile hang device sent to you, with an included guarantee for life. If your Mobile hang breaks, send it back to us and we will replace it. If we create an updated design, send us your old one, and we will send you the brand new one! We will also include the bumper sticker, and an honorable mention on our website.
  • Platinum Level
    Be the first to get the mobile hang device, and send one to a friend or family member. Both will include a guarantee for life. If your Mobile hang breaks, send it back to us and we will replace it. If we create an updated design, send us your old one, and we will send you the brand new one! We will also include the bumper sticker, and an honorable mention on our website.
  • Titanium Level
    Be the first to get the mobile hang device, and send one to five friends or family members. We will gift wrap them, and you can offer a personal dedication included with the gift. We will also put your name on our special tribute web page as a Titanium contributor. All of the devices will include a guarantee for life. If any of the Mobile hang devices break, send us the broken one, and we will replace it. If we create an updated design, we will automatically send you a new one without having to send us the old one. After all, you are a Titanium contributor.

This project has several components.  First, we have to finalize the design.  The prototype has showed proof of concept.  We have already added several updated features to improve the functionality of the device.  We added some no slip pads, and some snaps to ensure the unit stays flat and closed when not in use.  We also are working on a prototype that will be a little bigger than a credit card, but will be able to accommodate a bigger tablet than just an iPad mini.   The manufacturer that we are using is located in Bristol, PA.  They helped with the final design, and created the prototype.  The prototype had to be machined by hand.  Once we reach our funding goal, we can mass produce the product.  We also welcome any suggestions from our funders.  Since the molds haven't been created yet, it's a perfect time to make suggestions.  The molds will take about eight weeks to create, so we are hoping to have them created by the holidays. 

 



Risks & Challenges

With every new product, there is a chance that it won't be popular. 

Here are the risks that we have identified and our solutions:

Risk:

Knock offs, or replicas

Mitigation:

Mobile Hang is currently under Patent Pending protection.

Risk:

Mobile Hang won't be popular

Mitigation:

Testing market with crowd funding, and test groups of frequent fliers.  So far the response has been overwhelmingly popular.

Risk:

Mobile Hang is liable for damage to smartphone.

Mitigation:

There will be a warning on the package that Mobile Hang is not responsible for damage to a mobile device. Provided the Mobile Hang is properly used, the device will be secure.

Risk:

Mobile Hang won't make crowd funding goal

Mitigation:

We will seek outside investors.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Send out a tweet with the link to our crowdfunding campaign.
  • Send us an email with a suggestion, and we will try and incorporate it into the final design.

story:
MagniSun

Now any beach umbrella or tent can be put to work charging a phone, or USB-compatible device, with the clean power of the sun. The MagniSun was conceived as a USB solar charger that can be easily clipped on to any umbrella or tent using magnetic straps. No other USB solar chargers offer magnetic straps for mounting on umbrellas or the fabric of tents, backpacks, tarps, outdoor sunshades, and awnings. The flexible panel can even be left attached to an umbrella while folded up and can fold up with it. While unattached, the MagniSun can be laid out on any flat surface.

The MagniSun solar charger can power USB-compatible devices including mobile phones, iPods, battery packs, cameras, GPS devices, vaporizer pens and ebooks. In direct sunlight, the MagniSun will take about 4 hours to fully charge an average smart phone.

The 4 Watt solar PV panel is flexible and fold-able, with 5 V USB jack output (max current output: approx. 800 mA).



Dimensions-

Folded: 8" (200 mm) x 5.2" (130 mm) x 1.2" thick (30 mm)

Expanded: 8" (200 mm) x 14" (355 mm) x 0.1" thick (2 mm)

Weight: 7 oz. (200 g)

Part of the back side of the MagniSun solar charger (opposite side as the solar panel), has a smooth laminate surface for small battery packs with suction cups to be attached, such as the XPAL PoP’n (described below).


Whether for safety, social media, pictures or videos, everybody wants their smartphones charged and ready no matter where they are. The market trend is to add USB-compatible charging ports or cords to just about any type of small electronic device.


                                                                                            

Approach 

OC Outdoor Solar's founder has always wanted to keep a phone charged (mostly for taking pictures, or for emergency use) while camping or hiking, and has been been experimenting with portable solar chargers for over two years. One day he brought one of these solar panels to the beach, and laid it out on a beach towel. While the panel did a fine job charging an iPhone in the summer sun, extra care had to be taken to not let sand get in the USB port. 

Beachgoers who want to charge their phones with a solar charger do not want to lay a charger on the sand, as sand could get into the charging port.  Beach towel space is also often at a premium.  The logical solution is to mount the solar charger up on the top surface of any beach umbrella, and no other adaptable solution for doing this is yet on the market. Experimenting with several existing solar panels, initial efforts of OC Outdoor Solar focused on finding a way to mount solar PV panels on umbrellas. The first prototype with the umbrella-mounting of a flexible 3 Watt PV array had it semi-permanently attached to the umbrella fabric, with permanent holes to be punched through the fabric. 

The MagniSun, using magnetic straps, was conceived to allow the solar charger to be easily clipped on to any existing umbrella, without any permanent holes cut into it. The magnetic straps also allow the charger to be temporarily attached all kinds of fabric surfaces: tents, tarps, outdoor sunshades, and awnings.

Never have your cell phone dead at the beach ever again. Put your sun umbrella to work, charging your phone. Unfold it from your backpack or beach bag, clip it on to your beach umbrella with the magnetic straps, and have power all day! Enjoy the beach time to speak freely, listen to music, or call and text friends because you will always have mobile power. 


Hiking and Camping-

Solar power on demand in the great outdoors! The MagniSun charger can be attached to the fabric of tents or a tent rainfly. Backpackers, far away from their vehicles or civilization, can keep their phones and other devices charged.

Canopy Tents/Outdoor Events-

Attendees of outdoor events and festivals, who have no convenient source of power, can attached the charger to their sun umbrellas and canopy tents. Concertgoers commonly use their smart phones at concerts to take pictures and record videos.  At outdoor events, vendors can also mount the charger onto their canopy tents.


                                                                                           

Future Vision


OC Outdoor Solar‘s “Global Vision”-

In the future, OC Outdoor Solar seeks to help provide off-grid charging solutions such as solar phones or external solar chargers in emerging markets. Around the world, there are hundreds of millions of mobile phone users without access to the electricity grid, a factor which severely limits communication opportunities.

Simple uses of electricity such as small lights, radios, or cell phones help improve people’s lives in significant ways, and can all be charged or directly powered with a small solar charger. Sun umbrellas, tents, canopies, tarps, awnings and other fabric sunshades are common all over the world. As part of the crowdfunding campaign, OC Outdoor Solar will donate 5% of the total amount raised to Green Empowerment and other organizations dedicated to getting clean energy into the hands of people around the world without reliable sources of electricity. 

Green Empowerment is an amazing organization that works with local partners around the world to strengthen communities by delivering renewable energy and safe water. Click here to learn more.

                                                                                          

Storing the Energy of the MagniSun

Storing the Solar Energy in a Battery; Partnership in XPAL Power-

OC Outdoor Solar has recently partnered with battery pack manufacturer XPAL Power, who are also based in Orange County. As part of this crowdfunding campaign, XPAL Power has generously offered to let us include their PowerSkin PoP'n 1 USB battery pack in the MagniSun campaign offerings. The amazing PoP'n 1 battery pack, with 2000 mAh of energy storage capacity, is equipped with suction cups that can attach to any smooth surface, as seen below. The PoP'n can be charged while being attached to the new MagniSun prototype, which has a smooth laminate surface on the back (non-PV panel) side. With the PoP'n battery pack, you can take your MagniSun-generated solar energy from the beach (or anywhere outside) and use it anywhere indoors or later at night.
                                                                                           
What We Need & What You Get

Material and production costs: $1,500

Equipment, tools, misc. supplies: $500

Shipping: $250

Misc.: $125

Nonprofit donations (5% of total raised): $125 (Min.) 

Total: $2,500

Funds raised through Indiegogo will help us bring MagniSun to life. We will need to cover upfront costs such and minimum order quantity thresholds of suppliers. Once built, each unit will need to be tested and certified to assure what we have built is safe and reliable. At the end of it all, we will be able to deliver a great product that you helped build.


Over the next couple months, we will be working on minor improvements, such as refining the smooth surface material (for attaching the suction cups of the battery pack) selecting a cap on the end of the female USB connector, to keep out sand, dirt, etc. when it is not in use.

The main source components are manufactured in Asia, though the complete solar umbrellas will be integrated and assembled in Orange County, California. There will be some risk factor in the quality control and lead times of contract manufacturing of the source components due to the distances to the suppliers. However, quality of the source product samples of the chosen component suppliers has been excellent. 

                                                                                               

Why your support is really important for us

We are proud to present MagniSun and the team that made it possible. Just as important, you can also support us by spreading the word through social channels, reaching out to your networks through email, sharing with bloggers and others in the media.

                                                                                               

Risks & Challenges

The main source components are manufactured in Asia, though the complete solar umbrellas will be integrated and assembled in Fullerton, California. There will be some risk factor in the quality control and lead times of contract manufacturing of the source components due to the distances to the suppliers.  The most critical supplier of PV panels has had an excellent relationship with OC Outdoor Solar from the beginning of project, providing good quality source product samples and short logistical turn-around and shipment times for the initial small-batch orders. However, we will continue  to investigate alternative component suppliers in case our existing primary PV panel supplier is not able to meet our expectations.  There exist several different suppliers that could provide PV panels for the MagniSun, and a wider variety of suppliers for the other components (magnets, straps, dust covers, etc.).

                                                                                               

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t financially contribute you can still help. Share, Post, Tweet, Follow and Like on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn and any other social media platform that you are on.

                                                                                               


Brian Yanity

President/Founder, Chief Technical Officer

Electrical engineer and project manager with a lifelong passion for renewable energy, including solar energy. Also a lifelong outdoor enthusiast, Brian always been interested in portable solar panels that he can take along hiking, camping, or sitting on the beach. Since spring of the 2013, Brian has tested various types of foldable, flexible solar panels, and founded OC Outdoor Solar in late 2013. 


Courtney Aura Freeman

Marketing Product Manger

Seasoned marketing product manager with over ten years of business to business and business to consumer marketing strategy, product development, performance optimization, user experience testing and design consultation for both Fortune 500 companies and tech start-ups.


Breanna Bremer, MBA

Marketing and Sales

Experienced business professional with expertise in marketing, business development, and general management consulting.


Saquib Ahmed, Ph.D.

Technical Advisor

Physicist/materials scientist who has devoted his career to improving photovoltaics and semiconductors. Extensive academic research experience in Semiconductor Physics, Nanotechnology and Photovoltaics.


Khosro Eddie Mehrfar, Ph. D.

Business Advisor

Engineer with extensive experience in energy systems. Founder of Mehr US Corp., and his interest in alternative, sustainable clean energy led him to be part of an Orange County-based company dedicated to solar energy, Mehr Solar. 


Ruben Gonzalez, Dot Fulfillment Services

Fulfillment, Logistics and Shipping

29 Year Veteran in the fulfillment, printing, promotions & marketing industry. Started with the Dot in 1996, helped to build the Dot from a start up to a market leading organization with year over year profitable growth. Dot Fulfillment offers product & literature, Direct Mail & eWorkflow solutions.


                                                                                                                                                      

Frequently Asked Questions


What electronic devices can be charged with the MagniSun solar charger?

The MagniSun charger can be connected to any electronic device that can be charged or powered with a standard USB male connector.  The 4W solar panel is be capable of producing up to 800 mA of current at 5 V from its female USB port.  However, on partly-cloudy days, the panel would be producing about half that amount of mA.  USB cables can charge a wide variety of devices, with a wide variety of power demand.  So it is important that the user determine that the 4W panel can satisfactorily power or charge a particular device with at most 670 mA, or more than one device using a splitter hub.

Unfortunately, the 4W panel does not provide enough power to charge an iPad, which has a required current required of 1 Amp (1,000 mA) via USB at 5V.  Also, laptops and macbooks need more power (usually around several amps at 5 V) than could be provided by this 4W panel.

It should also be noted that USB adapters for device-specific charging connector types, other than standard USB, are not included with the MagniSun.


What solar PV USB-charging umbrellas are already on the market?

There are a few umbrellas with permanently mounted PV-powered USB chargers on the market, but they have tended to be larger, heavier patio umbrellas costing several hundred dollars. Also, the entire umbrella must be purchased, as the solar PV-panels are permanently attached to the umbrella. The MagniSun is much more appropriate for the portable applications such as the beach or camping, uses any existing umbrella, and is much more affordable. 


What could interrupt the MagniSun’s charging?

The MagniSun charging’s can be interrupted if the PV panel becomes shaded, or is turned away from the sun. If clouds pass overhead, or if a shadow is cast over the MagniSun, the charging can become interrupted. Phones will often reject the charge in cases like these. Connecting the MagniSun to a USB-compatible battery pack (see below) is recommended, which can still charge until much lower light conditions than a phone, and can store the energy to be used later (including at night).

Certain phones, such as the common Apple iPhone 4 and iPhone 5 models, may display "Accessory may not be supported" or similar message after being connected to a MagniSun charger, after which it stops charging. This is just because of the software of the phone’s power management system, and the MagniSun charger will still charge the phone with a couple simple steps. When the USB charging cable is connected to the phone, the smartphone firmware will detect if the power input is enough or not. If it is below the minimum "startup" power level, iPhone 4 and iPhone 5 will show this message and cut off charging. But an iPhone 4S will not have this problem because it has a different power management system. After the phone displays the message "Accessory may not be supported", follow these two steps (repeat if necessary):

  1. Position the solar panel under good sun light (if available)

  2. Re-plug the charging cable

It should be noted that any cell phone being charged should not be left in the direct sun on a warm day, or under a dark object in the sun, for an extended period. An overheated phone will not charge efficiently. It is recommended that the phone be kept in the shade if possible. 


Does the solar charger store energy with a battery?

The MagniSun does not have its own internal battery to store the solar energy, for use when the sun is not shining (charge during the day for use at night, for example). However, on the market there are a variety of compact and portable USB-compatible battery packs which could be connected to the MagniSun. As described above, OC Outdoor Solar has recently partnered with battery pack manufacturer XPAL Power as part of this crowdfunding campaign. XPAL Power’s PoP'n 1 battery pack, with 2000 mAh of energy storage capacity, is equipped with suction cups to attach to any smooth surface, including the back side of the MagniSun.


Is the flexible solar panel waterproof?

The MagniSun will withstand rain or minor splashes on the panel, although it is not designed to be totally submerged in water. 


If you've made it this far, you know too much.  Consider joining our team and share our project with your solar-loving friends or donate now.  Thanks in advance for your support!
story_txt:
MagniSun
Now any beach umbrella or tent can be put to work charging a phone, or USB-compatible device, with the clean power of the sun. The MagniSun was conceived as a USB solar charger that can be easily clipped on to any umbrella or tent using magnetic straps. No other USB solar chargers offer magnetic straps for mounting on umbrellas or the fabric of tents, backpacks, tarps, outdoor sunshades, and awnings. The flexible panel can even be left attached to an umbrella while folded up and can fold up with it. While unattached, the MagniSun can be laid out on any flat surface.

The MagniSun solar charger can power USB-compatible devices including mobile phones, iPods, battery packs, cameras, GPS devices, vaporizer pens and ebooks. In direct sunlight, the MagniSun will take about 4 hours to fully charge an average smart phone.The 4 Watt solar PV panel is flexible and fold-able, with 5 V USB jack output (max current output: approx. 800 mA).



Dimensions-
Folded: 8" (200 mm) x 5.2" (130 mm) x 1.2" thick (30 mm)
Expanded: 8" (200 mm) x 14" (355 mm) x 0.1" thick (2 mm)
Weight: 7 oz. (200 g)
Part of the back side of the MagniSun solar charger (opposite side as the solar panel), has a smooth laminate surface for small battery packs with suction cups to be attached, such as the XPAL PoP’n (described below).

Whether for safety, social media, pictures or videos, everybody wants their smartphones charged and ready no matter where they are. The market trend is to add USB-compatible charging ports or cords to just about any type of small electronic device.



                                                                                             
Approach 
OC Outdoor Solar's founder has always wanted to keep a phone charged (mostly for taking pictures, or for emergency use) while camping or hiking, and has been been experimenting with portable solar chargers for over two years. One
 day he brought one of these solar panels to the beach, and laid it out on a beach
 towel. While the panel did a fine job charging an iPhone in the summer 
sun, extra care had to be taken to 
not let sand get in the USB port.  

Beachgoers
who want to charge their phones with a solar charger do not want to lay a
charger on the sand, as sand could get into the charging port.  Beach
towel space is also often at a premium.  The logical solution is
to mount the solar charger up on the top surface of any beach umbrella,
and no other adaptable solution for doing this is yet on the market. Experimenting with several existing solar panels, initial efforts of OC Outdoor Solar focused on finding a way to mount solar PV panels on umbrellas. The first prototype with the umbrella-mounting of a flexible 3 Watt PV array had it semi-permanently attached to the umbrella fabric, with permanent holes to be punched through the fabric. 
The MagniSun, using magnetic straps, was conceived to allow the solar charger to be easily clipped on to any existing umbrella, without any permanent holes cut into it. The magnetic straps also allow the charger to be temporarily attached all kinds of fabric surfaces: tents, tarps, outdoor sunshades, and awnings.

Never have your cell phone dead at the beach ever again.
Put your sun umbrella to work, charging your phone. Unfold it from your
backpack or beach bag, clip it on to your beach umbrella with the magnetic
straps, and have power all day! Enjoy the beach time to speak freely, listen to
music, or call and text friends because you will always have mobile power. 

Hiking
and Camping-
Solar power on demand in the great outdoors! The MagniSun
charger can be attached to the fabric of tents or a tent rainfly. Backpackers,
far away from their vehicles or civilization, can keep their phones and other
devices charged.


Canopy Tents/Outdoor
Events-
Attendees of outdoor events and
festivals, who have no convenient source of power, can attached the charger to
their sun umbrellas and canopy tents. Concertgoers commonly use their smart
phones at concerts to take pictures and record videos.  At outdoor events,
vendors can also mount the charger onto their canopy tents.



                                                                                            
Future Vision
OC Outdoor Solar‘s “Global Vision”-
In the future, OC Outdoor Solar seeks to help provide off-grid charging solutions such as solar phones or external solar chargers in emerging markets. Around the world, there are hundreds of millions of mobile phone users without access to the electricity grid, a factor which severely limits communication opportunities.
Simple uses of electricity such as small lights, radios, or cell phones help improve people’s lives in significant ways, and can all be charged or directly powered with a small solar charger. Sun umbrellas, tents, canopies, tarps, awnings and other fabric sunshades are common all over the world. As
 part of the crowdfunding campaign, OC Outdoor Solar will donate 5% of 
the total amount raised to Green Empowerment and other organizations 
dedicated to getting clean energy into the hands of people around the world
 without reliable sources of electricity. 
Green Empowerment is an amazing organization that
 works with local partners around the world to strengthen communities by
 delivering renewable energy and safe water. Click here to learn more.

Storing the Solar Energy in a Battery; Partnership in XPAL Power-

As part of this crowdfunding campaign, XPAL Power has generously offered to let us include their PowerSkin PoP'n 1 USB battery pack in the MagniSun campaign offerings. The PoP'n can be charged while being attached to the new MagniSun prototype, which has a smooth laminate surface on the back (non-PV panel) side. With the PoP'n battery pack, you can take your MagniSun-generated solar energy from the beach (or anywhere outside) and use it anywhere indoors or later at night.

story:
POWL is an Australian based electronics company creating the newest and most innovative products for a modernising society. We strive to design and develop products that assist in making everyday life in the modern world that little bit easier.

  Smartphones have now become a necessity in our everyday lifestyle lets face it. From sending text's, to checking Facebook and Instagram, to just browsing the Internet to buy some time, the list of possible uses is endless. The downside? Well that's simple. Sooner or later you're going to run out of power when you need it most! The solution? myPOWL. The myPOWL concept first came about from looking at how people use their devices everyday and where they run out of power most. We found ourselves and the vast majority of people living in today's society out of the house and nowhere near a charger when this was occurring. Whether it be for dinner, drinks, at gigs, music festivals or simply just out of the house doing some shopping, it became clear that there needed to be a system that would ensure we remained in touch and informed. Now the obvious solution was to buy one of the vast options of power banks available on the market, but lets face it, most are the size and weight of a smartphone themselves, cost a days salary and require a labyrinth of external cables in order to fit the device you're wanting to charge. Not particularly something we wanted to be carrying around when trying to have fun and socialize or generally carry around when we’re out and about. We found the solution obvious yet not one brand could fit the bill so we created a super slim and small power bank that sits comfortably in your wallet, purse or pocket, yet is versatile and powerful enough to charge your most used devices. Using the built in cable it can easily be plugged into your chosen device, which is compatible to most Apple Lightning and Micro USB devices. This means no mess, no bulkiness, and no excessive cables, just a slim, powerful, strong and lightweight all-in-one myPOWL power bank. The myPOWL power bank is available in a 2500 mAh capacity, which is able to charge most of your devices up to 100%. With myPOWL we believe, we’ve delivered the ultimate portable power solution that completely eliminates on the go charging problems. 

  myPOWL's uniquely slim yet powerful design makes it incredibly portable and unlike many of the other bulky and expensive power banks currently on the market, slips easily inside your wallet, purse or pocket without anyone but yourself, knowing it's there. Designed to be similar in size to that of your credit cards, and about as thick as 4, this super slim essential tool will keep you up and running for longer. 

  Most power banks on the market today require you to not only cary an expensive, bulky battery around for extra power but also rely on messy and awkward cables to charge your devices, and even then only have the capability to charge either an Apple device OR a Micro USB device. The myPowl can charge both. No longer do you need to carry around any additional cables or connectors, it's as simple as pulling out the small cable built into the myPOWL and charge your device, thats it! 

Size: 96mm (3.8in) x 62mm (2.4in)  x 6.6mm (0.25in) Weight: 66g (2.3 Oz)

Frame: Advanced Lightweight Plastic Construction 

Battery: Grade A Lithium Polymer Battery 

Capacity: 2500 mAh

Output: 5V-1A

Time to fully charge the myPOWL - 180 minutes

Time to charge an iPhone 6 Device - 90 Minutes

Certifications: RoHS, CE, FCC

  myPOWL ships with both a Lightning and Micro USB connector built into the myPOWL that folds out of the device itself. This means that you're able to charge a huge range of devices such as the latest Apple products using the Lightning connection or any Micro USB based device using the latter. The choice is yours. And the possibilities are endless.

  With built in safety features such as charging, discharging, overload, and short circuit protection, as well as a huge 2500 mAh capacity, and easy high output USB charging, myPOWL comes equipped to cover all of your recharge requirements.

  With your help all funding will go towards first round production and further development of the myPOWL devices. You will also be helping grow POWL as an industry leader and aid in bringing future innovative devices to a growing market. Out of the $5,000 goal, we will be allocating $2,500 towards the manufacturing and further development of the product, and the remaining $2,500 will be used for marketing, fee's and other costs associated with developing and launching our product to market. The more funding raised, the further we can push myPOWL and POWL's innovation. With your assistance we can create a strong foundation and focus on growing this great product in the years ahead and ensure we can make myPOWL become a reality while continuing to push POWL's presence in the emerging consumer electronics market.

myPOWL Single Package - $35 - 1x myPOWL

myPOWL Double Package - $65 - 2 x myPOWL

myPOWL Power Package - $90 - 3 x myPOWL

myPOWL Share Package - $150 - 5 x myPOWL

myPOWL Family Package - $240 - 8 x myPOWL

myPOWL Business Package - $750 - 25 x myPOWL

myPOWL 'Big' Business Package - $1,450 - 50 x myPOWL

  During the past few months we have established close relationships with our manufacturing partners in Shenzhen, China, who will be manufacturing the myPOWL devices with grade A quality lithium ion batteries and durable injection moulded outer casings. However, we have also procured another relationship with a backup supplier in Guangzhou, China. They both have been proven as reliable and top quality manufacturers with high production capabilities ensuring manufacturing and production risks are kept at a minimum. 

Expected challenges we may face generally involve the delivery and shipping to our customers outside Australia. Customers may experience slight delays due to the changing nature of regulations surrounding the transportation of batteries however this will only mean a likely revision in the design of the myPOWL packaging. 

  If you are unable to help us out with a full purchase pledge of the myPOWL device don't worry thats completely fine. We still appreciate your interest and only ask you to spread the word. Sharing our Facebook or Instagram page to friends and family would help us out immensely. Spreading the word about what we are doing and what we plan to do is just as valuable as any financial help we receive!

We know you'll love the device/devices if you do decide to help out and would love to hear your feedback as well. If you can find the time once you have received your device we would also greatly appreciate any constructive comments sent to feedback@myPOWL.com.

Again thank you for your help and contributions. We look forward to continuing to work on the myPOWL devices and furthering POWL's innovation.


Regards, The Team at POWL
story_txt:
POWL is an Australian based electronics company creating the newest and most innovative products for a modernising society. We strive to design and develop products that assist in making everyday life in the modern world that little bit easier.


  Smartphones have now become a necessity in our everyday lifestyle lets face it. From sending text's, to checking Facebook and Instagram, to just browsing the Internet to buy some time, the list of possible uses is endless. The downside? Well that's simple. Sooner or later you're going to run out of power when you need it most! The solution? myPOWL. The myPOWL concept first came about from looking at how people use their devices everyday and where they run out of power most. We found ourselves and the vast majority of people living in today's society out of the house and nowhere near a charger when this was occurring. Whether it be for dinner, drinks, at gigs, music festivals or simply just out of the house doing some shopping, it became clear that there needed to be a system that would ensure we remained in touch and informed. Now the obvious solution was to buy one of the vast options of power banks available on the market, but lets face it, most are the size and weight of a smartphone themselves, cost a days salary and require a labyrinth of external cables in order to fit the device you're wanting to charge. Not particularly something we wanted to be carrying around when trying to have fun and socialize or generally carry around when we’re out and about. We found the solution obvious yet not one brand could fit the bill so we created a super slim and small power bank that sits comfortably in your wallet, purse or pocket, yet is versatile and powerful enough to charge your most used devices. Using the built in cable it can easily be plugged into your chosen device, which is compatible to most Apple Lightning and Micro USB devices. This means no mess, no bulkiness, and no excessive cables, just a slim, powerful, strong and lightweight all-in-one myPOWL power bank. The myPOWL power bank is available in a 2500 mAh capacity, which is able to charge most of your devices up to 100%. With myPOWL we believe, we’ve delivered the ultimate portable power solution that completely eliminates on the go charging problems. 




  myPOWL's uniquely slim yet powerful design makes it incredibly portable and unlike many of the other bulky and expensive power banks currently on the market, slips easily inside your wallet, purse or pocket without anyone but yourself, knowing it's there. Designed to be similar in size to that of your credit cards, and about as thick as 4, this super slim essential tool will keep you up and running for longer. 




  Most power banks on the market today require you to not only cary an expensive, bulky battery around for extra power but also rely on messy and awkward cables to charge your devices, and even then only have the capability to charge either an Apple device OR a Micro USB device. The myPowl can charge both. No longer do you need to carry around any additional cables or connectors, it's as simple as pulling out the small cable built into the myPOWL and charge your device, thats it! 




Size: 96mm (3.8in) x 62mm (2.4in)  x 6.6mm (0.25in) Weight: 66g (2.3 Oz)
Frame: Advanced Lightweight Plastic Construction 
Battery: Grade A Lithium Polymer Battery 
Capacity: 2500 mAh
Output: 5V-1A
Time to fully charge the myPOWL - 180 minutes
Time to charge an iPhone 6 Device - 90 Minutes
Certifications: RoHS, CE, FCC


  myPOWL ships with both a Lightning and Micro USB connector built into the myPOWL that folds out of the device itself. This means that you're able to charge a huge range of devices such as the latest Apple products using the Lightning connection or any Micro USB based device using the latter. The choice is yours. And the possibilities are endless.




  With built in safety features such as charging, discharging, overload, and short circuit protection, as well as a huge 2500 mAh capacity, and easy high output USB charging, myPOWL comes equipped to cover all of your recharge requirements.






  With your help all funding will go towards first round production and further development of the myPOWL devices. You will also be helping grow POWL as an industry leader and aid in bringing future innovative devices to a growing market. Out of the $5,000 goal, we will be allocating $2,500 towards the manufacturing and further development of the product, and the remaining $2,500 will be used for marketing, fee's and other costs associated with developing and launching our product to market. The more funding raised, the further we can push myPOWL and POWL's innovation. With your assistance we can create a strong foundation and focus on growing this great product in the years ahead and ensure we can make myPOWL become a reality while continuing to push POWL's presence in the emerging consumer electronics market.








$1 Thank You! 
myPOWL Single Package - $35 - 1x myPOWL
myPOWL Double Package - $65 - 2 x myPOWL
myPOWL Power Package - $90 - 3 x myPOWL
myPOWL Share Package - $150 - 5 x myPOWL
myPOWL Family Package - $240 - 8 x myPOWL
myPOWL Business Package - $750 - 25 x myPOWL
myPOWL 'Big' Business Package - $1,450 - 50 x myPOWL


  During the past few months we have established close relationships with our manufacturing partners in Shenzhen, China, who will be manufacturing the myPOWL devices with grade A quality lithium ion batteries and durable injection moulded outer casings. However, we have also procured another relationship with a backup supplier in Guangzhou, China. They both have been proven as reliable and top quality manufacturers with high production capabilities ensuring manufacturing and production risks are kept at a minimum. 
Expected challenges we may face generally involve the delivery and shipping to our customers outside Australia. Customers may experience slight delays due to the changing nature of regulations surrounding the transportation of batteries however this will only mean a likely revision in the design of the myPOWL packaging. 


  If you are unable to help us out with a full purchase pledge of the myPOWL device don't worry thats completely fine. We still appreciate your interest and only ask you to spread the word. Sharing our Facebook or Instagram page to friends and family would help us out immensely. Spreading the word about what we are doing and what we plan to do is just as valuable as any financial help we receive!
We know you'll love the device/devices if you do decide to help out and would love to hear your feedback as well. If you can find the time once you have received your device we would also greatly appreciate any constructive comments sent to feedback@myPOWL.com.
Again thank you for your help and contributions. We look forward to continuing to work on the myPOWL devices and furthering POWL's innovation.

Regards, The Team at POWL

story:
Haga clic aquí para español!

Featured On


What is WillMyPhoneWork.net?

WillMyPhoneWork.net was created to solve one single problem - How can I find out if a cellphone, smartphone, tablet, or mobile device is compatible with a mobile network carrier?

    In order to answer this question, I've spent nearly a year gathering all the necessary information, and packaging it into a simple and free online tool. There are thousands of mobile device models and hundreds of mobile networks for you to choose from.


    Who Would Use This Tool?

    • Mobile Device Buyers and Sellers: Looking to buy a phone but have no idea if it'll work with your carrier? Or, if you've ever sold a phone, you know the feeling of having people message you and always ask if it will work with carrier "X". Just send them our website!
    • Travellers: If you're travelling abroad with your phone, it's difficult to know how compatible your phone will be (if at all) with a foreign mobile network. Not anymore with our tool!
    • Technology Enthusiasts: Chances are, people come to you with tech-related questions. Here's just another resource to point people towards or to use in order to give them a quick answer rather than doing the research yourself.
    • And More: That's just the tip of the iceberg, I can see this being useful to mobile network carriers, mobile device manufacturers, cellphone stores, research purposes, etc.

    Why Am I Here?

    WillMyPhoneWork.net became so popular that I had to upgrade our web-hosting three times! I never anticipated that it would grow so fast in such a short time. Because of this, the website needs to be re-written to a better platform AND I'd like to add extra features that YOU, the users, have been requesting for a long time.

    The website is free to use and I don't plan on charging users in the future. To help pay for the website, I've tried non-intrusive ads which have only partially payed for expensive dedicated hosting. Besides, most users don't like ads or use ad blockers (myself included).


    Amazing New Features

    My goal is to raise $2,900 to fund this initiative. With your pledge, you can help me fund the following amazing new features:

    • Covert the website from the old Wordpress platform to ASP.NET in order to support new features and significantly boost performance.

    • Add Reverse Look-up feature (example: Show me a list of all phones that are compatible with 4G LTE network in Argentina OR Show me a list of all phones that are compatible with Wind Mobile in Canada).
    • Add an ALL option for Carriers so that you can get look up results from all carriers in a Country rather than searching one-by-one.
    • Add an ALL option for Sub Models so that you can get look up results from all sub models within a Model rather than searching one-by-one.
    • Display more clarity into why a phone is not compatible with a mobile network (example: Right now, we just have a red X when a device is not compatible with a network, I want to add a message explaining why it's not compatible).
    • Allow users to Share look-up results via email or social media.
    • Show partial compatibility between a mobile device and carrier network by listing the carrier network bands, along with the device band, so you can visually see if the device is fully compatible.


    New Features Sneak Peek

    New and Improved home page demonstration


    Advance/Reverse Lookup Demonstration


    Who's Behind This Project?


    How The Funds Will Be Used

    Below is a simple chart that describes how I plan on allocating the funds from this campaign. About half will go towards feature enhancements and then 40% to convert the website to ASP.NET. I've allocated some for taxes and Indiegogo fees. Any leftover funds will be used to pay for web hosting.

    How You Can Get Involved

    I really appreciate any support that you can provide to help me implement these amazing new features. The positive feedback that I've received from users so far has been overwhelming. Any pledge that you can give to this campaign will help push me to provide more great features and functionality.

    I'm looking forward to your continued support. Please consider helping to spread the message of this campaign by sharing this campaign with your friends, family, and colleagues. Simply use Indiegogo's Sharing Tools which are on the top of this page.

    Thank You Kindly.


    Aparece en


    ¿Qué es WillMyPhoneWork.net?

    WillMyPhoneWork.net fue creada para resolver un solo problema - ¿Cómo puedo saber si un teléfono móvil, smartphone, tableta o dispositivo móvil es compatible con un operador de red móvil?

      Para responder a esta pregunta, me he pasado casi un año reuniendo toda la información necesaria y empaquetado en una herramienta online sencilla y gratuita. Hay miles de modelos de dispositivos móviles y cientos de redes de telefonía móvil para que usted elija de.


      ¿Que volvería a usar esta herramienta?

      • Dispositivo móvil de compradores y vendedores: ¿Mirando para comprar un teléfono pero no tienen idea si va a trabajar con su compañía? O, si nunca has vendido un teléfono, usted sabe la sensación de que la gente te mensaje y preguntar siempre si funciona con el operador "X". Envíanos a nuestro sitio web!
      • Viajeros: Si vas a viajar al extranjero con su teléfono, es difícil saber cómo compatible será tu teléfono (si en todos) con una red móvil de exterior. Ya no con nuestra herramienta!
      • Entusiastas de la tecnología: Lo más probable es que la gente viene a usted con preguntas relacionadas con la tecnología. Aquí es otro recurso para apuntar hacia o para utilizar con el fin de darles una respuesta rápida en lugar de hacer la investigación usted mismo.
      • Y más: Eso es sólo la punta del iceberg, veo esta siendo útil a los portadores de la red móvil, fabricantes de dispositivos móviles, tiendas de teléfonos móviles, con fines de investigación, etc.

      ¿Por qué estamos aquí?

      WillMyPhoneWork.net se hizo tan popular que tenía que actualizar nuestra web hosting tres veces! Yo nunca anticipó que crecería tan rápido en tan poco tiempo. Debido a esto, el sitio web debe ser reescrito en una mejor plataforma y me gustaría añadir características extras que usted, los usuarios ha solicitado durante mucho tiempo.

      El sitio web es libre de usar y no planeo en carga de los usuarios en el futuro. Para ayudar a pagar por la web, he intentado no intrusivo anuncios que sólo parcialmente pagado para hosting dedicado costoso. Además, la mayoría de usuarios no como anuncios o bloqueo de anuncios de uso (me incluyo).


      Sorprendentes novedades

      Mi meta es recaudar $2.900 para financiar esta iniciativa. Con su promesa, me puedes ayudar financiar las siguientes nuevas características impresionantes:

      • Encubierta la Página Web de la plataforma antigua de Wordpress a ASP.NET para apoyar nuevas características y mejorar significativamente el rendimiento.

      • Añadir funciones de búsqueda inversa (ejemplo: mostrar una lista de todos los teléfonos que son compatibles con la red 4G LTE en Argentina o me muestra una lista de todos los teléfonos que son compatibles con Wind Mobile en Canadá).
      • Agregar una opción todas para transportistas para que pueda obtener resultados de búsqueda de todas las compañías en un país en lugar de buscar uno por uno.
      • Agregar una opción todos Sub modelos para que pueda obtener resultados de búsqueda de todos los sub modelos dentro de un modelo que busca uno por uno.
      • Mostrar más claridad en por qué un teléfono no es compatible con una red móvil (ejemplo: ahora mismo, tenemos un rojo X cuando un dispositivo no es compatible con una red, quiero agregar un mensaje explicando por qué no es compatible).
      • Permiten a los usuarios compartir los resultados consulta por correo electrónico o redes sociales.
      • Mostrar compatibilidad parcial entre un dispositivo móvil y portador de la red por el operador el listado bandas de red, junto a la banda del dispositivo, para que visualmente puede ver si el dispositivo es totalmente compatible.


      Anticipación de características nuevas

      Demostración de la nueva y mejorada página de inicio


      Avance/retroceso demostración de búsqueda


      ¿Quién está detrás de este proyecto?


      ¿Cómo se utilizarán los fondos

      A continuación es un gráfico simple que describe cómo planeo la asignación de los fondos de esta campaña. Aproximadamente la mitad se destinarán a mejoras de la función y luego el 40% para convertir el sitio web de ASP.NET. He asignado para impuestos y tasas de Indiegogo. Los fondos sobrantes se utilizarán para pagar hospedaje.


      ¿Cómo puede involucrarse

      Realmente agradezco cualquier ayuda que puede proporcionar para ayudarme a implementar estas nuevas funcionalidades sorprendentes. Los comentarios positivos que he recibido de los usuarios hasta el momento ha sido abrumadora. Cualquier compromiso que usted puede dar a esta campaña ayudará a empujarme para ofrecer más características y funcionalidad.

      Estoy mirando adelante a su continuo apoyo. Por favor considere ayudar a difundir el mensaje de esta campaña por compartir esta campaña con tus amigos, familiares y colegas. Simplemente herramientas de Indiegogo compartir que están por encima de esta página.

      Gracias.
