story:
Introduction

When I recently wanted to build some Arduino based sensors with a wireless interface to a Raspberry Pi board, I ended up building lots of little prototype board configurations and had various degrees of success.

There are certainly many wireless radio options available out there these days for sending sensor data between devices, and each one has its own unique advantages and drawbacks.    I came to a solution that worked well for me and suited my most important criteria best, namely:

  • Low cost
  • Reliable
  • Good range
  • Easy to use

With this project it is my wish to share what I have learned with you.


One development board that can do a lot of things


The EasyPeasy development board contains the following commonly used parts to make it easier for you to prototype your ideas:
  • 433 Mhz or 315 Mhz Radio Receiver
  • 433 Mhz or 315 Mhz Radio Transmitter
  • Socket for Arduino Pro Micro (or compatible) board
  • Dallas DS18B20 temperature sensor
  • NeoPixel RGB color 5mm LED   (see note)
  • Button
  • Buzzer

Note : Only the EasyPeasy for Arduino will have a Neopixel LED.  The EasyPeasyPi for Raspberry Pi will just have a normal RGB  LED

A prototype board of this nature is only valuable if it is also accompanied by great examples, libraries and source code.    So I also provide the following software to aid tinkerers and developers to fast track development

  • EasyPeasy library for Arduino
  • Lots of EasyPeasy examples which includes the following:
  • Working example of a wireless temperature sensors
  • Working example of a transmitter/responder (ping-pong)
  • Working example of RF repeater (range extender)
  • Working examples of C++ code for Raspberry Pi (more details below)

Saves you time and effort


The main purpose of EasyPeasy is to make things easier for anyone to build their own wireless sensors and devices,   

You can avoid time consuming trial and error pitfalls by starting your project with known working hardware and source code and then build out on that baseline with your own ideas and requirements.  In many cases you may even find that you can use the EasyPeasy board and the example code that comes with it directly as part of your proof-of-concept ideas

Some of the boards will be removable


Since this is essentially intended as a developer board, I decided to put some of the parts on header sockets such as the ones shows here.   For example the transmitter, receiver and Arduino Pro Micro will all be on removable sockets.   That means you an easily plug them out and try them in your own project.   Or maybe you just want to unplug them to use their I/O pins for something else.


Source code and circuit diagram provided

I will supply you with the circuit diagrams and all the source code of the libraries I used to make EasyPeasy.  This should enable you to easily test out your ideas and then simply import this into your own designs.

The examples provided cover all aspects of how to use the hardware and more. Please watch the campaign video to see just what I mean.


Range and power

One of the things I like most of the transmitters and receivers used in EasyPeasy,  are the good range I get out of them.   In open air line-of-sight conditions it is about 200 meters and inside buildings with walls in between it about halve of that.   To give you an example.... my house is quite big and yet I could easily cover every part of my house or yard from any other part of my house or yard.   And even if range is still a problem, you can always use an extra EasyPeasy as a range extender, but I did not even need to do that.

The devices are really light on power consumption as well.   The receiver uses about 2 mA while the transmitter uses about 20 mA (but only while its actually transmitting).   This makes battery powered applications possible as well.

Another thing that I like about these particular devices is that there is no "pairing" required as in the case of bluetooth etc.   You just transmit and every single receiver in range with get the signal.   This means your can easily have a one to many configuration if your application has such a requirement.

433Mhz or 315Mhz?

The receivers and transmitters used in EasyPeasy come
 in 433Mhz and 315Mhz flavors and since they cost the same price I will make this one of the option choices.   I only use the 433 Mhz in my own projects.   To give you a guideline, in Europe the official allowed frequency EU / CE R&TTE regulations is 433Mhz, so I recommend that users from Europe choose that option to stay on the right side of the law.    But both 315Mhz and 433Mhz are used in USA,


    Works on both Raspberry Pi and Arduino

    The EasyPeasy board was designed to facilitate developers of both Raspberry Pi and Arduino with the same basic hardware configuration.   More about this in the next paragraph.

    EasyPeasy vs EasyPeasyPi

    The same basic PCB are used both Arduino and Raspberry Pi A, B+ and RPi 2 development.

    How is this possible?  Well for Arduino development  you plug in an Arduino Pro Micro into the socket that are fitted on the board.  This is then  referred then as EasyPeasy. 

    But in  Raspberry Pi mode (also referred to as EasyPeasyPi)  there is no Arduino Pro Micro socket fitted. Instead there is a 26 way connector  on the bottom of the board that plugs directly into the Raspberry Pi's IO connecter.  All the signal lines have been fitted with voltage divider resistors or drivers so that , even though the Raspberry Pi works on 3V3, it can still drive 5V devices like the buzzer or the RF devices.

    Summary:

    EasyPeasy is for Arduino development.   Comes with the sockets for an Arduino Pro Micro board, but not the Raspberry Pi connector.  All you need is to fit and Arduino Pro Micro board and start develing.   (There are also some other components that are only required for Raspberry Pi implementation, which will not be fitted on the normal EasyPeasy board)

    EasyPeasyPi is for Raspberry Pi development.  Arduino Pro Micro socket is not fitted,  but it has the 26 pin connector on the bottom that fits on a Raspberry Pi board.

    Picture shows EasyPeasyPi

    When you choose your perks in your contribution, you will have to option to specify that either EasyPeasy or EasyPeasyPi or both.    You'll need one of each in a project where an Arduino based sensors needs to send stuff to a Raspberry Pi board and vise versa.    Both boards use more or less the same parts and cost about the same to manufacture.  So I kept the price the same and leave the choice up to you. 


    Spare IO pins

    Not all of the IO pins of the Arduino or Raspberry Pi is used by the EasyPeasy.   Those lines are still available for usage of your own application and for your convenience they have been brought out to some header pin sockets for easy wiring.   The free pins that is still available to you include the following:

    • Serial UART Txd and Rxd
    • SPI (MOSI, MISO, SCLK and SSEL)
    • Some general IO pins (including analog input pins in case of Arduino)

    This means that you can easily still use SPI, I2C, UART or analog on your EasyPeasy board in conjunction with the features that EasyPeasy brings to the table.


    Examples of what you can do with your EasyPeasy

    For such a small simple board, this is amazingly versatile.   I will indulge in just a few examples ideas to wet your appetite:

    Improved wireless doorbell

    Why not make yourself an improved doorbell that reaches further and can ring in various parts of your home.   You can even ad features like logging the time that someone last pressed your doorbell or interface it to your RPi to send you an email when someone pressed your doorbell.  

    Customized security system

    The RF receivers and transmitters used in this project can receive and transmit signals to a variety of cheap passive infrared detectors (PIR) and magnetic door and window sensors.  This means you can easily devise your own customized security system system.  

    Control home automation devices

    There are a variety of home automation devices (light dimmers etc) that uses radio technology that is compatible to the transmitters and receivers in the EasyPeasy project.   That means you can send signals to and receive signals from these devices.

    Wireless sensor

    Why not make a sensor that detects the level of an outside water tank which will send a signal to your RPi when water levels are running low.  The PRi in turn can send you an SMS to warn you your water tank is almost empty. 

    Or perhaps you just want to monitor the temperature of a couple of fridges in a warehouse.   The EasyPeasy board includes and accurate temperature sensors and we include an example of how to transmit the measured temperature to a remite device.   

    The Arduino Pro Micro also has some spare A/D lines.   You can thus use the Arduino based EasyPeasy as a wireless A/D measurement device for your Raspberry Pi (which does not have built in A/D).

    Long Range active RFID tag

    Most RFID tags have a range of only a few centimeters.   But now you can easily build your own customized long range RFID tag that will work for up about 200 meters based on the transmitter/responder example we include with the EasyPeasy project.

    Wireless RGB LED indicator

    Since the EasyPeasy also includes an RGB LED, it makes it very simple for you to make a wireless RGB LED indicator to indicate for example when someone is occupying the board room at the office or the health status of some vital computer system.   It is quite simple to interface on EasyPeasy via USB to a PC.  The PC then checks the health status of another online computer system and sets the remote LED to green, red or blue via its connected EasyPeasy board.

    Control your robot

    Probably one of the most obvious and simple applications is to control a robot.  Since you have bi-directional communication, it lends itself to all kinds of interesting possibilities in robot making.  

    You own ideas

    Most  these ideas are now easily accomplished using the examples that come with EasyPeasy.   I can thing of many more examples, but I hope these would be enough to spur up your own imagination of just what is all possible.


    What will be done with crowd funding

    The reason why I am searching crowd funding for this project is the following:

    Making yet another revision of the PCB

    I have already had two different revisions of the PCB.   Each time I realized another a small change was required to make things even better.   Before I send out the perks for this campaign I would like to add one or two more small improvements first.

    Making a website for EasyPeasy

    One of the things I would like to do if this campaign is successful is to make a special website for EasyPeasy.  The idea would be to have a place where the circuit diagrams and libraries can be downloaded but also where I wish to put a number of practical example projects that can easily be realized using the EasyPeasy project.

    Bulk buying of components and making EasyPeasy boards

    I want EasyPeasy boards to be low prized so that anyone can afford them and play with them.   To do this I need to buy some of the components in bulk.   The higher the number number the cheaper things get.   Same goes for the actual manufacturing itself.   If its just a few boards, I can easily solder them up myself.   But I work slowly and costly.   I would much rather prefer to contract a small manufacturing company to do it professionally for me.   But to do that I need at to make a substantial number of them.


    Risks

    The risks are very small.    I have already built working examples of the EasyPeasy boards and written the libraries and code examples  of how to use them.  It is not a difficult board to make or test and I'm confident there would not be any issues in that either.    So for me personally the only risk I can think of is that I completely misjudged other people's perception of the usefulness  of this product.  I hope I am right and other out there people will find it just a useful as it was for me.


    UPDATE : RGB LED replaced by NeoPixel LED

    Users of EasyPeasy for Arduino will be pleased to know that instead of a normal RGB LED on the board, I plan to fit a NeoPixel LED.    This has the advantage that you can set it to any color or brightness.   The EasyPeasy board will also expose the the Neopixel pins so you can easily attach a whole strip of NeoPixel LEDs if you wish.      This is good news....  the the NeoPixel is more expensive than regular RGB LED's, but so much more worth it.

    Unfortunately the EasyPeasyPi will still just feature a regular three color LED.  The reason why I did not include NeoPixel LED for the Raspberry Pi as well is that I simply could not manage to get it work well on the new RPi 2, even though it worked well on the RPi B+ mode.    But to keep consistency, all EasyPeasyPi's will have a regular three color LED.


    Questions


    Q:  I would like to use the EasyPeasy to interface to a 433 Mhz  wireless PIR sensor.  Can you advise how I would go about to intercept those signals.

    A:  Very simple.   One of the examples that come with Arduino EasyPeasy  allows you to see all kinds of info about the signal that the receiver see.   You can just monitor what code it receives and use that in your own code.  

    In case you are interested, the PIR sensors I used which worked really well for me can be found on this link: Wireless 433 Mhz PIR motion detector
story_txt:
Introduction
 When I recently wanted to build some Arduino based sensors with a wireless interface to a Raspberry Pi board, I ended up building lots of little prototype board configurations and had various degrees of success.
There are certainly many wireless radio options available out there these days for sending sensor data between devices, and each one has its own unique advantages and drawbacks.    I came to a solution that worked well for me and suited my most important criteria best, namely:  Low cost Reliable
 Good range 

Easy to use

With this project it is my wish to share what I have learned with you.

    One development board that can do a lot of things
 



The EasyPeasy development board contains the following commonly used parts to make it easier for you to prototype your ideas:  433 Mhz or 315 Mhz Radio Receiver
 433 Mhz or 315 Mhz Radio Transmitter
Socket for Arduino Pro Micro (or compatible) board
Dallas DS18B20 temperature sensor

NeoPixel RGB color 5mm LED   (see note)

Button
Buzzer

Note : Only the EasyPeasy for Arduino will have a Neopixel LED.  The EasyPeasyPi for Raspberry Pi will just have a normal RGB  LED


A prototype board of this nature is only valuable if it is also accompanied by great examples, libraries and source code.    So I also provide the following software to aid tinkerers and developers to fast track development


EasyPeasy library for Arduino 

Lots of EasyPeasy examples which includes the following:
Working example of a wireless temperature sensors
Working example of a transmitter/responder (ping-pong) 

Working example of RF repeater (range extender)
Working examples of C++ code for Raspberry Pi (more details below)

Saves you time and effort
The main purpose of EasyPeasy is to make things easier for anyone to build their own wireless sensors and devices,    You can avoid time consuming trial and error pitfalls by starting your project with known working hardware and source code and then build out on that baseline with your own ideas and requirements.  In many cases you may even find that you can use the EasyPeasy board and the example code that comes with it directly as part of your proof-of-concept ideasSome of the boards will be removable

Since this is essentially intended as a developer board, I decided to put some of the parts on header sockets such as the ones shows here.   For example the transmitter, receiver and Arduino Pro Micro will all be on removable sockets.   That means you an easily plug them out and try them in your own project.   Or maybe you just want to unplug them to use their I/O pins for something else.Source code and circuit diagram provided

I will supply you with the circuit diagrams and all the source code 
of the libraries I used to make EasyPeasy.  This should enable you to 
easily test out your ideas and then simply import this into your own 
designs.
The examples provided cover all aspects of how to use the hardware 
and more. Please watch the campaign video to see just what I mean.

Range and power
One of the things I like most of the transmitters and receivers used in EasyPeasy,  are the good range I get out of them.   In open air line-of-sight conditions it is about 200 meters and inside buildings with walls in between it about halve of that.   To give you an example.... my house is quite big and yet I could easily cover every part of my house or yard from any other part of my house or yard.   And even if range is still a problem, you can always use an extra EasyPeasy as a range extender, but I did not even need to do that.
The devices are really light on power consumption as well.   The receiver uses about 2 mA while the transmitter uses about 20 mA (but only while its actually transmitting).   This makes battery powered applications possible as well.
Another thing that I like about these particular devices is that there is no "pairing" required as in the case of bluetooth etc.   You just transmit and every single receiver in range with get the signal.   This means your can easily have a one to many configuration if your application has such a requirement.

The EasyPeasy board was designed to facilitate developers of both Raspberry Pi and Arduino with the same basic hardware configuration.   More about this in the next paragraph.

The same basic PCB are used both Arduino and Raspberry Pi A, B+ and RPi 2 development.
How is this possible?  Well for Arduino development  you plug in
 an Arduino Pro Micro into the socket that are fitted on the board.  This is then 
referred then as EasyPeasy.  
 But in  Raspberry Pi mode 
(also referred to as EasyPeasyPi)  there is no Arduino Pro Micro socket fitted. Instead
 there is a 26 way connector  on the bottom of the board that plugs 
directly into the Raspberry Pi's IO connecter.  All the signal lines have

Raspberry Pi works on 3V3, it can still drive 5V devices like the buzzer

Probably one of the most obvious and simple applications is to control a robot.  Since you have bi-directional communication, it lends itself to all kinds of interesting possibilities in robot making.

Most  these ideas are now easily accomplished using the examples that 
come with EasyPeasy.   I can thing of many more examples, but I hope these would be enough to spur up your own imagination of just what is all possible.

What will be done with crowd fundingThe reason why I am searching crowd funding for this project is the following:Making yet another revision of the PCB
I have already had two different revisions of the PCB.   Each time I realized another a small change was required to make things even better.   Before I send out the perks for this campaign I would like to add one or two more small improvements first.

story:
OUR STORY

We are a pre-startup company in Singapore and hoping to launch our first flagship product at the same time. Our company ELECTRIFARM is not registered yet and need funds to let things roll and we hope that you can help us by pre-ordering our flagship product DUCK at the same time.

Our goal is to rapid-prototype and roll-out very unique consumer electronic products. We already have in mind the future products in-line with the Electrifarm name. For sneak peak purposes, we reveal them as COW (Charger On Wheels) and COB (Charger on Bicycle) but we won't reveal any more details on that.

We are still surviving through volunteer work. Our domain www.electrifarm.com has just been bought and under development by a volunteer individual.

If you help us, your gonna help us to kickstart ELECTRIFARM, let it grow and help pay for the NREs cost of our flagship DUCK.

In exchange we give you the DUCK depending on the amount donated. We are currently working out on the international shipping fees and will give updates regarding that later.

OUR PRODUCT


DUCK with rubber cap for partial splash resistance.

DUCK dual USB output 5V 2.0A and 1.0A

DUCK input which is a standard car cigar port. Accepts 12V and 24V.

DUCK input DIN revealed by removing the red collar.

DUCK swivelled straight

DUCK swivelled 45 degrees

DUCK swivelled 90 degrees

We believe that this  is a very useful product and everyone will be proud to use it.

OUR PROMISE

The DUCK is almost ready for mass production after extensive testing and we are hoping that you also help us kickstart that. With proper funding, you can get the DUCK around late August or early September 2015.

story:
Get Connected, Stay Connected

Are you fed up with the bigger social media networks, like Facebook or Twitter?  Do you find it difficult to stay privately in contact with your circle of friends and your family, your community members, spread across the word, as we are these days?  Or perhaps you are thinking of starting up a group’s website so you can all stay in touch and share photos and other documents with each other.

Building that kind of secure website is not cheap and there are plenty of groups and small associations, scattered across the globe, particularly in the developing countries, that simply cannot afford to set up their own and pay the cost of keeping it maintained. That’s where we come in. We created something called WebForGroups, a cost effective, a very affordable way for groups of people to stay in touch with each other, in a matter of minutes.


Who Are We?

We are Multi-World Technologies LLC, based in Houston and we are a Technology and Management Consulting firm. We’ve been going since 2003 (12 years) and have customers spread across the four corners of the World.  We want our World, your World to be connected differently, we want people everywhere, no matter where they are, to be able to stay in touch, to have a support network and a private social network where they can collaborate with each other, chat in real time and share their lives with each other. That’s why we’ve developed our solution www.webforgroups.com

Multi-World Technologies LLC is BBB accredited and A+ rated, by the Better Business Bureau


What is WebForGroups All About?

WebForGroups is smart platform that delivers full-fledge websites for groups.  You get a standalone website, with minimal customization, one that deploys in under 5 minutes and is completely secure and private, is only accessible by folks you’ve invited and approved. Each group gets their own website and can invite their own users to participate in online chat, sharing blogs, sharing files and photos, accepting PayPal payments or donations and generally staying in touch. It’s a place for people who are tired of the commercialism of social media sites like Facebook and a place for those who simply want a private social network that is member only, where they don’t have to read rubbish posted by people they don’t know.

Features Overview: http://www.webforgroups.com/features

Our solution is all-in-one prepackaged solution, highly affordable with prices starting at just $16 for a month or $194 for a whole year’s membership.


How Much Do We Need and What Do We Get?

We are looking for $10,000 which will give us the money we need to really get this solution off the ground. The money will primarily be used to pay for marketing, support, web hosting, servers and data storage facilities for all the groups.  We also need to pay for overheads such as salaries and ongoing maintenance.  For your kind donation, you will get

  • $24 gets you:
    • Your own private WebForGroups for 6 months (75% off our launch price)
    • Immediate access to your WebForGroups (months before our June 1st Launch)
    • Your 6 Months only start counting from June 1st …
  • 48 gets you
    • Your own private WebForGroups for 12 months (75% off our launch price)
    • Immediate access to your WebForGroups (months before our June 1st Launch)
    • Your 12 Months only start counting from June 1st …
  • $96 gets you
    • Your Name displayed on our Special WebForGroups Contributors page
    • Your own private WebForGroups for 12 months (50% off our launch price)
    • Immediate access to your WebForGroups (months before our June 1st Launch)
    • Your 12 Months only start counting from June 1st …
    • Dedicated domain name registered for 12 months (redirected to your W4G)

Help us to Help You Stay Connected

Every cent will help us to get this solution off the ground and running. We are planning to go live on June 1st 2015 but, if you can’t help us financially then please help us in another way.  Use those social media connections you have to spread the word and share our story with your friends and family, all your followers and their friends. Tell people what we are doing and urge them to sign up with us, ready for launch day so that we really can get this whole world connected and talking, privately!

How does it work?

To get started, you’ll simply need:

-  A name for your group

-  An alias for your group (used for your URL) www.webforgroups.com/alias

-  Your email address (or approver / administrator  … whoever will approve members)

-  OPTIONAL: up to 3 photos or images, to be displayed on your homepage

That’s it!


When you contribute, you’ll receive your invitation code by email. Simply use it to generate your own WebForGroups in less than 5 minutes at www.webforgroups.com


WebForGroups in action ...

Family

Moms Club

Association

Photo Club

Exclusive Club

Dating Club

Thinkers

story:
The iMassageo is easy to use, portable, and offers immediate massage benefits. Like many people, you probably always have your smart phone close. Now you can simply open an app, apply a few discreet electrode pads and enjoy your massage.

This unit is perfect for athletes, busy working professionals, stay-at-home moms, travelers, students, seniors, and more! The iMassageo would also be a great addition to pain clinics, home health professionals, chiropractic offices, and other medical professionals.


Benefits

The iMassageo uses minute doses of electric current to promote natural pain relief. It is an effective treatment for both acute and chronic pain. It is a safe alternative to powerful pain-relieving drugs for some patients.


How it works


The iMassageo sends impulses through the skin to stimulate nerves in the treatment area. The stimulation reduces or sometimes totally eliminates discomfort the patient feels. It can be used on a long-term basis and can be used for hours at a time, depending on the patient and type of pain. There is no risk of addiction.

The unit is connected to the patient’s skin through electrode pads. There are different frequencies for specific needs. Patients can easily adjust the iMassageo through a simple app. This not only makes the iMassageo incredibly easy to use, but also fun for those who enjoy gadgets!

While you do not need a prescription to order iMassageo, you should ask your doctor about using the unit if you are currently pregnant or have a pacemaker or other implanted metallic or electronic device. This therapy can be used in conjunction with other oral or topical medications. Please consult your doctor.


Product details


The iMassageo is a unique product that features six different massage functions. But you won’t be limited to only six modes. You can accept upgrades and additions through your phone app. The original six modes are just the beginning! It allows the client to use up to five massage pads at once and comes with four regular electrode pads and XL large pads.


The iMassageo runs off a rechargeable lithium battery. You can recharge your unit with a standard wall outlet or USB cord. It is an affordable, discreet unit you can use anytime, anywhere.

Your iMassageo is durable, can survive a fall, and is covered with a lifetime warranty, After six hours of charging, your unit will operate for 20 hours of use.


About iMassageo

Founders Liran Grenwald and Kobi Asseo saw a need for something different. Why should you always have to make an appointment for a massage or relaxation treatment? You should be able to enjoy such benefits at any time. So they created a portable massage unit capable of various treatments from acupressure to muscle relaxation. iMassageo technology was based off the Technology of the TENS (Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation) unit.

Massageo aims for effective results, profits for our distributors, and cutting edge appeal.
 
What is Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation? 
 Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation is often referred to as TENS technology. There are a couple of theories on why TENS technology works to relieve chronic and acute pain. The first theory is that the electrodes stimulate nerves and “scramble” pain signals to the brain. The second theory says that the electrodes help the body produce endorphins, which block the perception of pain.

 

How we are different

Our product competitors have a remote control that connects to the electrode pads. iMassageo is the only company of its kind with technology to activate the massager over the phone. Users can control all the features of iMassageo through a user-friendly app. It’s totally wireless!                                                                                      Our product is small and easily portable, yet made for the full massage experience.

Upgrades and additions are easy and automatic through the app! The app can also track customer use, your favorite massage settings, length of use and more !


FAQ

What will my iMassageo package include?

The package include our iMassageo unit , XL pad ,2 or 4 regular Pads(Depends on the package ) ,USB Charger ,Pad holder And instruction .

How long will the Pads last?

The Pads are reusable. They will last up to year.

To maintain the pads you will apply a few drops of water on the pad before using it.

Can I use it after a workout?

Yes absolutely !

iMassageo was design to relax the muscle by stimulate the blood circulation.

It will help with your recovery so you can back to the gym faster.

How many types of Massage will I find on my iMassageo?

iMassageo control by Mobile app that will update regularly online .

Your Massage screen will include 6 customize function that you be able to choose them from the Massage list.

Our list will include option such as: Deep tissue massage, Tapping, Cupping, Swedish massage and more!

There is any warranty?

Yes!

iMassageo is quality product and will be cover with Lifetime warranty .

Will the iMassageo come with instruction\Manual?

Yes, iMassageo will have a section in our app that include a Manuel instruction and 2D map to provide you where you can use

The pads and which type of massage you need to be use depends on your target.

Will the iMassageo app be free?

Absolutely Yes!

Our app will be in Apple store and Google play.

If I forgot to add my shipping, What should I do?

Don't worry, we will keep in touch with all our Backers and let you know if you’ve forgotten to add the shipping.

We will also add a new perk for shipping before the end of the campaign.

What kind of the battrey iMassageo will be use ?

iMassageo will be use rechargeable lithium ion battery,USB chrager includes in the package.



Contact us

If you would like more information on the incredible iMassageo or would like to be part of our journey, contact us through our website or Facebook page.

story:
Make MORE money by allowing your customers to pay via credit or debit card using GarageSaleEasy! 

Welcome to the new and better way to hold a garage sale with the click of a button with the GarageSaleEasy app! We’ve developed an app that’s designed to make buying desired items and selling unwanted old things a breeze with our quick and secure app.

 

More about GarageSaleEasy!

Garage sales are casual events where people can sell their used goods for a fair price but are not required to collect sales tax or have a business license. People conduct these sales for a variety of reasons but the main one is to make money and get rid of unwanted but still useful items. Garage sales have been a part of our cultural fabric for a long time. They are so popular that we even have a National Garage Sales Day dedicated to its honor! With a tough economy and money being tight for A LOT of people, garage sales are on the rise bringing together people looking for items and sellers looking to make money on items no longer needed. Today EVERY DOLLAR counts in the quality of our lives and care of our families. And today people are looking to stretch that dollar further cycling that must-have, practical, and useful item to the next owner.

A few of the main concerns for people conducting garage sales is creating enough traffic to the sale to make it profitable and the security of accepting some forms of payments from buyers. With the GarageSaleEasy app, the seller no longer has to worry about taking checks that bounce, potentially fraudulent checks, counterfeit money or cash theft. The seller also doesn’t have to hold goods while the buyer says….’I’ll be back’…and never shows up causing a lost sale to another prospective buyer. And buyers that didn’t bring enough cash can quickly and easily access their funds at the garage sale site to purchase those bargain and one-of-a-kind items and not lose out on the opportunity.

With the GarageSaleEasy app and website, everything you need to setup and market your garage sales to maximize profits is at your fingertips. With our app you can manage the process from start to finish in a few easy steps and get paid instantly from buyers. GarageSaleEasy allows people to take advantage of mobile technology in the garage, yard, rummage, estate...well ANY -sale market! Mobile technology currently makes up over 25% of digital sales, so why not utilize it to increase your garage sale profits and make the money your family needs. 

 

What are the BENEFITS?

  • Accept debit and credit card transaction at your garage sales
  • Payment transactions are instant
  • Transactions are quick, safe and secure through mobile device
  • No merchant account or credit checks needed
  • Avoid bounced checks and check fraud
  • Setup, organize, track and create labels for your garage sales in just minutes – FREE app and website access to manage sales and print labels
  • GarageSaleEasy marketing tools and merchandise for successful garage sales every time (banners, shirts, labels, sale apron, signs)
  • Garage sales marketing and location services
  • More productive and profitable garage sales
  • Significantly increase sale profits by using GarageSaleEasy
  • Pricing tools to assist for easy pricing and labeling
  • Sales advice, tips and tricks to attract more customers
  • Popular items lists – things people want

 

Organizing and planning a garage sale with GarageSaleEasy ONLY takes a few minutes. GarageSaleEasy then opens up the opportunity for you to accept Credit Cards and Debit Cards. Your customers will love the ease and convenience of have funds available for any purchase. And you can feel safe and secure with the mobile transactions. 

The new member (seller) creates an account on the GarageSaleEasy site by registering for a free member ID. Once registered, the member can begin creating sale events by name, location and date.

The member can create sale inventory by entering items and uploading a photo (if desired). The member then creates scan-able pricing smart label which can be printed and affixed to the item for sale.

Buyers can now find you using our FREE and easy to use GarageSale Locator app.  Every garage sale is listed in our network and your items can be featured for buyers to search.  

Once a buyer selects an item for purchase, the buyer scans the label on the item and it’s placed in the shopping cart. When the buyer is ready to pay, he or she proceeds to checkout and selects a payment option to include credit and debit cards.

The transaction is posted instantly, the seller is paid and the item is moved to ‘sold items’ inventory tracker. The member can post the sale location on sale network. The buyers can search garage sales by location in your area and get a description of the types of items being sold. Buyers are not required to register unless they choose become members. Members can post items to be sold online through the site network as well or repeat the garage sales at a future date for unsold items.

 

For us to bring the “GarageSaleEasy” to life, we need your support! 

Your generous funding will help us continue our development to finalize and launch our product. Your contribution will assist us with further development, testing, production and marketing cost for the application launch. We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions to meet their needs. 

We will also be using the funding to: 

  • Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the GarageSaleEasy
  • Further customize the first version of the GarageSaleEasy 
  • Create additional products and services that will compliment GarageSaleEasy 

The GarageSaleEasy needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

If we don’t get the money we’re requesting, we’ll continue to develop the app as we believe in products and service the help all of us live better – it will just take longer. 

 

We need about $150,000 to launch GarageSaleEasy to the market. That will include marketing, materials, labor, servers /cloud infrastructure,  and related expenses for start-up. 

A stretch goal of $500,000+ will allow us to immediately launch GarageSaleEasy worldwide in 50 countries and 25 different currencies. We hope to make GarageSaleEasy immediately available to the entire world of garage sellers.

 

Timeline

 

 

After working hard in the credit card industry for many years, most of the members in our team not only have a deep understanding of credit card and mobile technology, but after years of accumulated experience have become masters of creating safe and secure transaction environments.

In crowdfunding, there's always potential for unexpected challenges to arise, and although we hope none of these come up but sometimes things happen.  Even for a team with our team experience, we are aware that we could be faced with unexpected situations along the way such as delays. That being said, our team’s experience and confidence in our merchant partners makes us confident that we can deliver the best garage sale app in the world and  deliver it on time. We will continuously inform our backers throughout the whole process. 

Should you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact us anytime.

 

Q: Is there a monthly fee or cost to purchase the app?
No. The app and site are FREE to use with your garage sale. We only charge a small fee of 7.9% + .30 cents at the time of the transaction and a small listing fee to list your garage sale online.

Q: Will the app be available in the App Store and Google Play?
Yes. We are currently beginning development on the production versions of the app for both Apple iOS and Android.

Q: Do I need a PayPal account to use the app?
Yes. The PayPal account is absolutely necessary to transfer funds and proceeds to you. We have found this to be the safest method to disburse money.

Q: Can I use different currencies and does it work in other countries?
Yes. Absolutely, we are working with our partners to have different currencies available for transactions and the app in other languages.  We are planning to have this available at production launch.

Q: Is the app and service safe and secure?
Yes. The app and site are safe and secure. We act as your agent during the transaction process and no financial information is stored by us or the buyer or seller. All purchases are done independently by the Buyer at the time of the transaction on their mobile phone.

Q: What if I want to negotiate a price?
Not a problem. If you and the buyer want to change or negotiate a price, all the seller needs to do is scan the pricing label and enter a New price for the buyer. The Buyer then scans the new pricing label to purchase. 

Q: What is the maximum amount that can be transacted by your service?
$10,000 is the maximum amount that can be transacted by our service. 

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. 

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Our app is designed to help EVERYONE! 
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

And that's all there is to it. 

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Email Support at:  support@garagesalesoft.com

GarageSaleEasy site:  http://www.GarageSaleEasy.com

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Our app is designed to help EVERYONE! 
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools! 
And that's all there is to it. Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!Email Support at:  support@garagesalesoft.comGarageSaleEasy site:  http://www.GarageSaleEasy.com

story:
We aspire to be a "SUPER Companion" application to FACEBOOK  or the "FACEBOOK of Music"

Here is a diagram of how it all works...a combination of hardware & software #gamechanger


From our Founder:

"This is NO...FLASH IN PAN" #PunIntended ;)



After a long and successful career as a nightclub promoter in Houston, I had seen everything. People were always asking the resident DJ to “burn CDs” or “load flash drives,” and given my background in programming, I sensed an opportunity to create something: a system through which people could get new mixes anytime they wanted.
Thumbjamz

 

Using flash drives, I developed the first Thumbjamz prototype in just 90 days, combining a custom flash drive with a basic mobile app that I uploaded to Google Play. The free app makes it possible for users to subscribe to their favorite local DJ for just $0.99 per month, listen to unlimited mixes online commercial-free, and download all the music they hear to a USB flash drive.

 

I have spent more than twenty years of my life in internet application development, so I know how to envision things and then follow through. I would like every backer to feel like they have helped me to make this happen, which is why I invite you all to give me your honest feedback throughout the development process!

 

Version 1 of the app is now live. Check it out!

Chad "Chizzle" Mills, Founder & Chief "Jammer"
Thumbjamz Entertainment

 

A Little More on the System
 

A sample screen from how Version 2.0 will look ;)

DJs, producers, and artists who collaborate with Thumbjamz will split the revenue their music generates right down the middle with us. You promote yourself on social media, pull in subscribers, and earn money automatically. In the process, you will win over a more loyal fan base that is always waiting to hear your latest tunes, the app sends instant push notifications whenever you release a new mix. This is a win for everyone: the artists, the fans, and the Thumbjamz team.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

 

We have come a long way with this project, but we can still use all the support we can get! Our goal is to raise $10,000 through this Indiegogo campaign. At that funding level, we can optimize our app further and incorporate new features into the Thumbjamz system. We also hope to run a professional marketing and PR campaign in order to bring in new subscribers and attract higher-profile DJs, because once we hit a tipping point, there is unlimited growth potential for Thumbjamz. To show our appreciation for your support at this critical moment, we are offering some exciting rewards, including 4-GB Thumbjamz-branded USB drives with two pre-loaded mixtapes for our first fifty backers, unlimited one-year access to the Thumbjamz app, and the Thumbjamz pro 8-GB USB drive with one-year access to the Thumbjamz app.

 

The Impact

 

 

This is your opportunity to invest in a music platform that is on the way up! By contributing to our campaign, you can help us to gain traction in the market and change the way people enjoy their favorite music.

 

Everyone who contributes something to this campaign will gain exclusive access to the platform during our development period, and we will invite you to provide feedback and tips on improvements that you would like to see.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

 

Spotify is a juggernaut in the music industry, and we will need to work hard to differentiate ourselves to customers. During the development, testing, and launch phases, we will need to be strategic about the features that we emphasize, because relative to us, Spotify is essentially working with unlimited resources. Our founder is well-versed in augmenting internal resources and outsourcing developer talent, though, so we believe that we can react to feedback with greater agility than a company like Spotify can. There lies our advantage! If we run into any other challenges, we will be sure to keep all our contributors updated.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

 

Please share the Thumbjamz project with everyone you know! If there is someone in your life who appreciates good music, tell them that they can now save that music to a flash drive more easily than ever before and discover new music on-the-fly – all with Thumbjamz.

 

We appreciate all suggestions and feedback as well. Please reach out to us at team@thumbjamz.com!
 

Thank you for reading about what we are doing! Keep on jamming!

story:
General Facts/Info

Exclusive to Indiegogo backers. The Ubuntu Z8 will NOT be available to buy at launch.

Specs to be finalised as late as possible to ensure the best available components.

Dual-boots into Ubuntu mobile OS and Android; converts into a full desktop PC.

Works with LTE and GSM networks, including Verizon and Sprint.

Perks include all charges for US and UK, including VAT and delivery.

Standard manufacturer warranty will apply once manufacturer is selected. Zero cost to backers if the campaign is unsuccessful.

Functionality

Mobile OS: Dual-boots Android and Ubuntu mobile  

Desktop OS: Ubuntu Desktop  

Internal storage: 500GB

RAM: 16GB  

Protection: Sapphire Glass Screen/ Titanium Back Plate

Connectivity: Dual-LTE, GSM LTE, GSM LTE, GSM  

Speakers: Stereo Surround Sound 4k Cinema  

Battery: Silicon-anode Li-ion

What is Ubuntu Z8

In the car industry, Formula 1 provides a commercial testbed for cutting-edge technologies. The Ubuntu Z8 project aims to do the same for the mobile phone industry -- to provide a low-volume, high-technology platform, crowdfunded by enthusiasts and mobile computing professionals. A pioneering project that accelerates the adoption of new technologies and drives them down into the mainstream.

  This beautifully crafted smartphone is a proving ground for the most advanced mobile technologies on the horizon, a showpiece for true mobile innovation. And at the heart of it all is convergence: connect to any monitor and this Ubuntu phone transforms into an Ubuntu PC, with a fully integrated desktop OS and shared access to all files. We’re fascinated by converged computing, the idea that the smartphone in your pocket can also be the brain of the PC on your desk. We’ve shaped Ubuntu so you can transition seamlessly between the two environments. Now all that’s needed is a phone that’s designed from the ground up to be a PC as well. The Ubuntu Z8 is our very own superphone, a catalyst to drive the next generation of personal computing.

 

Our Hardware

We’ve scoured the research labs of the biggest companies and most exciting startups for the latest and greatest mobile technologies to specify the first-generation Z8. Crafted from cool, textured titanium metal, the Ubuntu Z8 has a distinctive, and very precise look. Gestures are the next big thing in mobile, and our testing has found that a 4.7in screen is ideal for comfortable control of all four corners with one hand.

We also believe the race for ever higher resolution has become a distraction. Beyond 600ppi you’re adding overhead rather than improving display clarity. We think colour, brightness and dynamic range are now the edge of invention so we’ll choose a display for its balance of resolution, dynamic range and colour accuracy. We’ll protect that gorgeous display with something vastly tougher than glass: pure sapphire crystal, a material so hard only diamond could scratch it. For a phone to run a full desktop OS, it must have the raw power of a PC. We’ll choose the fastest available multi-core processor, at least 16GB of RAM and a massive 500GB of storage. The battery will use silicon-anode technology, so we can squeeze more energy into the same dimensions.

 With that kind of muscle, this phone can be your main PC anywhere -- and we really do mean anywhere. You can use the desktop wherever you can find a standard HDMI screen, and the dual-LTE chip will get you online with 4G even when you’re travelling abroad. It’s desktop computing gone truly mobile.

The OS Software

The Next-generation hardware deserves innovative software. The Ubuntu Z8 will dual-boot both the Ubuntu phone OS and Android, and convert into a fully integrated Ubuntu desktop PC.

First, Ubuntu mobile. We designed the interface to create a beautiful home screen that’s free from the usual clutter. You navigate by swiping over an edge of the screen: open your favourite apps on the left edge, switch instantly between open apps from the right, and use the system and app toolbars at the top and bottom respectively. It’s so simple, Ubuntu doesn’t need a home button at all. Specialist data artists have designed Ubuntu’s welcome screen, with graphics that evolve over time to reflect your use of the phone. We’ve reinvented the inbox so you can read and respond to texts, emails and social media posts in an instant.

From mobile... to desktop. Yes, it’s the full Ubuntu desktop OS used by millions on a daily basis -- and it runs directly from the phone, so you’ll be able to move seamlessly from one environment to the other with no file syncing or transfers required. The core OS and applications are fully integrated with their smartphone equivalents, so you can even make and receive calls from the desktop while you work.

Finally, you can also boot the phone into Android. And there’s a good reason for that...

Our Roll-out Plan

As well as being a bonus for app developers and anyone with a big Android app collection, including Android on the phone means we’re able to offer full convergence at launch. On day one, you’ll be able to launch the Ubuntu desktop from within Android using our existing Ubuntu for Android app. 

Then shortly after launch we’ll push out a free software update that adds this desktop integration to Ubuntu mobile as well. That’s the real goal we’re working towards. At that point you’ll have a leading-edge smartphone that runs Ubuntu and Android, both of which can also run a fully integrated Ubuntu desktop OS. What other phone can match that?

However you choose to use The Ubuntu Z8, the incredible components will keep it running fast and fresh as our software evolves. We’ll push out monthly Ubuntu software updates to add features and polish, and we guarantee to keep supporting the phone for five years.

For Software Developers 

HTML5 apps written for other platforms can be brought over to Ubuntu with ease, and any web property can quickly be adapted to run as a web app, with its own icon and access to system services. For richer applications, use our QML toolkit for amazingly productive high-performance engineering.

But best of all, using the Ubuntu SDK you can write and upload a single native application that has desktop, tablet and phone interfaces. It’s a developer’s dream.

All The Technical Specs

Dual boot Ubuntu mobile OS and Android

Fully integrated Ubuntu desktop PC when docked

Fastest multi-core CPU, 16GB RAM, 500GB storage

Micro-SIM

4.7in 1,280 x 720 HD sapphire crystal display

12mp low-light rear camera, 10mp front camera

Dual-LTE, dual-band 802.11n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4, NFC

GPS, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass, barometer

Stereo speakers with HD audio, dual-mic recording, Active Noise Cancellation

11-pin connector providing simultaneous MHL and USB OTG

2, 3.0 USB Ports

3.5mm jack

Silicon-anode Li-Ion battery

Our Project's History

We've been through a long creative process, from early concepts and sketches to 3D wireframes and a variety of test handsets. It's all led us to the beautiful Ubuntu Z8 prototype.

The Ubuntu Z8 is an exclusive production run, available only through Indiegogo. All of the funding we receive goes directly towards producing the device for expected delivery in June 2018. The only pockets getting filled by this campaign will be yours when the handset arrives.

A lot of people around the world have collaborated to get us this far. We have a beautiful prototype Ubuntu Z8 handset, we have advanced Ubuntu software running across phone and desktop, we have experienced operators and manufacturing partners in place, and we have incredibly talented and passionate people to put it all together.

All we need now is you.

Risks and Challenges 

Although our core business is software for PCs and the cloud, we know the phone industry pretty well too. We’ve been working with manufacturers and carriers, so everything we need is already in place. We also have a team based in China where the bulk of the production will occur; and we have engineers around the world who have built this kind of product before. We’re well prepared for the journey ahead.

And it is going to be a journey. We’ve set such a high crowdfunding target for a good reason. Between design, certification and manufacture, the costs of building a new phone are huge -- but the more we produce, the lower the final cost of each handset. Setting such an ambitious target means a more competitive price per device.

Finally, the very nature of this concept device means the exact component list is fluid until we enter production to ensure we’re picking the best available part at the time. If we are forced to change a major feature or component, we’ll come up with something just as innovative to replace it. If you’ve backed us, you’ll be kept right up to date.

story:
Privacy On Top - Internet Privacy made easy

What is Privacy On Top ?

Privacy On Top is a Wi-Fi router that provides

  1. Internet privacy 
  2. Online security
  3. Anonymous dark web access
  4. Censorship-bypassing

Our Wi-Fi router exposes two separate Wi-Fi networks from the router: one Wi-Fi for network security using OpenDNS & DNSCrypt and other for online privacy/anonymity using Tor .

You can connect any device (laptop, smartphone, tablet, IoT, etc. ) to this Wi-Fi hotspot to get online privacy & security. 



Why should I consider Privacy On Top?

  • It gives online privacy
    • To hide your online activities from your ISP and other entities 
  • It provides online security
    • to get protection from phishing websites and malware attacks    
  • You get uncensored internet access
    • To access any blocked content and website  
  • Your router is hardened & maintain high security standards 
    • so you get protection from common attacks. 
  • You get centralized solution for security & privacy  
    • Which means your all devices connecting to this router will be secured and anonymous 

What are perks?



$20USD

Make your network 5X secure
Expert technical support to improve your network security by 5X. We will contact you over skype and assist you to achieve 5X security to your existing Wi-Fi network. No hardware upgrade or software installation required. Read more here: http://PrivacyOnTop.com/Network-Security-Support



$25USD

Nexx WT3020 Travel router
Nexx pocket size travel routers with Privacy On Top. Thanks you for backing us. We will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$40USD

Nexx WT3020 Travel router
Nexx pocket size travel router with Privacy On Top. Thanks you for backing us. We will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$50USD

Nexx WT3020 Travel router
Nexx pocket size travel router Thanks you for backing us. We will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$50USD

DLink Travel Router
DLink DIR-505 router with Privacy On Top Thanks you for backing us. We will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$85USD

Two Nexx WT3020 Travel router
Two Nexx pocket size travel router. One for you and one for your friend. Thanks you for backing us. Will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$90USD

Dual band high range router
TP-Link TL-WDR3500 home router with Privacy On Top. Thanks you for backing us. Will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$95USD

High range Home router
TP-Link TL-WR1043ND home router with Privacy On Top. Thanks you for backing us. We will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$105USD

Dual Band High range Home Router
Powerful TP-Link TL-WDR4300 dual band home router with Privacy On Top. Thanks you for backing us. Will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details



$140USD

One Home & One Travel router
1 TP-Link1043ND and 1 Nexx travel router with Privacy at Home and on the go. Thanks you for backing us. Will list your name as donor on our website
Hardware details


.
$170USD

Powerful Archer C7 Router
Powerful Home and office router TP-Link Archer C7 with Privacy On Top Thank you for backing us. Will list your name as donor on our website.
Hardware details


Share and Win

Get a free router or direct cash by helping us to spread the word

  1. Register in Indiegogo referral program - Get started here.
  2. Share the link and spread the word
  3. For every $1000 pledged we get from your link, you get a free travel router or equivalent cash in your account.


About Us

We are team of Open Netware.

Based in Mumbai, India, Open Netware is founded by Sameer and Mangesh.

Sameer Kulkarni, Co-founder & CEO with 6 years of experience in successfully building products, entrepreneurship and management.
Here is his LinkedIn profile.

Mangesh Bhamre, Co-founder & CTO has 15+ years of experience in Software development which includes 10 years working in Software security at major corporations. He has a deep understanding of the consumer security space.
Here is his LinkedIn profile.


There is a squad of 5 people following Sameer and Mangesh; each one has expertise in various fields such as development, design, marketing etc. Here is company profile on LinkedIn.

Open Netware is founded by two young entrepreneurs, who strongly believes that network today is not standardized neither secured. At Open Netware, we feel the need to fix the gap and take the network to next level.

Privacy On Top is our first product and we are lined up with two more exciting products that we think will change the way we connect to internet. Network and security are our core areas of expertise and we are here to bring in innovation to make a positive impact.

We have got the right people, expertise and experience in product and processes to make this happen. Our dream needs your helping hand to get us off the ground.



What do we need to get off the ground ?

Funding required to get us started is 25,000 USD.

With the initial seed funding from family and friends we have done the research and development of this product. We now plan to sell 500+ units of our hardware units to get much needed traction for our startup. This will help us gain user base, continue our excitement for developing next version and also to spread the word.

This amount will be spent on following tasks

  1. Procure 500+ units and ship to users who pledged
  2. Do online marketing and advertising to reach wider audience.
  3. Start research on next version
  4. Move into a better office as we currently operate from a residential apartment


Click here to know about

  • Why privacy on top loaded router is most secured and out of the box?
  • Hardware details of the routers
  • How does network security work in our router?
  • How does POT works in detail.
  • How we managed Risks and challenges
  • Even more FAQs



Contact Us

Website: http://PrivacyOnTop.com

Blog:http://blog.PrivacyOnTop.com

Support: support@opennetware.com



Timeline


Testimonial

The Privacy On Top routers offer centralized privacy and security features out-of-the-box. They provide a really simple way to improve your internet privacy or security, without installing any software on your devices.

-- Damilare D. Fagbemi , Security expert, speaker & blogger. His own views.

Privacy On Top - Internet Privacy made easy

What is Privacy On Top ?
Privacy On Top is a Wi-Fi router that provides 

Internet privacy 
Online security
Anonymous dark web access
Censorship-bypassing

To hide your online activities from your ISP and other entities

to get protection from phishing websites and malware attacks

Your router is hardened & maintain high security standards 

so you get protection from common attacks. 


You get centralized solution for security & privacy  

Which means your all devices connecting to this router will be secured and anonymous

No hardware upgrade or software installation required. Read more here: http://PrivacyOnTop.com/Network-Security-Support

For every $1000 pledged we get from your link,  you get a free travel router or equivalent cash in your account.




About Us 
We are team of Open Netware.
Based in Mumbai, India, Open Netware is founded by Sameer and Mangesh.






            Sameer Kulkarni, Co-founder & CEO with 6 years of experience in successfully building products, entrepreneurship and management.
            
Here is his LinkedIn profile.
        








            Mangesh Bhamre, Co-founder & CTO has 15+ years of experience in Software development which includes 10 years working in Software security at major corporations. He has a deep understanding of the consumer security space.
            
Here is his LinkedIn profile.
        



There is a squad of 5 people following Sameer and Mangesh; each one has expertise in various fields such as development, design, marketing etc. Here is company profile on LinkedIn.
Open Netware is founded by two young entrepreneurs, who strongly believes that network today is not standardized neither secured. At Open Netware, we feel the need to fix the gap and take the network to next level. 
Privacy On Top is our first product and we are lined up with two more exciting products that we think will change the way we connect to internet. Network and security are our core areas of expertise and we are here to bring in innovation to make a positive impact.

What do we need to get off the ground ?

story:
The Blade Protector- An Impact Protection Device

We set out to make a product that protects the teeth of all electric and manual hair cutting clipper blades. The purpose of this product was to give clipper owners a sense of security while traveling with and storing their clippers. While transporting, clipper owners usually wrap their clippers in either the power cord itself, or some sort of soft cloth material.  The idea was simple; a quality, protective clipper guard. The Blade Protector attaches to the still blade and protects the cutting blade. The Blade Protector device prevents damage to the teeth of the blade which could possibly be caused by impact from another object.  Along with the shock absorbent fins, the blade protector utilizes a magnetic hold, whereas the guard attaches securely onto the upper portion of the stationary blade. 

When storing clippers in moist areas, the protector assist in repelling moisture from the teeth and most of the stationary and cutting blade, which helps to prevent rust and other water related damage(s).  This will extend the life expectancy of each individual blade.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking funding to close out production and packaging cost, in addition to placing an order substantial enough to meet the expected demand of this product. 

The perk you receive from pre-ordering this device is a 30 percent discount of the expected retail price (an amazing deal). 

The Impact

The Blade Protector provides real time protection where an operator can attach the device to a clipper blade while in use, not in use, in transport and or storage. Clipper operators tend to drop their clippers very often. The Blade Protector absorbs impact of the clipper blade and the ground, offering shock absorbent fins with a hard plastic outer shell and soft interior material that extend outwards from the clipper. This allows the Blade Protector to serve as an impact protection device if the hair cutting blade has first contact with the floor or another object. 
The greatest impact of the device is that it is universal and the first of its kind. The Blade Protector is currently Patent Pending. 

Risks & Challenges

The development of the Blade Protector is nearly complete. Clipper Companies are reinventing hair clippers and blades everyday. We want to remain the forefront in clipper blade protection.  Our ultimate goal is to partner with every clipper company and offer a protector for every clipper blade made to date.  Once we reach our funding goal we intend on improving the material of the device to offer more protection and also offer the protectors in different colors.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with individuals who are clipper owner/operators to help us raise awareness for this revolutionary new device.  Please post and share our campaign on your social media networks to help us bring this project to life.

2015 new Short Flat Bracelet Data Charging Cable Cord, For Iphone. 8 Pin USB Cable .

this is bangle usb.

this is flat usb



Awesome bracelet usb cable to charge and data sync your device Anytime, Anywhere!

(here we replace lightn cable with micro usb version)

Features:

  1. 2015 New released cable
  2. Flat Bracelet usb cable, fashion & functional
  3. High quality tinned oxygen-free copper, high speed transmit
  4. Small functional gadget, perfert ideal item for your power bank
  5. 8 pin lightn usb cable, compatible for Iphone 5/5S/6/6+,s6, etc.
  6. Both power charge and Data Sync
  7. Wrist bracelet practical gadget, perfect promotion present for customer



how to get 1 extra usb after you pledge.

 1)share our campaign on facebook.screen shot send to us via our facebook page.

2)congratulation we will send you additional usb cable to your pledge.

                  referral programme.

How can I be sure that my referrals count?

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Then, visit the campaign page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.

Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the link icon circled below.


How To Track Your Results

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders.

Please note: Referrals are not immediately reflected on your Indiegogo profile, but will be displayed within 24 hours.

You can use your Indiegogo profile to track your referrals on each campaign you’ve shared. This makes it easy to participate in more than one referral contest at once!



                why indiegogo?

We are using Indiegogo to interact with our customers at the earliest stages and thanks to your feedback we can create much better products .

We hope to start shipping in december.

As soon as we reach our goal , we will immediately start with production - WE ARE NOT GOING TO WAIT FOR THE CAMPAIGN TO END And Hopefully Will Deliver Your Products Sooner Than You Think ;)

as seen on.

Founded in 2014, flatbangle team  has quickly carved itself a name as an innovator in cutting edge mobile phone accessories. Driven by professionalism, innovation and simplicity, the company pioneers products that cater to the dynamic needs of its tech savvy market. The  usb bracelet Cable is the company’s latest revolution and reflects its commitment to enhancing the day to day lives of its customa

about packing.

our goal is to make 5000 usb cable.

                                                 term and condition apply.

                                all usb cable will come with 1 year warranty.

story:
FR| PT| ES| Русский| Türkçe| فارسی|

 

EasyCrypt will protect privacy of your email while allowing you to use email as usual. Google and other email providers will not be able to scan your mail; overreaching governments and spy agencies will no longer  be able to surveil it; hackers will not be able to read it even if they break into your email account. 

 

 

EasyCrypt is the first email privacy service that provides end-to-end encryption, anonymity and metadata protection at your existing email address. Using EasyCrypt is super easy - just use email like you normally do.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Use EasyCrypt as Webmail and/or as app on your mobile device

 

Send and receive email as usual, from your existing email address, using mobile devices, Webmail or Outlook. Privacy protection is performed transparently in the background.

Your messages will be encrypted on your device and decrypted only on the device of the recipient. Nobody will be able to read your messages except you and your correspondents. 

EasyCrypt encrypts also the information about you and your messages, such as your IP address, email address, message subject, etc. Nosy email service operators and spy agencies will no longer be able to see your metadata. Nobody will.

 

"Metadata is extraordinarily intrusive. As an analyst, I would prefer to be looking at metadata than looking at content, because it's quicker and easier, and it doesn't lie."

 

Edward Snowden

 

 

You  can choose to communicate under email  pseudonyms, so that nobody will know that you are the author of your messages or learn your email address.

Emails exchanged between you and other EasyCrypt subscribers will be protected, no matter what email services you and they are using. You can exchange encrypted messages even with people who do not subscribe to EasyCrypt.

Your messages will be stored by your regular email service provider while being fully protected from its prying eyes. You can use a big and stable provider - no need to worry about it going out of business and taking your emails with it.

 

 

We are technically unable to access your messages or metadata, let alone disclose them to a 3rd party.  Do not take our word for it. Source code of EasyCrypt will be published, allowing verification of our "zero knowledge" claims. Moreover, our service will operate under the strictly privacy-protecting jurisdiction of Switzerland.

 

 

 

Existing email encryption services have serious limitations. Most of them require use of a dedicated email address. Others let you communicate securely only with subscribers of the same service or charge exorbitant fees for email storage.

Moreover, other email privacy solutions do not protect your metadata, including your IP address, the subject of your messages and your email address, and do not support real anonymity.

EasyCrypt is unique in overcoming all of these limitations and creating perfect email privacy.      

 

 

EasyCrypt compared to other solutions*

 

* See our Email Privacy Crash Course to learn more.

 

 

EasyCrypt extends the OpenPGP encryption standard while closing its main privacy loopholes: lack of protection of user identity and metadata. EasyCrypt's innovative integration with Tor network (aka "Deep Web") allows it to achieve sender anonymity and metadata protection. EasyCrypt can read neither the content nor metadata of your encrypted messages, and  cannot identify you as the author of your messages.

 

 

 

We are a team of passionate technologists and privacy enthusiasts. We embarked on a mission to empower people to defend themselves against overreaching government surveillance and predatory invasion of privacy by Internet giants. We use advanced cryptographic technologies but focus on ease-of-use by ordinary email users. 

We have spent a year and a half developing the EasyCrypt concept, architecture and algorithms. Initially we developed and tested several proof-of-concept prototypes. This was followed by development of internal beta versions of EasyCrypt Webmail and Android app.

 

 

 

 

 

So far we financed EasyCrypt research and development from our personal savings and through our own hard work. Reaching our goal of $100,000 will allow us to accelerate the development and launch the EasyCrypt service with Webmail and Android app. Due to ease of use, openness and future availability of a free plan, we expect EasyCrypt to  go viral and become even more valuable to users due to the "network effect".  

We need you on board not just as a backer but as an active participant, providing us with valuable feedback and influencing features and product plans. We need you to help us to implement our vision of empowering people to get their privacy back. 

Please share the campaign using the buttons below, and invite your friends to join you in backing and using EasyCrypt!

 

 

 

We are committed to pushing the limits in helping people to protect their digital privacy, not only for email. Our next major goal is to integrate support of cryptocurrency payment privacy in EasyCrypt. Here are our stretch goals for this campaign:

 

 

 

 

 
(Scroll up to see detailed perk descriptions)
 

 

 

 

 

I know nothing about encryption. Do I need to learn?

No. Just use email as you normally do. EasyCrypt will manage encryption  transparently. If you want to learn more, see our Email Privacy Crash Course.

 

Can I and my correspondents use different email services? 

Yes. You and the people communicating with you can continue to use the email services and addresses that you are are already using. This is a major advantage of EasyCrypt.

 

Can I send encrypted messages to people who do not subscribe to EasyCrypt?

Yes. They will be able to read and reply to your messages in browser, using a password that you supply to them.

Will you disclose my email data or metadata under subpoena?

We are technically unable to do so.

I plan to use Gmail to communicate with other EasyCrypt subscribers. What will Google learn by inspecting my mailbox?

Google will learn when the emails were sent to or from you, and their size. Nothing else.

 

Nothing? No names, no email addresses, no contents, no subject, no IP addresses, no personal metadata?

Correct, none of those. Your email address will be shown, but since it is your mailbox that is being inspected, there will be no new information in this.

 

My perk includes a USB security key. How does it work?

The key adds another layer of protection to your EasyCrypt account. Your account will not be accessible without the key, even if your password is stolen. The same key will secure also your Gmail and Dropbox accounts.

 

Will EasyCrypt be free?

 

Initially EasyCrypt will be available only to our Indiegogo backers. After we release it for other users, EasyCrypt will always have a free plan. Paid plans will  provide unlimited anonymous messages and advanced features (such as multiple email accounts and time-limited messages).

 

Can I communicate securely with hardcore PGP users?

Yes, easily. See the FAQ on our website for details. 

 

Can I access my encrypted messages without using EasyCrypt?

Yes. You can export your  keys and access your email directly at your email account, using any 3rd party PGP client. 

 

Can I use Tor browser to access EasyCrypt webmail? 

Yes.

Will EasyCrypt be released in open source?

Yes.

Where can I get more information and ask questions?

Please visit How it works and FAQ pages on our website. You can also read our Email Privacy Crash Course or email us at support@easycrypt.co. You can also post comments above. We love user questions!

Can I contribute in Bitcoin?

Of course! Our bitcoin address is N3pvQwNbQmt3rnAUqp8CaegW76HCJ4qnu. Please email us at indiegogo@easycrypt.co with the details, so we can give you a perk. You can also contribute using PayPal or credit card.

 

EasyCrypt. Get Your Privacy Back!
