story:
The Peeple App changes the way people learn about each other online. 

Yelp for People.

You may of heard about us last October 2015 when our app concept was exposed to the world and went global and viral in 24 hours...a trending topic on all social media and thousands of articles written about us. We have come a long way since then. We have successfully launched our iOS app on March 7, 2016 in Canada and the US with huge success of over 18,500 users in the first month.

We gave the people what they wanted and made 4 major changes to the app before we launched:

1. Full control over your profile

2. Ability to deactivate your account

3. No 5 star rating system just a Peeple Number that is the total number of recommendations you have received.

4. No one can start your profile

Our Story

Years ago, Nicole set out to change the way people can learn about each other online. She knew the value of a referral and then it struck her – why is there nothing that provides recommendations and commentary on aspects that truly matter to us?

Teaming up with her best friend Julia, the two innovative women set out to change the way people can learn about each other online. The Peeple app allows you to better choose who you hire, do business with, date, become your neighbours, roommates, landlords/tenants, and watch, teach, and care for your children. There are endless reasons as to why we would want this reference check for the people around us.

Looking at everyone in the three ways you could possibly know someone – personally, professionally and romantically – you can provide a recommendation on everyone you come in contact with, while allowing yourself to be recommended.

Once armed with these recommendations you can turn them into your new form of currency to get better job opportunities, better dates, growing relationships, and networking opportunities. The online social media space was lacking a safe place to manage your online reputation.

We are confident that with Peeple you deserve to have it all!

Help us build Android and launch by August 2015.






Your support helps us release the Peeple Android app sooner.

Key features of the app:

  • FREE to download
  • Create your Profile
  • Recommend people and be recommended in three categories (Personal/Professional/Dating).
  • Share any Recommendation to social media sites and over text/email
  • Share your profile and the profile of others on social media and over text/email
  • Search for and add friends from Facebook
  • Geo-location Nearby feature allows you to find people within a 10 mile radius of you.
  • Peeple Number  is the number of recommendations that you have published on your profile.
  • Agree with a recommendation
  • Like a profile
  • Follow people
  • Messaging feature allows users to message anyone in the app
  • Truth License:  upgrade paid feature to see all recommendations that weren't published on people's profiles.

 

Add your name, career, passion and interest to your profile and be found by like minded people.

              



Search for people by name and location to recommend them. If not on the app you can find them in your address book and leave them a recommendation; they will get a text from you to download the app to see what you wrote.

                  



Make recommendations on people or have people write recommendations about you in the three ways you know someone (Personal/Professional/Dating). Turn the dating section on or off in your settings     :)      We respect your relationships.

                    


When you receive a recommendation you can take 4 actions:  1. Publish the recommendation live on your profile. 2. Delete the recommendation 3. Block the user who sent it 4. Report the user who sent it.

Completely safe to manage your online reputation and profile.

                       



Share your profile and recommendations on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, over text and email. Use your recommendations received to highlight yourself to hiring managers, volunteer groups, clients, friends, business associates, and so much more.

                  


Let’s collaborate to build the Peeple Android App and use social currency to help you get more of what you want in life!

Where will your money go?
  • 5% will go to Indiegogo
  • 3% - 5% will go to PayPal
  • 90% will go to our development team partners to build this app for ANDROID!

When will the app be available?


* Development will start May 2016 and will continue as we raise the money.


  1. $100,000 CDN will allow us to create an app for ANDROID (August 2016) and anything additional will significantly speed up our development process and allow us to add even more features.
  2. The faster we achieve or surpass this goal, the greater possibilities we have to get funding from other sources and investors.

Other ways to help us:

  • Download our iOS app here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/peeple/id1008896593?ls=1&mt=8
  • Tell your friends about the campaign
  • Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube or Pinterest

The Peeple app team consists of a group of dreamers, developers and critical thinkers who spend their free time contemplating how we can engage with the people around us in new ways. Our team has grown to a modest 6 full-timers in the form of 2 successful directors, an incredible Chief Technology Officer, 2 developers and a resourceful customer care manager who share a passion for traveling, cultural experiences, relationship building and creating outstanding platforms and systems.  We have 32 shareholders, a robust legal team and partnerships with Fortune 500 companies. 

                                             


1. When will the Android app be complete? The app takes 3 months to build. We will start in May 2016 and should have it complete by August/September 2016
2. Will Peeple ever have a web based version? Yes, in the future we look forward to giving access to everyone with a web based version.
3. Will you be able to build the Android app even if you don't get fully funded? Yes, we have a team dedicated to the project that are flexible and willing to get paid once we raise enough money.
4. Are you looking for Venture Capital, Funds, or Angel Investors at this time? Yes, we are actively seeking the right funding partner to take our company global by 2017. 
5. What happens if you raise more than $100,000 CAD? What will you do with the money? We will use this money to add more features to our iOS and Android app while expanding into new countries.
*- FAQ on the app concept itself can be found at www.forthepeeple.com

Other ways to help us:

Download our iOS app here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/peeple/id1008896593?ls=1&mt=8

Tell your friends about the campaign 

Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube or Pinterest




The Peeple app team consists of a group of dreamers, developers and critical thinkers who spend their free time contemplating how we can engage with the people around us in new ways. Our team has grown to a modest 6 full-timers in the form of 2 successful directors, an incredible Chief Technology Officer, 2 developers and a resourceful customer care manager who share a passion for traveling, cultural experiences, relationship building and creating outstanding platforms and systems.  We have 32 shareholders, a robust legal team and partnerships with Fortune 500 companies.

2. Will Peeple ever have a web based version? Yes, in the future we look forward to giving access to everyone with a web based version.


3. Will you be able to build the Android app even if you don't get fully funded? Yes, we have a team dedicated to the project that are flexible and willing to get paid once we raise enough money. 


4. Are you looking for Venture Capital, Funds, or Angel Investors at this time? Yes, we are actively seeking the right funding partner to take our company global by 2017.

story:
The Logo's we go by.

We are Market Trading Solutions™ (Engineering Works) We are a very small yet well organized. we come from Telford, England. We currently have a team of four, all of us have years of experiences in varying fields. two of us have heavy CAD/manufacture and design backgrounds, while one of us has a very deep history in business and marketing. We have existed for around one year, not very long by industry standards, though what we have done in that time is fairly substantial. We have a very bright future ahead of us, but we need your help to get there.

"No one is truly self made" - Gary Keller (From New York Times best seller 'The One Thing')

We spend more time drawing, designing and re-designing, than any other company out there. Why? We do it because we care about the quality that we deliver to our customers. if you scroll down you can learn more about our major project.

Development Work -  Some images showing our true to life renderings. Here's a simple fly by view, enjoy the rest! This took us some time.

Exploded Diagram to show how easy this Product can be mass manufactured. This design only has 5 components, excluding the battery and internal microchips, this makes mass manufacture particularly easy, considering that the most complex materials can be easily formed and prefabricated as shown bellow. This takes away a plethora of risks commonly associated with most crowed funded projects. I personally have see many projects with a very well thought out design but no feasible means of manufacture. We make everything easier here at MTS.

Seamless Open/Close mechanism, air tight security, long lasting design. How many times have you heard a loud SCREECH, when it comes to opening your door? Not with this lock, we gave the design a good amount of tolerance whist also keeping the connection air tight and secure (Not 100% air tight). We were able to accomplish this through having a tolerance of less than 1/32nd of a millimeter between connections.

Colour Works - a great new way to decorate your door. (Reece Mitchell Colour Works Developer)

Colour works is a project set to change the way we look at door locks, we often see them as clutter, something that usually acts as an eye sore on our doors, that's why we produced color works, an application that can change the color of the led on your lock, perhaps you may want this to link different colours to rooms they represent, or just perhaps the aesthetic qualities that it serves.

How does the colour system work? - Have a look for your self bellow

Lets take a look at the app? The app for color works will have an interface similar to that of Photoshop, you will have a wide selection of millions of colours that you can precisely tweak to your liking.

Ambient Light Sensor - A very efficient method to save power. (Jay Hanna Ambient Light Sensor Developer)

The ambient Light Sensor is more so an idea developed for young children who have trouble sleeping at night, as appose to smart adults who may see this feature as a waste of battery power. This feature can be turned On/Off via the app.

Day Time LED Effect - During the day time, the ambient light sensor detects light in the room and tones down, or switches off the LED depending of how bright the area surrounding the lock becomes.

Night Time LED Effect - During the night time the ambient light sensor is Frequently active due to the low lighting in the room at night.

Key-less Entry - A brilliant new way to keep your home safe without the hassle of keys. (Kevin Smith Key-less Entry Developer)

Software is still currently in development, how ever it will be finished upon completion of this project. This software will enable you to control every door lock in your home remotely from your phone, or from your tablet, this can be operated from any where in the world, just as long as your lock has a viable means of power (1xAAA Battery). Its a revolutionary new way to lock up your home from afar. Forget to lock the front door? No worries.

(Reece Mitchell Developer)

Don't worry! you're in safe hands with us! Unlike most "smart locks" ours will shut down the network and trap the intruder, it will also send a message to the correct authorities (police) so everything is taken care of and nothing valuable is taken. With many locks you may not know for days whether someone has actually been inside your home, if you happen to be away. This is a very common problem and one we have believed to have fixed. This feature could mean the difference between life or death quite literally! So don't waste your hard earned money on some cast aluminum Swiss army knife, that you have to bore a massive hole through your door to install. With our easy insulation (very friendly for people renting their properties) you won't have to worry about a thing. After all would you rather rest the protection of your home and family on a cheaply manufactured and expensive aluminum gadget, or a solid titanium alloy enclosure, a material heavily trusted by NASA and other military agencies and institutions? You do the math.

Our App is currently under construction, we are working tirelessly to get everything right, we don't want to miss a detail or a design flaw that may hinder the security of our users.

For such a premium product we want to offer you the best with out asking for a premium price. We've done this by cutting down our net earning on each unit to approximately £3 per unit. We feel at Market Trading Solutions™ (Engineering Works) that everyone deserves to best quality for the best price, we will be one of the few groups that plans makes less then 10% ROI every sale. Security is everything when it comes to running a home, so we chose the most versatile materials on the planet to help keep you, your family and your possessions safe.

Titanium Alloy - We need this material to keep the locks at a small size, but keep the level of strength very high. This material is costly, but our customers deserve to be kept safe. (Fun fact: NASA uses Titanium Alloy on the ISS because of its incredible strength to weight ratio!)

Poly-carbonate - This material is one of the strongest polymers known to man, along with ABS, though this material is also costly we believe that this is the best to secure the delicate housing of fragile components.

Neodymium - This material is highly magnetic and helps to keep a strong forceful grip on any object that emits its apposing pole. We believe by study and practice that this material is best to help secure the emergency lock ins and connectors between both parts of the locking mechanism

Copper - This material is probably one of the best electrical conductors, bedsides gold, when it comes to directing electricity, we believe that this works magnetically too, when a electrical charge is run through it.

We can't offer much, but we will do our best to give you value for money! We appreciate every £ that comes our way! But we do offer rewards for those looking to go above and beyond to help our project see the light of day! Thank you all of you for your help and support!

There are many risks and challenges of creating a product so complicated, one of the biggest risks we are currently considering is difficulty to manufacture on a large scale, we need skilled workers and a very (progressed) manufacturer to produce our product. Our product is of a higher quality and higher advancement of anything else on the market, and mass production will be expensive. But it will be worth it to deliver you the best product possible. The second risk is that it may not function as expected, never the less a small re-design or tweak may fix that, we are working around the clock to constantly improve our products. Nothing is going to get in our way, we are diligent, organized and ready for anything. The third and final risk, is that it may not become a popular product. Never the less we will still continue to make our product popular though our marketing campaigns e.c.t.

Frequently asked questions

Q:Will it work with any device?

A:Our short answer is yes it will work with any device, so long as your device operates on iOS or Android, and your locks have power. You'll also need WIFI for this feature.

Q:Is it water proof?

A:To a degree, though this isn't a very planed feature of ours. Our locks are only designed for indoor use only so we found water proofing to be pointless and drive the cost up for the consumer, which is never a good thing. 

Q:Do you need WIFI to operate it?

A:No you do not need WIFI, however if you wish to connect locks to a network and have them all function a certain way, then you will need a WIFI connect. If you just want to use it as a simple every day lock with no app-connect and all the 'fancy' software upgrades you may. I too prefer things to be kept simple.

Q:Do you need a iOS or Android device to operate it?

A:No the lock can function as a normal lock and you can open it with our key-fob, though if you intend to operate the lock with a phone, it may come in handy to have one.

Q:How much force does it need to take before it alerts authorities?

A:It will take around 1000lbs of impact force before it sends a distress signal, the force is about that of a sledge hammer, but believe me, the lock can survive it. The idea behind it being 1000lbs of force, is for the door to shatter, showing heavily signs that the door is being literally forced open. This way you won't get a scare from the police simply by just knocking in to it, punching the lock won't make it go off either.

Thank you for your time everyone! Thank you ever so much for helping our cause. And if you need to ask any questions about the product, feel free to ask! My personal email as CEO is jayhanna10@gmail.com, anything you want to ask, you can ask me! Thank you once again! Be sure to like us on Facebook.

(Protected under the UK Copyright, and Design Patent Acts 1988, All logo's and ideas you have seen here are officially protected under UK law).

story:
Short Summary

A little bit of insight:

  • My name is Evan Williams, I am 23 years old and was born and raised in Dallas, Texas. Growing up since the age of four I played football and as i grew older I discontinued my Football career due to injuries. Ever Since the ending of my Football journey I've been repairing and customizing apple products (mainly iPhone's)
  • What i'm doing here isn't just for fun or "Just Another Business", I've actually developed a passion for this business that is similar to the same passion I had growing up for football.
  • With your help i will be able to expand my business 10 fold. Your help is the same as A car that needs a jump start, all of the other components of the car works, but sometimes you just need a little spark to get things rolling.

Be apart of something that is high in demand and rarely seen. Anyone with business knowledge knows that rare things GET SOLD, and of course business is "supply the DEMAND" rite?

What We Need & What You Get

Let Me Break It Down In Simplicity:

  • Im setting my goal at $50,000. Funding received for this project will be going towards a building space in a local area. Not only just a business space, funding will also be used for other things that are mandatory for this business's growth. Such as, Legalities necessary for the business to be legitimate (city, state & Country) Copyright's, Lawyers  & things of that sort which are needed that the business will be protected in all angles. funding also will be going towards the store front displays so that customers will be able to observe all of the different items that our store has to offer. last but not least funds will be used for keeping our stock at a level to where we will stay in stock at all times. Payments to DHL so that our items will be transported to my business safely and in a timely manner. These are just A few of the major things needed for our business
  • We specialize in custom coloring iPhones, laser engraving of any design, any name & any logo whether for business or pleasure. We will be adding Diamonds bezels to the apple watches coming soon at the start of 2017. Also various color ways of the Apple Watch wrist bands.
  • Planning on my downfall isn't something that i do, but having A back up plan is useful & one of the more educated things to do in life. Let's say i didn't reach my $50,000 goal. That doesn't mean I will feel like A failure and quit going after my dreams. No matter if i raised $5 or $1,000,000, Every penny will be put towards the steps to attain the goals recently stated.
  • WE ALSO WILL BE GIVING BACK TO THE ONES THAT HAVE CONTRIBUTED. WE WILL BE DOING A RANDOM GIVE AWAY TO ONE OF OUR CONTRIBUTORS. THE GIVEAWAY WILL BE A CUSTOM 24k GOLD IPHONE & APPLE WATCH, GIVIN AWAY TOTALLY 100% FREE.

The Impact

Your Contribution is a huge asset, great things get accomplished when you have people on your side motivating and supporting the movement:

  • What we are doing here is doing something that no one else can do like we can. feel more connected with your one of a kind personal preffered iPhone.
  • I've done many phones in the past and I'm looking forward to doing many more projects as well as expanding.
  • Want to build a trust with my clients, co-workers and most importantly YOU, the person that made all of this happen.

Risks & Challenges

It won't be an easy road to take, but what great person has achieved anything great without obstacles and hurdles to overcome. It took many years and even death for people to finally realize how smart and legendary Albert Einstein really was.

  • Even to get to this point where I am now I've overcome many trials and tribulations, I could have gave up and moved on wit my life but my desire mixed with my ambition just wouldn't let me do so. Since sticking through the hard times i've recently met a business partner that has helped expand my business as a whole with his expertise. I would have never found this new business partner if i would have never kept going passed the hard times, doing research and bettering myself overall. Now I know the importance on why to never give up even when your down to your last straw.
  • You live and you learn, hope you guys can help me through my journey and better myself even more thanI already have.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can't give money to help out with funding doesn't mean you can't do anything to help out. Something as small as a simple prayer, or even a social media post could help as fuel to the fire:

  • Share this on your social media profiles so that more people may be able to be apart of something great.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to help Us get more exposure. Cant think you enough for your much appreciated help.

Sincerely, The Apple Doctor Team
story_txt:
Short Summary
A little bit of insight:

My name is Evan Williams, I am 23 years old and was born and raised in Dallas, Texas. Growing up since the age of four I played football and as i grew older I discontinued my Football career due to injuries. Ever Since the ending of my Football journey I've been repairing and customizing apple products (mainly iPhone's)
What i'm doing here isn't just for fun or "Just Another Business", I've actually developed a passion for this business that is similar to the same passion I had growing up for football.
With your help i will be able to expand my business 10 fold. Your help is the same as A car that needs a jump start, all of the other components of the car works, but sometimes you just need a little spark to get things rolling.

Be apart of something that is high in demand and rarely seen. Anyone with business knowledge knows that rare things GET SOLD, and of course business is "supply the DEMAND" rite?

What We Need & What You Get

story:
Magic Card: The Premium Portable Phone Stand

 

The Story

While attending a wedding, Franko (Co-Founder) asked to himself, “What if I could prop up my phone on this crowded table top and glance at it easily without turning away from other guests? What if I could make this item a cool wedding gift for the guests?” Franko searched on the market for days after, but nothing comes close to his high expectation in terms of quality. Thus he decided to make his own.

He first approached his friend from a long time back, Kelvin (Co-Founder), because he knew Kelvin has a plastic moulding business and his design experience would be invaluable. Over the next few months and after two prototypes, a final design is completed.  Then, they took it to a trade show to test the waters.

To Franko’s pleasant surprise, the trade show was a tremendous hit. Many people inquired about the product. After the trade show, Franko recruited two more people to handle the tremendous feed back and to optimize the production process to meet the demands.

Now the team is wants to expand production onto a bigger scale and make the product available to world wide audiences!

 

How will your Funding make a Difference?

We want to create a premium and unique product that you will love and use every day.  The Magic Card is a project that has gone through detailed research, iterative design refinement, and rigorous testing, and we are very close to completing our production phase. The funding that we need to raise will be used towards upgrading our printing and engraving process in order to make the highest quality personalized graphics design. In other words, we just need a little bit of your help to get this exciting product to you!

 

Our Promise

As a BIG THANK YOU for supporting us early on and making this project possible, we make sure we are offering a great price for you in this campaign. With decades of design and manufacturing experience backing our team, we are 100% confident that we will get the Magic Card into your hands and you will fall in love using it. We will fulfil our orders in the sequence that they are received, so be sure to order early on to be the first ones to get your hands on our exciting product. See the Perks section for all the exciting deals that we are offering!

 

Retailers and Distributors Interest

If you are a retailer or distributor looking to order larger quantity, we would love to work with you too! At a minimum order quantity of 30, we can support different levels of customization.  Please see our Perks section for Value Pack, Savings Pack, Super Savings Pack, and Mega Custom Pack for details.  After you place an order, we will get in touch with you or you can also contact us at info@noveli.com.hk to discuss additional details. We are super excited to hear from you!

 

Subscribe, Like, and Share Contest!

Join for a great chance to get a free Magic Card Portable Phone Stand. Simply visit our Facebook link: https://business.facebook.com/noveli.hk/app/512541485429310/ , then subscribe, like, and share! We will announce 1 lucky winner on Facebook for every 10 people joining the contest! Contest closes at 1000 Likes, so hurry!

 

Doing Great On Our Timeline

 

The Team

Since 2009, Noveli has been supplying to global brands. Our team has decades of experience in design, high precision manufacturing, global marketing, financial management, and quality assurance.  Moving forward, we want to offer our awesome original products to you.

 

Risks & Challenges

The funds that we raise in this campaign is used towards upgrading our printing and laser engraving process. So far without any external funding, our team has already covered all other manufacturing and tooling costs.  Currently, we are aiming to start shipping products by July 2017 and we are confident that we will be able to stick to that schedule.

As with all projects, there are risks.  With the high degree of graphics customization, our product creation is very labour intensive as we thoroughly inspect and carefully package our products to ensure that we give you the best products possible.  We strive to keep our promise to start shipping on schedule, but if we see a huge demand for our product, this may cause stress in our production line and may cause potential delays in product delivery.

We will do our best to keep our promise to deliver on schedule and to maintain constant communication with our supporters, so be sure to come back often to see our progress update!

story:
Download the app and see if it's worth supporting

We are two computer science students from Slovenia. Our passion for programming leaded us to mobile development and we just launched Android and iOS app. We want to share our application with the world and for that we need your support. Check out our app and if you like it share the app, back us up, just spread the word around. Help us keep the app live.

Team Behind The Scene

We are young, passionate, energetic developers with a vision to create our own mobile applications. We want to make cool apps for you people out there. And if that doesn't work out... Hey, we think we could have a quite awesome career as bartenders.

About Our App

Your Daily Dose Of Fun 

Get funny, weird and interesting live tweets and enjoy your social media experience. This is an extremely easy to use app with beautiful graphics. It has a very simple navigation and you can access all app features with absolute ease. 

Always Up To Date

Switch to trending stream where you only see the tweets from currently trending topics on Twitter. The trending topics are updated every 3 hours so you are always up to date with what is going on.

More and More and More Fun

We set up a time interval for incoming tweets, but if you want to get new tweets immediately just scroll up. The time interval can be adjusted to your needs inside settings section. 

Laugh Together

While reading funny tweets, you can not only have fun for yourself, but also share these tweets with your friends directly from the app.  

Ideas That Came From You

Have an idea how to improve the app? We are always opened to suggestions. Here are some examples of the user-suggested functionalities.

 

  • Night Mode Theme

    Hey I was just using your app and I thought of a possible addition. Having a dark and amoled theme would be really cool (and good for the eyes).

    The night mode would be amazing, and of course so would a normal dark theme option.

  • Bigger User Image

    I would like to be able to click onto people's profile pics and see a bigger version of their picture.

    Actually, my main request would be to be able to click on the profile picture and have a large one appear in the app. Sometimes I'm like'oh what's that in the picture?' and it's a bit of a pain to have to open it through the twitter client.

  • Settings Button

    I just don't know how to get into the settings on the app. My galaxy 7edge doesn't have a hardware settings button, and I can't find one inside the app.

Use Of Funds

  • App Updates
    We will improve the graphic user interface, add user voted filters for streams, support for different languages and countries.
  • Promotion
    To reach more audience and let our app fly we have to promote, promote, promote... We will request app reviews on major websites, create Twitter and Facebook campaigns.
  • Server Maintenance
    Processing live tweets and filtering out unappropriated content is a not budget-friendly server operation. As most of the adults we just want to the bills go away.
  • Data Mining
    We plan to do a case study in interpreting twitter data to reveal how wording influences tweet success. Our goal is to add better filters and bring to the user more quality tweets.

The Perks for Funding Us?

Unfortunately, we can't give you a geeky gadget for your coffee table, but we gave our very best to provide you with an equal for the support you show us.

So here are some awesome gifts as a big thank you for your funding.

  • 5€
    Lovely thank you from us.
  • 15€
    Your name will be proudly written as an contributor on our website.
  • 25€
    Share your thoughts. Your tweet will be shown to every active user for a day*. You can select the date.
  • 50€
    We want to meet you. Let's have a Skype meeting to talk about your brilliant ideas about the app.
  • 100€
    Share your thoughts. Your tweet will be shown to every active user for a week.*
  • 500€
    Only one purchase available. You can design with us a color theme that will be named after you.
     
*The app shows live tweets(meaning tweets that were posted moments ago). We will program a tweet of your choosing so it will be shown once to every user active in a day or a week.

story:
PLEASE READ THIS FIRST!!!

Do not buy this if your smartphone ​don't support Bluetooth 4.0 or higher.


Features:

  • Smart Mode: On smart mode, it turn on/off automatically when sensoring moving & stop.
  • ​Wireless Control over Bluetooth: Control the temperature over Bluetooth 4.0 on your smartphone.
  • Battery Notification: Batttery level will be shown on the app, low power notification will be given.​
  • ​Optimized Heating Process: Automatically optimize heating process to save power consumption. (smartmode must be active).

Specification:


​




What are the shipping and customs fees? ***NOTE*** 

Shipping fees are between €15 - 35 depending on your perks. We will send anywhere in the world. All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. All indiegogo rewards will be declared 'gifts', however, most countries will assess duties/taxes and in certain countries the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can’t ship another package to you.

Risks & Challenges

Like any hardware project, there are risks and challenges associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics. There is always a chance that unexpected changes or issues may arise during execution impacting the delivery schedule.

The only risk we can think of is the projected timeline of the delivery of rewards. There may be unforeseen challenges when we start production. If any issues come up, the delivery of your reward will be delayed.

Zombie apocalypse or a very large meteorite hitting the earth ;p Everything is ready to go. All we need is your support.

That said, we’re pretty straight forward when it comes to communication and have built a reputation of being transparent with our backers. We'll make two promises:

  • We will deliver the highest quality product to each and every single backer. We take extreme pride in making some of the best products in the world and will never compromise on quality.
  • We will keep the lines of communication open at all times. If we have hurdles, you'll be the first to know about them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. Thanks in advance! Any help is welcome.

story:
Introduction

i-Rocks Fun Keyboard Project Goals

1.  Fun with Lego bricks

2.  Changeable decorating plates

3.  Reproduce the satisfyingly tactile with a delightfully clicky feel of Alps tradition


We attempt to create a device that integrate daily joy and satisfyingly function. This functional keyboard could heal your inner and mood. Meanwhile, we want to reproduce the typing feel of Alps keyswitches used in some of most legendary keyboards from the last century as well.


Our idea was inspired in a keyboard fans meeting. After numerous tests and discussions, we brought our prototype to a select group of experts who dedicated in keyboard industry for more than 30 years. We shared different ideas and discussed feedbacks, which drive the necessary change to perfection.


When the product is ready for production, we ensure that each step of manufacturing is handled with attention to detail but most importantly quality. This ultimate keyboard is a joint of joy, fun, and a renascent legend.


What Makes i-Rocks Fun a Wonderful Keyboard

1.  Joy and Fun: Lego and Detachably Decorating Plates


The toys, even games, have changed dramatically and very different from the toys we played 30 years ago.


Comparing the modern offerings, the previous toys seem almost primitive. It is true that technology has changed the way we play. Innovated toys might seem to be altering human behavior at lightning speed. However, if we take a closer look and really examine the toys and games we are playing with, we’ll discover that although the items for playing have changed, the principles behind playing remain the same.If we look at the popularity of Minecraft or other similar games, we could easily find that underpinning game is very helpful for creativity (i.e., people could design everything on their own). Therefore, we designed the plate that users could create their unique keyboards by Lego bricks.


OK. Some might wonder why we use the concept of Lego. Here are the reasons.

  • Simple

It's one of the things that almost anyone can do just because it's such a simple concept. Putting the bricks together and create something on your own. The creation could be very complicated, or simple enough. It's all on your terms. You decide if you want to make a small table or the empire state building. All you need if the imagination.

  • Ageless

Basically, Lego is a toy indeed. But even adult could play these toys. The process makes people happy and relax. Don’t forget Lego has stood more than 60 years. Lego is very adaptable by your inner no matter how old are you.

  • Creativity

With different pieces, Lego could release your imaginative mind and you create everything you want. There are so many possibilities and the wide range is so broad that there is still so much more that can be done. Meanwhile, when you design your own items, it gives you the right to manage everything with it. Do it on your own way and that where the creativity begins.

  • Fun

It is fun to play Lego because your imagination lies in your hands. Lego is a lot more than a toy. It’s a creative expression. A lot of people, even adults, hugely engaged with it. With Lego you can make the most amazing things — things you’d never imagine. Furthermore, these colorful bricks could be disassembled in the end of a day and you could start a new design next time. As long as you have a creative imagination (and childishness!), you will have infinite joy.


Lego pieces of all varieties constitute a universal system. We designed a plate based on this universal system so that people could build bricks on their keyboards.

Not in the mood for playing? No problem! We also designed detachable top plates. You could choose the one you love and just change it. Depending on the purpose of your nameplate, this can be as simple as one color printed plastic or it can be as complex as building something with Lego.


2.  The Renascent Legend: Alps

Mechanical keyboard fans rejoice. We spent a lot of time make a step closer to make a legend switch reborn of our keyboard. Alps is a Japanese company and brand that well known in the keyboard community primarily for the Alps SKCL/SKCM series (Originally made by Alps) of mechanical keyswitches. These switches have stopped production for a long time ago, but Alps clone switches are still manufactured by many other manufacturers. Here is the whole story of how we reach the disappeared legend switch.


  • History of Alps switches

With perhaps the most complex background and story of any switch type, Alps switches are much more difficult to categorize than most other mechanical switches. Alps Company has been out of business for years, and the Alps name is now used out of convenience to denote the stem type found on the switch. According to the data and products we could find, Alps switches could be sorted as below:

Alps SKCL/SKCM series

Commonly referred to as complicated Alps,Alps Bigfoot, and Alps CM due to its complicated design. First introduced as early as 1983,the Alps SKCL/SKCM series has been one of the first commonly available, compact-design keyboard switches. This series probably was the most common type of Alps switches used in computer keyboards when desktop computer from 1985 to 1990. Over the years there have been many variants of the keyswitches, including changes in color and design. Early variants of the Alps switch did not carry the Alps logo on the top part of the case, and only had it stamped in on the switch bottom.

Alps SKBL/SKBM series

Commonly known assimplified Alpsdue to its reduced part count overAlps SKCL/SKCM series. This series of switches appeared to have been manufactured byForward Electronicsin Taiwan around 1999. In 2000, Alps ended up the 30-years long joint venture with Forward Electronic. From this point onward, this series has no relationship with Alps. This also led to the switches refereed to “Fukka” or “Fuhua Alps” that are misreading Taiwanese name.

Alps clone


This series refers to a keyboard switch not made by Alps but interchangeable with SKCL/SKCM series and SKCL/SKCM series switches. Because many switches are very similar to Alps SKCL/SKCM and SKBL/SKBM series switches, and because earlier SKCL/SKCM switches were not visibly brand mark, it became common to mistake a wide variety of switches for being "Alps" switches.

Because of historic background and reasons, we would like to highlight the following factors.

1.  Since Alps is out of switches business for years, a lot of keyboard players are very familiar with ALPS switches but consider ALPS switches entry level products. This opinion is somewhat correct because the current Alps switches are not Alps original design. The different design leads the typing feeling changed and this feeling is hard to describe by words.

2.  Before the membrane keyboard debuted, mechanical keyboard was the primary choice of input equipment. Alps also dominated the switches market many years. At that time, Cherry focused on niche market and became current market dominator in switch market.

3. The purpose of Alps switches categories is to sort out different types of Alps switches. It doesn’t mean that one type is definitely better than another.



  • Development and reproduce the feeling of Alps

Switches are the soul of a keyboard. Good switches should have a bright, crisp feeling, with a slightly tactile feedback that tells you when the press has registered just half way through the key travel. That’s totally different from a membrane keyboard, where you have to press the key down to the bottom. When typing on a keyboard you actually felt good respond and feedback. You'd press a key and you could feel a nice, satisfying, mechanical click. When talking about the feeling, it’s very subjective. We usually use following criteria to describe the feeling.

1. Tactile

Some switches have clearly tactile feedback while some are not. A strong tactile feedback makes the pressing process have two phases. Comparing the linear switches, tactile switches make typist clearly and definitely feel the whole process of typing.

2. Clicky

Yes. It’s the noise that made from typing. Due to the mechanical design, some mechanical keyboards have noisy reputation. The typing sound may be a problem if you work in an office. But some typist love these rhythmic clatters cause it helps typist in a good typing pace.

3. Force

The force means actuation force. Some switches need more actuation force than other switches. That gives typists totally different feeling.

4. Travel Distance

Travel distance means the typing distance that actually detonates by contact. Mechanical keyboards usually have longer travel distance than that on membrane keyboards.

We visited many enthusiastic keyboard experts and borrowed several legendary keyboards that used Alps switches. It takes almost 2 years and countless modifications to meet our criteria. Since mechanical keyboards use separate complete switches underneath every key, each switch is composed of a base, a spring, and a stem. Depending on the shape of the stem, such keyboards have varying actuation and travel distance. Switches also come in three variants, linear with consistent resistance, and tactile with a non-audible bump or with an audible click. Meanwhile, depending on the resistance of the spring, the key requires different amounts of pressure to actuate. Mechanical keyboards allow for the removal and replacement of keycaps. Finally, we have made four different keyswitches.

i-Rocks Private Alps Switches


The switch accepts Cherry MX and other keycaps. However, you can’t hand-wiring this switch on cherry keyboard cause the pin layout couldn’t be kept identically.

Spec：


  • Interface: USB ( Full Speed )
  • Key number: 104 Keys ( By Language )
  • Switch type : i-Rocks Mechanical Switch
  • Key stroke: 4.0 mm to the bottom 
  • N-Key rollover 
  • LED Backlighting function
  • Multimedia shortcut keys
  • Cable Length:200cm
  • Dimensions: 459 (L)*158.5 (W)*39.5(H) mm
  • Weight : About 1.45 Kg
System Requirement
  • Microsoft  Windows® XP,  Windows Vista ®  , Windows® 7 ，Windows® 8 and Windows® 10 operating system.
  • Available USB Port

Comparing the different clicky and tactile feel, we created four types of switches: Clicky(blue), Tactile(brown), Linear(red),and Geek (white). 



The blue switch provides clear tactile and clicky feedback. The tactile force is 60g and the operating force is 35g. The design of blue switch is for a typical mechanical keyboard. If you like clicky and click reckless abandon, this is the right choice to you.




The brown switch also provides clear tactile and clicky feedback. But the tactile force is 50g and the operating force is 33g. Comparing to blue switch, brown switch has smaller sound and less contact. If you like tactile typing and work in an office, the brown switch keyboard is fitting your requirements.


The red switch is virtually identical to the blue switch except for the absence of the “tactile peak.” There is a consistent force throughout the full stroke of the key so there is no tactile feedback unless the switch bottoms out. That is the reason why we called it linear feeling. Some people prefer the switches with linear feeling due to their “smoother” feel. Since there is no peak or tactile force, the total effort required to reach the activation force of 40 g is slightly less than with the tactile (blue and brown) switch.




We take geek switch as an advanced linear switch. While the total effort required to reach the activation force on red switch is 40g, the effort on geek switch is 28g. The feedback is so special and polarizes people into two extremes: love it or not. That’s also the reason why keyboard fans called light linear switch “geek switch”.


Meet i-Rocks Fun

As we've been building what's become i-Rocks Fun, we also talked to many huge fans of mechinical keyboard. It's been amazing to watch people suddenly "get it"as they put their hands on i-Rocks Fun. 
Although we will have a booth on Computex Taiwan, 2016, we want to bring that experience to as many people as possible. If you are in media industry and would like to know further information, please contact us for trial working samples. 
Updated News
We are in the news! Amazing! CNET



Risks & Challenges

Luckily we've been in the business for many years so we think we have most challenges covered. We've done everything we could to set ourselves up for an on-time delivery. The delivery estimates we've put together represent our best effort at accounting for part lead times and unanticipated delays. However, the thing about unanticipated delays is that you can't anticipate them. If something does come up, we promise to be as forthright and transparent about it as we can. The delivery will be two phases after the campaign finished.

1.  The first 1000pcs of i-Rocks keyboards will be delivery on Oct. 2016.

2.  The rest orders will be delivery on Nov. 2016
story_txt:
Introduction

i-Rocks Fun Keyboard Project Goals

1.  Fun with Lego bricks
2.  Changeable decorating plates
3. 
Reproduce the satisfyingly tactile with
a delightfully clicky feel of Alps tradition



We
attempt to create a device that integrate daily joy and satisfyingly function.
This functional keyboard could heal your inner and mood. Meanwhile, we want to reproduce the typing feel of Alps keyswitches used in
some of most legendary keyboards from the last century as well. 


Our idea was
inspired in a keyboard fans meeting. After numerous tests
and discussions, we brought our prototype to a select group of experts who dedicated
in keyboard industry for more than 30 years. We shared different ideas and
discussed feedbacks, which drive the necessary change to perfection. 


When
the product is ready for production, we ensure that each step of manufacturing
is handled with attention to detail but most importantly quality. This
ultimate keyboard is a joint of joy, fun, and a renascent legend.

What Makes i-Rocks Fun a Wonderful Keyboard
 


1. 
Joy and Fun: Lego and Detachably Decorating Plates

The toys, even games, have changed dramatically and very
different from the toys we played 30 years ago. 

Comparing the modern offerings,
the previous toys seem almost primitive. It is true that technology has changed
the way we play. Innovated toys might seem to be altering human behavior at lightning
speed. However, if we take a closer look and really examine the toys and games we
are playing with, we’ll discover that although the items for playing have changed,
the principles behind playing remain the same.If we look at the popularity of Minecraft or other similar
games, we could easily find that underpinning game is very helpful for creativity
(i.e., people could design everything on their own). Therefore, we designed the
plate that users could create their unique keyboards by Lego bricks. 


OK. Some might wonder why we use the concept of Lego. Here
are the reasons.




Simple

It's one of the things that
almost anyone can do just because it's such a simple concept. Putting the
bricks together and create something on your own. The creation could
be very complicated, or simple enough. It's all on your terms. You decide if
you want to make a small table or the empire state building. All you need if
the imagination.




Ageless

Basically,
Lego is a toy indeed. But even adult could play these toys. The process makes
people happy and relax. Don’t forget Lego has stood more than 60 years. Lego is
very adaptable by your inner no matter how old are you.




Creativity

With
different pieces, Lego could release your imaginative mind and you create
everything you want. There are so many possibilities and the wide range is so broad
that there is still so much more that can be done. Meanwhile, when you design
your own items, it gives you the right to manage everything with it. Do it on
your own way and that where the creativity begins. 




Fun

It
is fun to play Lego because your imagination lies in your hands. Lego is a lot more than a
toy. It’s a creative expression. A lot of people, even adults, hugely engaged
with it. With Lego you can make the most amazing things — things you’d never
imagine. Furthermore, these colorful bricks could be disassembled in the end of
a day and you could start a new design next time. As long as you have a
creative imagination (and childishness!), you will have infinite joy. 



Lego pieces of all varieties constitute a universal system. We
designed a plate based on this universal system so that people could build
bricks on their keyboards.


Not in the mood for playing? No problem! We also designed detachable top plates. You could choose the one you love and just change it. Depending
on the purpose of your nameplate, this can be as simple as one color printed plastic or
it can be as complex as building something with Lego.

story:
Short Summary

We are Hanassy R&D, Ltd. we provide R&D services and develop apps. and devices for the Hitech and Bio-Tech domains for few years. 

Product main features :

  • In the last few years we developed an Augmented reality headset for smartphones :'Putiton Go AR' with those following features:
    • Ready to go, Handfree, and wearable: Could be taken everywhere and carried as sunglasses or hat when not used
    • Compatible with any app. not just 3d-VR but also AR, 2D, and general apps (Using two different optical setups)
    • Could be used for gaming or general usage
    • Compatible with any device
    • Finger movment pointer controller by using a google play designated application (uses the camera and magnet sensors)
    • Comfortable to use especially no pressure on face skin
    • Easy to use
    • Not expansive

  • Your contribution will help us go on and push Putiton products from prototype to mass production and bring you a great augmented reality experience

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Goal: We are raising 156,000$ in this stage for finishing at least one prototype and go on to mass production. Putiton Go AR V1 product will include a wearable headset with two optional optical sets (2D/3D) and a mobile finger-pointer controller app. for any smartphone. 
  • You can be the first to use our products. And the first to enjoy a great AR to go experience with a great price. Preorder Putiton v1 or buy our 3D printed prototypes to be used with most of the smartphone devices. Preorder Putiton v2 and you will be the first to use even greater AR experience with our final product in lower prices.
  • "It is not over till you stop": We intend to sell products in great quantities at the begining of 2017. If we will not reach our entire goal we will use the found to rise more money and complete the development of the mass production stage.

 

The Impact

 

Greate for AR games. Change this:

Into this:

Different scenarios:

Why it is so awesome+?

When you are using a first person AR game or app. in the regular way, it is hard to convince yourself that the first person figure is you. But when you will use it in a headset, a moto-sensory feedback loop will cause your brain to believe that you are inside the game and enhance your experience. Especially when the real world is already part of the application, like in AR games, and your whole body interact with it.

 

Contribute and help us change the world into a big AR experience:

  • The Putiton AR will change the way everybody uses smartphones, and provide much more functionally to your smartphone. This include virtual reality (VR), augmented reality(AR) and cinema experience. It will make AR technology much more friendly to the user and highly increase its usability.
  • Hanassy R&D is providing research and development services for the hitech and biotech domains, for few years now. Our clients are universities, companies and people that want to develope ideas into products. 
  • For more information and contact : http://www.putitonar.com/ 
  • https://www.facebook.com/PutitonGoAr/
  • Download our beta App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...
  • Hanassy R&D official site: https://www.facebook.com/HanassyRnD/
  • hanassy.com Heb:http://www.hanassyil.com/

Risks & Challenges

  • Our prototype products were tested on many people and shown in several private exhibitions using 3d printed technology. Yet it was not mass producted before. Our app. was tested on many devices but never published until now. 
  • Your contributions will help us tackle all those problems and develope a mass production line for putiton version 1. and 2. (Plastic molds for injections, production, assemble, packageing and shipping) and fix the app bugs
  • Development of mass production line to deliver the products should take 4-6 months (more or less...) so we intend to deliver our final core product in the begining of 2017, yet, 3D printed product will be delivered as soon as possible (limited amount;  1-2 month of delivery time).

Other Ways You Can Help

Contribute by:

  • Tell everybody especially if you like Augmented Reality games
  • Download our App and try it with a finger (or any) flashlight.
  • Like our facebook page
  • Upload a video to our facebook page using the app and saying that you like Putiton and share it
  • Share our campaign: Use indigogo share tool to spread the world

 

 

Thanks!

 -http://www.shapeways.com/  

For providing us great platform to test our prototypes with their great services

 

-http://strawebberry.co.il/red/

For their great services & support

story:
Every day in our busy schedule, we keep running around the office and the home with our phones. We take out our phones 1,000 times a day, for checking emails, notifications, using applications, playing games, etc. We play motion sensor games with our phone.

What if all of these movements with the phone could be used to power up your phone? That’s what "MoveCharge" is all about.

 

 

 

 

 

 

So now if you’re going to a remote area with no or limited power source, or if you’re just adventurous and like to hike but worry about your phone charge, you have the perfect solution.  "MoveCharge" helps to charge your phone on the go, without any power source.

 

Our Mission

  • Conserve energy
  • Promote physical movement

Not only do we aim to make technology environmentally friendly but to promote physical movement in individual’s as well. When your phone is running out of charge and you have a device that can charge it via physical movement, your first and foremost option would be to run or to jog with the "MoveCharge" in hand.

 


1. A person running for office with the phone in his hands, 2. Checking notifications, 3. Playing motion sensor games.

All these movements could power up your phone. MoveCharge, therefore, has the capability to prompt people to adopt a healthy lifestyle. Rather than lounging on your sofa with your phone attached to a power cable, you’re more active. It’s a win-win situation, not only is your phone battery completely charged but that of your mind as well. 

 

 

How MoveCharge Works

We are all aware of the law of conservation of energy which primarily states that “Energy can neither be created nor destroyed; rather, it is transformed from one state to another”. The product is designed on the basis of this law. MoveCharge works in such a way that when the phone is subjected to any movement, its kinetic energy (the energy of movement) is converted into electrical energy by electromagnetic induction, which is then stored in the battery inside the Moto Mod.
 
 
 
This stored energy is, therefore, used to recharge the phone when you run out of battery and can’t access the charger or if you just want to opt for an environmentally friendly option. 

 

Specification

 

 

 

  • Battery: 900mAh Li-ion battery.
  • USB C port.
  • LED battery indicator.
  • Soft touch material.
  • 4 inductors which produce 400mA power.
  • Compatibility: Moto Z and other USB compatible devices.
  • Precise buttons and port cutouts.

 

Development

We started our research in motion charging technology in 2015, and we had many iterations of MoveCharge. Later, we implemented our technology into the Moto Mod™, which is a great platform for a product like MoveCharge. And recently, we were selected for Motorola's "Transform the Smartphone Challenge".  Here is an image of our initial prototype. 

 

Wide Compatibility

MoveCharge can also be used to charge other USB compatible devices. Just connect MoveCharge to any other devices using a USB cable, and it charges your favorite device.

 

 

 

The Impact

We are all constantly raving about the conservation of energy, about depleting energy sources and power crisis. Yet, nobody has found a perfect solution to this problem which can be workable through all hours of the day, from morning till evening. 

Statistics according to a report published by U.S. Department of Energy and the Environmental Protection Agency state that approximately $171 million could be saved for United States consumers each year if all homes included an Energy conservation furnace. Likewise, the country would experience a decrease in the emission of greenhouse gasses equal to that of emissions from 177,000 cars. Even more staggering, if all computers were conserving energy, an amazing 1.8 billion U.S. dollars could be saved each year, and the country would experience a decrease in the emission of greenhouse gasses equal to that from two million cars.

Now imagine, if the statistics are so staggering for computers, how shocking would the value be for the collective use of mobile phones on which we spend countless hours of the day and the charging of which is our utmost priority. Needless to say, Mobile chargers are energy vampires.

 

 

However, their use is certainly inevitable and unavoidable. There is, therefore, a dire need for an energy efficient system to charge mobile phones, a system which does not just conserve energy but is portable and compact as well. 

And with the use of modern technology and innovative minds, this need has certainly been fulfilled! We are proud to introduce to you a remarkable power source for your phones which doesn’t just conserves energy but is extremely practical as well.

‘MoveCharge’ is a device that will help charge your phone on the go. Modern times have made the use of smartphones essential as compared to feature phones. We all use smartphones and its power consumption via these is much higher as compared to that of feature phones. The problem is, though, that if we need a longer battery life, the overall size of the phone increases as larger sized batteries are required. Still, these big batteries do not last long enough, and this is where "MoveCharge" comes to life. "MoveCharge" can generate an unlimited amount of power from your daily activity.

 

How We Use Our Funds

 

 

 

What We Need

We have come to you, (Indiegogo), for help raising at least $5,000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of MoveCharge. Our stretch goal of $50,000 will cover an expanded marketing campaign and future research and development for the MoveCharge successors and other world-class Technocrib Labs products.

 

Risks & Challenges

As with any start-up, there is some inherent risk. We have spent a great deal of time getting this product ready, however, and we are confident that what we have developed will be well-received by our target audience. On top of that, we are already in contact with reliable manufacturing and distribution partners, putting us on a straight path to a solid product launch.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post our URL on Facebook or Twitter: we want this to be a poorly-kept secret! The more people are aware of the MoveCharge, the smoother our launch will go.
We appreciate all contributions, monetary and otherwise, and we thank you for your time.

 

 

We believe that this technology holds the potential of being groundbreaking on every level with minimum drawbacks. And we believe that your funds can help ‘MoveCharge’ achieve this landmark. Please pitch in to make this prospect possible.
Thank you!
 

FAQ

 

1. Do I need to attach MoveCharge to Moto Z to produce power? 

There's no need. You just need to attach MoveCharge to Moto Z when the battery is low. And it's no problem if it is always attached.

2. What is the capacity of the battery inside MoveCharge?

MoveCharge has a 900mAh Li-ion battery, which always recharges automatically on the go.

3. How big is MoveCharge?

MoveCharge has same dimensions as Moto Z phones, and its greatest thickness is 12mm.

4. What kind of movements can charge MoveCharge?

MoveCharge has 4 inductors which can produce power from almost all movements with the phone, like checking notifications, playing motion sensor games, walking with the phone and cycling.

5. Can I charge MoveCharge from the wall?

Yes, MoveCharge can be charged from the wall using a USB cord, like any other power bank.

6. How many colors of MoveCharge will be provided?

Currently, the colors have not been decided. After the campaign ends, we will send out a survey for colors.

7. Is there an app that accompanies MoveCharge?

Yes, we will definitely provide an app so you can know the amount of power produced from your activity, and to know the calories burned from your activity. 

8. What happens when the phone battery dies?

MoveCharge will automatically recharge the battery inside MoveCharge Mod and transfer that power to your phone.

9. How do I install MoveCharge to Moto Z?

Just attach the Mod to the back of the phone. Strong magnets hold the Mod securely in place.

10. Are Motorola phones the only ones that can use MoveCharge?

No, we have MoveCharge Mod specifically for Moto Z phones, and MoveCharge Powerpack for non-Moto Z users.

11. What devices will MoveCharge be compatible with?

The MoveCharge Mod is compatible with Moto Z phones, and MoveCharge Powerpack is compatible with almost any device which supports USB charging.

12. How big is MoveCharge Powerpack?

MoveCharge PowerPack is 60 x 60 x 12 mm.

13. Do you ship overseas?

Yes, we can ship MoveCharge overseas.

Conserve energy
Promote physical movement

story:
Stay Informed All the Time

Always on information on the back of your Moto Z series phones at a glance.

We have been working working with e-paper technology for quite some time. Now we have designed a concept MotoMod for Motorola Moto Z  phone. This concept has been tried before on other phones. However only Moto Mod provides a platform for second screen to fulfill its potential. 

 

DigiFrameMod will feature:

  • At a glance e-paper display - always on, ultra low power, high definition e-ink screen will display information you need/
  • Information dashboard - set up your own widget with information you need to be available 24/7/
  • Picture wallpaper - express your personality with a retouched photo or display a screenshot from your main screen.
  • Extra power  - additional battery for your phone.

What is unique?

  • Works without a phone - DigiFrameMod will work even detached from your phone. Battery will keep clock running. You can magnetically stick it to your fridge with a love note.
  • Open API for widgets -  DigiFrameMod will have an open web based API for developers to develop their own widgets. 
  • Selection of widgets - get information widgets from a store or develop your own.

Think of it as smart desk watch with information you want.

How we will do it?

E-Paper technology is a well established one at this point. We already made partnership and signed required paperwork with core technology providers in this area.

Hardware prototyping has already started.

DigiFrameMod will be supported by a server software and an app to deliver an information content to your screen. Technical design and development has already started.

Simple HTML knowledge will be enough to develop widgets for DigiFrameMod. You will be able to develop them yourselves or ask us to do it for you. 

Initial technical specs

  • 4.3", 800 x 480, 216 dpi, e-ink screen (physically limited by Moto Mod design constrains)
  • 152.7 x 73.5 x 5 mm
  • 1500 mAh battery (preliminary, may change)

Your contribution is essential

We need funds to complete the hardware prototype and develop a software so you will be able to use it.
For this we ask you to support DigiFrameMod !

We need $ 10 000 to complete DigiFrameMod prototype implementing and developing the functions provided.

Any additional funding will be spent to industrialize prototype and prepare for mass production. We will launch additional pre-ordering campaign when we have prototype ready to show you.
