story:
!!!NEW!!!!

 

2017.07.26
Now our products on online shop!
Please check it!

https://omotenashi4u.com/

 

 

 

 

 

 

Background of KUDEN project
~Why we have to succeed this project~


I start up a KUDEN project to archive my dreams.
It's to make a place to work with my son who is an autistic child and now live apart.
He love to create something; he take after his father, me.

My dream is to make a place that I and my son can work and create product together.
It's not only dream, my aim and purpose I must archive.
I want them who have handicap like  my son to know pleasure to earn money by themselves.

The place to live comfortable for my son whole his time after I pass away.
I want to make businness like that.


What's KUDEN?


・Lifestyle brand for the people who want to incorporate japanese culture or spirit into their daily life
・Company that create jobs and employment for  handicapped people and also young and old people who have traditional technique that likely to disappear
 

 


 Why we join forces with traditional craftman


My born place,Tochigi is famous for "日光東照宮-Nikko TOSHOGU SHRINE" that built in Edo period,1603-1868.
When I was a child, I had many opportunities to meet craftman.
In fact, I am an apprentice of knife smith.
I'm very attached to craftman because they are kind to me while I was young.

As my job, I had experienced design and launch a new business.
So I launch new lifestyle brand that do all process from Forest industry to sell, design and produce to use my experience.


Works of craftman are very subtle and need patience.
It's need time to learn but craftman is continuing to age.
Their work has been decreasing year by year and luck of successors is  big problem for all traditional craft.
We are going to lose Wonderful tradition and history.
(The craftsmans who make this KUMIKO Laptop board are both 74 years old! )


Now, that is when we do!
It' so difficult that we sell just old style traditional craft because we and you, foreigner for japanese, have different culture and style.
As designer, I read a craftsman's thought, context, technique and history and I produce new product that people living all over the world in this time can get japanese culture and spirit into their life style.
Not only producing product, I propose how to  adjust them to your life style.


There are various craftsman' work in japan.
It's the most suitable for people like my son who have own personality.
I want to make my company the place handicapped people and aged person work energetically and lively.
I have dreams but I cannot complete my project immediately.
 


This year, my son will be 7 years old.
My first aim is to work with my son who graduate from junior high school after 9 years.
For fist step of my dream, I start this project collaborated with craftsman, produce the new product and job for them.
make a profit, create jobs and employment for  handicapped people and let them become craftsman's pupil.
Make employment to combine the technique, employment of the handicapped and design.


I start a project devoted my life .
Please support us.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What's KUMIKO

Someone says craftsman who built Nikko TOSHOGU SHRINE-日光東照宮- in Edo period moved to Kanuma city from Nikko city to keep out to cold.

Because of this history, There are many skilled craftsman in Kanuma that is famous for wood craft.

Wonderfulness of their sculpture on Dashi, a float that god ride on in festival, is famous here in japan.


One of their technique is Kumiko.
Kumiko is woodworking technique that make geometrical pattern by combining wood and wood. They use a little adhesive it's almost no adhesive.

There are many nature motif pattern, for example leaf, snowflake and shell suit.

They have used for household furniture and their decoration.

 

About KUMIKO technique

This is one of component of KUMIKO.
These parts are made by exclusive tool(also the  craftsman create them!).
His own plane, KANNA in japanese, makes them one by one.
He adjusts these parts delicately for puttern of KUMIKO.

Do you believe that craftsman even make tools!

These round wood parts are create one by one to plane with exclusive tools.

Also he combines each parts by hand.
It's difficult to combine wood parts more than you can imagine.
Too big to combine, too small to combine.
On this video, craftsman make bigger size KUMIKO for easy to explain than which included in KUMIKO laptop board.

Each designs of KUMIKO has own name.
The name of plant that japanese are familiar, gods, and so on.
These designs are left for posterity and craftsman want to tell to next generation.
 

 

What's KUMIKO Laptop Board

I designed KUMIKO Laptop Board to use KUMIKO technique beautifully in your daily life.

When you use Laptop PC on sofa or bed, don't you think you want something like a board to put on Laptop or tablet?
But most ready-made board is heavy, because they are mede of MDF or bamboo plywood, and uninspired.

I hit upon the idea When I drank a tea with craftsman in his workshop.
That is ... if I make the board included these nature motif KUMIKO , I think it could be beautiful and light.
I noted this idea, I discussed with craftsman many times and then we did it, this prototype was completed.

The fist problem I met is strongness of KUMIKO.
KUMIKO is not resistant to heat because they are made of nature Hinoki, japanese cypress, with no coating.
We made trial products and talk it over again and again about strongness and how to release the heat from PC.

Craftsman is paticular about nature wood that used of KUMIKO so I adopt these Hinoki as other part of KUMIKO Laptop board.


When you pick it up, you may notice suspicion of the good wood smell.

 

Next we focus on the mousepad.
We select the case leather called Tochigi-leather that made of mimosa from a natural resin without harmful chemicals in Tochigias and are tanned carefully as mousepad.

We design to use KUMIKO Laptop board not only on your lap but also on your desk in office or study.


You can release the heat from PC on the desk by attached laptop legs by making incline.
We are currently developing 2 type of board leg and that makes more comfortable to typing and you can charge your smartphone setting on the board.
*We update our development status!

Natural wood can make the board stunningly light and KUMIKO made of that has a role of heat release.


KUMIKO laptop board is almost same weight as iPad pro, about 730g, so you can use on your lap, at your favorite cafe, easy to put away and store.
For that, we present you Furoshiki, japanese wrapping cloth.

You can carry many types of thing by wrapping Furoshiki.
There are a lot of ways to wrapping.
We'll send you mini book telling you how to use the Furoshiki so enjoy to wrap your own style!
(Also will update how to use Furoshiki!)

 

Craftsman create your board one by one...use natural material...handmade craft...so we cannot mass-produce and reduce labor cost.
That is way our product is expensive but I want you to get this and feel the wonderfulness of craftsman's technique.

 

WE COMPLETED ALL DEVELOPMENT!!


Looking forward to getting it!

 

 

 

 

There is a word "NAJIMU" in japan.
Najimu means that "getting closer to somewhere or someone or something" or "savor or tone unites into one. Harmonize. Go together."

The concept of KUMIKO laptop board that made of natural wood and leather is this "Najimu".
We remain the natural taste of wood and leather, craftsman make each part of board carefully by their hand for you.

That is important and essensial element to express their own feeling by technique of craftsman.

 

KUMIKO is not coated in japan too, we love their natural wood taste and craftsman thinks a great deal of it.
We don't coat outer flame as we can, it's minimum semi-gloss finish.

So both part of wood and leather, it will be damaged or discolored by sun but these damage or discolor make your KUMIKO laptop board "Najimu" on your hand and room.

Please use your KUMIKO laptop board for a long time like your favorite jeans or leather shoes and "Najimu" it as yours.

 

 

From KUDEN, we deliver you some OMOTENASHI accessory that you can incorporate japanese culture into your life style.

 

OMOTENASI 1

・Furoshiki
-Japanese wrapping cloth-

Do you know Furoshiki?
For japanese, a square cloth called Furoshiki is known for a long time.
We love to use as bag or to wrap and carry something by various way to fold.
We give you this Furoshiki as a present with KUMIKO laptop board.

You can prefer KON -navy blue- or ENJI -dark red-.
Both are traditional japanese color.
You can choose one which you like better.

Please cover your KUMIKO laptop board and carry it to office or cafe with japanese traditional culture.

 

OMOTENASI 2

・KIMONO-box
-ItemBox-

We also deliver you KUMIKO laptop board in "Tatoushi" in KIMONO-box, both of them are for keeping japanese traditional cloth "Kimono" with great care.
After you receive the KUMIKO laptop board, you can use this KIMONO-box and Tatoushi for KUMIKO laptop board or your cloth or favorite items.

 

UNDER DEVELOPMENT

We can update if you support us

→→ALL COMPLETE!!

 

・Board leg

We design to use KUMIKO Laptop board not only on your lap but also on your desk in office or study.


You can release the heat from PC on the desk by attached laptop legs by making incline.
We are currently developing 2 type of board leg and that makes more comfortable to typing and you can charge your smartphone setting on the board.

2017.05.19

!COMPLETED!

Add function to use KUMIKO Laptop board more comfortable & useful on the desk
・Adjust the angle of KUMIKO laptop board
・Release heat more on the dest

Pattern A
Flat

 

Pattern B
With a slant

 

Road to complete the board legs

Rough sketch
Prototype of air dry clay to verify the angle


try many types of legs...
pick the best one



How to use ~feature~

  • use on your desk
  • detachable legs
  • adjust the angle by winging up a spring
  • fit on almost anywhere because of the round tip of the screw
  • include very small KUMIKO in leg

Very small KUMIKO...
Amazing craftsman technique!
And made it!!!

 

 

・Tag

Each our product is the only one in the world so we decide to give serial number.
In some perks, you can get your name in english or even japanese KANJI on tag.
We choose suitable japanese KANJI for your name and impress them on tag.

2017.05.19

!COMPLETED!


Each Kanji has own meaning. We choose translate your name to Kanji.
Or also impress your name in English with tag.
You can choose  either one  you like.
*may change design but complete except design!*

 

 

 

 

Give craftsman's traditional technique to you casually and easily.
We prepare beautiful KUMIKO as a coaster for you.
You can select from 3 pattern of KUMIKO.
Each design has a name.

the meaning of flax ornament

flax ornament  is one of the most popular pattern in japan.
They say that we don't need time and effort to take care of it and growing speed is fast so there is meaning that growth of baby and keeping out of harm's way in them.

 

the meaning of tortoise shell

Cloisonne means the seven treasures,gold, silver, pearls, agate, crystal, coral and lapis lazuli.Hexagonal pattern is a tortoise shell.
Turtles have a long life so they are sympol for long life in japan from lomg ago. We had regarded them as lucky charm.

These coasters are made of natural wood as with KUMIKO laptop board.
We don't coat varnish over them because we want you to feel natural wood.
Please don't regard as easy to get dirty, spend a greate time with KUMIKO coaster.
It's this whish is NAJIMU feeling.

 

You can choose pattern of KUMIKO from these 3


For example, you want 12 KUMIKO you have 4 options
1)only KAWARI ASANOHA ...means 12 KAWARI ASANOHA
2)only NIJU ASANOHA ...means 12 NIJU ASANOHA
3)only SHIPPO KIKKO ...means 12 SHIPPO KIKKO
4)pattern assort... you can choose numbers of each pattern(ex. KAWARI 3, NIJU 3, SHIPPO6)
If you choose "pattern assort", we will ask you on email after campaign, so please allow to receive email from "@ku-den.jp".
craftsman make each part of board carefully by their hand for you so there is an individual difference but  we want you to enjoy these individually.

 

 

 

 

 

We already had next project

For our dream, we already begin to ready next project, you may like it too!
Please keep supporting us.

 

Have a precious experience if you come to japan!

When you, backers come to japan, please contact us. We cannot give you money for trip but can provide opportunity to experience craftsman's work.
It would be a precious experience for you!

 

*NOTICE*
・Craftsman creates one by one...use natural wood and leather...handmade craft...so it is not exactly same as image

・Products are made of natural wood and leather so they will be damaged or discolored by sun but these damage or discolor but we want you to enjoy these change by your action.

・Please check and confirm how to use and keep these natural wood craft. We design to put laptop PC on this board but please take care of it when you use. Don’t use them in an alternative way. We will not take responsibility for any damage on your PC or something other than our products.

・In some country, you may have  to pay customs duties.
In that case, it’s charged to purchaser.

 

 

OUR PROJECT TEAM

Gerbera* + craftsman ...and more
Special thanks to everyone!
story_txt:
!!!NEW!!!! 2017.07.26Now our products on online shop!Please check it!https://omotenashi4u.com/      Background of KUDEN project~Why we have to succeed this project~I start up a KUDEN project to archive my dreams.It's to make a place to work with my son who is an autistic child and now live apart.He love to create something; he take after his father, me.My dream is to make a place that I and my son can work and create product together.It's not only dream, my aim and purpose I must archive.I want them who have handicap like  my son to know pleasure to earn money by themselves.The place to live comfortable for my son whole his time after I pass away.I want to make businness like that.
What's KUDEN?・Lifestyle brand for the people who want to incorporate japanese culture or spirit into their daily life・Company that create jobs and employment for  handicapped people and also young and old people who have traditional technique that likely to disappear  
 Why we join forces with traditional craftmanMy born place,Tochigi is famous for "日光東照宮-Nikko TOSHOGU SHRINE" that built in Edo period,1603-1868.When I was a child, I had many opportunities to meet craftman.In fact, I am an apprentice of knife smith.I'm very attached to craftman because they are kind to me while I was young.As my job, I had experienced design and launch a new business.So I launch new lifestyle brand that do all process from Forest industry to sell, design and produce to use my experience.Works of craftman are very subtle and need patience.It's need time to learn but craftman is continuing to age.Their work has been decreasing year by year and luck of successors is  big problem for all traditional craft.We are going to lose Wonderful tradition and history.(The craftsmans who make this KUMIKO Laptop board are both 74 years old! )Now, that is when we do!It' so difficult that we sell just old style traditional craft because we and you, foreigner for japanese, have different culture and style.As designer, I read a craftsman's thought, context, technique and history and I produce new product that people living all over the world in this time can get japanese culture and spirit into their life style.Not only producing product, I propose how to  adjust them to your life style.There are various craftsman' work in japan.It's the most suitable for people like my son who have own personality.I want to make my company the place handicapped people and aged person work energetically and lively.I have dreams but I cannot complete my project immediately. This year, my son will be 7 years old.My first aim is to work with my son who graduate from junior high school after 9 years.For fist step of my dream, I start this project collaborated with craftsman, produce the new product and job for them.make a profit, create jobs and employment for  handicapped people and let them become craftsman's pupil.Make employment to combine the technique, employment of the handicapped and design.I start a project devoted my life .Please support us.           What's KUMIKOSomeone says craftsman who built Nikko TOSHOGU SHRINE-日光東照宮- in Edo period moved to Kanuma city from Nikko city to keep out to cold.Because of this history, There are many skilled craftsman in Kanuma that is famous for wood craft.Wonderfulness of their sculpture on Dashi, a float that god ride on in festival, is famous here in japan.One of their technique is Kumiko.Kumiko is woodworking technique that make geometrical pattern by combining wood and wood. They use a little adhesive it's almost no adhesive.There are many nature motif pattern, for example leaf, snowflake and shell suit.They have used for household furniture and their decoration. About KUMIKO techniqueThis is one of component of KUMIKO.These parts are made by exclusive tool(also the  craftsman create them!).His own plane, KANNA in japanese, makes them one by one.He adjusts these parts delicately for puttern of KUMIKO.Do you believe that craftsman even make tools!These round wood parts are create one by one to plane with exclusive tools.Also he combines each parts by hand.It's difficult to combine wood parts more than you can imagine.Too big to combine, too small to combine.On this video, craftsman make bigger size KUMIKO for easy to explain than which included in KUMIKO laptop board.Each designs of KUMIKO has own name.The name of plant that japanese are familiar, gods, and so on.These designs are left for posterity and craftsman want to tell to next generation.  What's KUMIKO Laptop BoardI designed KUMIKO Laptop Board to use KUMIKO technique beautifully in your daily life.When you use Laptop PC on sofa or bed, don't you think you want something like a board to put on Laptop or tablet?But most ready-made board is heavy, because they are mede of MDF or bamboo plywood, and uninspired.I hit upon the idea When I drank a tea with craftsman in his workshop.That is ... if I make the board included these nature motif KUMIKO , I think it could be beautiful and light.I noted this idea, I discussed with craftsman many times and then we did it, this prototype was completed.The fist problem I met is strongness of KUMIKO.KUMIKO is not resistant to heat because they are made of nature Hinoki, japanese cypress, with no coating.We made trial products and talk it over again and again about strongness and how to release the heat from PC.Craftsman is paticular about nature wood that used of KUMIKO so I adopt these Hinoki as other part of KUMIKO Laptop board.When you pick it up, you may notice suspicion of the good wood smell. Next we focus on the mousepad.We select the case leather called Tochigi-leather that made of mimosa from a natural resin without harmful chemicals in Tochigias and are tanned carefully as mousepad.We design to use KUMIKO Laptop board not only on your lap but also on your desk in office or study.You can release the heat from PC on the desk by attached laptop legs by making incline.We are currently developing 2 type of board leg and that makes more comfortable to typing and you can charge your smartphone setting on the board.*We update our development status!Natural wood can make the board stunningly light and KUMIKO made of that has a role of heat release.KUMIKO laptop board is almost same weight as iPad pro, about 730g, so you can use on your lap, at your favorite cafe, easy to put away and store.For that, we present you Furoshiki, japanese wrapping cloth.You can carry many types of thing by wrapping Furoshiki.There are a lot of ways to wrapping.We'll send you mini book telling you how to use the Furoshiki so enjoy to wrap your own style!(Also will update how to use Furoshiki!) Craftsman create your board one by one...use natural material...handmade craft...so we cannot mass-produce and reduce labor cost.That is way our product is expensive but I want you to get this and feel the wonderfulness of craftsman's technique. WE COMPLETED ALL DEVELOPMENT!!Looking forward to getting it!    There is a word "NAJIMU" in japan.Najimu means that "getting closer to somewhere or someone or something" or "savor or tone unites into one. Harmonize. Go together."The concept of KUMIKO laptop board that made of natural wood and leather is this "Najimu".We remain the natural taste of wood and leather, craftsman make each part of board carefully by their hand for you.That is important and essensial element to express their own feeling by technique of craftsman. KUMIKO is not coated in japan too, we love their natural wood taste and craftsman thinks a great deal of it.We don't coat outer flame as we can, it's minimum semi-gloss finish.So both part of wood and leather, it will be damaged or discolored by sun but these damage or discolor make your KUMIKO laptop board "Najimu" on your hand and room.Please use your KUMIKO laptop board for a long time like your favorite jeans or leather shoes and "Najimu" it as yours.  From KUDEN, we deliver you some OMOTENASHI accessory that you can incorporate japanese culture into your life style. OMOTENASI 1・Furoshiki-Japanese wrapping cloth-Do you know Furoshiki?For japanese, a square cloth called Furoshiki is known for a long time.We love to use as bag or to wrap and carry something by various way to fold.We give you this Furoshiki as a present with KUMIKO laptop board.You can prefer KON -navy blue- or ENJI -dark red-.Both are traditional japanese color.You can choose one which you like better.Please cover your KUMIKO laptop board and carry it to office or cafe with japanese traditional culture. OMOTENASI 2・KIMONO-box-ItemBox-We also deliver you KUMIKO laptop board in "Tatoushi" in KIMONO-box, both of them are for keeping japanese traditional cloth "Kimono" with great care.After you receive the KUMIKO laptop board, you can use this KIMONO-box and Tatoushi for KUMIKO laptop board or your cloth or favorite items. UNDER DEVELOPMENTWe can update if you support us→→ALL COMPLETE!! ・Board legWe design to use KUMIKO Laptop board not only on your lap but also on your desk in office or study.You can release the heat from PC on the desk by attached laptop legs by making incline.We are currently developing 2 type of board leg and that makes more comfortable to typing and you can charge your smartphone setting on the board.2017.05.19!COMPLETED!Add function to use KUMIKO Laptop board more comfortable & useful on the desk・Adjust the angle of KUMIKO laptop board・Release heat more on the destPattern AFlat Pattern BWith a slant Road to complete the board legsRough sketchPrototype of air dry clay to verify the angletry many types of legs...pick the best oneHow to use ~feature~
use on your desk
detachable legs
adjust the angle by winging up a spring
fit on almost anywhere because of the round tip of the screw
include very small KUMIKO in leg
Very small KUMIKO...Amazing craftsman technique!And made it!!!  ・TagEach our product is the only one in the world so we decide to give serial number.In some perks, you can get your name in english or even japanese KANJI on tag.We choose suitable japanese KANJI for your name and impress them on tag.2017.05.19!COMPLETED!Each Kanji has own meaning. We choose translate your name to Kanji.Or also impress your name in English with tag.You can choose  either one  you like.*may change design but complete except design!*    Give craftsman's traditional technique to you casually and easily.We prepare beautiful KUMIKO as a coaster for you.You can select from 3 pattern of KUMIKO.Each design has a name.the meaning of flax ornamentflax ornament  is one of the most popular pattern in japan.They say that we don't need time and effort to take care of it and growing speed is fast so there is meaning that growth of baby and keeping out of harm's way in them. the meaning of tortoise shellCloisonne means the seven treasures,gold, silver, pearls, agate, crystal, coral and lapis lazuli.Hexagonal pattern is a tortoise shell.Turtles have a long life so they are sympol for long life in japan from lomg ago. We had regarded them as lucky charm.These coasters are made of natural wood as with KUMIKO laptop board.We don't coat varnish over them because we want you to feel natural wood.Please don't regard as easy to get dirty, spend a greate time with KUMIKO coaster.It's this whish is NAJIMU feeling. You can choose pattern of KUMIKO from these 3For example, you want 12 KUMIKO you have 4 options1)only KAWARI ASANOHA ...means 12 KAWARI ASANOHA2)only NIJU ASANOHA ...means 12 NIJU ASANOHA3)only SHIPPO KIKKO ...means 12 SHIPPO KIKKO4)pattern assort... you can choose numbers of each pattern(ex. KAWARI 3, NIJU 3, SHIPPO6)If you choose "pattern assort", we will ask you on email after campaign, so please allow to receive email from "@ku-den.jp".craftsman make each part of board carefully by their hand for you so there is an individual difference but  we want you to enjoy these individually.     We already had next projectFor our dream, we already begin to ready next project, you may like it too!Please keep supporting us. Have a precious experience if you come to japan!When you, backers come to japan, please contact us. We cannot give you money for trip but can provide opportunity to experience craftsman's work.It would be a precious experience for you! *NOTICE*・Craftsman creates one by one...use natural wood and leather...handmade craft...so it is not exactly same as image・Products are made of natural wood and leather so they will be damaged or discolored by sun but these damage or discolor but we want you to enjoy these change by your action.・Please check and confirm how to use and keep these natural wood craft. We design to put laptop PC on this board but please take care of it when you use. Don’t use them in an alternative way. We will not take responsibility for any damage on your PC or something other than our products.・In some country, you may have  to pay customs duties.In that case, it’s charged to purchaser.  OUR PROJECT TEAMGerbera* + craftsman ...and moreSpecial thanks to everyone!

story:
Be Featured On 

 What The All-In-One Charger Cable 

 Charging all your phones and apple watch 

The Compatibility

The Difference Between 3-IN-1 Cable& 4-IN-1 Cable

You need only one cable

We always have so many charging devices and need all kinds of interface charger cable !!

Charging all your devices or share with your friend's Charging

When your phones are out of power, it is disappointing, and as long as you have All-IN-One cable, anywhere and anytime, even if your friend’s phone is out of power, it can give them a great help.

 Durable and high quality 

strong nylon weaving  and Aluminium design would  never break down.

The best length, The max load 

This length is the most optimized, portable and convenient for everywhere. The max 3.8Amp current load and the Fast Charging is up to USB power adapters. We recommend the minimum output current 2.2 A/ 5V when you charging all devices at the same time.

The Load Current-measuring  

Data transfer synchronous charging for iPhone

 

 Durable Test 

Wireless Charger PAD Internal  

  • The strong magnetism of NdFeB magnet ensures that your Apple watch is firmly adsorbed on-cable and get the highest charging efficiency at the same time.
  • The built-in magnetic charging module of the cable uses a high-efficiency pure copper coil to provide 3.5W power for your Apple Watch, it does not generate much heat as the original Apple Watch charger.

 

Smart charging system of the All-In-One cable, which regulates the current automatically for all Apple Watch series 1/2/3/4

Prototype Design  Work 

All our concepts start at the prototype stage, and we have to do lots of work and calculation, such as ID design, mechanical design, PCB layout, soldering and testing.

ID  Draft

 

 Mechanical Design

 PCB Layout & Sample Component

Compare the original apple watch charger testing 

The charging speed is up to input charging current. The C17 cable's charging current is same as the apple original charger.

The Trial production 

In order to confirm the quality of mass production, trial production must be carried out before mass production, to deliver the products with the fastest and best quality requirements.

Why chose this All-In-One cable

 

 

Special free gift 

If you back this campaign, we will send you a storage cloth bag, the best storage cloth bag is very suitable for this cable when you travel outside.

Our ONE Year Free warranty

We guarantee that every cable comes from reliable and durable materials. If there are any problems in the future, we will provide a one-year free warranty.

Customer Support: support@ruiysion.com

The Team Members

 

Share with your friends and spread the world

We don't know everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t purchase C17: All-In-One Cable right now, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Updated Product Offering

We are happy to inform you that we are close to raising a larger professional round, but based on the strategic advice of our existing and potential investors we have decided to restructure the product offering and have refunded our backers 100%. We will be enrolling a limited number of people into a "free beta" program (once we launch) for the updated product offering and the people who are interested can mail us at info@tier3d.com with the subject: 'Free Beta' for a chance to try the products for free.

Tier3D - AI With Human-Like Intelligence

Tier3D Artificial Intelligence gadgets connect to the Tier3D Artificial Intelligence cloud and contribute to human-like artificial intelligence. Tier3D gadgets crowdsource Artificial Intelligence to generate a deep understanding of what you need to help you in a very precise way and work for you as an intuitive extension of your own mind. For example, if you go to a meeting wearing the Tier3D smartwatch and you promise to send a presentation the next day, the Tier3D watch understands your conversation and automatically generates a presentation highly specific to what you may need.Tier3D AI-Phone comes with an octa-core processor, 6 GB RAM, 128GB memory, and a special 3D light field camera. Tier3D Watch comes with a quad-core processor, 8GB internal memory, and a special 3D light field camera.

Pricing

Kindly wait for the updated product offering and updated pricing. If you wish to get access to the free beta of the product once it launched, kindly send us a mail at info@tier3d.com with the subject: 'Free Beta'

 

Tier3D Artificial Intelligence at work

 

Tier3D AI automatically does things for you

The Tier3D watch uses Mind* cloud to understand the information from your interactions. The AI on the Mind* cloud transforms this understanding into a structured form of learning & desired actions. The composer on the Mind* cloud uses the human-like AI to generate content like presentations, documents, notes, essays, summaries etc., doing things for you without you needed to specify them.

Edit and compose like a Pro

The Tier3D gadgets capture 3D videos with light field and True Texture© information, which allows AI to do better segmentation and have better understanding of the content captured. Tier3D MindStudio app uses the video segmentation and composition features of the Mind* cloud to automatically segment different objects from the video based on simple queries like "find all objects in the scene" or more complex like "find all dancing people in a batch of videos". The objects thus extracted can be edited, added or enhanced and re-composed in a way that is consistent with the lightfield as well as the geometry of the scene.

Anyone can create, connect, share, and monetize with AI

The Tier3D software suite and AI allows everyone to capture & create high-quality content, with no software development or 3D modeling training, by simply interacting with the AI chatbot. The creations of a user can be in form of AI inferences, AI models, documents, video compositions, games, and algorithms, which can be shared and published using the MindNet social media platform.

Traditional large subscriber platforms have the problem of "more exposure to those who are already on the top", which puts the newcomer with a small marketing budget at a big disadvantage. The MindNet social AI algorithms consider deep content meaning and context for targeting, which allows people who create content to reach the right audience without a huge marketing spend. The MindNet platform is not just a monetization platform for the influencers but for everyone who can create content.

You don't need to be a marketing guru or tie up with a marketing firm to be popular on MindNet.

Why Tier3D is better?

 

3D Light Field Sensor & True Texture©

Unlike with 2D pixels, each point in the real 3D world space has multiple light rays going in different directions. To accurately show a virtual object immersed in a real-world 3D scene, the software therefore needs to know the ambient light field and re-compose the blended scene by ray tracing.

In a traditional 2D camera picture the only thing we know about a point on an object is a single color. On the other hand, to edit, enhance & re-compose a very high quality 3D scene we need to know the material of every point on an object and its color response to different kinds of lighting. True Texture© is the response function of every point to the incident light.

Tier3D Light Field Sensor uses special electronics and Artificial Intelligence to estimate ambient lightfield and True Texture© of the objects in the scene, thus capturing, and re-composing, extremely high-quality 3D pictures.

Locality Focus© & Clearer Rendering

In normal augmented reality/mixed reality glasses virtual objects look like translucent holograms and the fidelity of the virtual objects is highly dependent on the ambient lighting conditions. If the ambient lighting is bright, the object rendering has high noise.

In the case of parallax based 3D rendering the eyes are focused on the virtual object, which is rendered at a fixed distance, which is normally infinity. The brain reconstructs the 3D information based on the disparity between the left eye and the right eye. If the intended distance of a virtual object is similar to a real object and the eyes are focused on the virtual object then the real object looks blurred. This is because the eyes are focused on the virtual object project at infinity but the real object is much closer.

Tier3D uses special optical design along with the AI algorithms to make bring the real objects near to the virtual objects in-focus (Locality Focus©). The optical design also generates much clearer rendering in the case of brighter ambiance.

 

AI Crowdsourcing

One of the core features enabling Tier3D's AI is the ability to do crowdsourcing in a highly intuitive way. Tier3D AI engine converts complex inference based tagging tasks into easy human readable surveys that take only a moment to answer. The users of the system are incentivized by giving them credits for responses, which are monetizable.

The raw and crowdsourced captured data is given to the Tier3D Mind* cloud, which has an auto-scaling learning design that dynamically scales to the complexity of the problem. The auto-scaling design also allows distribution of large scale AI prediction modules into multiple machines in the cloud without being constrained by the performance of single monolithic GPU based prediction engine.

 

AI Privacy Management

The amount and complexity of data generated by the users is growing rapidly and it is projected to only increase. One of the problems with the existing privacy agreements is that they give little control to the user to decide which data form is private to them and which is not. The privacy controls for the user are generally at the level of data blobs (like images, videos). Another problem with the existing privacy management systems is that they apply privacy rules to a certain fixed set of features like pixelation of number plates and thus lack an automatic ability to adapt to newer feature forms like runner identification on the bib of a runner. Current privacy management systems thus do not automatically adapt to more complex data sets and need a human programmer to identify correspondingly more complex privacy forms, which consequently can only be updated manually.

Tier3D AI driven privacy management system passes the data through an artificial intelligence system, which marks various parts of the input data with a privacy level tag with continuously updating rules. It also allows users to do more meaningful transformations of the privacy-controlled data parts and not just redaction or pixelation.

Tier3D Gadgets

Tier3D Phone

 

 

Tier3D Watch

 

 

Tier3D Software

MindComplete©

MindComplete is an AI assistant, which uses the Mind* backend to improve the efficiency and accuracy of everyday tasks. MindComplete takes inputs from the user interaction to personalize the auto-complete engine, make suggestions, accomplish tasks, and power other AI enabled utilities.

 

MindNet©

MindNet is an online portal, which is a window into the Mind* backend. It gives you the status of the games you are participating in, social & sharing notifications, and whatever latest people share with you. It is also a marketplace and allows you to publish content, apps, AI algorithms and monetize them.

 

MindStudio©

MindStudio is an AI composer application, which allows you to create apps, content, and games without programming or creating artwork. Just use an interactive session to describe what you want and MindStudio creates the content for you.

Tier3D's Mission

Tier3D mission is to enable massive Artificial Intelligence and amazing Mixed Reality, which naturally combine together as Artificial Human Intelligence (AHI) to simulate human intelligence and consciousness in a machine.

A human mind is not limited to just the physical mind inside the cranium but is a continuum between what’s inside the human and extends to the physical world. A human mind externalizes information, intelligence, tools and uses the physical world to think and do actions. A model of the human mind (with all its creative and abstraction capabilities) is thus incomplete without a detailed model of the perceived universe. For creating Artificial Human Intelligence we need to create a model of the whole universe, which means we need to observe, record and model everything perceptible. The modeling of the perceived universe cannot be done in isolation with small samples of data but needs crowdsourcing of the data and “human interpretation of it”. Tier3D crowdsources information from millions of connected humans and also learns “interpretations” based on human interactions.

Tier3D gadgets are specifically designed to facilitate such AI crowdsourcing and, in combination with the Tier3D software platform, enables users to write AI apps and present them to users on the Tier3D gadgets. One of the fundamental and symbiotic applications of the ‘AI and visual model of everything’ is Augmented & Mixed Reality. Tier3D's contribution to the next advancement in Augmented & Mixed Reality is the ability to add visually realistic as well as behaviorally realistic content to the real world. The Augmented & Mixed Reality apps complement AI by generating high-quality rich data of natural interaction of humans with the virtual models.

Tier3D gadgets with the AI cloud is a cohesive and complete ecosystem for creating Artificial Human Intelligence. We have re-imagined wearable gadgets to enable Artificial Human Intelligence and we have created a novel set of applications and UI to enable its expression in software. The gadgets and software cannot be done in isolation of each other, that is, one cannot create a self-learning AI cloud and hope that someone will create gadgets with sensors to enable AHI, or conversely one cannot just create novel gadgets and hope that someday, someone will create an AI backend to use the data.

Project Timeline

Kindly wait for the updated product offering and updated pricing. If you wish to get access to the free beta of the product once it launched, kindly send us a mail at info@tier3d.com with the subject: 'Free Beta'

Prototypes

Tier3D Phone Prototypes

 
 
 

 

Future Work

We have created a 3D physical processor design (patent pending), which can simulate physical systems in the form of real physics. We plan to realize this in the next 5-10 years. This architecture will solve the following problems:

  • Current ray tracing systems take a very long time to render. This architecture will enable real-time raytracing.
  • Current deep learning networks take a very long time for training. This architecture will enable real-time training of AI systems.
  • This architecture will enable real-time time evolution of any scene with intelligent participants.
  • This architecture will allow generation of the real light field instead of parallax based 3D.
  • One variation of this architecture is a dynamic optoelectrical processor, which can run AI algorithms directly on the 3D light field instead of first sampling it as images.
  • Another variation of this architecture will allow much more efficient quantum computing.

Tier3D Team

Tier3D is backed by a team of technology and science experts, which includes a Nobel Laureate and Stanford Faculty, that have come together to create a solution for Artificial Human Intelligence.

Shalender Singh, our CEO, has more than 20 years experience in Computer Vision, Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Reality.

,

Brian Josephson, our advisor and a Nobel Laureate in physics, has been working on extensible AI based physics models & evolutionary approaches to AI.

Dan Riskin, our advisor and on the Faculty at Stanford University, is an expert in healthcare artificial intelligence, and as a seasoned entrepreneur his companies have been featured in Forbes and The Wall Street Journal for influencing the care of millions of patients.

Srini Srinivasan, our CMO, has 30+ years in the software industry and his earlier positions as an investor & advisor were in WebEx, Skype Qik, and Savi technologies, prior to which he was a senior executive at TIBCO Software known for being a pioneer in enterprise distributed computing.

Vishnupriya Singh, our COO, is an MS in computer science with 18+ years of experience as an entrepreneur in high growth companies. Prior to Tier3D, she was an entrepreneur as CTO & founder of Visualflex Solutions Private Limited.
story_txt:
Updated Product Offering
We are happy to inform you that we are close to raising a larger professional round, but based on the strategic advice of our existing and potential investors we have decided to restructure the product offering and have refunded our backers 100%. We will be enrolling a limited number of people into a "free beta" program (once we launch) for the updated product offering and the people who are interested can mail us at info@tier3d.com with the subject: 'Free Beta' for a chance to try the products for free.
Tier3D - AI With Human-Like Intelligence

Tier3D Artificial Intelligence gadgets connect to the Tier3D Artificial Intelligence cloud and contribute to human-like artificial intelligence. Tier3D gadgets crowdsource Artificial Intelligence to generate a deep understanding of what you need to help you in a very precise way and work for you as an intuitive extension of your own mind. For example, if you go to a meeting wearing the Tier3D smartwatch and you promise to send a presentation the next day, the Tier3D watch understands your conversation and automatically generates a presentation highly specific to what you may need.Tier3D AI-Phone comes with an octa-core processor, 6 GB RAM, 128GB memory, and a special 3D light field camera. Tier3D Watch comes with a quad-core processor, 8GB internal memory, and a special 3D light field camera.
Pricing
Kindly wait for the updated product offering and updated pricing. If you wish to get access to the free beta of the product once it launched, kindly send us a mail at info@tier3d.com with the subject: 'Free Beta'
 
Tier3D Artificial Intelligence at work
 
Tier3D AI automatically does things for you

The Tier3D watch uses Mind* cloud to understand the information from your interactions. The AI on the Mind* cloud transforms this understanding into a structured form of learning & desired actions. The composer on the Mind* cloud uses the human-like AI to generate content like presentations, documents, notes, essays, summaries etc., doing things for you without you needed to specify them.
Edit and compose like a Pro

The Tier3D gadgets capture 3D videos with light field and True Texture© information, which allows AI to do better segmentation and have better understanding of the content captured. Tier3D MindStudio app uses the video segmentation and composition features of the Mind* cloud to automatically segment different objects from the video based on simple queries like "find all objects in the scene" or more complex like "find all dancing people in a batch of videos". The objects thus extracted can be edited, added or enhanced and re-composed in a way that is consistent with the lightfield as well as the geometry of the scene.
Anyone can create, connect, share, and monetize with AI

The Tier3D software suite and AI allows everyone to capture & create high-quality content, with no software development or 3D modeling training, by simply interacting with the AI chatbot. The creations of a user can be in form of AI inferences, AI models, documents, video compositions, games, and algorithms, which can be shared and published using the MindNet social media platform.
Traditional large subscriber platforms have the problem of "more exposure to those who are already on the top", which puts the newcomer with a small marketing budget at a big disadvantage. The MindNet social AI algorithms consider deep content meaning and context for targeting, which allows people who create content to reach the right audience without a huge marketing spend. The MindNet platform is not just a monetization platform for the influencers but for everyone who can create content.
You don't need to be a marketing guru or tie up with a marketing firm to be popular on MindNet.
Why Tier3D is better?
 

3D Light Field Sensor & True Texture©


Unlike with 2D pixels, each point in the real 3D world space has multiple light rays going in different directions. To accurately show a virtual object immersed in a real-world 3D scene, the software therefore needs to know the ambient light field and re-compose the blended scene by ray tracing.
In a traditional 2D camera picture the only thing we know about a point on an object is a single color. On the other hand, to edit, enhance & re-compose a very high quality 3D scene we need to know the material of every point on an object and its color response to different kinds of lighting. True Texture© is the response function of every point to the incident light.
Tier3D Light Field Sensor uses special electronics and Artificial Intelligence to estimate ambient lightfield and True Texture©  of the objects in the scene, thus capturing, and re-composing, extremely high-quality 3D pictures.
Locality Focus© & Clearer Rendering

In normal augmented reality/mixed reality glasses virtual objects look like translucent holograms and the fidelity of the virtual objects is highly dependent on the ambient lighting conditions. If the ambient lighting is bright, the object rendering has high noise.
In the case of parallax based 3D rendering the eyes are focused on the virtual object, which is rendered at a fixed distance, which is normally infinity. The brain reconstructs the 3D information based on the disparity between the left eye and the right eye. If the intended distance of a virtual object is similar to a real object and the eyes are focused on the virtual object then the real object looks blurred. This is because the eyes are focused on the virtual object project at infinity but the real object is much closer.
Tier3D uses special optical design along with the AI algorithms to make bring the real objects near to the virtual objects in-focus (Locality Focus©). The optical design also generates much clearer rendering in the case of brighter ambiance.
 
AI Crowdsourcing

One of the core features enabling Tier3D's AI is the ability to do crowdsourcing in a highly intuitive way. Tier3D AI engine converts complex inference based tagging tasks into easy human readable surveys that take only a moment to answer. The users of the system are incentivized by giving them credits for responses, which are monetizable.
The raw and crowdsourced captured data is given to the Tier3D Mind* cloud, which has an auto-scaling learning design that dynamically scales to the complexity of the problem. The auto-scaling design also allows distribution of large scale AI prediction modules into multiple machines in the cloud without being constrained by the performance of single monolithic GPU based prediction engine.
 
AI Privacy Management

The amount and complexity of data generated by the users is growing rapidly and it is projected to only increase. One of the problems with the existing privacy agreements is that they give little control to the user to decide which data form is private to them and which is not. The privacy controls for the user are generally at the level of data blobs (like images, videos). Another problem with the existing privacy management systems is that they apply privacy rules to a certain fixed set of features like pixelation of number plates and thus lack an automatic ability to adapt to newer feature forms like runner identification on the bib of a runner. Current privacy management systems thus do not automatically adapt to more complex data sets and need a human programmer to identify correspondingly more complex privacy forms, which consequently can only be updated manually.
Tier3D AI driven privacy management system passes the data through an artificial intelligence system, which marks various parts of the input data with a privacy level tag with continuously updating rules. It also allows users to do more meaningful transformations of the privacy-controlled data parts and not just redaction or pixelation.
Tier3D Gadgets
Tier3D Phone  
Tier3D Watch  
Tier3D Software
MindComplete©

MindComplete is an AI assistant, which uses the Mind* backend to improve the efficiency and accuracy of everyday tasks. MindComplete takes inputs from the user interaction to personalize the auto-complete engine, make suggestions, accomplish tasks, and power other AI enabled utilities.

 
MindNet©

MindNet is an online portal, which is a window into the Mind* backend. It gives you the status of the games you are participating in, social & sharing notifications, and whatever latest people share with you. It is also a marketplace and allows you to publish content, apps, AI algorithms and monetize them.

 
MindStudio©

MindStudio is an AI composer application, which allows you to create apps, content, and games without programming or creating artwork. Just use an interactive session to describe what you want and MindStudio creates the content for you.

Tier3D's Mission
Tier3D mission is to enable massive Artificial Intelligence and amazing Mixed Reality, which naturally combine together as Artificial Human Intelligence (AHI) to simulate human intelligence and consciousness in a machine.
A human mind is not limited to just the physical mind inside the cranium but is a continuum between what’s inside the human and extends to the physical world. A human mind externalizes information, intelligence, tools and uses the physical world to think and do actions. A model of the human mind (with all its creative and abstraction capabilities) is thus incomplete without a detailed model of the perceived universe. For creating Artificial Human Intelligence we need to create a model of the whole universe, which means we need to observe, record and model everything perceptible. The modeling of the perceived universe cannot be done in isolation with small samples of data but needs crowdsourcing of the data and “human interpretation of it”. Tier3D crowdsources information from millions of connected humans and also learns “interpretations” based on human interactions.
Tier3D gadgets are specifically designed to facilitate such AI crowdsourcing and, in combination with the Tier3D software platform, enables users to write AI apps and present them to users on the Tier3D gadgets. One of the fundamental and symbiotic applications of the ‘AI and visual model of everything’ is Augmented & Mixed Reality. Tier3D's contribution to the next advancement in Augmented & Mixed Reality is the ability to add visually realistic as well as behaviorally realistic content to the real world. The Augmented & Mixed Reality apps complement AI by generating high-quality rich data of natural interaction of humans with the virtual models.
Tier3D gadgets with the AI cloud is a cohesive and complete ecosystem for creating Artificial Human Intelligence. We have re-imagined wearable gadgets to enable Artificial Human Intelligence and we have created a novel set of applications and UI to enable its expression in software. The gadgets and software cannot be done in isolation of each other, that is, one cannot create a self-learning AI cloud and hope that someone will create gadgets with sensors to enable AHI, or conversely one cannot just create novel gadgets and hope that someday, someone will create an AI backend to use the data.
Project Timeline
Kindly wait for the updated product offering and updated pricing. If you wish to get access to the free beta of the product once it launched, kindly send us a mail at info@tier3d.com with the subject: 'Free Beta'
Prototypes
Tier3D Phone Prototypes

 

 

 

 Future WorkWe have created a 3D physical processor design (patent pending), which can simulate physical systems in the form of real physics. We plan to realize this in the next 5-10 years. This architecture will solve the following problems:
Current ray tracing systems take a very long time to render. This architecture will enable real-time raytracing.
Current deep learning networks take a very long time for training. This architecture will enable real-time training of AI systems.
This architecture will enable real-time time evolution of any scene with intelligent participants.
This architecture will allow generation of the real light field instead of parallax based 3D.
One variation of this architecture is a dynamic optoelectrical processor, which can run AI algorithms directly on the 3D light field instead of first sampling it as images.
Another variation of this architecture will allow much more efficient quantum computing.
Tier3D TeamTier3D is backed by a team of technology and science experts, which includes a Nobel Laureate and Stanford Faculty, that have come together to create a solution for Artificial Human Intelligence.Shalender Singh, our CEO, has more than 20 years experience in Computer Vision, Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Reality.,Brian Josephson, our advisor and a Nobel Laureate in physics, has been working on extensible AI based physics models & evolutionary approaches to AI.Dan Riskin, our advisor and on the Faculty at Stanford University, is an expert in healthcare artificial intelligence, and as a seasoned entrepreneur his companies have been featured in Forbes and The Wall Street Journal for influencing the care of millions of patients.Srini Srinivasan, our CMO, has 30+ years in the software industry and his earlier positions as an investor & advisor were in WebEx, Skype Qik, and Savi technologies, prior to which he was a senior executive at TIBCO Software known for being a pioneer in enterprise distributed computing.Vishnupriya Singh, our COO, is an MS in computer science with 18+ years of experience as an entrepreneur in high growth companies. Prior to Tier3D, she was an entrepreneur as CTO & founder of Visualflex Solutions Private Limited.

story:
David Scharps, documentary film-maker of "The Cure Is..." with leading experts in the health field, calls KIJINI an "invaluable" tool. 



The frequencies and patterns in your voice, no matter what you're saying, reveal more than you ever imagined about your health, personality and much more. Using the science of bio-acoustics (the study of the vibrational interactions within the body) KIJINI will ‘read’ the story in your voice and instantly reports its findings to you. 

KIJINI will be easy to use and very entertaining, but don’t be fooled--KIJINI’s reports are data-driven and sophisticated, based on 25 years of research in a clinical setting. 

Very simply: the coherence and harmony in the voice is 
directly correlated with the health and vitality of the body! 

 We know this sounds too good to be true. We were skeptical of the abilities of this technology in the beginning too! But the science is well-researched, and more and more, bio-acoustics is making headlines, revealing the potential applications and implications of this ground-breaking technology! 

The software already exists. Now we want to make it mobile! 





Physicists from Cornell learned how to measure the vibrational frequency of resonant atoms nearly 20 years ago. 

World renowned physicist Nassim Haramein of the Resonance project has proved that all matter in the known universe resonates and vibrates at certain frequencies, including all of the biochemical interactions in the body. These biochemical interactions are designed to give you optimal energy and health. 

In addition, bioacoustics research has discovered the frequency algorithms that accompany dozens of common complaints and conditions. In the language of bioacoustics, people with similar conditions/symptoms have similar if not identical vocal patterns. 

Resonance + Bioacoustics + Cloud Database = KIJINI!

Our website, www.KIJINI.com, contains much more detail, but in simple terms, each wave of the voice has information in it and the KIJINI technology deciphers that information, converts it from sound to data,  matches it to our proprietary database, and provides instant reports revealing what is happening in your body bioacoustically.

The KIJINI app will be free to download.  Basic reports will also be free. Detailed reports, where you will discover all the relationships between your voice frequencies and your body, and be able to monitor your progress toward your optimal potential, will be in-app purchases.

These first apps are nearly half-way there, and with your help on this campaign we anticipate they will be in the app store by September, 2015.  

 Here is the KIJINI app structure and what 2015 holds in store:

KIJINI will be easy to use, and fun!

Using a microphone on your mobile device, you’ll record your voice for about 30 seconds.  We run the recording through our software and KIJINI generates an instant report with specific, actionable data on muscles and vertebra, nutrition, energy, detox, emotions and personality, and more!

KIJINI can be used before and after meals, workouts, stressful events, before making health decisions, or anything that will affect your wellness.


With your help, we can bring this technology to your mobile device.

KIJINI does not diagnose or treat illness, but is a powerful tool for personal research and understanding. While the technology behind KIJINI has been used and developed for decades, on thousands of people, the advancements in the microphones on mobile devices are now allowing us to bring the KIJINI technology to your phone and tablet, to start a revolution in human wellness. And that’s where you come in!

KIJINI will launch the Nutrition, and Muscle apps in September, 2015.  Depending on your contribution, you may also have access to other apps as well. Each KIJINI app will provide a detailed report, giving you instant access to a wealth of actionable information about you and your body.

Talk into your phone, choose a report, and view the frequency equivalents of your voice! Imagine checking in with our inner wellbeing every morning, and seeing what your body needs. Imagine checking KIJINI after a run, or workout, and seeing what areas were most affected when the body gets depleted. The uses are endless!

KIJINI will have the ability to determine your percentage of overall wellness--how close you are to your optimal potential.  KIJINI will also focus on the frequency relationships seen in many metabolic, immune, and degenerative issues. 

OVER 50 DATABASES CURRENTLY DEVELOPED, 
READY TO TURN INTO MOBILE APPS


KIJINI represents the opportunity to begin a needed shift in health and wellness. The ability to gain accurate, non-biased, data-driven insight into what is happening within your body is critical to transforming your health.  Moving the technology onto mobile devices will revolutionize how you access and use information about your body in your own personal pursuit of wellness.


Watch this video for the entire animation of how the KIJINI technology is possible

The funds received from this campaign will help convert the bioacoustic databases into the the first two KIJINI apps.


Further, we will be updating our databases and creating more databases that evaluate predominant health issues and conditions from a bioacoustic perspective. Examples include frequency biomarkers related to symptoms of:  Diabetes, Thyroid,  and Blood sugar, Adrenal Exhaustion, Allergies, Digestion, Arthritis, Cancer, Inflammation, Immunity, and more.

Time is running out on our campaign. The sooner we reach our goal, the closer we get to bringing these apps to you, so please help us by contributing today.






Full Interview with Dr. Clyde Porter



Everyone! Professional athletes and weekend warriors; chiropractors and physicians, parents, children, teachers, trainers, and wellness practitioners, and anyone who wants more understanding of their own body and well its performing. We ALL need what KIJINI has to offer, because it is a direct analysis of YOU, in the moment you are speaking. KIJINI tells you where you are on the scale of your Optimal Potential, and then allows you to look deeper into the frequencies that are not harmonic within your system. See which frequency equivalents are high or low, and what you can do to support your body's ability to maintain coherence and harmony. 

KIJINI is a group of passionate people that are dedicated to bringing the extraordinary science of bioacoustics to the public. We are health professionals, researchers / scientists, and entrepreneurs, committed to bringing forth technologies and information that can empower people on their path to health.

The KIJINI group has dedicated many years to researching, developing and introducing information and technology - technology that can change our understanding of what is possible. 





Q: How can KIJINI actually work? 

A: Your vocal cords are hardwired to the brain. The brain has been determined scientifically to be a holographic biological frequency modulator. The recurrent laryngeal nerve is a branch of the vagus nerve that supplies all the intrinsic muscles of the larynx. The Vagus nerve also connects to the heart and all the other organs, the parasympathetic and sympathetic nervous systems. The sound waves coming from the vocal cords are therefore directly connected to frequency data of the entire nervous system.

Q: What is the science behind KIJINI

A: Importantly, KIJINI has been in development for more than 25 years. KIJINI is based on the science of bio-acoustics (the relationship between the body and frequency),  and quantum physics. All of the matter in the known universe resonates at different frequencies. All of the material that makes up the body is also vibrating at certain known frequencies. These resonant vibrations are processed by the nervous system and the brain holds a holographic representation of all of them at all times. This information is expressed within the frequencies of the voice. Databases of the Frequency Equivalents FE’s(™) of tens of thousands of compounds, substances, and body parts have been created over the past 25 years, and proven over and over again to be accurate.

Q: Can KIJINI tell me what is wrong with me?

A: KIJINI does not diagnose illness, but can identify the frequencies in your voice that are out of coherence (imbalanced, stressed, or weak) that represent the frequencies within your entire system. These frequency equivalents can be related to many common issues you might be experiencing, including nutrient deficiencies, muscle stress, toxic overload, pathogens, neurotransmitter and hormone imbalances, and more! 

Q: How does KIJINI analyze the voice?

A: KIJINI uses an algorithm that has been developed over the last 25 years to unearth the frequencies in the voice that tell a story. When looking at these tones from a mathematical perspective, the voice offers a whole catalog of information that can be analyzed. KIJINI'S technology and extensive, proprietary database development allows us to decipher and make sense of this information. This complex algorithm is at the heart of the KIJINI technology.

Q: Is KIJINI safe?

A: Yes, it only records your voice, analyzes it, and produces a report on the frequencies and their equivalents represented in your voice.  

Q: What happens to my data once KIJINI analyzes it?

A:  Your voice is analyzed using KIJINI’s unique algorithms and you have the option to save the data to your account. The data in the voice is only decipherable through the KIJINI program, and only data you wish to keep will be saved to your account. All other data will be deleted, and there is no recording saved. It is analyzed instantly. 

Q: Do I need to speak in a certain way?

A : KIJINI will provide the most accuracy when you speak in a normal speaking tone and inflection. You can speak in any language you wish.  The most accurate readings will be from recordings with no background noise, other voices, or interruptions.

For more FAQs please visit www.kijini.com/blog/faqs

* $1 perk valid with a $2000 minimum total contribution from shares through Indiegogo's share buttons.

story:
Now you have the technology which can actively reduce noise pollution.

Noise pollution affects both health and behavior of mankind and may harm the activity or balance of human life.

Unwanted sound (noise) can damage psychological health.

Noise pollution can cause hypertension, high stress levels, tinnitus, hearing loss, sleep disturbances, and other harmful effects.

Now you can defend yourself! Now thanks to the Noise Block app you are eqipped with the ultimate tool to fight noise and stay in better psychological and phisical shape. 

SELECT A PERK


Noise Block hushes ambient sounds by creating frequencies that obviate the noise at your close surrounding. 

The app won't eliminate everything, but significantly reduce the noise of the engine, whoosh of speed, rumbling noise of tires, air-conditioning system and so on. 

Noise-canceling app captures the ambient noise and creates a quiet zone using the microphone of your smartphone and speakers of your car-audio-system. 

Via bluetooth connetion with car-audio-system the Noise Block eliminates waves of noise with other waves going in the opposite direction, improving driver and passengers comfort by reducing the exposure to noise while driving.


SELECT A PERK


Noise Block uses the principle called destructive interference. 

Which means that when waves of the sound (noise) are traveling into your surrounding, 

Noise Block hits them with similar waves of the same volume, the same frequency, but shifted by 180 degrees, they will interfere with each other and cancel each other.

Now there are so many possibilities with Noise Block to fight unwanted noise.

One of them is to make your closest environment relaxing while your next-door-neighbor party is pretty loud. Right now you can use your home-audio-system and via headphone jack connect it to your smart phone with Noise Block app.

Through microphone of the smart phone and algorithms of Noise Block, your home-audio-system speakers will produce noise-canceling counter waves, providing you relaxing and silent ambience. 


SELECT A PERK


Noise Block senses the snoring sound (of you or your partner) and through the speaker of the smart phone broadcasts in real time a counter sound wave which eliminates unwanted snoring sound.

Thanks to the Noise Block app creates a quiet zone in the shape of sphere.

The range of this quiet sphere depends on factors like type of the smart phone, its speaker's power, ambience and so on.

To successfully create silent ambience keep the phone near the head of the snoring person (near the source of snoring sound). And keep it in the airplane mode.

And most importantly you do not need any other additional device than you beloved smart phone : ))


SELECT A PERK



If you can find new and creative application for Noise Block app and share with us your idea, we are open to welcome you on board of our team. 




If you need our help referring to Noise Block please do not hesitate and write or call us, we would be very grateful to hear from you today.

email: noiseblockmobile@gmail.com

phone: +48 606 308 779

@FirstNoiseBlock


With a little help from you a big change can happen…

Thank you!

story:
Climate Control Hoodies/Jackets

Presented by Waves Technology

Waves Technology is proud to present one of our debut products: Climate Control Smart Hoodies. 
  • Hoodie can read your outer body temperature 
  • Temperature of hoodie can be adjusted  with our IOS app 
  • Made with soft, pre-shrunk,  high quality material 
  • Drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, Waves Technology emblem

Using a common problem, and a simple idea, we have created an innovative product.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make Climate Control Smart Hoodies we will need:

  •  $15,000 in order to start manufacturing the hoodies
  • If we do not get fully funded the money will be put in a separate fund and we will continue to build on the technology.

The Problem and solution

The weather changes constantly, of course, I don't need to tell you that.  But not everyone wants to gear up in snow proof clothes in order to stay warm during the winter months, and some people don't want to be close to naked to stay cool during the summer. So we have created the Climate Control Smart Hoodie:

  • Stylish hoodies (with more styles added constantly!) 
  • Ability to change temperature through our IOS app.
  • Rechargeable!
These hoodies are created through top of the line materials to ensure the most comfortable and natural feel for any hoodie/jacket. We will be adding new styles constantly so just be sure to check up on Indiegogo.
The Impact

Everyone's contribution matters. Even $1 will help us reach our goal. We are truly thankful for everything that everyone gives.

  • Our product provides the ability to save energy throughout your home. Instead of changing your thermostat, change the temperature of your hoodie instead.
  • Effective way of staying warm!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge we face  is creating the technology to cool the hoodie and have it perform the way we want it to, Another challenge is figuring out which is the safest way to wash the hoodies . We are confident we can overcome these challenges as we learn more about the technology. They will be finished by the delivery date!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you  can't help:

  • Ask people to get the word out about this awesome product!
  • Share it everywhere and remember to stay up to date and contact us with any questions or comments!

Thank you all for taking the time to read our story about  our product. Make sure to check out this page regularly for updated images, videos, and stories.

story:
Featured on



 
“By far the best laptop stand I have ever used.”
Rui Vieira, Certified Mac Technician 

Sled™ is the debut product of On a Different Angle°.

A 100% ethically-made, portable and versatile laptop stand: Made with environmentally conscious materials, from the product itself all the way to the packaging. Completely sustainable (for every Sled™ sold we plant one tree) and 100% made in Europe under fair working conditions.




Sled™
This is it.

A portable and versatile laptop stand made from a solid pine wood block, with a striped pattern crafted through the years by nature. Precisely cut and hand finished with respect for people and  the environment.

Carefully conceived by a type designer’s eye, Sled’s minimal design is perfectly balanced, its curves sculpted until they felt perfectly harmonious. After many refinements we are proud to present an elegant and fully functional piece of design that will stand out on any desk.


Sled should hold any tablet and laptop. We have tested it with up to 17” devices both Mac and PC. Keyboard Pianos shouldn’t be a problem either, however Sled might not be appropriate for large keyboards. We have tested it with up to a 5 octave keyboard and it was pretty steady.



Our Mission

This is what moves us.


We believe that the way we buy things has a very powerful influence in the World. Unfortunately, most of the time, that influence is not a good one. We want to impact the World in a positive way. We want do things on a different angle. That is the driving force behind this project. 

Sled™ is, hopefully, the first of many products we will do with this mindset. We believe that having beautiful products that we like and caring for the people and the planet are not in opposition to each other. We are bound to do design on a different angle.



A Bit About The Author

Who and Why.

Natanael is a 27-year-old type designer who has the virtue (or the vice, yet to be decided) of always creating new stuff. Natanael has the dream of creating high quality products that are 100% ethical. Sled is the first of these products and, with your help, his dream might come true.

A few years ago, Natanael built with his father, Luís, the first prototype of Sled. After unsuccessfully searching for a solution for a dual-screen working setup, he decided to design his own. This prototype became famous among his friends and he was encouraged to make it available to more people.

If it was going to happen, however, it had to be done right. So Natanael started a long process of creating a 100% ethical environment for the production of his design. It started with selecting a local woodshop where he could supervise the way things were done. After that he researched and tested a lot of materials in order to get the perfect outcome without neglecting his initial purpose. Finally he partnered with the Portuguese non-profit “Plantar uma Árvore” (Plant a Tree) in order to be able to fulfill the promise of planting a tree for every Sled™ sold.



The Perks

Oh yeah! Here they come.


Challenges

It wouldn’t be as fun without them.

Our funding goal will be used mainly for the production of Sled™, but a bit will also be used for the development of the online shop.

Our funding goal is flexible because we are able to deliver every Sled™ even if the total amount produced is small, only with a more humble packaging. We really want to promote and improve On a Different Angle° Brand. For that we need a website and online shop, new high quality images and videos of the final product (and not only the old prototypes), and hopefully some money to start thinking about a follow up product. For that we need to reach the total amount.

We plan that Sleds will be delivered by September, but it will probably be sooner. Hurray!
Take a look at our timeline:

If you have any question, please feel free to ask. We will answer gladly and promptly.


Sharing The Same Heart

Impossible without you!

A campaign like this is only possible with your help. Even if you can’t buy a stand, you can always share this with your friends. We will randomly offer one Sled to anyone who shares it (using the indiegogo share tools, otherwise we cannot keep track of shares) and we will offer another Sled to the person who brings more people to this campaign.

story:
It was a comment from my daughter Jennifer that got me thinking.  She mentioned she was having trouble plugging the charger cable into her phone.  She handed her phone to me and I took a closer look – the connector was damaged!

I thought about it for some time. I was also having problems inserting the cable into my tablet each night. Then it dawned on me! Why not make a cable that was color coded so it’s easy to know which way is the right way? Then I wouldn’t be guessing, getting frustrated and possibly damaging my tablet.

I called a few friends and asked “How many times do you turn a micro-USB cable around in your hand, trying to get it inserted? They answered, “couple of times a day, and sometimes both ends!”

 

Do you also have this problem? 

 

If so, keep reading. 

The answer was simple!  Make a color-coded cable with a tactile arrow so we know the correct orientation even in low light!

It was important to color code the cable on both ends because the connector that goes into the computer/charger is also “one way only”.

This is where we started the industrial design to make a friendly, ergonomic, and beautiful connector.  We did all the drawings,

 

 

 



made some 3D printed parts,

 

 

 




And here are our final cables.

Since connectors on some of your devices (tablets, headphones, etc.) may be upside-down from your phone, we decided to supply small colored adhesive dots to remind you of the orientation on each device and voila, the problem is solved!

Since we were designing a better cable, we decided to take care of another major complaint – charging speed. Our cables can handle up to 3 amps, which supports Quick Charge 2.0 technology and is the maximum allowed by USB standards for charging current.

Getting cables made wasn’t easy, but we persevered with the idea and the Aviva cable was born. We think it offers a time-saving improvement to everyone’s life — simple and quick for everyone from 9 to 90.   Aviva cables will get the whole family connecting in one easy step with a cable for each device:  headphones, tablets, cameras, speakers, phones, everything with a USB port that needs charging or data transfer.

We built and tested samples and received extremely positive responses from everyone we approached about the Aviva cable.  Because of our high quality, we confidently offer a lifetime warranty!

In summary, the Aviva cable provides help in 3 ways.

·  Ease of use – dual-color connector with tactile feature. Connect easily every time.

·  Capable of charging up to 3A – highest allowed by USB standards. Shorten your charging time, depending on your charger.

·  Lifetime warranty – no more trips to buy new cables.

We need your help to get production going.  Please help us reach our goal of launching the world’s most convenient micro-USB cable!

Thank you!

The Aviva team.
