story:
Short summary 

Hi, We are a new App Startup.  We have designed an application that we believe will revolutionize safety on the world's roadways. Our application will potentially take smartphones out of the hands of millions of teenage drivers. DryvMi will be the world's first fully integrated driving distractions eliminator for new drivers.  

DryvMi will,

  • Eliminate the use of texting or social media use while driving
  • Set time restrictions on texting and Social Media (perfect for School or Bedtime)
  • Provide real time location information
  • Set Speed limit notifications. If the device travels above a parental approved speed a notification will be sent to the Parent

What We Need & What You Get

Your Help Will:

  • Allow us to hire additional developers to implement our GPS/SMS blocking algorithm in a android and iOS application.
  • Support infrastructure cost ie Storage, hosting, etc
  • Advertise, Advertise, Advertise. We cant save millions of lives if parents are unaware of our technology


The Impact

DryvMi has the potential to save countless lives. Here are some troubling statistics our country currently faces.

  • 71% of teens and young people say they have composed/sent SMS messages while driving (2012, Ad Council)
  • 36% of teens say they have been involved in a near-crash because of their own or someone else's distracted driving. (2010, Pew Research Center)
  • 11% of all drivers under the age of 20 involved in fatal crashes were reported as distracted at the time of the crash. This age group has the largest proportion of drivers who were distracted.  (2012, NHTSA)

We are passionate about this project. We have been working on this project for over a year. Our goal is to get as many teen drivers using our application as possible.  If we only get 10-12,000 teens using DryvMi, then that will be 10-12,000 teens driving without distraction. We want to bring a powerful tool to to the parents to give them control when they aren't in the car. Your contribution will help us change the future of our communities roadways.


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can donate, thats okay!!! All we ask is donate what you're comfortable with, and spread our message and our goal to your friends and loved ones. Follow us on facebook and twitter to track our growth.

    And that's all there is. LETS DO THIS!!!

story:
Now Available in Micro USB!

 JuiceBox is proud to announce that we have just released the Micro USB version! Micro USB JuiceBox sets will also contain a 3 foot long double shielded charging cable as well as a wall adapter. Our Micro USB chargers will hold the same price as our lightning chargers, and also maintain the same shipping schedule.

High level details

•We have two versions of the JuiceBox, supporting iPhone and Samsung

•Charges for 20 minutes allows you to hold an hour of battery life for both iPhone and Samsung.

•No compromises on quality of the JuiceBox: top ABS plastic, top lithium ion battery, and a double shielded charging cable for maximum durability.

•JuiceBox starts shipping in November with top tier rewards shipping late October.

Anytime, anywhere, anyplace.

With just a 20 minute charge, give your smartphone an extra hour of life. Smallest charger with the biggest punch on the market guaranteed. The full retail price for the JuiceBox will be $13, so you're signing up for a deal of under half price by supporting us on Kickstarter. We will not be retailing the JuiceBox until all of our Kickstarter rewards have been shipped.

We' been making and designing batteries for almost 5 years now, with big success. By designing a portable, high quality, compact charger, our dream is that one day everyone will have the JuiceBox ready to enhance their phones. Our company goal is to make the JuiceBox a key tool used not only in your personal life, but wherever you need it. For just $9 we want to drastically improve and increase the amount you are able to achieve in any given day.

While first developing the ion battery in the JuiceBox, we discovered an important yet complicated problem: size. As we increased the amount of testing, our team was able to drastically shrink battery size while maximizing quality. Being only from the highest grade materials available, the JuiceBox has found its maximum potential.

Us here at JuiceBox HQ have a fully functional product that has been in use for months without error. We have designed an easy to use and carry product that has exceeded expectations and is fully ready to be produced on a large scale.

Simple and convenient, without compromise

We’ve added the entire set – the exclusive compact JuiceBox, a 3 foot long double shielded charging cable, a wall adapter, and the cheapest yet best design ever created – without changing what matters most to you:

•Slim, easy to use design

•Up to an hour of battery life

•20 minute charge for a ready to go experience

•Water resistant and durable

•One snap, and it’s ready to go

•No bulk, to stay out of your daily life

•A lifesaving tool

•A cheap and affordable solution to increasing smartphone proficiency

•Ships anywhere in the world, for free

•Two versions of the JuiceBox supporting iPhone as well as micro USB devices

•A durable, waterproof case for all JuiceBoxes

Introducing the JuiceBox Keychain!

We have begun production of the first JuiceBox Keychain holder! The JuiceBox Keychain will be a part of all reward tiers – without altering our price. For all versions of the JuiceBox, we will include a reinforced plastic case that is 100% waterproof. For more details, please refer to our reward tiers and for any questions please do not hesitate to contact our staff for information.

International Backers

We're proud to have JuiceBox supporters in over 125 countries. We are shipping JuiceBox worldwide without charge, to give back and reach everyone who has invested in making the JuiceBox become a reality. Delivery times may vary depending on location, please contact our team by emailing JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com for details.

Estimated Delivery

Top reward tiers have different estimated shipment than the lower reward tiers, being two weeks earlier. While these are not expected to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month change. For any and all concerns, please contact our team by emailing JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com.

Warranty

Each JuiceBox includes with a 60 day (starting on date of delivery) money back guarantee and 1 year limited warranty. For more information concerning our warranty policies, please contact JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, about anything, during or after our campaign has closed, you can always reach the JuiceBox staff at JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com. Our team will respond within one to two business days, with no automated messaging to provide a more personal aspect of customer service.
story_txt:
Now Available in Micro USB!  JuiceBox is proud to announce that we have just released the Micro USB version! Micro USB JuiceBox sets will also contain a 3 foot long double shielded charging cable as well as a wall adapter. Our Micro USB chargers will hold the same price as our lightning chargers, and also maintain the same shipping schedule.  High level details•We have two versions of the JuiceBox, supporting iPhone and Samsung •Charges for 20 minutes allows you to hold an hour of battery life for both iPhone and Samsung. •No compromises on quality of the JuiceBox: top ABS plastic, top lithium ion battery, and a double shielded charging cable for maximum durability. •JuiceBox starts shipping in November with top tier rewards shipping late October.
Anytime, anywhere, anyplace. 
With just a 20 minute charge, give your smartphone an extra hour of life. Smallest charger with the biggest punch on the market guaranteed. The full retail price for the JuiceBox will be $13, so you're signing up for a deal of under half price by supporting us on Kickstarter. We will not be retailing the JuiceBox until all of our Kickstarter rewards have been shipped.
We' been making and designing batteries for almost 5 years now, with big success. By designing a portable, high quality, compact charger, our dream is that one day everyone will have the JuiceBox ready to enhance their phones. Our company goal is to make the JuiceBox a key tool used not only in your personal life, but wherever you need it. For just $9 we want to drastically improve and increase the amount you are able to achieve in any given day. 
While first developing the ion battery in the JuiceBox, we discovered an important yet complicated problem: size. As we increased the amount of testing, our team was able to drastically shrink battery size while maximizing quality. Being only from the highest grade materials available, the JuiceBox has found its maximum potential.
Us here at JuiceBox HQ have a fully functional product that has been in use for months without error. We have designed an easy to use and carry product that has exceeded expectations and is fully ready to be produced on a large scale. 
Simple and convenient, without compromise 
We’ve added the entire set – the exclusive compact JuiceBox, a 3 foot long double shielded charging cable, a wall adapter, and the cheapest yet best design ever created – without changing what matters most to you: 
•Slim, easy to use design 
•Up to an hour of battery life 
•20 minute charge for a ready to go experience 
•Water resistant and durable 
•One snap, and it’s ready to go 
•No bulk, to stay out of your daily life 
•A lifesaving tool 
•A cheap and affordable solution to increasing smartphone proficiency 
•Ships anywhere in the world, for free 
•Two versions of the JuiceBox supporting iPhone as well as micro USB devices 
•A durable, waterproof case for all JuiceBoxes
Introducing the JuiceBox Keychain!We have begun production of the first JuiceBox Keychain holder! The JuiceBox Keychain will be a part of all reward tiers – without altering our price. For all versions of the JuiceBox, we will include a reinforced plastic case that is 100% waterproof. For more details, please refer to our reward tiers and for any questions please do not hesitate to contact our staff for information. International Backers We're proud to have JuiceBox supporters in over 125 countries. We are shipping JuiceBox worldwide without charge, to give back and reach everyone who has invested in making the JuiceBox become a reality. Delivery times may vary depending on location, please contact our team by emailing JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com for details. Estimated DeliveryTop reward tiers have different estimated shipment than the lower reward tiers, being two weeks earlier. While these are not expected to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month change. For any and all concerns, please contact our team by emailing JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com.  Warranty Each JuiceBox includes with a 60 day (starting on date of delivery) money back guarantee and 1 year limited warranty. For more information concerning our warranty policies, please contact JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com. Need help? We're here for you. If you have questions at any time, about anything, during or after our campaign has closed, you can always reach the JuiceBox staff at JuiceBoxHeadquaters@gmail.com. Our team will respond within one to two business days, with no automated messaging to provide a more personal aspect of customer service.

story:
What is Immediate Mode(IM) Gui?

Immediate mode rendering is a style for application programming interfaces of graphics libraries, in which client calls directly cause rendering of graphics objects to the display. It does not preclude the use of double-buffering. In contrast to retained mode, lists of objects to be rendered are not saved by the API library. Instead, the application must re-issue all drawing commands required to describe the entire scene each time a new frame is required, regardless of actual changes. This method provides the maximum amount of control and flexibility to the application program.

source:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immediate_mode_%2...

if you don't want the IM gui, you can write us for other

Short Summary

RCoder is a cross platform 2d immediate mode gui widget library and gui designer. It has several properties following:

  • Customizable Look and Feel Widgets.
  • Extensible Widget Library.
  • Drag and Drop Gui Designer.

What We Need & What You Get

RCoder is currently in development, the funding here will help us cover adding new widgets and properties, marketing, preparing documents and promotions. We have a lot of perks here.

The Impact

RCoder is important because it is a customizable and extensible graphical user interface library for developing an application.

  • RCoder includes a gui designer for developing fastly the applications
  • It doesn't confuse with installation problems, it makes all compiler and linker settings automatically.

Development Timeline

Unpredictable situations can be during development but we are planning to finish within three months.

  • Month one: to finish the widget library
  • Month two: to prepare linux and mac os x editions
  • Month three: to test beta edition and release stable edition

Help make it born

We want to develop the software development tools now and in the future.

story:
Most of the underwater pictures and videos you can see were shot via iphone6S and 6S plus with Submacam Phone Case(Second model & Final model) In Malaysia.

>The story

The phone you’re holding is the best and most convenient photography tool. It is more portable than professional cameras but produces better image quality and provides better operational experience than action cameras. Simply decide the composition of your photo through the screen of your phone and press the shooting bottom. It is especially ideal for IOS considering its extraordinary shooting quality which is as impressive as SLR cameras. At this moment you just need our underwater phone case, then your diving journey will definitely be a life-long unforgettable experience! That is really cool!

Just a little time from you and our program will be considerably advanced. Please share Fidget Cube to your Facebook, Tweeter, and Submit to tell people about us! /to help us gain more attention.

>What is Subma Cam Phone Case?

Subma Cam is a brand focusing on underwater imaging products, providing underwater imaging system that is readily available. Its products include camera stands, submarine lights and professional camera diving shells. The underwater phone case is just a beginning.

*Supports iPhone8, iPhone8 plus, iPhone7, iPhone7 plus, iPhone6s, iPhone6s plus, iPhone6, iPhone6 plus

 

>Why we design Submacam phone case

Because most of the products on the market are not satisfactory! The main products on sale are plastic waterproof bags, plastic waterproof case and Waterproof Case For Deep diving.But when you see the feedback by the buyer on the Amazon, Do you think they are really reliable?Do you still put your phone in them?

 

>What their problems are

Plastic Waterproof Bags and Plastic Waterproof Case’s material and structure are not strong enough, It has been hard to keep waterproof when you use several times, and You really trust to use them?

By comparison, the waterproof case for deep diving would be more secure. Before you use it, you need to put silicone oil on the O-ring. Some models can offers protection up to 40 meters if you use them properly. But please don't forget that those cellphone waterproof cases are controlled by controlling buttons directly, there are mechanical button and much risk. In most cases, the first leak is the button. The more times you use, the higher the risk of leakage. But the serious problem is that you do not know when it starts leaking, it was too late when you knew it. Like a time bomb！

 

>Now let's take a look at how Submacam solves these problems!

Waterproof 40 meters / Special control APP / Vacuum-sensing System / Built-in charging treasure /  1000 lumens multi-function video Lamp /  Extended Lens Connector / Buoyancy Arm / Quick installation hood / Equipped with 1/4 expansion screw /double Optical glasses / 3-stages O-ring

  • The new design of the waterproof structure

Submacam phone case using a dedicated App control, there is no direct button, so that the phone is completely sealed, and safe. Depth Rating up to 40 meters.

We redesigned the waterproof structure, using a unique three-stage O-ring that is the best waterproof structure, and you no longer need to repeatedly apply silicone oil.

 

  • Special control APP 

Traditional waterproof phone case’s function is single, you need control the phone by touching Screen button, so operation function is little.

With the most intuitive control operation, Submacam phone case can operate the camera to shoot photo/video, zoom, camera switch, picture view and other functions, you just need to press a button.

​

According to different phone models, you can shoot high-quality video up to 4K 30FPS, and Up to 240 frames of slow motion video capture.

• Supports 4K (3840X2160) 60FPS video capture (iPhone 8/8p, iPhone X)

• Supports 4K (3840X2160) 30FPS video capture (iPhone 7/7p + / 6s / 6sp + / SE + / iPad Pro)

• Support for HD (1920x1080) video capture (iPhone 7/7p + / 6s / 6sp + / SE + / 5s + / iPad Pro)

• Supports up to 240FPS (1980X1080p) High Speed ​​Video Capture (iPhone 8/8p, iPhone X)

• Supports up to 240FPS (1280X720p) and 120FPS (1980X1080p) High Speed ​​Video Capture (iPhone 7/7 + / 6s / 6s + / SE + / iPad Pro)

• Supports up to 120FPS (1280X720p) (iPhone 5s)

App interface that is designed for underwater shooting, Power / remaining hard disk space / shooting time / Sound gain and other key information display at a glance. Operation Icon design is clear, you can be easy to operate even in the water.

The pictures and videos record GPS location information.

 

  • Vacuum detection Kit

The vacuum-sensing system specifically designed protect your phone perfectly.

Vacuum structure kit can easily to make the case pressure at the negative pressure -300mmhg

In the negative pressure state, the Vacuum detection system determines case state By real-time detection of pressure changes. If the case’s pressure change, Red lamp flash that means not waterproof. You can know the case safe at any time, everything is under control, You can more focus on your shooting.

 

  • Multifunction Lens

special accessories: Extended lens connector

Quick installation multi-function connector provides up to three simultaneous mounts and install two lenses at the same time

The filter lenses provides yellow, orange and red, so you can cope with different depth and different sea of the color situation.

You can also install close lenses and switch it quickly. Macro shooting is very handy.

 

  • Back Battery

Special accessories: dedicated external backup battery. Increase double the shooting time twice.

 

  • The lens have double optical glass

The structure of the traditional single-lens glass easily lead to glass fog at high temperatures.

Because of the high temperature, the surface temperature of glass is relatively low, vapor in the air cools through the surface of the glass and becomes liqui. By principles of heat-protecting glass, Submacam phone case is double optical glass that effectively reduces the glass surface temperature difference to solve the problem of glass fog.

 

  • Equipped with 1/4 expansion screw, easy external fill lamp and arm lamp accessories

 

  • Buoyancy Arm

Special accessories: Adjustable neutral buoyancy arm

According to your need, there are several different ways of installing, and you can keep neutral buoyancy underwater.

In addition, double arms are also fit the waterproof camera housing and can be installed with double video lamp.

 

  • Hood

Special accessories: Quick installation hood

You can see the screen when you are in the sun, Let you fully enjoy the fun with the sun.

We take strict quality control. All products are tested by 50 meters waterproofing pressure!

 

  • Multi-function Video Lamp

​Special accessories: Specially designed 1000 lumens multi-function video lamps, you can   easily adjust the angle with universal arm

 

120 wide-angle lamping

 

High-quality CREE6500K color lamp beads

 

1 hour battery life

Rechargeable battery and 60 minutes battery life

 

40 meters waterproof

 

Dedicated external lamp concentrator arm, underwater macro photography weapon(Coming Soon!)

 

  • Which phone models Supported?

*Support Apple iPhone8, iPhone8 plus, iPhone7, iPhone7 plus, iPhone6s, iPhone6s plus, iPhone6, iPhone6 plus

 

>What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to speed up our mass production, We will offer our best discount to our supporters. Thank you to all backers for helping make Submacam phone case a reality!

  • Now you can take an underwater selfie yourself or with your friends, without worrying about whether you look good or not, and all these are so easy and convenient!

  • If you are a diving lover, when you dive deep into an intriguing sea, you will want to record this marvelous journey with pictures or videos and share with your friends without doubt. Now you just need our underwater phone case, and you don’t need extra investment to buy any other expensive underwater equipment.

 

>About Us

Submacam is a brand focusing on underwater imaging products, providing underwater imaging system that is readily available.

Submacam is a young brand and team, Our members have a wealth of experience in many production areas. We have a lot of creative ideas in product design, circuit design, and app programming, We are a team of courage and passion.

>Karl said（PADI MASTER INSTRUCTOR）

Hello, I am Karl, PADI MASTER INSTRUCTOR. I have ten years scuba diving experience. Underwater is a magical world, that is unparalleled if you are in the water. I very much hope to share the beautiful scene and my diving experience, and my smart phone can help me do that. I need a waterproof phone case. Although I bought a lot of different brands of phone case, but they can not meet my needs, they are not really waterproof, And even let my phone scrapped! Until I know Submacam that is different from most other brands on the market, they design a more efficient structural to achieve the best waterproof. Because Submacam phone case is 40 meters waterproof, easy to operation, rich in scalability, and has the reliable vacuum detection system. When i scuba diving, I shoot by Submacam phone case, I very enjoy and I do not need to worry about my phone.

This is really a amazing product! Whether you are snorkeling, free-diving, or scuba diving, that is the best phone case. Trust me! when you see the underwater images that you shoot, you would more love the underwater exercise!

 

The Impact

Even if we don't reach your entire goal, we will still do mass production, because this is the underwater products we need for real. Your support will greatly speed up our mass production process.  We will continue to bring to every one of you more joy and fun from the underwater world. You can keep up with us through our website, Facebook, and twitter, on which we will update our new progress.

After our long-time efforts, we finally decided on the design of our product, and repeatedly tested the water resistance ability of our sample products. The product you see now is the final product prototypes. We need the minimum order amount to put it into production, and the new products in the next stage in our plan also need supports from you.

Risks & Challenges

We are dedicated to producing and delivering Submacam phone case to our backers in the highest standards and on schedule. 
We have passed prototype and testing stages successfully and are confident about the production process. 
As with all Indiegogo projects, delays and unforeseen incidents may occur. We are dedicated to working towards solving them all.

This is just the beginning (Stretch Goals)

The subma Cam phone case is just a beginning, and we will design easier, more reliable and more low-cost underwater system for professional SLR as well as the corresponding accessories such as the lights and the stands; so we really need you to support us to carry out this product plan, and we have a lot lot more ideas about professional underwater camera shells. We  are very excited to have created this project, and to be able to finally share it with you. We hope you love your Submacam phone case just as much as we do! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We need your help. Recruit 100 Underwater photographer!

If you are a professional Underwater photographer and often go diving, We will offer you a Submacam super phone case for free. You just need to keep shooting more beautiful photos to post add us. You will become our long-term closed beta members and get our newest underwater products!

Please follow us and send email to Submacamsevice@gmail.com with your introduction immediately, If you are suitable, we will contact you!

story:
TPMS (Tire Pressure Monitor System) is designed to ensure the safety of passengers from 1980s’, much like a seat belt or airbag. Every car should have one.
However, we found TPMS on the market today are with  below problems,

  • Complicated. Need work from technician
  • Expensive and high maintenance cost
  • Monitor, transceiver, or wires in the car
  • Indicator only or single operation

Can we have a TPMS easy to use?

Perun is a Smart Bluetooth TPMS designed for mobile age. With only one smartphone in hand, you can directly monitor tire status and get alert if any abnormality detected. Just put sensors on tire valve stems, and click on the app. You can easily get real-time tire pressure and temperature data, no any other devices required. 

Designed for easy DIY, you can finish install and maintenance by yourself which takes only a few minutes. Ideal for people who like things simple and easy, and save lots of your time and money.

You can also experience our unique designs, such as background monitor to help focus on driving without visual distraction, fast installation and anti-theft with QR code paring, and automatic power saving for longer battery life.  

This is the the simplest, smartest, and most affordable TPMS ever.

Qucik facts below,  


3-Step Set Up:
We believe that using a TPMS should be easy and quick. With three simple steps, you are ready to go!

3-Mins Maintenance/repair:
Get a button battery (CR2032) and replace by yourself when the power runs off. If one of the sensor is down, simple get a single new sensor and put it on. There is no need to go auto repair, of course no maintenance fees to pay at all.

 

Perun APP is free and supports iOS/Android. Unlike the dull screen of other TPMS, it is beautifully designed and with many flexible custom settings. 

  • Stylish UI: Specially designed with vivid and modern style .
  • Custom settings: Set high/low alert limit, choose temp F or C, and can do tire rotations.
  • Multiple vehicle: set up more than one car/trailer on your smartphone.
  • Multiple users: with owner’s authorization, you can monitor the same vehicle from different phones. (Ideal when your family members driving your car.)

 

You can choose different modes depends on your needs. We give you the flexibility while others can't. 

 

Foreground mode -- A reliable digital tool.
Use it as the real time monitoring system to provide the most accurate tire status. Or it can replace tire gauge as a spare tool, just sit inside the car and click the app to check tire status.

 

Background mode -- Your phone can multitask.
Sometimes your smartphone is busy muti-tasking while you drive. Perun continues to monitor your tires in the background, and will automatically alert when any abnormality detected. 
 

Super background mode -- World’s only!
If you like to focus on driving without any visual distraction, simply set the phone aside and let it asleep. Perun will protect you quietly. Once any abnormality detected, Perun will proactively wake the phone and alert you.

 

Don't worry about sensors been stolen.
We have it the traditional way: using an locking nut together with sensor can secure it from being easily removed.
And we have it the modern way: Our unique QR code system pairs the sensor to owner authorized phones, when it can't be used after stealing, there will be no stealing at all. 

Battery efficiency matters!
Battery efficiency is related to future costs and the monitor efficiency of TPMS. We do care and we know it matters. Our sensors automatically switch between sleep and operation modes, so the battery life is extended to the max. 

Perun TPMS passed several international standard tests, and it means high quality and reliable.

  • Use Bluetooth 4.0 which is more reliable than radio signal.
  • Speedy response. (response time is 50% faster than competitive products) 
  • Waterproof and dustproof: IP 67 qualified.
  • Meet vehicle standard: SAE J2657 compliant. 

 

 

Now you know what Perun is and how it works, come to learn more about what was the story behind.

As frequent drivers, we all experienced flat tires or puzzled about the condition of tires. However, we are dissatisfied with TMPS products on the market.

Such an important safety device should be simple, intelligent and affordable. Therefore, we decided to turn such idea into reality. 

However, it has been a tough journey to bring Perun alive. We spent two years on R&D and thousands times of testing. We encountered numerous failures, and even redesigned the product after pilot production due to the occurrence of new problems..

Today, we are very pleased that we finally offer a TPMS solution truly belonging to this digital generation!

We are an experienced team founded in Taiwan with strong technical and manufacturing capacity. Our members are experienced professional with telecom, automotive, and manufacturing backgrounds. Therefore, we have the full knowledge of building this safety device. 

We only have one mutual goal: lever the power of technology to break convention and solve important problems in life cleverly.

We have made this product from scratch. Finally, Perun TPMS becomes a reality.

Now, we need your help to make this product available for more people. Your sponsorship is a gesture of recognition and support which encourage us to go further. We are planning for more features, for example cloud processing system, and it will not be possible without your help.

We are inviting you now to join us in this TPMS innovation.

We have settled on the final version. Moreover, it has passed all required testing and is ready for mass production.

  • Our extensive experience and our manufacturing capacity allow us to deliver on scheduled. Although unforeseen incidents may still cause unexpected delay, we promise to do our best to keep it on schedule. In case of inevitable manufacturing delays, we will keep you updated and well informed.
  • The interface or function of the app or hardware might be slightly modified before shipment. Please rest assured that all updates are made for your better user experience.

​Yes, we can make it come true.

We only provide car version (4 wheels) in this campaign.
What comes in the box from Perun?

  • 4 Sensors
  • Tools: 4 anti-theft nut and 1 wrench
  • Identity QR code

*Shipping costs will be automatically calculated once you select a perk. Depending on where you live on the planet, the shipping cost and time will vary. 

*The perks will be shipped as gifts to your pledge in support of our crowdfunding  campaign. In case there are additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country, you may need to take care of them by yourself when receiving the shipment.  

If you are press, distributor or interested in the sponsorship,
you can reach us by email: service@perun-tech.com

 

Q: Is there any functional or accuracy differences between Perun and other internal tire pressure sensors?

A. Perun is an external device that performs the same to internal tire pressure sensors. It is very accurate in pressure and temperature, and we use the latest and the best chip available in the market so it is even better than most of existing products.  

 

Q: Is power consumption of Bluetooth high?

A. We use Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology which can reduce power consumption. In addition, we have special design on signal transmission, so it does not consume much power.

 

Q: Can one smartphone monitor several cars? 

A: We support multi vehicles to be monitored by one smartphone. Simply choose which ride you are taking today when open the app and start monitoring.

 

Q: Can I use other Bluetooth device while using Perun on my phone? 

A: Bluetooth 4.0 supports multiple devices and multiple apps, so you can use several Bluetooth device at the same time.

 

Q: What to do if I wash my car? 

A: Perun is built with strong waterproof design and it has passed IP67 tests. Just wash your car like you normally do, regular washing process will not affect the senor.

 

Q：If one of the sensor is not working, can I purchase a single sensor and replace by myself?

A: Yes. While most of the TPMS products on the market require you to send the whole set back for repair or replace, Perun is available in single so you can replace the sensor, reset your app, and you are ready to go. 

 

Q: Can I install Perun app directly on my head unit in car?

A: As long as your device support Bluetooth 4.0 and Android 4.3/iOS 7, the answer is yes. You can manually key in QR code while paring with a head unit. However, please note that our development and tests are based on smartphone devices, and thus we are not able to ensure our app can comply with all types of head unit.

 

Q: Does Perun TPMS have motorcycle or truck version?

A: We have motorcycle version, it functions the same as the automobile version, but we only provide automobile version as the perk in this campaign. Up to today Perun doesn't support trucks, but it is included in the future product development plan. If you are interested in the sponsorship, please send your inquiry to service@perun-tech.com.


Q: Can I use Perun if I have rubber valve stem?  Do I need to change to metal ones?

A: We have tested Perun sensors on regular rubber valve stems, and there have been no problems. However, please be aware of the condition of each valve stems because the rubber do age. We suggest you to check valve stems during routine maintenance, or you can switch them to metal ones. It is not a must, but a plus. 

 

Q: Do I have to have my tires balanced?
A: Tire balancing is only required for heavier sensors. Perun sensor is about 9g each and is within the tolerance range of 5g to 10g. Therefore, tire balancing is not required when you put them on. However, as time goes by, tires age, wear and tear and rim deformation might affect balance. We suggest you to check tire balance during each time of maintenance or tire alignment.

story:
Xfinitum® – Turn your mobile devices into the Ultimate Entertainment Machine

Compatible with iPhone, iPad, and Android operating systems

With a single touch, you can transform your smartphone into a full laptop replacement.  XFINITUM enhances the functionality of your smartphone or tablet by bringing you a whole new level of comfort and interaction. Work, study, web browsing, games, music and movies don’t have to be done from the palm of your hand anymore. 

While regular laptops and smartphones typically have one operating system like Windows, Android or iOS, Xfinitum works with multiple devices and different operation systems. This gives you the ability to watch movies, play games, browse the internet, and play music on laptop while the content is being processed by the computing power of your smartphone.

To connect your PlayStation or Xbox simply plug in the HDMI cable and use Xfinitum as a gaming laptop.

Why XFINITUM is better than regular laptops?

The biggest advantage of the Xfinitum device is that you won’t have to upgrade it anytime soon. Since the smartphone is the one running the apps, you won’t need to depend on the resources of Xfinitum to process them. The money saved from not having conventional computer components allows us to capitalize on elements that enrich your visual and audio experiences. The state-of-art IPS screen and 4:2 speakers are guaranteed to not be outdated in the long-term compared to regular laptops. The only device you’ll have to upgrade is your smartphone.

Modern smartphones are so powerful that they can handle console level graphics games. So why not take advantage of our anti-glare 1080p IPS screen? Enjoy the finer details like never before on the cutting edge 15.6’ or 17.3’ screen.

You can now plug your Nintendo, Playstation and Xbox consoles straight into Xfinitum and play from any location. Xfinitum expands the video and audio capabilities of gaming consoles and removes the space limitations of TV stands and bulky gaming setups. With Xfinitum, gaming consoles step into a new era of portable entertainment.

Wireless hard drive (up to 1TB)

Xfinitum can serve as a wireless storage device for thousands of movies, songs, photos, and files. With Xfinitum you will never run of storage on your mobile device. Expand your mobiles device storage with wireless memory of Xfinitum up to 1TB. Multiple devices can access the Xfinitum storage remotely and simultaneously, allowing friends and family to easily share large data.

Wireless card reader

On iOS devices and more recently Android devices, card readers and USB ports are not typically built-in. Xfinitum gives you a wireless card reader that you can use with any Wi-Fi enabled devices to copy and share files with your friends while expanding your iPhone and Android device’s storage.

Longest battery life ever

Xfinitum’s unique technology allows it to reach battery life of 73 hours on a single charge. It no longer matters if you forgot to charge your device overnight or left your charger behind – your productivity will not be held back for as long as a week. So wherever you go, whatever you do, you’ll always have a power supply for multiple gadgets in one package without the excess power adapters!

High quality low frequency sound

Equipped with 6 high fidelity drivers, Xfinitum gives you uncompromising listening experience with all of the essential high and low frequencies. Xfinitum will be your favorite mobile movie watching and gaming device due to the exceptional sound quality.

Screen

You can take full advantage of the bright, high-quality 15" or 17" IPS, anti-glare screen when watching movies, looking at your favorite pictures and playing games.

Have a look at XFINITUM in action

Our custom SDK compress and send mobile device data over wi-fi to the Xfinitum chipset.

Customizable desktop mode themes

Xfinitum open new doors for Android and iOS developers

Technical specifications

OUR TEAM

Xfinitum Pte. Ltd. is an innovative technology company based out of Singapore. First conceived in 2014, Xfinitum Pte. Ltd. was launched in 2015. The first project was a device that would replace traditional laptops. We decided to use a smartphone as the CPU, memory, and main processing unit instead of using standart laptop components. 

Developing the first prototype and raising the first round of start-up capital, Xfinitum Pte. Ltd. was officially registered in Singapore in April 2015. A truly global company, Xfinitum has since then picked up throughout Europe and Asia team members who are dedicated to creating a unique and modern device.

Most recently, Xfinitum Pte. Ltd. started working with factories in Vietnam and China, preparing for mass production and setting up connections with more than sixteen suppliers and manufacturers.

A technology development company first and foremost, Xfinitum is prepared for the road ahead, having accrued the tools and resources necessary to compete in this industry.

"Our mission is to offer alternative options to the costly and inefficient solutions that dominate the consumer electronic market today, and as a business, we are striving to achieve affordability and quality." Mikhail Prokudin, CEO of Xfinitum Pte. Ltd..

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP?

Xfinitum is just a first step. Our next step is the ultra slim 13inch Xfinitum, which is waterproof, has a touch screen, and boasts a huge onboard battery. It can become reality if each of us gets involved and does our part to make changes. You are so important to helping make this dream come true. We need your support to prove that new ideas can change the world!

Roadmap to delivery

FAQ

Is it a laptop running Android?

No, it is not running any OS on it’s own, in order to use the Xfinitum device you need to pair it with your smartphone, gaming console or Xfinitum's xDoc.

How does the phone connect to Xfinitum?

There are two ways to connect: wireless and wired connection. To connect wirelessly just download and install Xfinitum software from our website, open Xfinitum application and press the "pair" button. For wired connection simply plug in the cable into Xfinitum's hdmi port.

Will Xfinitum work with my smartphone?

It works with any Android 4.4+ and iOS 8.1+ mobile device.

Does the Xfinitum simultaneously charge my phone? 

Yes, you can simultaneously charge your phone because Xfinitum is equipped with 20.000-40.000 mAh high storage battery and 4 usb ports.

How does it connect to a PS4 and Xbox?

Turn on the Xfinitum and simply plug in the HDMI cable to the HDMI port and press the "switch mode" button.

CONTACT US

Have questions about Xfinitum?

Feel free to contact our support team on info@xfinitum.com, we are always happy to answer your questions.

For questions about your order, shipping & feedback

Contact our sales department on order@xfinitum.com.

For press, exhibitions, business inquires

You can download our press kit from our website. If you have business inquires or need more recourses please send your email to nikita@xfinitum.com.

story:
“Build a better mouse trap, and the world will beat a path to your door” 

Replace “mouse trap” with "phone mount" and now you have the mantra for the start of Clipster Phone Mount System.

How exactly is Clipster a "better phone mount"? 

First & Foremost: 

The "obsolete upgrade syndrome" is a vicious cycle which goes like this... 

  1. We buy a new phone.
  2. We buy cool accessories such as car mounts and arm bands and belt clips and bike mounts and other phone holders to park our new phone. 
  3. We upgrade our phone and... it all becomes obsolete! Repeat 1-3, over and over, again and again and again. 

Not a very efficient scenario for our pocketbooks. But, (we asked ourselves), "Self, what if we were to offer a universal adapter that could be attached to any phone for use with all kinds of mounting scenarios?"

Introducing Clipster! 

From hiking to biking, at home, office and on the go. 

A phone mount system for ANY phone, ANY place, forever!

Secondly: 

"This is Awkward" 

What about the adjustable mounts and the plastic pouch arm bands being sold in today's marketplace? Are they not universal? 

Well, sure but they are also clumsy and require multiple steps in order to mount and to dismount your phone. Our hands are busy holding and doing other things. We want a quick and easy way to grab our phones. We want simplicity! 

In walks Clipster!

The FIRST phone mount system with One Touch Lock & Release Technology! Easy on & easy off capability for today's busy multi-taskers.

Finally:

Phones fall! Screens break! 

What about magnetic mounts? They are both universal AND easy, right? 

Right you are! BUT life is bumpy! We can't trust our phones to a magnet while jogging or riding a bike or on your belt or backpack or purse.  

Clipster is a lock tight phone mount system. 

Your phone, locked safe and secure, just a touch away!  

Clipster is available in the following models:

Wall Clipster (Desk/Car)

  • One Touch Lock & Release - no switches, no rotating, no hassle
  • Tilts Up/Down & Rotates 360% 
  • Re-usable adhesive backing holds tight until detached and wash with warm water to relocate
  • Lowest profile & stylish modern design 
  • Built-in magnetic guides makes mounting simple & easy
  • (Adapter also mounts to magnetic mounts)
  • Locks tight and won't let go of your phone until you release 
  • Heavy duty construction withstands harsh conditions 
  • Polycarbonate/ABS, Vinyl & Stainless Steel hardware 

Belt Clipster (Backpack/Purse)

  • ONE TOUCH LOCK RELEASE - no switches, no rotating, no hassle!
  • Lowest profile & stylish modern design
  • Built-in magnetic guides makes mounting simple & easy!
  • Locks tight & won't let go until you release! 
  • Heavy duty construction withstands harsh conditions
  • Polycarbonate/ABS, Zinc-alloy & Stainless Steel hardware 
  • 2" clip is perfect for most belts, backpacks, bags, purses, sun visors, etc.

Bike Clipster (Bar/Stroller/Motorcycle)

  • One Touch Lock & Release - no switches, no rotating, no hassle
  • Rotates 360% & Tilt Up/Down
  • Adjustable to fit most any size bar
  • Soft rubber gasket holds firm to the bar without scratching
  • Lowest profile & stylish modern design  
  • Built-in magnetic guides makes mounting simple & easy
  • Locks tight and won't let go of your phone until you release 
  • Heavy duty construction withstands harsh conditions 
  • Polycarbonate/ABS, Vinyl & Stainless Steel hardware  

Sports Arm Clipster

  • One Touch Lock & Release - no switches, no rotating, no hassle
  • Lowest profile & stylish modern design  
  • Built-in magnetic guides makes mounting simple & easy
  • Locks tight and won't let go until you release them
  • Heavy duty construction withstands harsh conditions 
  • Polycarbonate/ABS, Vinyl & Stainless Steel hardware  

Car Clipster

(Suction for Dash/Windshield/Desk/Wall)

  • One Touch Lock & Release - no switches, no rotating, no hassle
  • Multi-Directional - Adjusts Up/Down, Telescopic, Rotates 360% & Tilts
  • Lock Tight Suction for use on car dashboard/windshield & home desk/wall/window/counter-top
  • Lowest profile & stylish modern design  
  • Built-in magnetic guides makes mounting simple & easy
  • Locks tight and won't let go of your phone until you release
  • Heavy duty construction withstands harsh conditions 
  • Polycarbonate/ABS, Vinyl & Stainless Steel hardware  
  • ALL Clipster models are compatible with all smartphone brands including Apple, Samsung, LG, HTC, Sony, etc. 
  • ALL Clipster models are compatible with all cell phone models including iPhone 7 Plus 6S 6 Plus 5 5S SE 4 3 2, Galaxy Note 5 4 3 2, Galaxy S8+ S8 Plus S7 Edge S6 Edge S5 S4 S3, etc.
  • ALL Clipster models are compatible with all cell phone case brands including Lifeproof, Otterbox, Mophie, Spigen, Tech21, etc
  • ALL Clipster models are compatible with all cell phone case models including Lifeproof Fre', Nuud, Otterbox Commuter, Symmetry, Defender, Mophie Juice Pack Plus, H2Pro, Helium, etc.

We are a husband/wife team and have been working as a small family business on this product innovation literally for years. Our hired design team are some of the sharpest product engineering minds in the world. We have contracted a production team and all together, we have repeated the testing process over and over again until we were all completely confident of the function, design and quality. 

Ready to rock the world! 

We aim to be a major brand with worldwide distribution in multiple channels. We have established long term relationships with a list of high volume distributors and plan to use our client base for an initial product offering. Then we plan to take advantage of our marketing expertise and eCommerce experience to grow sales incrementally while targeting brick & mortar retail, specialty, big box, kiosk and warehouse outlets. 

We have all the pieces in place and will soon go into full production and be on our way.

We can't do it without your support!

Without you, we are nothing.

Having you with us, we are everything. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out, share our story, make some noise about our campaign!!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it!!
story_txt:
“Build a better mouse trap, and the world will beat a path to your door” 
Replace “mouse trap” with "phone mount" and now you have the mantra for the start of Clipster Phone Mount System.
How exactly is Clipster a "better phone mount"? 
First & Foremost: 
The "obsolete upgrade syndrome" is a vicious cycle which goes like this... 

We buy a new phone.
We buy cool accessories such as car mounts and arm bands and belt clips and bike mounts and other phone holders to park our new phone. 
We upgrade our phone and... it all becomes obsolete! Repeat 1-3, over and over, again and again and again. 

Not a very efficient scenario for our pocketbooks. But, (we asked ourselves), "Self, what if we were to offer a universal adapter that could be attached to any phone for use with all kinds of mounting scenarios?"
Introducing Clipster! 

From hiking to biking, at home, office and on the go. 
A phone mount system for ANY phone, ANY place, forever!
Secondly: 
"This is Awkward" 
What about the adjustable mounts and the plastic pouch arm bands being sold in today's marketplace? Are they not universal? 
Well, sure but they are also clumsy and require multiple steps in order to mount and to dismount your phone. Our hands are busy holding and doing other things. We want a quick and easy way to grab our phones. We want simplicity!

story:
NEW INVENTION  

Olympic Race Sport Car (ORSC)

ENTERTAINMENT

Hello Winter, Hello Ice

I have invented and designed a new form of year round entertainment and muscle development. It is a car operated by hand and assists in building arm  muscles. This project  has been patented.

This car is the first in the world. It can run on the following:

  • The car can run on ice.
  • Its name is: Olympic Ice Racing Sport  Car (OIRSC)
  • Second car: can run on ordinary streets, its name is: Olympic Street Racing  Sport Car (OSRSC).
  • Third car can run on water, its name is: Olympic Water Racing Sport Car (OW RSC).

All these cars are for individual exercise and use:

  1. To strengthen chest, neck and hand muscles.
  2. Very enjoyable entertainment to enhance long winter, spring and summer hours.

Action plan

I seek to make a workshop to produce these cars but I need more than one hundred thousand dollars to accomplish this workshop and the necessary licenses.

After six months I will start to produce the cars.

  • After production and sales:
  • I will work to produce and improve these cars.
  • I will work to use the unemployed as much as I can.
  • It is my intention to allocate a portion of my profits:
  1. To cancer patients 7%.
  2. To dialysis patients7%.
  3. To handicapped people 7%.

small prototype for test:

Background:

My name is Ibrahim Jabr. I am a Mechanical Engineer & Physicist. . I arrived in Canada from Syria as a landed immigrant in February,2016 . I was warmly welcomed by the Canadian people.

It is my profound wish to give back to the Canadian people through my invention.

story:
People get smarter so technology has to keep up as well!

Do you call your friends still using this phone?

Of course not, because you have this:

And it is more than a phone. It is a smartphone not only because it can turn into your personal assistant but most importantly it changes over time so it meets your needs!

MyTeletouch knows the power of changing for the sake of comfort. For a second let’s just imagine that you have friends or family over for the evening and you want to brag about your new Smart TV – you saved in your YouTube account a funny video just for them yesterday and you want to show it on this big shiny screen when…

Option 1: you have to type in the browser the YouTube URL using the remote control… yes this small piece of plastic with no buttons for the letters so you have to endlessly click left and right or up and down to type a single word, then you have to type the password of your account to get in, then you have to navigate through the videos and try not to miss the one… you got the idea…everybody will be bored to death.

Option 2: you would have been wise enough to get your mouse and keyboard installed so you can use them; however, would you hold them in your lap for the rest of the evening and make plans how to get rid of the big chunky blocks in your hands… and what will happen if one of these devices is broken or runs out of batteries, would you go back to option 1?

Option 3: using MyTeletouch USB Dongle you can hold in your hand a wireless keyboard, mouse and gamepad altogether comfortably resting on the sofa having the ball with your friends and family. You will effortlessly type and navigate on your Smart TV and find this funny video for a short while. Everyone will be asking what this cool device is as it is so easy to use and really saves time.

MyTeletouch is a user-friendly device that eases the remote access to your Smart TV, computer or any media device. All you need to do is plug in MyTeletouch dongle, install the application on your phone and start using your phone the smart way! You can blog, search, update your Facebook status, find a YouTube video, play a game or post a tweet from the big screen of your smart TV because typing and navigating has never been so easy and comfy. You can also create a home cinema: use your beamer to project the movie on the wall and control your PC remotely when you don’t want to get up every time you have to adjust the volume or pause for a second. In addition, MyTeletouch will never and has never intended to kill the joystick by introducing the gamepad because all gamers know the feel and the experience is quite different. We wanted you to always have a plan B – a spare joystick when you need it that functions exactly the same way, especially when you have the Raspberry Pi that can turn it into a retro-gaming machine. Everything is as easy as this!

Why MyTeletouch is unique?

In a nutshell, we are not lazy but we like things simple and easy. MyTeletouch is the simple to use keyboard, mouse and gamepad that will never get old because we upgrade it on regular basis. We will also add new features for all tastes: movie lovers, business people, presenters and speakers, internet surfers or gamers – because we listen to the needs of every kind of user. That is why we are the only product of this kind available for Windows phones.

Why we need your support?

Last year we managed to ship a couple of MyTeletouch pieces to people all over the world. But to make it sustainable we need to reduce the product costs, improve the production cycle and start keeping quantities in stock, as well as work on the user experience and futures of the phone application – we have a future vision for adding voice commands, new skins, air mouse and what not. We want to constantly add value to each aspect of our customers’ daily life and make things easier when using their smart devices.

Together we can move MyTeletouch to the next level. Get your own MyTeletouch dongle and, help us fund this project.

Tech Specs

Mobile application with a simple and easy to use interface. Fast navigation between mouse, keyboard and joystick.

Search for the app: MyTeletouch

Available for:

  • Windows® Phone 8.1 or later
  • Android™ 4.3 or later
  • iPad® Air™ or newer, iPad® 2 or newer, iPad® mini™ or newer, iPhone® 4s or newer

MyTeletouch USB Dongle implements the following futures

  • Driver: Composite USB HID device
  • Mouse: 3-button mouse
  • Keyboard: Standard
  • Joystick: 5-button XY-axis joystick
  • Wireless range: 10m (33ft)

Supported Operating Systems

  • Windows® 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or later
  • Android™
  • Chrome OS™
  • Mac® OS™
  • Linux
  • USB port

Project Timeline

↓

27/11/2014 - IDEA - Startup Weekend Sofia Winners

↓

2015

↓

03/2015 - RESEARCH AND DEVELOPEMENT

↓

06/2015 - PCB AND DONGLE

↓

09/2015 - WINDOWS PHONE APP

↓

11/2015 - IOS APP

↓

2016

↓

02/2016 - ANDROID APP

↓

06/2016 - USER TESTS

↓

09/2016 - PRODUCTION PLANNING

COMPLETED

11/2016 - LAUNCH INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

↓

11/2016 - PILOT RUN PRODUCTION

↓

12/2016 - SHIP TO ALL BACKERS

↓

2017

Q&A

Is my Smart TV compatible with this product?

The keyboard is compatible with all models of SmartTV/devices that support the mouse and keyboard function. The documentation of your TV should mention this bit of information. Otherwise the manufacturer of the TV should be able to verify if the TV has this type of support.

The characters on the keyboard don't correspond to the characters that I type on the TV. How can I change the lay-out?

Make sure that the keyboard is supporting this layout, your TV is supporting this language and language is selected in your smart TV as an input language(s).

The steps to change the language layout vary per TV brand / model. You can usually find this in the settings on your TV, such as: System > Device Manager > Keyboard settings > Options Keyboard > Keyboard Language However, per brand / model, the above naming can be different.

When I use the YouTube app the keyboard is not working properly.

This keyboard should work with different apps. However, there is a known issue with some Smart TV's and keyboards from different brands, and the non-functioning of apps such as YouTube and Netflix We suggest to contact TV manufacturer for more information and possible solutions.

My touchpad is not working. What do I do?

Please make sure that your TV supporting HID mouse and keyboard is recognized by the TV also as HID mouse. Please check the properties of your TV to verify how the keyboard is recognized.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support our campaign, it's ok. You can help us by spreading the word to everyone you know using Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your support :)

story:
Overview

The unique and compact design of multi-functional all-in-one Bluetooth wireless Super Cuber X7 by Tronics Group is now ready to the world.  We have reshaped the keyboard like a Rubik's cube design for a new and easier way of typing, yet lightweight and user-friendly high quality of all-in-one keyboard/speaker/clock/etc...  This cube-shaped keyboard is easy and fun to use with a reliable wireless connection of the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology for everyday needs. 

Compatible with:  Apple iOS, Android, Windows, Mac,  Linux, and all others

 

 

 

 

 

THE NEW GENERATION OF THE KEYBOARD HAS BEGUN...

Tronics Group has reshaped the keyboard like a Rubik's cube design for a new and easier way of typing, yet lightweight and user-friendly all-in-one high quality of keyboard/speaker/clock/etc…
The big keyboards have inconvenient of mobility issues and much smaller keyboards have a tiny size of keys that brings an inconvenience of typing for larger hand users.
Those are the facts and reasons that we have decided to develop and modify the current keyboard and come up with a new product of Super Cuber X7 with an exciting ergonomic shape of the cube.

 

Small Yet Powerful Sound~

With a crystal clear sound, this will surprise you with the sound quality when you listen.  You may use our latest Bluetooth wireless connection, USB, flash drive, and micro sd card for your next hi-fi speaker or by using our 3.5mm audio in and audio out ports for your conveniences.

✔  Hi-Fidelity Speaker   40mm/4ohms/5W

✔  6 Preset Equalizer Music Modes

✔  Bluetooth Wireless True Range Minimum 33ft(10m) plus+

✔  Audio Line In & Out

 

The beauty of backlit...

It is very convenient to use Super Cuber X7 keyboard in dark place with this LED backlit.  It comes in 3 different colors.  If you just turn it on the LED backlit and it will enhance the beauty of your place.

 

Just sit back and get relax...

Don't forget to connect to your smart TV for a better internet browsing text inputs with this Super Cuber X7.  Yes, many of today's smart TV has Bluetooth and you may connect in seconds and enjoy your new experiences of smart TV.

How do you become a weekend couch potato? lol~~

Steps

  1. Prepare the couch potato spot. Choose the best place in the room for reclining in complete comfort. ...
  2. Prepare the sustenance. ...
  3. Prepare the couch distractions. ...
  4. Deal with the potential for distractions. ...
  5. Enjoy your sojourn on the couch. ...
  6. Bribe some servants. ...
  7. Exercise the couch potato way. ...
  8. Be a couch potato in moderation...
  9. Always keep your Super Cuber X7 next to you!

 

Take it anywhere...

Your new companion of Super Cuber X7 wants to go anywhere that you want to take like cafes, camping, traveling, home, office, and it will definitely share a good time with you.  Of course, we do provide you a micro-fiber material carrying pouch that you could clean or carrying...

 

Typing is easier than ever...

The layout of this QWERTY keyboard is the same as one of your normal keyboard except this is a portable, yet a unique way of ergonomic design of handheld typing experience with a touchpad mouse. Experience it, and we are very sure that you will love this device for your next enjoy of music listening and typing with the latest technology of Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connections.

 

Simple yet elegant looks...

This is an all-in-one multifunction device like a pandora box, yet it is simple to use with a cube-shaped design...

 

  • FLASHLIGHT/MOOD LIGHT> use this for a mood of your choice by pointing it on the wall.
  • AUX-OUT EARPHONE> just plug in your earphone for the peace of your own time.
  • HANDS-FREE CALLS>  use this feature in the car or anywhere for your next phone calls.
  • FM RADIO> time to time, you might wanna enjoy the relaxation of radio.
  • POWER BANK> supply to your phone in case of power shortage in an emergency.
  • RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM> for long hours of usage, it has 1800mAh Lithium battery and it will last you more than 16 hours of playback time.
  • ALARM CLOCK, DATE DISPLAY, TEMPERATURE, many other features.

 

 

 

 

Would you prefer Black or White finish?

We think the black color is more of a classic style and the white is simple and good choice for a modern style.  You could trust our high quality of piano lacquer finish of our Super Cuber X7!

 

Love of Super Cuber X7~

 

You may need this~

 

FEATURES of Super Cuber X7:

  • The keyboard of the Silica gel keyboard will prevent some EMF for your safety.
  • The soft-touch feel of stroke keys with silica gel keys.
  • As an all-in-one function, it is convenient for all users.
  • Very lightweight, easy to use by anyone.
  • Small yet very powerful hi-fi sound system.
  • Preset equalizer music modes that can be played by Bluetooth, USB, TF, and audio line in/out.
  • The latest technology of Bluetooth 5.0 for a faster, reliable, and auto reconnection.
  • The everyday need for an alarm clock, date, day, temperature display screen.
  • Hands-free calls are more convenient than ever.
  • Built-in microphone for easy hands-free calling.
  • The keyboard backlight is available so it can be used conveniently in dark places.
  • Mood light can also be used by LED-backlit.
  • The flashlight is installed in needs of assistance in need of anywhere.
  • The Super Cuber may use as a power bank supplier to your phone.
  • Built-in touchpad mouse and keyboard.
  • LED-backlit in 3 colors.
  • FM radio.
  • Voice prompts.
  • Piano gloss lacquer finish for black and white available.

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS:

 

Making of Super Cubers...

All tooling molds are completed and we are in progress of mass production!

 

TIMELINE

 

Words from our team...

Our team is very small yet very motivated with one goal in mind that is joining in the world of better technology as a part small or big. We are always pursuing to create the most inspiring designs of products where new ideas and technologies are imagined and brought to life. We will do our utmost efforts on every aspect of creating innovative ideas and promise to present the goods for the consumers, not as a seller’s concept.

This is the time that we need to ask your help, although we’ve been working with tears and joys to complete this product with one thing in mind that is present a good to consumers. That's the SUPER CUBER X7 and this is just the beginning. We are committed to constantly developing innovative ideas, and we have started this campaign because we need your support, so we could humbly join today's technology development world and that also may bring a better life to our next generations.

Asking your Support...

Our company and members are humbly asking your support and it will be imprinted in our hearts as a most unforgettable grace. We sincerely promise your supports and contributions will be shared and passed to others exponentially along with good hearts to the society of our today’s life.

 

Final package~

 

Indiegogo Exclusive Early Bird Special!

For thanking first 200 backers, we would like to add a special high-quality earphone as a token of appreciation for each pack.  The color of earphone will match to your backing orders(white or black).

SPECIAL 50% OFF

PLUS

HIGH-QUALITY EARPHONE GIVEAWAY SPECIAL!

 

Are we ready to ship?  YES

All orders will be ship worldwide by fast air-freight starting in October 2019.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help and support our campaign by sharing the word out:

Super Cuber X7 on Indiegogo link:   https://igg.me/at/supercuber

 

More details on our website:    https://www.tronicsusa.com

 

Watch our videos on Youtube:     https://youtu.be/vVG8ZQGlaK4

 

We truly appreciate having an interest in our product!

story:
Introducing Juice Card by exō, The Universal Magnetic Wireless Power Bank. Don't be fooled by deceiving bulky power banks claiming to be slim, exō Juice Card is currently the worlds thinnest at 10.5mm at 5000mAh. Designed to be so compact that its comfortable holding both your phone and Juice Card without compromise, So you can keep your devices charged wherever you go. 

 

Eliminate Anxiety and Stay Charged All Day

Juice Card Universal Power Bank allows you to be worry free, If you are out at an event, you don't have to worry about your phones battery lasting. When your out with friends at a restaurant and see your phones battery life dwindling, you don't have to get anxious and start looking for outlet. You don't have to get out of the present moment or stop having a good time because you are worried that you cant request an Uber home or check a subway schedule.

Magnetic Wireless Charging

exō is a certified wireless charging battery pack. That means, it's compatible with all Qi enabled devices, including your Air Pods. With a battery capacity of 5000mAh, Charge your device + Juice Card simultaneously over night and wake up to a full battery the entire next day. 

Car Vent Clip

exō Juice Card has integrated the use of a car vent clip for hands free charging and driving. By strategically placing a metal contact point on the backside of the Juice Card, simply place the back of Juice Card + Device on the magnetic vent clip. Allowing you to wireless charge the phone and still able to view maps or other apps while driving. 

Minimal & Light

exō weighs only 134g. It's so minimal and light, you won't feel it there. Also, since it can charge your mobile devices cable-free, you'll  never have a tangled mess in your pockets ever again.

Super Fast Recharge

exō features Dual Qualcomm3.0 Micro USB and Type-C port for super fast recharge. Equipped with Qualcomm 3.0 quick charge, works seamlessly with iPhone and Android devices at 7.5W power, respectively

 

Charge Two Devices

exō can charge up to two devices at the same time. One device wirelessly and the other with the included cable through its 3.0A Qualcomm USB port.

Warranty

While many other campaigns end their job after shipments, we go a step further and offer a 1 year warranty that covers defects in materials, faulty batteries and any malfunctions after you receive your Juice Card. We have a very close working relationship with our supplier network in China and are very confident in our quality control procedures.

 

Specs

Why you need Juice Card

Smartphone, bulky power bank, and charging cable. Having to carrying all of them at the same time can sometimes be a headache. How often have you left your cable behind by accident? Or too tired after work you forgot to charge up your mobile devices? exō has the simple everyday solution for all of these problems, so you can finally be free from all the tangled cables that bind you.

Universal Compatibility

Fulfillment

Introducing a new product to market is always scary. You have to make sure the risk is worth the reward. exō Juice Card is our 2nd product invention that has received a US Patent D825,456S. Our first invention was the exō wireless adapter for wired beats, US Patent 9,510,085. We have successfully sold this item on our own website and Amazon.com for the past 3 years. To limit the risks to Indiegogo backers, we have completed the manufacturing tooling before launching the campaign. The only other risk would be logistics, as shipping out rechargeable batteries has always been a safety concern. That's why  we've taken extra precautions for safety certifications and also hiring a safe logistics company to ensure the safe delivery of all your rewards.

story:
Introducing Eastern Collective's Cascade Cables, the Apple MFI Approved Lightning to USB C cables. It's time to ditch the dongles and enable Fast Charging on your Apple Devices today!

Welcome to the connection type of the future! By now everyone is more than familiar with a traditional Lightning to USB cable to charge your Apple devices. However it's time for the clunky USB connection to pass the torch to the universal USB C.

We have been designing Apple MFI Approved Charging Cables since 2012. This mean the Cascade Cables will be safe to use on all of your Apple iOS devices as Eastern Collective purchases authentic parts directly from Apple. 

The Cascade Cables will feature Apple's brand new c94 Chip, which allows third party manufacturers to now produce Lightning to USB C cables. Our certification has already been submitted and approved by Apple for the Cascade Cables

The new chip c94 also now enables Fast Charging through USB C for select iPhones and iPads. This means you will be able to charge your device up to twice as fast when using a Cascade Cable and 18w charger compared to the cable and charger that comes with your iPhone. 

Whether you are heading out the door in 15 minutes or you have an hour to grab a charge, get more out of your battery with the Cascade Cables.

Since Apple switched their Macbook line to strictly USB C ports, thousands of Apple users were forced to use dongles to connect their iPhone when using the cable that came in the box. It's time to ditch the dongles! 

Charge and sync your devices directly to your Macbook without any annoying dongles with the Cascade Cables. Plug the Lightning connection into your iPhone with the USB C compatible with any USB C port on your Macbook. 

The Cascade Cables will feature our signature rugged woven design. Each cable is wrapped in a tough nylon fabric material to add additional durability to each cable. 

The Cascade Cables will withstand more bending at your devices, wear and tear during your daily routine, and remain tangle free unlike the white plastic chargers!

You know the feeling when you want to use your iPhone while charging but the only outlet is out of reach halfway across the room. The Cascade Cables are 6 feet long which is two times longer than the Lightning Cable that comes with your iPhone!

Whether you are on the go, charging at home, or powering up at the office - always have the perfect size cable for any situation!

The Cascade Cables also feature ultra slim connection will allow you to easily charge and sync two devices side by side when using your Macbook Pro. No more bulky dongles that overlap your second port!

Plus protect your iPhone with your favorite case and still fit your Cascade Cable without having to remove it to keep charging! 

Your iPhone deserves a charging cable that looks just as good as the phone itself. The Cascade Cables feature four vibrant colorways with unique patterns. Pick the colorway that best fits your style or simply get one of each.  

No one needs a boring white charging cable! Color code your travel cable from your at home cable or know when your significant other steals your cable for the 1,000th time. 

Eastern Collective has been designing tech accessories with a design focused aesthetic since 2012. Our specialty has been centered upon Apple devices through Apple's MFI Program creating accessories from the 30 Pin Connector to Lightning Cables of all lengths and colors. Our signature woven design revolutionized charging cables in 2012 when all cables are simply boring solid plastic cables. 

Over the past 6+ years, we have worked with amazing retailers such as J.Crew, West Elm, Urban Outfitters, Restoration Hardware, Fab.com, Think Geek, Brookstone, and Nordstoms to name a few. Similarily our products have been seen across the globe in GQ Magazine, the Wall Street Journal, Uncrate, Vogue, Mashable, Wired, the Verge, Gizmodo, and much more.

We are excited to bring our newest collection to the Kickstarter community to kick off our next chapter in 2019.  

Shipping Information

Our estimated shipping date is early April 2019. You will automatically see the shipping rate per country once you make your pledge. Products will be shipped from the United States. Domestic transit will be 3-5 days with international transit time of 7-21 days depending on your location. Backers from other countries may see VAT or import charges depending on their local regulations, which is not built into the shipping costs. All tracking numbers will be sent within 24 hours of your order being sent.

Legal Disclaimer

"Made for iPod," "Made for iPhone," and "Made for iPad" mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod, iPhone, or iPad, receptively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards. Apple is not responsible for operation of this device or its compliance with safety and regulatory standards. Please note that the use of this accessory with iPod, iPhone, or iPad may affect wireless performance. iPad, iPhone, iPod, iPod classic, iPod nano, iPod touch, and Retina are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. iPad Air, iPad mini, and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

story:
ikola takes advantage of the iPhone 12's new magnetic feature. With its MagSafe support, just snap your ikola power bank onto the back of your iPhone and it will start charging your phone instantly. No cable, no hassle. It fits freely in any pocket and thanks to its powerful magnet, it can wirelessly charge your phone anytime, anywhere. It can also charge both your phone and itself at the same time when connected with  cable, becoming a convenient bedside table wireless charger for the night. Features 2 card slots where you can stow a credit card, ID, business card, club card, etc.

See how we make iKOLA in 2 weeks

 

Forget about your wallet

Give your iPhone a second battery

The iKola with MagSafe, designed for the iPhone 12 (pro/pro max), but also compatible with other phones. Lighter, slimmer, and more powerful than ever, the  is the power bank your phone has been waiting for.

10W Fast Charging PD and QC

The MagSafe provides the  iPhone with a charging power comparable to its original 10W charger, which can charge the iPhone to 80% in just 1 hour.

 

Wireless charging your airpod 7 times

iKOLA brings fully functioning surface of QI! Put your AirPod or other phone on the surface and get your charge with. 

Only one step

Auto absorb and stick when it close to the phone.

 

Forget about your wallet

Two (2) card slots where you can stow a credit card,
 ID, business card, club card, etc.

 

Charge it with lightning

Charge your phone and power bank at the same time.

Adapt oringinal case

Adapt to the original magasafe case for wireless charging.

 

 

Available in multiple colors

 

safety and stable

Smart chip keeps the safety and stable output charging.

Adapt to the original magasafe case for wireless charging.
 

 
Available in multiple colors

 
safety and stable


Smart chip keeps the safety and stable output charging.

story:
Summary

Renewable technology is taking over! Why not join in?

  • The Dual Solar Power Portable Charger can charge two different devices simultaneously. 
  • High Powered and fast charging sourced from sunlight.
  • Join in and start using Renewable Energy and know that you are helping the world become a more natural and better place.

The Device

  • High Quality Efficient Solar Panels collects sunlight and stores the power instead the device until you are ready to use it. Small, Portable, and Lightweight. Don't worry about carrying a bulky charger!


The charger comes in 5 different colors and everything you need to get started with solar charging.
  • Mini USB Connector
  • Micro USB Connector
  • 8 Pin USB Connector
  • 30 Pin USB Connector
  • 2.5mm USB Connector
    (Any USB you have can be used with this charger)
Our goal is to raise at least $20,000 to distribute the high powered solar portable charger. Help us spread the word about renewable energy and start using solar power to charge your devices!
