story:
What is tipit?

How often have you left a place without leaving a tip to that nice waitress/ waiter only because you didn't have any cash on you? 

Or, have you ever wondered where the tips go once added on a card machine or left on a table? 

Tipit is a mobile service that lets you send and/or receive tips directly to and from a bank account! 
Businesses will be able to operate a 'tipjar' policy but we support fair tipping and with tipit you will see exactly where your tip goes. 
It's safe and simple!

We need your help!

We have spent the last 12 months scoping the idea out, developing the prototype and investing in brand and design development. Now we are building the final solution but we need your help to get it to the market. 
Your contributions will help us to get it to the market. Our mission is to be the biggest mobile tipping service globally! 
We are looking to raise £50,000 to help us get tipit to the mass market. Your funding will help :
  • To launch the first real-life trial (aiming for June 2015!);
  • To carry out extra promotion so we can get it to the mass market;
  • To facilitate any additional improvements needed after the trial!

10% of your donation will be reserved and waiting for you when you set up your tipit account. Thus we are securing 10% for someone who you wish to reward with a tip for an extra lovely service. 

ALSO it is official & even more personal! We will run  a competition for two funder segments if you donate till official campaign closing date 3.04.2014, 12 am:

Segment number 1: contributing £1-£99 

Segment number 2: contributing £100-£1000

The Tipit founders mum, artist Mara Kalnina has kindly donated two original oil paintings from her collection that are currently on sale. The winner from the segment 1 will receive the small size painting (worth 300 euros) and the winner from the segment 2- large size (worth 700 euros). Winners will be able to choose from the paintings available! 

We will video record the announcement so it is fair and transparent! 

you can see Mara's artwork here https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mara-Kalnina/157... 

Benefits of tipit:

Tipit is safe & simple to use! This solution will:

1.  Provide an opportunity to receive a tip when clients don’t have cash (in emerging cashless societies those working individuals who heavily rely on tips increasingly face reduced cash in- flows = less income);

2.  Provide an opportunity for businesses to ‘sign off’ tips as a business expense thus contributing more to the tips and generating more income for waiters;

3.  Provide an opportunity for waiting staff to declare this as an oficial income to acquire mortgage, bank loan or other credit.

4.  Provide an opportunity to turn a shadow economy (cash-in-hand) into more formal and controlled environment. 

How tipit Works?


Create your account



Monitor your tips


Your Help Goes a Long Way!

If you can't support us financially don't worry. You will help us massively:

  • When you share and tell others about the idea;
  • When you follow us & like us thus helping us to generate the buzz! 
Follow us on 
Twitter: @just_tipit
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/justtipit
G+: +Tipit

story:
"If I had POMM - I could have saved myself needless distress & exposure,
now I want POMM for me & my son"

Sharon Perry, Israeli Jennifer Lawrence,
Welcomes POMM Smartphone Privacy Solution! 

"This is a real message to us all – we can regain control of our private stuff & protect our children from harassment & shaming".

As seen on TV: The world's first mobile-phone-case for securing, saving, and easily managing sensitive data; upgrading Android smartphones with biometric authentication, encrypted communication, vast isolated storage and secured apps

Pomm, annuling the claim "there’s no way of making a regular mobile 100% private", turns your mobile phone private adding to it important life-management functions, such as financial & medical file management, operation of electronic door locks and more!

Your platform for secure life management: POMM

POMM changes the rules of the game by turning smartphones into 100% private platforms, serving the growing need for digital life management. POMM currently offers biometrically-authenticated access and secure management and storage of files via a set of secured applications. 

Next year's release includes additional secured applications dedicated to managing wealth portfolio, financial records & medical files. These will be offered at special terms to POMM owners.

In addition, POMM owners can operate a set of highly secure, encrypted and remotely-operated electronic keys for doors, lockers, bicycles, and more.

With POMM – you decide what needs to remain private and secured

 

We believe that everyone has the right to keep personal and business data secured and private at their choice.

As digital users, we are all like moving targets for hackers on the search for sensitive private or business data stored on our mobile phones or backed up on Internet cloud storage services.

For the first time ever, POMM - Privacy-on-my-Mind - offers private and business users the highest level of mobile data security; by saving, and easily managing sensitive data on POMM patented, biometry-based mobile phone case.

The truth is – everyone needs a POMM!

 

With POMM, only YOU can access your content 24/7, anywhere on the globe, even if there is no cellular network or Internet available!

POMM arrives with integrated bio-metric and physiological sensors to authenticate its legitimate user, sense physiological/emotional stress and ensure utmost privacy, security and safety of your selected sensitive personal and business data.

Fast access is granted after face/palm biometric authentication to ten different data sections of personal and business information; such as passwords vault, various media, documents, contact lists, Secure Dials/calls and browsing history.

And it's so simple to setup and use

It's a 3-step easy process to setup and use POMM:

  1. Slip your Android smartphone into POMM electronic mobile phone case.
  2. Download the secured application/s at your choice from Google Store.
  3. Move all data you wish to secure to POMM isolated secure storage.
    (32 up to 256 GB).

That's it, you're ready to go.

Get 2-devices in 1- case

Encase your Android smartphone in POMM and get two devices in a single case!

One device is your smartphone, open to the public lines and acting as a fully updated commercial mobile phone;

The second is your POMM - a highly-secured; encrypted-data device that allows access only to you - its authenticated legitimate owner.

Your smartphone functionality remains intact and you can download any application and use it without damaging or affecting the security and privacy of the encrypted data stored exclusively on your POMM.

Order POMM and get:

  • All day power: POMM integrated backup battery increases mobile phone power by over 50%
  • Secure storage:
    • My-POMMTM 64GB;
    • POMMTM-PRO 128 GB (optional up to 256 GB)
  • Encrypted depository: data stored separately on isolated POMM memory
  • Leave no file behind or unsecured:
    • 32,000+ photos;
    • 20+ hours of video
    • 18,000+ songs ;
    • thousands of protected documents and emails
  • Secured set of apps for personal/business users - only you can access and manage on your mobile phone!
    • Secured Media (photographs, graphics and Videos)
    • Secured contacts;
    • Secured call dial records;
    • Secured calendar/diary;
    • Secured browsing history;
    • Secured POMM camera;
    • Secured passwords library: All your IDs/usernames and passwords in POMM super-secured data depository.
    • Secure library of documents;
    • Secure notes.

 

                         POMM Secure Apps Main Menu

 

Top-security unique features

  • Combined hardware and software protection:
    POMM isolated encrypted memory is secured via both hardware architecture and software algorithms to apply multi-layer security protection
  • Built-in malware check:
     POMM contains  a double-gate hardware between the  Smartphone and POMM, which hosts updated malware check for potential viruses and malware software
  • Dual-channel biometric sensors:
    POMM owns two built-in biometric sensor channels. The user can choose whether to activate either one of them or both:
    • face recognition and/or
    • hand wave gesture/in air-signature
  • Self-destruction feature:
    POMM  integral memory content includes a "self-destruction" feature that is operated in case of repeating invasive trials to open the case and invade its memory content

 

POMM PRO for business:

 

POMM-Pro for business has secure email communication capabilities with other POMM-PRO users and with company servers.

POMM PRO has 3 layers of certificates exchange and encryption, while still using the conventional cellular and internet infrastructures for data transfer. This enables employees and professionals to have constant communication globally with no extra charges involved.

 

 

Some interesting facts:

 

Most people spend $600-$1,000 on the latest Android Smartphone, and then generally additional $100-200 on accessories such as a case, external disk drive for backups and power solutions, etc. POMM comes with all of these and much more!

POMM protects your phone as a highly ruggedized sleeve, and in parallel it protects all your accumulated mobile data content and IDs from being exposed, stolen or misused.

Until POMM arrived, your only option to achieve mobile data privacy and security was to buy an expensive secured smartphone, costing thousands of US dollars, offered by a small set of companies. 

POMM allows you to upgrade your commercial Android smartphone at a fraction of the price saving up to 90% of the cost - and you can keep using your current smartphone for uses where security or privacy are of no importance to you!

 

We currently have a set of working prototypes and we're now focused on:

  • Finalizing the industrial engineering schematics for the final commercial product.
  • Designing high quality, lowest profile light weight plastic packaging.
  • Getting product certifications.
  • Designing the supply chain and production process
  • Industrial QC & Tooling
  • Materials and components procurement
  • Production process and contractors.

 

Why we need your support:           

We have been working on POMM for several years and we've come a long way. Your support will allow us to bring the product to production so we can make this revolutionary and much needed solution available to you and to millions of people. Let's make our digital world safer and smarter together.

So why should you support us?

  • Secure your own POMM. Verify that your private data does not get to the wrong hands
  • Be able to control you data and keep your private stuff in private
  • Support our teams in sending us feedbacks on the POMM usages and performance.

 Awards:

HORIZON 2020 – EU Program for Research and Innovation Framework

  Project No: FP7-610713; Project Acronym: PCAS; R&D Duration 2013-2016

The POMMTM you are pledging for has been developed and tested in several European centers under the European PCAS R&D project grant by a consortium of 7 partners for the past 3 years. POMM Inc. has initiated and took an active part in the prestigious PCAS project, managed together with the 6 additional EU leading research centers and technology partners.

More information on the project can be found here: http://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/110720_en.html

Exhibitions:

  • POMMTM was presented at MWC Barcelona 2017
  • POMM Inc. was Chosen at CES2017 Las Vegas, USA as one of the top 10 Cyber and Personal Security Companies to Watch for in 2017
  • POMM Inc. was chosen among one of the most Innovative Trends to Watch for 2017

 

Publications:

  1. HOW TO KEEP YOUR PRIVACY ON ANDROID
    "Unfortunately, there’s no way of making a regular mobile 100% private (you’d need to buy an expensive secure phone for that, and even then you might not be completely hidden)" -
    With POMM there is a way to make a regular mobile phone 100% private and much more! 
  2. POMM – THE MISSING SECURITY LAYER OF IOT
    The endless opportunities of IoT come with a price. With billions of devices connected together, what can people do to make sure that their information stays secure as well as private? If someone can hack into your toaster, and then get access to your entire network – this is a serious security breach...
  3. PRIVACY AND SECURITY FOR MOBILE PHONE USERS – IS THAT POSSIBLE?
    The power of a trustworthy information society must be based upon individuals empowered with full control over their personal data. This means eliminating the Big Brother Syndrome, unfriendly eyes tracking sensitive data, and criminal or otherwise undesirable abuse of users’ private information…
  4. HOW TO GET SMART ABOUT YOUR MOBILE SECURITY PRACTICES
    When the first IBM Simon smartphone debuted about 20 years ago, according to Business Insider, only a few could have imagined how indispensable these devices would become in our daily lives…

Read more: 
http://privatepomm.com/press-room/
http://privatepomm.com/blog/

 

The Team:

POMM Inc. experienced team brings to the project an impressive track record of development, production and marketing of electronics and mobile products.

 

 

POMM Product Specifications

Mechanics: Light, low-profile durable polymer smartphone case.

Communication:

·Comm. with smartphone - USB. Wireless NFC (optional)

·Comm. with ATM/Kiosk – NFC (optional)

·Internet access - POMM for security reasons has no direct access to the Internet, it is able to do that securely and indirectly through the user’s attached smartphone

·Encrypted Storage: MY POMM 64GB; POMM PRO 128GB (256GB – optional)

·Battery: My-POMM;1500 MAh rechargeable battery, My-POMM
External Display interface: Micro HDMI integrated connector

Authentication: Owner identification and bio authentication
POMM Security measures: Three levels of security mechanisms:

·Hardware - Biometric sensors, Tampering protection, Side-channel protection

·Firmware - Hardware implemented security mechanisms inside the Freescale CPU and its peripherals

·Software - Advanced Encryption algorithms, security certificates exchange, Passwords, Communication coding.

Biometric sensors: The following POMM integrated biometric sensors are available:

·Motion tracking - Integrated 3D accelerometer/gyro to recognize predefined hand motion registration pattern

·Face recognition - using a camera and advanced precise image processing with anti-spoofing protection

·Reading Blood Oxidation State - reading the blood oxidation concentration by integrated electro-optical oximeter sensor and advanced algorithm.

·Heart Beat rate recognition - reading and verifying the heart beats by using the same oximeter sensor.

·Body Temperature measurement - Integrated temperature sensor

Physical Dimensions and Power consumption:

·Surface Dimensions - enclosure surface dimensions are optimally fitted to selected smartphone

·Thickness - Max. 6-7mm

·Extended length over phone size - Max. 15mm

·Weight - Max. 70gr

·Material - Reinforced impact resistant injected Engineering Polymer case
Max. POMM back & touch panel temperature - 45 ⁰C

·Total power consumption - Nominal 4W, Max 7W

LEDs & Buttons: 

Power: Power main slide switch is located at the bottom of the POMM case.

·LED Green – Power On

·LED Blinking Red – Battery Low

·LED Yellow – Charging

IR LEDs: IR illumination LED, for face recognition camera low light conditios.

Secured applications selectable main menu partitions: Contacts, messages, photo/video gallery, secured camera, secured dials, secured calendar, secured notes and passwords, secured documents, secured emails (optional)

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

BUYING & SHIPPING

Do you offer a warranty?

Yes, we do - For 12 months.

How do you know which mobile phone model backers have to send the correct case?

At the end of the campaign, you'll get a survey asking you to choose a model, color and shipping address.

Which Smartphones are supported?

At present, for the crowdfunding campaign, we support two advanced updated smartphone models: Samsung Galaxy 8S and Samsung 8S+, More POMMTM models to fit to other Android phones will soon follow, to comply with other popular models from markets leading smartphone suppliers.

I've just backed you up, why I was not given a choice to choose color and model?

After the campaign will end, you'll get a survey asking you about the Galaxy 8 model, color and shipping address.

TECHNICAL

Will you send updates of POMMTM Android secured Apps?

Yes, we commit for one year of updates pay-free releases of our secured applications to fit Android new versions, downloadable through Google Play.

What about future mobile phones coming out to market?

POMM Inc. is committed to release POMMTM cases to fit as an electronic privacy management protective case to most market leading Android smartphones. The first POMMTMs released for the crowdfunding campaign will fit the recently released two Samsung popular advanced models; Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+

What are the differences between My POMMTM and POMMTM Pro for BUSINESS?

While the My POMMTM model is geared to serve the private data privacy and security daily management and data maintenance needs of the private user, the POMMTM Pro model is designed and geared to serve the professional business data secure management needs.

The POMMTM Pro will serve the professional lawyer, accountant, broker, executive manager and business owner daily needs to securely manage and always keep with them their daily emails communication between their smartphones their remote office. It will enable them to securely store and manage their communications with their clients and manage their sensitive work contacts lists and communications data with their customers in a highly secure and private way.                                                             

Here is the list of main special features of the POMMTM-Pro:

  • Maintaining and efficiently arranging fast and easy data retrieval to secure professional’s work/office information.
  • 128GB very large capacity flash based storage secure encrypted memory.(optional 256GB)
  • 2,200 mAh POMMTM Pro integrated backup battery
  • Google Play downloadable secure professional applications:
  • Secure confidential encrypted emails
  • Secure vault of owner’s service providers IDs data; usernames, passwords, PIN numbers
  • Secure notes
  • Secure camera - secret imaging gallery done through POMMTM internal camera.
  • Secure gallery of work sensitive collected pictures and videos
  • Secure work documents
  • Secure private documents
  • Secure contacts list
  • Secure secured dialed numbers
  • Secure browsing
  • Secure calendar
  • An integrated service enabling having a second free US non registered number
  • POMMTM Pro enable the user to have a second number to separate between work/business communication and private communication:
  • For POMMTM Pro users we offer a second free phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on your same smartphone, it also syncs across your devices, so you can use it while on the go, or at home. Use your smartphone registered number for your work/business calling number while forwarding private calls, text messages, and voicemail to your other free service phone number.
  • It also enables you to block numbers you don’t want to hear from. All these private calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.Your incoming private voicemail are also transcribed to have voicemail transcriptions so you can read in the app or have sent to your email. Cheap international calling – the user can make international calls from the second number at competitive rates without using his mobile data.

NOTE:   this second call number service is currently available only in the US. All calls made using the free phone number service for Android use the standard minutes from your current cell phone plan. The free number calls are placed through a US-based access number, which may incur extra costs (e.g. when traveling internationally)

HOW DOES IT WORK WITH

When I charge battery wireless, will it charge my mobile phone?

The POMMTM first released generation is not equipped with a wireless charging option. So the POMMTM matching smartphone can be charged wireless without the POMMTM attached to it, or it can be charged in parallel (Tandem Charging) through the POMMTM bottom edge integrated Micro-USB connector.

Will I be able to backup photos and videos from my POMMTM storage?

Yes. The available POMMTM secured Media storage space may hold for the user a practically unlimited amounts of secured and encrypted media files.

How does POMMTM’s integrated secure camera work?

The POMMTM has an integrated advanced generation digital compact video solid state camera installed within the lower end of the POMMTM case. It has a water sealed optical window and an adjacent IR illumination LED with a second window - geared to be illuminated while imaging the face or palm of the authenticated user. The secure camera is totally separated from the smartphone integrated cameras in order to ensure the secure generation of totally isolated imaging within the POMMTM required to authenticated user as well as for supporting the secured app of generated secure images done through the secure camera that are stored in a separate secure photographs partition in the POMMTM secured encrypted memory not related to the secure media memory content derived from external imaging resources.

Does POMMTM connect to the internet?

POMMTM is totally isolated from the Internet to comply with leading hardware based security management solutions and restrictions. The POMMTM has no IP address so hackers cannot get direct access to its content. The smartphone attached to it is isolated from the POMMTM through a double-door isolation mechanism that is part of the secured android set of applications to be installed on the smartphone through the POMMTM installation procedure that is geared to lock any new incoming file and checks it for malware, viruses and any suspicious data content and rejects this data from entering the POMMTM secure isolated content.

OTHER QUESTIONS

What are the challenges?

We are doing something that has never been done before: a completely revolutionary solution like nothing else in the market. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. Soon, POMM devices will be securing mobile data and allowing people to get back control over their data like never before.

Any more questions? Ask away!

We hope you join us.

Self-destruction feature:POMM  integral memory content includes a "self-destruction" feature that is operated in case of repeating invasive trials to open the case and invade its memory content

This enables employees and professionals to have constant communication globally with no extra charges involved.  Some interesting facts: Most people spend $600-$1,000 on the latest Android Smartphone, and then generally additional $100-200 on accessories such as a case, external disk drive for backups and power solutions, etc. POMM comes with all of these and much more!POMM protects your phone as a highly ruggedized sleeve, and in parallel it protects all your accumulated mobile data content and IDs from being exposed, stolen or misused.Until POMM arrived, your only option to achieve mobile data privacy and security was to buy an expensive secured smartphone, costing thousands of US dollars, offered by a small set of companies. POMM allows you to upgrade your commercial Android smartphone at a fraction of the price saving up to 90% of the cost - and you can keep using your current smartphone for uses where security or privacy are of no importance to you!  We currently have a set of working prototypes and we're now focused on:Finalizing the industrial engineering schematics for the final commercial product.
Designing high quality, lowest profile light weight plastic packaging.
Getting product certifications.
Designing the supply chain and production process
Industrial QC & Tooling
Materials and components procurement
Production process and contractors.
 Why we need your support:           We have been working on POMM for several years and we've come a long way. Your support will allow us to bring the product to production so we can make this revolutionary and much needed solution available to you and to millions of people. Let's make our digital world safer and smarter together.So why should you support us?
Secure your own POMM. Verify that your private data does not get to the wrong hands
Be able to control you data and keep your private stuff in private
Support our teams in sending us feedbacks on the POMM usages and performance.
 Awards:HORIZON 2020 – EU Program for Research and Innovation Framework  Project No: FP7-610713; Project Acronym: PCAS; R&D Duration 2013-2016The POMMTM you are pledging for has been developed and tested in several European centers under the European PCAS R&D project grant by a consortium of 7 partners for the past 3 years. POMM Inc. has initiated and took an active part in the prestigious PCAS project, managed together with the 6 additional EU leading research centers and technology partners.More information on the project can be found here: http://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/110720_en.htmlExhibitions:
POMMTM was presented at MWC Barcelona 2017

POMM Inc. was Chosen at CES2017 Las Vegas, USA as one of the top 10 Cyber and Personal Security Companies to Watch for in 2017

POMM Inc. was chosen among one of the most Innovative Trends to Watch for 2017

 Publications:

HOW TO KEEP YOUR PRIVACY ON ANDROID"Unfortunately, there’s no way of making a regular mobile 100% private (you’d need to buy an expensive secure phone for that, and even then you might not be completely hidden)" -With POMM there is a way to make a regular mobile phone 100% private and much more! 


POMM – THE MISSING SECURITY LAYER OF IOTThe endless opportunities of IoT come with a price. With billions of devices connected together, what can people do to make sure that their information stays secure as well as private? If someone can hack into your toaster, and then get access to your entire network – this is a serious security breach...

PRIVACY AND SECURITY FOR MOBILE PHONE USERS – IS THAT POSSIBLE?The power of a trustworthy information society must be based upon individuals empowered with full control over their personal data. This means eliminating the Big Brother Syndrome, unfriendly eyes tracking sensitive data, and criminal or otherwise undesirable abuse of users’ private information…

HOW TO GET SMART ABOUT YOUR MOBILE SECURITY PRACTICESWhen the first IBM Simon smartphone debuted about 20 years ago, according to Business Insider, only a few could have imagined how indispensable these devices would become in our daily lives…
Read more: http://privatepomm.com/press-room/http://privatepomm.com/blog/ The Team:POMM Inc. experienced team brings to the project an impressive track record of development, production and marketing of electronics and mobile products.  POMM Product SpecificationsMechanics: Light, low-profile durable polymer smartphone case.Communication:·Comm. with smartphone - USB. Wireless NFC (optional)·Comm. with ATM/Kiosk – NFC (optional)·Internet access - POMM for security reasons has no direct access to the Internet, it is able to do that securely and indirectly through the user’s attached smartphone·Encrypted Storage: MY POMM 64GB; POMM PRO 128GB (256GB – optional)·Battery: My-POMM;1500 MAh rechargeable battery, My-POMMExternal Display interface: Micro HDMI integrated connectorAuthentication: Owner identification and bio authenticationPOMM Security measures: Three levels of security mechanisms:·Hardware - Biometric sensors, Tampering protection, Side-channel protection·Firmware - Hardware implemented security mechanisms inside the Freescale CPU and its peripherals·Software - Advanced Encryption algorithms, security certificates exchange, Passwords, Communication coding.Biometric sensors: The following POMM integrated biometric sensors are available:·Motion tracking - Integrated 3D accelerometer/gyro to recognize predefined hand motion registration pattern·Face recognition - using a camera and advanced precise image processing with anti-spoofing protection·Reading Blood Oxidation State - reading the blood oxidation concentration by integrated electro-optical oximeter sensor and advanced algorithm.·Heart Beat rate recognition - reading and verifying the heart beats by using the same oximeter sensor.·Body Temperature measurement - Integrated temperature sensorPhysical Dimensions and Power consumption:·Surface Dimensions - enclosure surface dimensions are optimally fitted to selected smartphone·Thickness - Max. 6-7mm·Extended length over phone size - Max. 15mm·Weight - Max. 70gr·Material - Reinforced impact resistant injected Engineering Polymer caseMax. POMM back & touch panel temperature - 45 ⁰C·Total power consumption - Nominal 4W, Max 7WLEDs & Buttons: Power: Power main slide switch is located at the bottom of the POMM case.·LED Green – Power On·LED Blinking Red – Battery Low·LED Yellow – ChargingIR LEDs: IR illumination LED, for face recognition camera low light conditios.Secured applications selectable main menu partitions: Contacts, messages, photo/video gallery, secured camera, secured dials, secured calendar, secured notes and passwords, secured documents, secured emails (optional) Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)BUYING & SHIPPINGDo you offer a warranty?Yes, we do - For 12 months.How do you know which mobile phone model backers have to send the correct case?At the end of the campaign, you'll get a survey asking you to choose a model, color and shipping address.Which Smartphones are supported?At present, for the crowdfunding campaign, we support two advanced updated smartphone models: Samsung Galaxy 8S and Samsung 8S+, More POMMTM models to fit to other Android phones will soon follow, to comply with other popular models from markets leading smartphone suppliers.I've just backed you up, why I was not given a choice to choose color and model?After the campaign will end, you'll get a survey asking you about the Galaxy 8 model, color and shipping address.TECHNICALWill you send updates of POMMTM Android secured Apps?Yes, we commit for one year of updates pay-free releases of our secured applications to fit Android new versions, downloadable through Google Play.What about future mobile phones coming out to market?POMM Inc. is committed to release POMMTM cases to fit as an electronic privacy management protective case to most market leading Android smartphones. The first POMMTMs released for the crowdfunding campaign will fit the recently released two Samsung popular advanced models; Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8+What are the differences between My POMMTM and POMMTM Pro for BUSINESS?While the My POMMTM model is geared to serve the private data privacy and security daily management and data maintenance needs of the private user, the POMMTM Pro model is designed and geared to serve the professional business data secure management needs.The POMMTM Pro will serve the professional lawyer, accountant, broker, executive manager and business owner daily needs to securely manage and always keep with them their daily emails communication between their smartphones their remote office. It will enable them to securely store and manage their communications with their clients and manage their sensitive work contacts lists and communications data with their customers in a highly secure and private way.                                                             Here is the list of main special features of the POMMTM-Pro:
Maintaining and efficiently arranging fast and easy data retrieval to secure professional’s work/office information.
128GB very large capacity flash based storage secure encrypted memory.(optional 256GB)
2,200 mAh POMMTM Pro integrated backup battery
Google Play downloadable secure professional applications:


Secure confidential encrypted emails
Secure vault of owner’s service providers IDs data; usernames, passwords, PIN numbers
Secure notes
Secure camera - secret imaging gallery done through POMMTM internal camera.

Secure gallery of work sensitive collected pictures and videos
Secure work documents
Secure private documents
Secure contacts list
Secure secured dialed numbers
Secure browsing
Secure calendar
An integrated service enabling having a second free US non registered number
POMMTM Pro enable the user to have a second number to separate between work/business communication and private communication:

For POMMTM Pro users we offer a second free phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on your same smartphone, it also syncs across your devices, so you can use it while on the go, or at home. Use your smartphone registered number for your work/business calling number while forwarding private calls, text messages, and voicemail to your other free service phone number.
It also enables you to block numbers you don’t want to hear from. All these private calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.Your incoming private voicemail are also transcribed to have voicemail transcriptions so you can read in the app or have sent to your email. Cheap international calling – the user can make international calls from the second number at competitive rates without using his mobile data.

NOTE:   this second call number service is currently available only in the US. All calls made using the free phone number service for Android use the standard minutes from your current cell phone plan. The free number calls are placed through a US-based access number, which may incur extra costs (e.g. when traveling internationally)HOW DOES IT WORK WITHWhen I charge battery wireless, will it charge my mobile phone?The POMMTM first released generation is not equipped with a wireless charging option. So the POMMTM matching smartphone can be charged wireless without the POMMTM attached to it, or it can be charged in parallel (Tandem Charging) through the POMMTM bottom edge integrated Micro-USB connector.Will I be able to backup photos and videos from my POMMTM storage?Yes. The available POMMTM secured Media storage space may hold for the user a practically unlimited amounts of secured and encrypted media files.How does POMMTM’s integrated secure camera work?The POMMTM has an integrated advanced generation digital compact video solid state camera installed within the lower end of the POMMTM case. It has a water sealed optical window and an adjacent IR illumination LED with a second window - geared to be illuminated while imaging the face or palm of the authenticated user. The secure camera is totally separated from the smartphone integrated cameras in order to ensure the secure generation of totally isolated imaging within the POMMTM required to authenticated user as well as for supporting the secured app of generated secure images done through the secure camera that are stored in a separate secure photographs partition in the POMMTM secured encrypted memory not related to the secure media memory content derived from external imaging resources.Does POMMTM connect to the internet?POMMTM is totally isolated from the Internet to comply with leading hardware based security management solutions and restrictions. The POMMTM has no IP address so hackers cannot get direct access to its content. The smartphone attached to it is isolated from the POMMTM through a double-door isolation mechanism that is part of the secured android set of applications to be installed on the smartphone through the POMMTM installation procedure that is geared to lock any new incoming file and checks it for malware, viruses and any suspicious data content and rejects this data from entering the POMMTM secure isolated content.OTHER QUESTIONSWhat are the challenges?We are doing something that has never been done before: a completely revolutionary solution like nothing else in the market. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. Soon, POMM devices will be securing mobile data and allowing people to get back control over their data like never before.Any more questions? Ask away!We hope you join us.

story:
Short message from CEO, Les Toft

Nudipay is LIVE and ready to launch. All our development is done. This crowdfunding campaign is to find beta testers to put Nudipay through its paces.

The reason why mobile payments haven't taken off is because so few merchants are accepting it. And the reason why they're not, is it's going to chew into profits even more. And I'm talking about 'mom and pop' stores.

Let's appreciate their predicament. An owner operator, a average business owner nets app 10.3% profit. This means, for every thousand dollars they pay in bank fees, they have to turnover $10,000 in their business. Now that's a lot of work.

As a business owner, I faced the exact same challenges. So I decided to do something about it.

We wanted to create a mobile payments platform with the barest of fees. That's how we got our name.

Nudipay is ZERO cost to join. ZERO cost to keep the account. The merchant only pays when a transaction is completed and the fees are super low (flat 15¢). Also no equipment for a merchant to buy, they can use the equipment they have in their store now. Never a fee for a friend to friend transfer.

Mobile payments is all we do. We're not a search company trying to add another string to their bow, or a smartphone manufacturer trying to sell more phones. We have complete freedom and a complete focus to give customers exactly what they want.

We're the only mobile payments company setup to service 100% of the market. You see, not everyone has a smartphone. Google and Apple have no interest in these customers. In the USA and Europe, that's about 660 million customers completely ignored by these companies - customers that buy stuff.

It's crazy!

At Nudipay, we believe everyone should be able to use their mobile phone to pay for stuff.

Unlike other mobile payment apps that are limited to the phones they can be on, Nudipay is available on all smartphones and non-smartphones, tables, laptops, computers.

Servicing 100% isn't visionary - it's just good business.

WE NEED INDIEGOGO BETA TESTERS


Indiegogo beta testers are at Ground Zero with Nudipay. 

We think our technology is already cool. Your input is going to give us a chance to make it even cooler.

We have a host of different rewards to meet the different needs of our backers - something for everybody. 

It's going to be a great adventure, and you can be part of it. Join us..

The Impact

With your support we will make sure that we have the best mobile payment app on the market. It will be a boost to all small businesses and you as a consumer you will have a mobile wallet you can use everywhere for everyday purchases and friend to friend transfers.

  • Our app will help small businesses around the world not just the USA
  • The more people we have sign up and help us test the app, the more financial backers will want to invest. 
  • With Nudipay consumers will not need to be dependent on banks and credit cards, you will have more independence.
  • We have four cool technologies like GEO Location of Stores, SMS Payments, Loyalty Points to help Businesses Grow and TAG Super Fast Pay.  We will be developing more as we grow to make your life easier. Like being able to track you're weekly or monthly expenses, helping you live in your budget and so much more.
  • A system that can be used not only in the USA, Australia, and UK but around the world.
Nudipay makes it all possible!


Risks & Challenges

Nudipay is about creating real change in the world, but having fun along the way. Our challenge is finding beta testers to assist us with a proper testing. But we also need some funds to help meet expenses. That's the vibe. Now we need our 'tribe'.

Nudipay is LIVE now! And we're ready to launch. All our development is done.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

The FormKey L.L.C., through theformkey.com, helps make the moving process quick and easy by: 
  • providing you with important information; 
  • helping you fill out and file your moving paperwork; 
  • reminding you of important dates and deadlines.

The idea behind The FormKey L.L.C. sprang out of a conversation between Allison and Robert, two friends who met in law school.  After graduation, Robert was accepted into business school two weeks before his program started, which meant he had two weeks to pack-up and move across the country.  About a week after he finished unpacking in New York, he received a cable bill from New Orleans.  

After arguing with the cable company, Robert called Allison to complain (the mistake cost him $120).  Allison had a story of her own.  Earl, her dachshund, was kicked out of a Houston dog park for not having his city tags.  Even though he was up-to-date on all of his shots, he wasn't allowed to play until Allison paid the registration fee and filed the right form.

After talking with their personal networks and doing additional market research, they realized that their experiences were normal.  The moving process is stressful, and most people don't do it frequently enough to really master the process.  

The FormKey L.L.C. is here to help!  With your support, we can put to work Robert and Allison's combined experiences, including: years in the real estate industry, experience in state government and regulation, two law licenses, and a business education.  Help us make your next move easy!

Make sure to check-out our Facebook page and website for pictures of the team, bios, and frequent updates!

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking at least $25,000 through this campaign.  

Half of this amount will go towards our creative team who is working hard to bring our vision to life and to link the user friendly front end to our highly technical back end database.  The rest of the funds raised will go towards basic operating costs to support our company through the launch of our service: advertising/marketing expenses, employee salaries, server rental fees, software licensing fees, and office materials.  

To show our appreciation for believing in us, we have developed some exciting "perks" for our generous contributors.  Ranging from recognition on our "Founder's Wall" to a three-month internship experience, we have designed our perks to offer something of value at each contribution level.  Please check-out our perks page for a complete description of each perk!

We are dedicated to our mission and our service, regardless of whether we reach our full funding goal.  If we don't reach our goal, we will use the funds we do raise to support the launch of our service.  

The Impact

For anyone who has ever had the misfortune of being caught with out-of-date documents, you know the financial and personal repercussions of letting moving paperwork slip your mind.


For everyone else, the consequences of forgetting to update your address, schedule utility service connections, etc. can be quite severe.  Forgetting to schedule an internet service connection before you move can lead to weeks without internet access in your new home.  Unpaid bills going to the wrong address can lead to late payment fees or collections proceedings. Getting caught with an out of date driver's license can lead to tickets, fines, and in some states criminal charges.  


By bringing all of the important information to one spot and making the whole process convenient and user friendly, The FormKey team will help you get settled in your new home and avoid the negative consequences that can come with failing to update your information.

Risks & Challenges

Quagmire is the word that comes to mind when describing the regulatory framework within the United States.  Every state and every city has a unique set of rules and procedures.  Thankfully, Robert, Allison, and The FormKey team are up for the challenge to turn the moving mess into an easy-to-navigate process.  

Both practicing attorneys, Robert and Allison are masters at figuring out confusing paperwork, but their connection to the moving process runs deeper than that.  As a former real estate broker, Robert knows that people need to get settled into a new home.  Allison has a wealth of experience interacting with regulatory agencies and state government.  

Most importantly, however, Robert and Allison have moved a collective ten times in the last five years, covering four states!  Through personal experience, including a few mistakes, we know the common pitfalls that accompany the moving process.
We're here to help!

Other Ways You Can Help

Remember that if you can't help fund us personally, there are still a lot of ways to help!  The more people who know about our campaign, the better chance we have at meeting and exceeding our funding goal.  Please take the time to tell your friends and neighbors about our exciting new service.  You can use the Indiegogo sharing tools to make the process of getting the word out quick and easy!

story:
WHAT IS BBN?

We are building the first and only bicycling dedicated television network!

Bicycling has changed by leaps and bounds since the development of the BMX and the mountain bike. It’s evolved today into such a wide-angled sport that various competitions and events have been developed just to accommodate innovations constantly taking place.

But that’s just the tip of the two-wheeled iceberg. Riding alongside its sporting aspect is bicycling’s intensely increasing popularity around the world as a chosen form of transportation. Fossil fuel-free, easy on maintenance, and healthy, the bicycle is the ride of the present and the future.

Unlike other sports, however, bicycling has not been given the exposure it deserves even though it has become a part of everyday living. High time it was given a spotlight of its own.

The Bicycle Broadcasting Network (BBN) is on a mission to bring both the sport and the vehicle to the living room. We envision creating and operating a single-sport TV network dedicated to the world of cycling and its three big aspects: leisure, competition, and commuting.

People, events, innovations, products, destinations. BBN aims to deliver all the news, updates, and information on the bicycling world, increasing media coverage of cycling by broadcasting 24/7 on bicycles and bicycling through cable TV, satellite, broadband mobile, and Internet streaming.

With this vision, BBN aims to promote bicycling and invite everyone to "Pedal Where the Road Leads” 

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS WANT

In the past two years our team has been doing independent research, consulting cyclists and members of the bicycle industry about what they would like to see on TV. Their viewing wishes included:

·  coverage of international/domestic races and events 

·  great places to ride and cycling news from around the world

·  bike maintenance and safety, products and equipment updates

·  insights on fashion and fitness, travel destinations, kids cycling

·  and everything that deals with cycling.

Our customers include:

·  millions of U.S. cable TV subscribers who love to watch races and cycling events

·  the more than 48 million U.S. citizens who ride bikes

·  bicycle and equipment manufacturers from all over the world

·  retail bike shops where people go to see, touch, test, and buy their bikes

·  corporate advertisers and sponsors who sell their products to athletes

HOW TO ACCESS BBN

BBN will use several forms of media to reach its audience.

1. Cable TV and Satellite. In our first seven years of operation we plan to obtain lease agreements and broadcast our network on the top five U.S. cable TV companies and major satellite providers. Cable TV and satellite have a combined audience of more than 60 million subscribers.

2. Mobile devices.

3. Internet streaming sources likes Apple TV, HULU, ROKU, etc.

4. Distribution  of media rights agreements with foreign cable, satellite, mobile, and Internet services.

WHY WE NEED YOU

To make BBN happen, we need your help. We are a small team and have so far been entirely self-funded through our research and development stages. The money we raise from your gift will help us to fund Phase 1 of our project and be used to pay for initial production and operating costs. These expenses include office space, office equipment, working capital, and fees.

               

THE CORE TEAM

The Bicycle Broadcasting Network is composed of broadcasting and film industry professionals who are dedicated to their craft.

1.  James Evora – Founder/President

James’ background covers over 35 years of broadcasting in both radio and television. Recently, Jamie has been working in the bicycling industry as a sales manager and has been involved in community outreach for a national bicycle chain in San Francisco.

2.  Keith A. Jenkins - Co Founder/Senior VP

Keith has over 20 years of broadcasting and film experience in the San Francisco Bay Area and Michigan.

3.  Glenn Foster – VP Production

Glenn brings 30 years of professional experience in the field of entertainment services at NBC-TV in Burbank, CA, CBS-TV in Hollywood, CA, and ABC Television’s Entertainment Marketing Department. Glenn was a recipient of an EMMY Award as Technical Director for NBS Sports and two Platinum Albums from Priority Records for commercial editing.

4.  Henry Joseph – Director Field Operations

Henry has over 20 years experience as an Instructor and Video Broadcast Operations Specialist.

5.  Vivian Tran – CSR/Road Racer

 Vivian is a rider for Lost Dog Cycling Team, E4 road racer; Collegiate racer for Triathlon & Cycling at SF State, B road racer. 4 years of experience in cycling, 2 years of on and off competitive cycling.

6.  Yao Saetern – Broadcast technical staff/Road Racer

Yao is a Data Manager and Photographer in Berkeley, CA. A rider for the Lost Dog Cycling Team, E4 road, E5 track; and the San Francisco State Gators Triathlon/Cycling Club, Men's B road, and has over 6 years of recreational and competitive cycling experience.

7.  Isaac Fowler–Broadcast technical staff

WHAT YOU COULD DO TO HELP

Your support will allow the Bicycle Broadcasting Network to move our project forward, leading to the first day of on-air broadcasting. To back our projects, please take the following actions:

1.  Check out our rewards page

2.  Pick a reward you like and contribute

3.  Email you family and friends about our project and bring them on board

4.  Tell everyone you know about our project

5.  Share our crowd funding site on your FaceBook wall

6.  Tweet it to your followers

7.  Instagram our crowd funding video and share it with the world.


OUR COMMITMENT TO YOU

We promise to communicate with our supporters and keep them informed and up-to-date on our progress and future steps.

Any pledge amount will take us one step closer to our business goal.

Help take us from Vision to Reality.

All of us at the Bicycle Broadcasting Network thank you for your support.
story_txt:
WHAT IS BBN?
We are building the first and only bicycling dedicated television network!Bicycling has changed by leaps and bounds since the development of the
BMX and the mountain bike. It’s evolved today into such a wide-angled sport
that various competitions and events have been developed just to accommodate
innovations constantly taking place. 
But that’s just the tip of the two-wheeled iceberg. Riding alongside its
sporting aspect is bicycling’s intensely increasing popularity around the world
as a chosen form of transportation. Fossil fuel-free, easy on maintenance, and
healthy, the bicycle is the ride of the present and the future. 
Unlike other sports, however, bicycling has not been given the exposure
it deserves even though it has become a part of everyday living. High time it
was given a spotlight of its own.



The Bicycle Broadcasting Network (BBN) is on a mission to bring both the
sport and the vehicle to the living room. We envision creating and operating a
single-sport TV network dedicated to the world of cycling and its three big
aspects: leisure, competition, and commuting. 

People, events, innovations, products, destinations. BBN aims to deliver
all the news, updates, and information on the bicycling world, increasing media
coverage of cycling by broadcasting 24/7 on bicycles and bicycling through cable TV, satellite, broadband mobile, and Internet streaming.
With this vision, BBN aims to promote bicycling and invite everyone to "Pedal Where
the Road Leads”  


WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS WANT
In the past two years our team has
been doing independent research, consulting cyclists and members of the bicycle
industry about what they would like to see on TV. Their viewing wishes
included: ·  coverage of international/domestic
races and events  
 ·  great places to ride and cycling news from around the world 
·  bike maintenance and safety, products and equipment updates

·  insights on fashion and fitness, travel destinations, kids cycling·  and everything that deals with
cycling.  


Our customers include: 
·  millions of U.S. cable TV subscribers who love
to watch races and cycling events 
·  the more than 48 million U.S. citizens who ride bikes
·  bicycle and equipment manufacturers from all over the world 
·  retail bike shops where people go to see,
touch, test, and buy their bikes 
·  corporate advertisers and sponsors who sell their
products to athletes

HOW TO
ACCESS BBN
BBN will use several
forms of media to reach its audience.
1. Cable TV and Satellite.
In our first seven years of operation we plan to obtain lease agreements and
broadcast our network on the top five U.S. cable TV companies and major
satellite providers. Cable TV and satellite have a combined audience of more
than 60 million subscribers.
2. Mobile devices. 
3. Internet streaming
sources likes Apple TV, HULU, ROKU, etc.
4. Distribution  of media
rights agreements with foreign cable, satellite, mobile, and Internet services.
WHY WE NEED YOU
To make BBN happen, we need your help.
We are a small team and have so far been entirely self-funded through our
research and development stages. The money we raise from your gift will help us
to fund Phase 1 of our project and be used to pay for initial production and
operating costs. These expenses include office space, office equipment, working
capital, and fees.               
THE CORE TEAM

The
Bicycle Broadcasting Network is composed of broadcasting and film industry
professionals who are dedicated to their craft. 
1.  James Evora – Founder/PresidentJames’
background covers over 35 years of broadcasting in both radio and
television.
Recently, Jamie has been working in the bicycling industry as a sales manager
and has been involved in community outreach for a national bicycle chain in San Francisco.2.  Keith A. Jenkins - Co Founder/Senior VP

Keith has over
20 years of broadcasting and film experience in the San Francisco Bay Area and Michigan.
3.  Glenn Foster – VP Production

Glenn brings
30 years of professional experience in the field of entertainment services at
NBC-TV in Burbank, CA, CBS-TV in Hollywood, CA, and ABC Television’s
Entertainment Marketing Department. Glenn was a recipient of an EMMY Award as
Technical Director for NBS Sports and two Platinum Albums from Priority Records
for commercial editing.
4.  Henry Joseph – Director Field OperationsHenry has over 20 years experience as an Instructor and Video Broadcast Operations Specialist.
5.  Vivian Tran – CSR/Road Racer Vivian is a rider for Lost Dog Cycling Team, E4 road racer; Collegiate racer for Triathlon & Cycling at SF State, B road racer. 4 years of
 experience in cycling, 2 years of on and off competitive cycling.
6.  Yao Saetern – Broadcast technical staff/Road
RacerYao is a Data Manager and Photographer in Berkeley,
    CA. A rider for the Lost Dog Cycling Team, E4 road, E5 track;
    and the San Francisco State Gators Triathlon/Cycling Club, Men's B
    road, and has over 6 years of recreational and competitive cycling
    experience.
7.  Isaac Fowler–Broadcast technical staffWHAT YOU COULD DO TO HELPYour support will allow the Bicycle
Broadcasting Network to move our project forward, leading to the first day of
on-air broadcasting. To back our projects, please take the following actions:
1.  Check out our rewards page
2.  Pick a reward you like and contribute
3.  Email you family and friends about our project
and bring them on board
4.  Tell everyone you know about our project
5.  Share our crowd funding site on your FaceBook
wall
6.  Tweet it to your followers
7.  Instagram our crowd funding video and share it
with the world.
OUR
COMMITMENT TO YOU
We promise to communicate with our
supporters and keep them informed and up-to-date on our progress and future
steps.
Any pledge amount will take us one
step closer to our business goal.
Help take us from Vision to Reality.
All of us at the Bicycle Broadcasting
Network thank you for your support.

story:
Support tompac and get it at Home

Tompac provides us with the charging needs that we have at home, during a dinner, sitting on our sofa, waiting for an important call. 

   

Thanks to Tompac, our guests no longer need to continuously get up to check their messages, emails or calls. We can relax and enjoy without having to worry about charging our smartphone.

Tompac also provides interactions with your smartphone: thanks to the integrated bluetooth technology you will be able to share your favourite music with your guests or answer a call.


Take a look, get more informations about our product and choose your favourite colour

Forget about battery anxiety. Support tompac and find it in your favorite Public Places.


Just when we needed the most, that our smartphone's battery has gone dead!
Our idea is generated from a common need: bring a "charging" solution inside restaurants, beaches, hotels, buses, meeting places...bars.




How it works part one: recharge 




How it works part two: improve your quality service and customer's satisfaction




How it works part three: NFC technology to promote your business



Tompac is a system that enables you to recharge your smartphone or tablet without the need of being cabled. Our system enables four users to recharge simultaneously their devices, thanks to an integrated cabling system, a usb connection and to the modern wireless recharging technology.
Tompac can also be used to extend your wifi coverage at home as well as in public places.


Improve your business with our services




Low Charge? Charged and ready to go.


Eliminating charging cables to improve your experiences at restaurants, bars, beaches, hotels, buses, meeting places including  bill and table ordering.



A single base is all you need to store the modules one on top of another,
therefore reducing space, while guaranteeing the possibility of charging Tompac at any given time without connecting cable to the system, thus reducing cabling costs.

  • The call button eliminates long waits for orders.
  • Tompac can be positioned anywhere.
  • Including bill button. 
  • Wi-Fi Extender. 
  • The touchscreen shows when a table is ready to order.
  • Charge up to four different devices.
  • Tompac cuts the cord for your devices.
  • Share your social network thanks to NFC technology.
  • Tompac is truly wireless.


Available 9 colors 

Available 9 colors: Black, White, Orange 1595 c, Pink 178 c, Green 382 c, Red 485 c, Red 696 C, Blue(e) 5473 c, Blue 279 c.

Plastic Case


Support to Get Limited Edition

Silver, Classic Gold, Pink Gold. Luxury Metallic Case

Design and manufacturing made in Italy



Special Thanks

Grazie, grazie, grazie a Stefano Andrea Macchi ( actor & voice) ed Anna Pettinelli (actress) for their professionalism, their passion, their love. You support Tompac.

Special thanks to "Il Libro Divino" (Danilo, Eva ed Il Lupo) Rome - Italy for their support.

1000 times thanks to Daniele & Mirko (Actors) and owner of Next Door Guesthouse Rome, Italy.  

Thank you to Daniela Girfatti e Lorenzo Borrelli: actors for a day.

Grazie e grazie a Fabiana ed al suo TimeOut café in Rome.

Thanks to all actors to help us to make the video

Director: Federico Giannace

story:
Features:

For All of the smart phones in the world. Can Work with Apple, Android, Blackberry, and Windows phones.


Features in the Media:

9to5mac.com: "A few other multi-purpose tech tools have been featured here, but the Co-Connector’s industrial design is extremely appealing."


Co-Connector is smart phone charger which serves as a tripod mount, and it also contains a flash memory drive for storing and transferring electronic data.


Most smart phone chargers are long wires with a USB outlet on one side and a cellular phone charger outlet on the other. They tend to be long, tangle easily, and tedious to carry on one’s person. These are the reasons why I found it imperative to invent the Co-Connector, to mitigate these issues.

This is a ready-made product, it is available now! We can deliver the products once the campaign over!


Progress:

Design

Prototype

Injection mold

Production

Why Co-Connector?

Although others have invented portable cellular phone charges, various functionalities that set ChargeDrive apart are:

  • it is more versatile
  • it is more compact and portable
  • it does not make use of long wires that can tangle and become very cumbersome
  • the tripod legs can be setup in multiple positions, thereby enabling the user to view the cellular phone’s screen in either landscape or portrait mode
  • it has a flash drive storage device integrated into a charging system, thereby eliminating the need to carry multiple devices for both purposes
  • it can have a NanoSuction plate attached to the back screw as well.

Timeline:


We have launched this product half year, we need to promote it as much as possible. That's why we start this campaign and just set the goal only 1000 USD, this funds even can not cover one part mold cost. Spread the product is our main purpose. Thanks a million for your spreading and backing.





USB On-The-Go, often abbreviated to USB OTG or just OTG, is a specification first used in late 2001 that allows USB devices such as digital audio players or mobile phones to act as a host, allowing other USB devices such as USB flash drives, digital cameras, mice or keyboards to be attached to them. Use of USB On-The-Go allows those devices to switch back and forth between the roles of host and client devices. For instance, a mobile phone may read from removable media as the host device, but present itself as a USB Mass Storage Device when connected to a host computer.



LET'S MAKE THIS HAPPEN!

story:
• Our Dream

We dream to be one of the best video sharing platforms within the entire free internet websites. Our philosophy is to give the best videos to our visitors and users with web and smartphones new features.



  • Outstanding Alexa Ranking

Since we began this journey in September 19, 2014, the last 6 months had been an awesome journey. We improved our Alexa (alexa.com) ranking from 21 000 000 to 1 400 000 and we expect with all your help to improve our worldwide ranking from 1 400 000 to 700 000 in the next few months and be on top 5 000 in the next 2 to 3 years. However to accomplish that, we will need all the help possible.

Be one of our “Backers” and make this dream possible. 



  • Our Challenge

Due to our traffic grow, we cannot actually provide our resources for all users to upload their videos. Here is a brief overview of the major steps we will need to accomplish to develop BlizVideo.com website for the next few months: 



The main challenge of this project is to develop our website to become a reference in the website entertainment field in the next few years. Be part of our success. 

  • We Need You !

Please contribute to BlizVideo.com, If a contribution is not possible at this moment, your voice is still valuable. Take a minute to share this campaign with your friends. Thank you to everyone for your generosity.

You can visit us at: http://blizvideo.com/videos/all

Special Thanks ! ; 
Alex Murray
Britney Upton

story:
ProDock is the first bluetooth keyboard that features a two-way docking and magnetic stand made specifically for the iPad Pro user.

 

What is special about ProDock is that it was born out of necessity. Making regular presentations, leading company meetings, or even just surfing the internet with friends - we always had the chore of constantly turning or spinning the iPod Pro around the table. And we have all had those meetings where everyone gathers uncomfortably around behind one person clicking away. We envisioned a product to avoid the extra steps of toggling between the iPad Pro and other monitors or computers. We designed ProDock to help make its user be more efficient with their time.

 

We found that ProDock not only allowed us to be faster collecting notes and brainstorming ideas, but it has helped our bottom line. Clients pay more attention to the presentations and don't get sidetracked watching someone type or passing around the iPad Pro.

It's sharp edge design measures 6.8mm, but still has a 1000mAh rechargeable battery working inside to provide 30 days of working time and 3 months of standby time! By connecting ProDock, you can type, flip and use the featured Page Up/Page Down controls with the iPad for your customers, and turn it back toward you just as quickly and easily. It's like having a lighter and more versatile MacBook!

Feature highlights 

Two-way docking keyboard,one way for typing, another way for presentation.


Page up/down control for presentation.


Magnetic stand

Strong magnetic stand of ProDock firmly hooks the iPad Pro, you can take it anywhere with your ipad pro.

Color adjustable backlit

long working time

1000mAh rechargeable battery inside the keyboard provides you 30 days working time and 3 months standby time.

Bluetooth 4.0 keyboard with quick pairing

Chipset

 We use the world's most stable and fastest bluetooth chipset to be the beating    heart of ProDock.Broadcom Corporation based in Irvine,California.

High quality chiclet & scissors keys

Slim and light-weight

Sharp edge design, average thickness 6.8 mm

Only 544g, very light to carry around


Structural design photos

Size over view Minidock, a ProDock for ipad mini4

It took 6 months to create ProDock with our team after inception - they're awesome! And in that time, we also created a MiniDock - ProDock for the iPad Mini4!

                                                                MiniDock


Specifications of ProDock and MiniDock:

US QWERTY layoutWhy crowdfunding

We have seen many great keyboards bring much convenience for users, we hope that our creative design can benefit all the iPad Pro users. 

ProDock is currently in the costly production stage. All monies raised will be used directly to finish production. In addition to delivering timely perks for donations, our backers will also receive a discount on the ProDock product they purchase.

We would like to thank you in advance for checking out ProDock, and thank you for your support. We look forward to hearing from you.

Prodock project progress
 Perks 

ProDock  team

We are a team of geeks of keyboard that owns a workshop, keyboard for ultrabook and iPad is our main researching direction. We adopt new technology to make our products, especially the keyboards for iPad. From 6 months ago, we began to start this project, trying to create something new for the ipad pro users, now we made it! Our team members have put huge effort on this, here we say thank you for all our team members.

 FAQ:

Q1.How much is the battery capacity of the proDock? How long will it take? How long does it take to charge?

 A: ProDock has a 1000mAh battery inside, you can use it for 30 days, need 2 hours to have it fully charged.

Q2.Does ProDock come with hot keys for iOS?

 A: Yes, you can use its hot keys to adjust the brightness, volume, back to homescreen, lock screen, search, etc, like the normal iPad keyboards.

Q3. Can I have some words printed on the product? How many words can be?

 A: This service is only for backer of Prodock Sepecial Version. You can print your name or some words less than 50 on the back case of the product, you can leave us a message to tell us what you need to print.

Q4. Does the MiniDock come with the magnetic stand like the ProDock?

 A: Yes.

Q5. Does the MiniDock have the feature of two-way docking?

   A: Yes

Q6. Does the MiniDock come with the backight too?

  A: NO

Q7. What are the weight of ProDock and MiniDock ? Easy to carry ?

  A:  ProDock is 544g, MiniDock is 204g, very light to carry around.

Q8. Can I have the keyboard made with layout like AZERTY or QWERTZ?

  A: Currently, we only produce the keyboards with QWERTY. This layout is used in countries like the US, United Kingdom. Canada, Australia, India and many other countries.

Q9 .Does the Prodock come with 3 pin connection like the Apple keyboard for iPad Pro?

  A: No. ProDock is a bluetooth keyboard, it connects your iPad Pro via bluetooth, also very fast and easy to use.


Delivery date and warranty

We ship all the perks in 15 days after the crowdfunding ends.

Warranty: One year

 

Contact us

Email: info@mgkeyboard.com

Contact: Mr. Bill Tang

mobile: +86 13823321441

Website: www.mgkeyboard.com
