Q4. Does the MiniDock come with the magnetic stand like the ProDock?
 A: Yes.
Q5. Does the MiniDock have the feature of two-way docking?
   A: Yes
Q6. Does the MiniDock come with the backight too?
  A: NO
Q7. What are the weight of ProDock and MiniDock ? Easy to carry ?
  A:  ProDock is 544g, MiniDock is 204g, very light to carry around.
Q8. Can I have the keyboard made with layout like AZERTY or QWERTZ?
  A: Currently, we only produce the keyboards with QWERTY. This layout is used in countries like the US, United Kingdom. Canada, Australia, India and many other countries.
Q9 .Does the Prodock come with 3 pin connection like the Apple keyboard for iPad Pro?
  A: No. ProDock is a bluetooth keyboard, it connects your iPad Pro via bluetooth, also very fast and easy to use.

Delivery date and warranty
We ship all the perks in 15 days after the crowdfunding ends.
Warranty: One year
 
  Contact us

Email: info@mgkeyboard.com
Contact: Mr. Bill Tang
mobile: +86 13823321441
Website: www.mgkeyboard.com

story:
About MO-I

To develop a new market for cell phone accessories

MO-I is currently the most convenient product, as it makes it possible for the users to control their phone with one hand.

The phone will not fall in any circumstances; therefore, MO-I prevents the screen from breaking.

Also, it is designed so that there would be less stress to the user’s hand even after he or she uses it for a long time.

The MO-I can be left anywhere on the phone and used.

  • The first of the objectives was to develop a product that gives less stress to the user’s hand and for the user to be able to control the application with one hand.
  • The second objective was to prevent the breakage of the screen by not letting the cell phone drop.

  • The third goal was to let the user use the phone with either the left or right hand – without any differences.

  • The fourth idea was to make it strong.

  • The fifth point was to make it possible to be applied to phones with filp cases or curved phones

 You don't have to worry any more! 

The MO-I team has solved all these problems and come to the point where they could release the product.

In the beginning of the development, the goal was to come up with solutions for the product’s functions, sizes and designs.

During the development of the product, we emphasized the functionality that makes it possible for the product to be controlled with one hand, mounted at any locations and thereby raises the value of the customers.

  • We have applied a strong and smooth holder that uses a combination of metal and silicon.
  • We have made it possible for the users to use either left or right hands through 360 degree rotation.
  • We have it made it possible for the users to conveniently control the videos and the phone without any limits to locations by applying the mounting function.
  • We have made it possible to control the phone in the most convenient and effective way by applying the side GRIP.

MO-I has been designed to have safety and convenience together.

When you use your phone with one hand or use the phone in the mounted mode, people around you will think “How is that possible?” and fix their eyes on you.

Introducing MO-I



MO-I reduces stress of the user’s hand ; therefore, it is more convenient when watching long videos or games.

With MO-I, the smartphone will never be dropped.

The phone can be mounted anywhere, such as coffee shops, and restaurants.

Are you worried that your child might drop your phone?

You don’t have to worry about that any more!

It is possible to use MO-I in the subway, bus, etc. safely with only one hand.

With MO-I, it is also possible to conveniently take a selfie while riding a bicycle or a boat, or when you are moving without worries of dropping the phone.

You can use it by attaching the MO-I to your cell phone or to the case.

Also, you can attach it to the flip cover. It is a convenient product that makes it possible to control the phone and watch videos with one hand.

You would not have to worry about dropping MO-I even when you’re using it outdoors or in your bed. 

MO-I will protect your children’s eyesight, because when they hold it too close to their face, it will create stress on their wrists, forcing them to hold the phone at a distance.


iPhone 6, Galaxy 6 Edge, etc.

You can attach it to all types of phones and handheld devices that are 4.7 inches or above.

MO-I being used while the battery is being charged.

Even while using a portable battery, it is possible to use it with one hand.

The MO-I Package

We ship additional 3M TAPE 1EA. 
In the case where we reach our goal of $100,000, we will change the wrapping papers into gift-wrapping and ship it.

(The design for the wrapping paper can be changed)

In the case where we reach our goal of $150,000, we will include the REMOVER and ship it.

Testing MO-I

Test for the holder


Ultrasonic Welding Test


Test for the disk

Designing MO-I

MO-I team has been working on this project for over two years.

Our objective was to create a product that makes it possible for everyone to use their phones safely and conveniently.

With MO-I, you can not only use your phones and handheld devices conveniently while moving, but also use them conveniently in the office, coffee shops many other places by applying the mounting function.

Therefore, by combining metal and silicon, we have produced a holder that is strong and smooth at the same time.

For the 360 degree rotation functionality and for safety, we have applied metal to the disk.

This will provide you with a function that is safe and convenient.

MO-I Specifications

These are initial test products, so tThere may be changes in the design when the products are actually produced.


Timeline

 Perks 

Teams

It took a long time to develop the product.

At one point, we even thought that we would not be able to commercialize MO-I.

However, we did not give up and we have now successfully completed this project.

In order to let everyone use our product - created from our persistent efforts – we need your advice and support.

Risk and Challenges

MO-I is preparing for the production of MO-I through prototype testing.
Currently, we have finished all preparations for production.

When we are sufficiently funded, we will start production immediately. For  smooth production, we need your support.

We have completed a production contract with a company that has been manufacturing cell phone parts for over 20 years, and are now preparing to produce.

The production and wrapping will take place in Korea, but the production of the wrapping papers will be undertaken in China.

In return of your support, we will improve our work to wrap it with gift-wrapping papers.

There may be some delay in shipping on account of this process, but we will do our best to take prior action to avoid any problems.


FAQ

When would it be shipped?

The production of the accessory  will start from November, 2015. You will be able to receive your product by the end of December, 2015. Delivery to less than 10 countries may be delayed. 

Is the shipping fee included in the mentioned price?

If you are in Korea, the shipping will be free of cost. When purchasing over 20 products per country, the products will be sent as soon as they are produced. Due to taxes and customs, there may be delays in the delivery when purchasing 20 or fewer products.

What will you do with the funds?

It will be used to produce the products. We will produce more upgraded products to reflect your needs and comments.  

Which smartphones can MO-I be applied to?

You can apply it to smartphones that are between 4.7 inches and 7 inches. If it’s for the children, you may apply it to smaller phones. 

How do you attach and use Mo-I?

After removing the sticker behind MO-I, you can attach it to your phone or the case itself. We have provided detailed instructions on how to use MO-I on our company’s website. 

Is it possible to use it even if the phone is curved?

Yes. You can even attach it to the products like G3.

Is the position of the attachment fixed?

You can adjust the position according to your use and needs. For example, if you are a heavy user of the application, but don’t need horizontal videos/holder, then you could attach it at the ¾ point of the phone for more convenience. 

Is it possible to reuse it?

Yes. you can reuse it. However, in order to reuse MO-I, you need to be careful when detaching or attaching the MO-I. We advise you to use a tape that has adhesive strength at least equal to that of the previously used 3M tape. 

How do I pull the MO-I off?

In order to remove the tape, use the remover at the point where the disk and the phone are attached to each other, and push it in - with the tape as the center. If a space occurs between the disk and the phone due to the tape, you can pull the disk off using a tool. 

What is the Remover?

The Remover removes the MO-I, and is currently being produced by the company.If you do not have a Remover, you can simply use a 1mm thick iron plate or plastic. When it’s close to shipment, we will request for you to fill out the form through e-mail. You can then choose the color and confirm the shipping address.

How do I select the size of the holder?

As of now, the current model is free size, so we don’t have different options for the size. However, we are planning to diversify the sizes into 3-4 different types in the future.

I am an agent. How should I contact you?

If you have any queries or concerns about the distribution of MO-I, please send an email to rkstn@iandt.kr.

story:
In a world ruled by pastels, rounded edges and “user experience engineers” - we must resist. When it comes to our mobile phone interfaces - the computers we arm ourselves with, the computers that live and breath with us - when it comes to our most prized piece of tech, we should not just lie down and tolerate “pretty” interfaces.

The Google Play store is littered with launchers, alternatives to the stock experience offered by manufacturers. These alternative launchers all suffer the same infection that doomed the stock software, the cutesy vomit-inducing last-century styling.

It's time for a launcher that reflects the dystopian world we live in. A launcher that looks the way we feel: sharp-edged and kick-ass. For those who need the facts, the stats and the updates that matter most. Not for anybody who wants to be cuddled, swaddled in a warm blanket of primary colors and hover-effects. A launcher that matches your mirror shades, your get-bent attitude, your cyberpunk existence.

An Android launcher to take back your phone.


What We Will Build

Glitch will replace your Android lock-screen and home-screen with what they were meant to be. You'll have at your fingertips the things you absolutely must have, sharp and to the point, free from the distractions of industry bloatware.

Stats that matter:

  • Memory
  • CPU
  • Battery
  • Connectivity

Notifications you want:

  • SMS
  • Tweets
  • Calls

Most frequently:

  • Used apps
  • Contacted people

The Tech

Glitch will be built as an Android app. It will be downloaded by most users directly from the Play Store, although those who help fund the campaign will get early access builds with installation instructions. The app will install itself, using basis access privileges, it will replace your current launcher app and will be there each time the phone boots.

Stretch Goals

Once we have brought Glitch to the Android platform, we want to extend it's reach into iOS, tablets and the desktop. Whether you are using Mac, Windows or Linux we want the look at feel of your device to represent your needs and the core principles of Glitch; metrics, notifications. Real signals, less noise.

The Community

We're speaking directly to the hamlets of Cyberpunk, the diverse communities which exist online who share a common appreciation for all things grudgy, dystopian and futuristic. 

Glitch is about giving our tech the look and feel we want it to have. We ask for your support and to show our appreciation we have selected rewards that are culturally appropriate to our cause.


About MMC

We're a small software company from Dublin (Ireland), typically locked in the cycle of contract work for clients, but determined to launch a distinct and unique mobile interface, hopefully with your help. To learn more about what we do, check out our portfolio.

So contribute if you can, share if you cannot. Work with us and get early access to Glitch. Talk about us and share the dream with others.

Glitch - An Android launcher to take back your phone.

story:
(Scroll down for English)

Un coup de pouce pour les étudiants

Smart Me Up, c'est bon pour :

Les étudiants : qui peuvent tester leurs connaissances tout au long de l'année grâce à des QCM et à des battles face d'autres étudiants => augmentation de l'engagement

Les enseignants : qui peuvent créer des quizz qui seront automatiquement corrigés => gain de temps

Les écoles : qui ont accès à des statistiques leur permettant d'adapter leurs plannings de cours en fonction des besoins des étudiants => optimisation de la formation

Smart Me Up : ça sert quoi ?

Les Creative Slashers, spécialisés dans le digital et assurant des formations dans diverses écoles supérieures, ont imaginé une solution destinée aux étudiants qui intègre les principes de la gamification. Ils sont partis d'un simple constat : en mode apprentissage, les étudiants perçoivent les études comme laborieuses, une “corvée” nécessaire, mais une corvée tout de même. En revanche, dès qu’une notion de jeu ou de challenge est introduite, ils se montrent plus réactifs, plus engagés et s’impliquent dans le processus d’apprentissage. Dès lors, le concept de Smart Me Up a commencé à germer.

Notre solution ? Une plate-forme où l'étudiant peut accéder à des quizz sur les matières qui le concernent. Il peut ainsi s'entraîner, s'auto-évaluer, voir sa progression et son niveau par rapport aux autres, et même les défier. Tout ça sans avoir à attendre la sanction des examens, une fois qu'il est trop tard pour réagir. Smart Me Up s'adresse également aux enseignants qui peuvent créer des quizz auto-corrigés : un réel gain de temps pour évaluer leurs étudiants sans passer des heures corriger les copies ! 

Ce concept, imaginé pour les étudiants à l’université peut être adapté à tout type de classe, d'établissement ou de niveau, qu'ils s'agisse de petites classes, d'établissements d’enseignement supérieur ou dans le cadre de la formation en entreprise. Un système de gamification (jeu)a été mis en place pour encourager les étudiants à répondre aux quizz. Ainsi, ils gagnent des points, améliorent leur classement, remportent des badges et se positionnent comme experts dans certaines matières. En effet, de nombreuses études ont démontré l’impact positif du jeu dans l’apprentissage, et ce à tout âge. Le challenge représente finalement un moteur plus puissant que la simple note finale.

Un besoin réel et chiffré 

En France, le nombre d’inscrits à la fac à la rentrée universitaire de 2014 était d’1,5 million. Sur l’ensemble de ces étudiants,  27%  sortiront du système universitaire en première année, 19% finiront sans diplômes et 29% redoubleront leur première année. Ces statistiques sont affolantes et ont un impact économique majeur.

Les 140 000 jeunes qui décrochent des études chaque année en France auraient un impact financier estimé à 30 milliards d’euros (http://www.lemonde.fr/les-decodeurs/article/2014/11/21/qui-sont-les-jeunes-en-decrochage-scolaire_4527096_4355770.html).

Deux causes majeures à ce décrochage au cours d’un cursus universitaire : 

  • l’isolement auquel ne sont pas préparés les bacheliers qui sortent du lycée, 
  • le manque de suivi au cours de l’année. 

Les étudiants se retrouvent livrés à eux-mêmes, perdus au milieu de dizaines d’autres étudiants, sans soutien, sans suivi personnalisé, sans rendus intermédiaires leur permettant d’estimer leur niveau. Au final, un sur 10 déclare souffrir d’isolement et la plupart attend l’échec du partiel semestriel pour découvrir que le niveau n’est pas au rendez-vous.

A quoi servira le crowdfunding ?

Le financement nous servira à développer une première version fonctionnelle de l'application afin de la proposer à des établissements. Cela implique :

  • développement
  • création graphique
  • marketing et communication
  • serveurs
  • événements pour présenter Smart Me Up (nous faisons partie de l'ALPHA team du WebSummit)
  • contreparties (ça, c'est pour vous remercier, parce que vous le valez bien !)

////English ////

Boosting students' success

What if we created a new solution to help students all the way to their graduation? What if we reinvented teaching? What if we found a solution to prevent dropout and isolation during studies? What if studying was made fun? Smart Me Up is a brand new platform aiming to get students more engaged and more proactive during their studies. An original concept built up around actual needs and creating a link between students and teachers.

French university numbers are appalling and representative of a general behavior among students who don’t get engaged in their studies and tend to wait for “brain feeding”:

  • 27% of students entering university drop out of the educational system,
  • 29% will repeat their first year,
  • 19% will never graduate,
  • 10% feel isolated.

Smart Me Up has been imagined as a side-tool aiming to engage the students, accompany them and lead them on their path to success. This unique platform has been built on two observations: students feel more involved if there is a challenge including the characteristics of gamification (points, badges, leader boards…) and collaboration between the students leads to better results for the whole group.

How does it work?

Smart Me Up allows students to test their level by answering various quizzes created either by professors or by other students. They can see their own progression in a subject as well as their level compared to the other students. A chat system is implemented so that students can get in touch with the ones identified as “experts” in a subject. Helping another student grants you points, as well as submitting new questions which will go through a validation process. Finally, in order to earn more points and badges, students can challenge each other into one-to-one battles, reinforcing the game effect.

Talking with the students, studying their reactions and habits, we found out that they were passive if there wasn’t something to earn, given that knowledge and skills are seemingly not enough. Their attention grows, their involvement in the learning process increases and their participation multiplies as soon as they can visualize their own progression and their level compared to the others’. Collaborating on the same project also motivates them to support each other and helps them understand the subjects better as they explain them to someone else.

The solution is also directed toward the professors who benefit from a system that allows them to create quizzes using either their own questions or the ones from the platform. The quizzes are auto-corrected and the results are published as soon as the final answer to the quiz has been submitted. It saves time and offers an efficient support as well as analytics.

This concept has emerged at the heart of Creative Slashers, a digital agency. The founders, Audrey Rochas – CEO – and Virak Mey – artistic director – both give talks and teach classes for students from age 18 to 25 on various subjects (digital strategy, product management, marketing, design, project and team management…). They built Smart Me Up over a year and a half, testing the idea, adapting it to the students’ reactions and to their own needs; an efficient solution that is meant to evolve rapidly when implemented in universities and schools.

What will we do with the money raised?

The crowdfunding will give us a chance to develop a first version of our solution that we will be able to implement in the first schools and colleges. This implies:

  • development
  • graphic design
  • marketing and communication
  • servers
  • events to introduce Smart Me Up (we're part of the WebSummit ALPHA team)
  • perks (those are for you!)
story_txt:
(Scroll down for English)Un coup de pouce pour les étudiants
Smart Me Up, c'est bon pour :Les étudiants : qui peuvent tester leurs connaissances tout au long de l'année grâce à des QCM et à des battles face d'autres étudiants => augmentation de l'engagementLes enseignants : qui peuvent créer des quizz qui seront automatiquement corrigés => gain de tempsLes écoles : qui ont accès à des statistiques leur permettant d'adapter leurs plannings de cours en fonction des besoins des étudiants => optimisation de la formationSmart Me Up : ça sert quoi ?Les Creative Slashers, spécialisés dans le digital et assurant des formations dans diverses écoles supérieures, ont imaginé une solution destinée aux étudiants qui intègre les principes de la gamification. Ils sont partis d'un simple constat : en mode apprentissage, les étudiants perçoivent les études comme laborieuses, une “corvée” nécessaire, mais une corvée tout de même. En revanche, dès qu’une notion de jeu ou de challenge est introduite, ils se montrent plus réactifs, plus engagés et s’impliquent dans le processus d’apprentissage. Dès lors, le concept de Smart Me Up a commencé à germer.Notre solution ? Une plate-forme où l'étudiant peut accéder à des quizz sur les matières qui le concernent. Il peut ainsi s'entraîner, s'auto-évaluer, voir sa progression et son niveau par rapport aux autres, et même les défier. Tout ça sans avoir à attendre la sanction des examens, une fois qu'il est trop tard pour réagir. Smart Me Up s'adresse également aux enseignants qui peuvent créer des quizz auto-corrigés : un réel gain de temps pour évaluer leurs étudiants sans passer des heures corriger les copies ! Ce concept, imaginé pour les étudiants à l’université peut être adapté à tout type de classe, d'établissement ou de niveau, qu'ils s'agisse de petites classes, d'établissements d’enseignement supérieur ou dans le cadre de la formation en entreprise. Un système de gamification (jeu)a été mis en place pour encourager les étudiants à répondre aux quizz. Ainsi, ils gagnent des points, améliorent leur classement, remportent des badges et se positionnent comme experts dans certaines matières. En effet, de nombreuses études ont démontré l’impact positif du jeu dans l’apprentissage, et ce à tout âge. Le challenge représente finalement un moteur plus puissant que la simple note finale.Un besoin réel et chiffré En France, le nombre d’inscrits à la fac à la rentrée universitaire de 2014 était d’1,5 million. Sur l’ensemble de ces étudiants,  27%  sortiront du système universitaire en première année, 19% finiront sans diplômes et 29% redoubleront leur première année. Ces statistiques sont affolantes et ont un impact économique majeur. Les 140 000 jeunes qui décrochent des études chaque année en France auraient un impact financier estimé à 30 milliards d’euros (http://www.lemonde.fr/les-decodeurs/article/2014/11/21/qui-sont-les-jeunes-en-decrochage-scolaire_4527096_4355770.html).
Deux causes majeures à ce décrochage au cours d’un cursus universitaire : 



l’isolement auquel ne sont pas préparés les bacheliers qui sortent du lycée, 


le manque de suivi au cours de l’année. 


Les étudiants se retrouvent livrés à eux-mêmes, perdus au milieu de dizaines d’autres étudiants, sans soutien, sans suivi personnalisé, sans rendus intermédiaires leur permettant d’estimer leur niveau. Au final, un sur 10 déclare souffrir d’isolement et la plupart attend l’échec du partiel semestriel pour découvrir que le niveau n’est pas au rendez-vous.
A quoi servira le crowdfunding ?
Le financement nous servira à développer une première version fonctionnelle de l'application afin de la proposer à des établissements. Cela implique :



développement


création graphique


marketing et communication


serveurs


événements pour présenter Smart Me Up (nous faisons partie de l'ALPHA team du WebSummit)

contreparties (ça, c'est pour vous remercier, parce que vous le valez bien !)




////English ////
Boosting students' success



What if we created a new solution to help
students all the way to their graduation? What if we reinvented teaching? What
if we found a solution to prevent dropout and isolation during studies? What if
studying was made fun? Smart Me Up is a brand new platform aiming to get
students more engaged and more proactive during their studies. An original
concept built up around actual needs and creating a link between students and
teachers. 
French university numbers are appalling
and representative of a general behavior among students who don’t get engaged
in their studies and tend to wait for “brain feeding”:



27% of students entering
university drop out of the educational system,


29% will repeat their first
year,


19% will never graduate,


10% feel isolated.



Smart Me Up has been imagined as a
side-tool aiming to engage the students, accompany them and lead them on their
path to success. This unique platform has been built on two observations:
students feel more involved if there is a challenge including the
characteristics of gamification (points, badges, leader boards…) and
collaboration between the students leads to better results for the whole group.

How does it work?
Smart Me Up allows students to test their
level by answering various quizzes created either by professors or by other
students. They can see their own progression in a subject as well as their
level compared to the other students. A chat system is implemented so that
students can get in touch with the ones identified as “experts” in a subject.
Helping another student grants you points, as well as submitting new questions
which will go through a validation process. Finally, in order to earn more
points and badges, students can challenge each other into one-to-one battles,
reinforcing the game effect. 
Talking with the students, studying their
reactions and habits, we found out that they were passive if there wasn’t
something to earn, given that knowledge and skills are seemingly not enough.
Their attention grows, their involvement in the learning process increases and
their participation multiplies as soon as they can visualize their own
progression and their level compared to the others’. Collaborating on the same
project also motivates them to support each other and helps them understand the
subjects better as they explain them to someone else.
The solution is also directed toward the
professors who benefit from a system that allows them to create quizzes using
either their own questions or the ones from the platform. The quizzes are
auto-corrected and the results are published as soon as the final answer to the
quiz has been submitted. It saves time and offers an efficient support as well
as analytics. 
This concept has emerged at the heart of Creative
Slashers, a digital agency. The founders, Audrey Rochas – CEO – and Virak Mey –
artistic director – both give talks and teach classes for students from age 18
to 25 on various subjects (digital strategy, product management, marketing,
design, project and team management…). They built Smart Me Up over a year and a
half, testing the idea, adapting it to the students’ reactions and to their own
needs; an efficient solution that is meant to evolve rapidly when implemented
in universities and schools.
What will we do with the money raised?
The crowdfunding will give us a chance to develop a first version of our solution that we will be able to implement in the first schools and colleges. This implies:



development


graphic design


marketing and communication


servers


events to introduce Smart Me Up (we're part of the WebSummit ALPHA team)


perks (those are for you!)

story:
About Us?

We have implemented lots of innovative projects for industrial and academic purposes. We have more than 10 years of experience in coding and hardware implementations. Our startup company is called Innoesys and our objective is to bring innovative ideas to life.

What We Ask?

We ask you to help us implement our idea. Some of our products can be found online (check them here). Others are parts of large scale projects for bigger companies.

Why Help?

Are you an Arduino lover? You like new ideas? You want to help small startup companies to make a difference? You are just a kind person? Then you must definitely help!

Overview

Innoesys Educational Shield is an Arduino shield that has all the necessary components and sensors on it, for the beginner to start programming. Sure there are hundreds of starter kits out there with components, breadboards, cables and more. But in all of them you have to connect resistors and cables and much other stuff!

…what if you don’t want to learn electronics but you want to learn how to program an Arduino and what you can do with it

…what if you are a teacher and you want to learn the students how to “play” with the Arduino. It not so safe for kids to play with components especially in small ages.

…what if you are a hobbyist but your knowledge  in electronics theory is limited


This Educational Shield comes as a solution to all these problems.  All the components and sensors are soldered with the appropriate circuits. No need to solder!

Tutorials

GR: Arduino Programming

EN: Arduino Programming


1.  Overview

IES-EDU-ARD is an Arduino shield containing some elementary electronic components designed for educational purposes targeting entry level users in the development of embedded software. The board contains digital and analogue interfaces like buttons, LEDs, sensors, etc. The following figure illustrates the architecture of the shield.


   

2.  Board description

1.  Connections

Fig. 2.IES-EDU-ARD components



Table 1. IES-EDU-ARD connections

The board is powered from 5VDC power source provided by the Arduino board and the different components are enabled with active high logic.

·  5V and GND pins

The power supply pins for the IES-EDU-ARD shield. 

·  A0 pin (Temperature sensor)

The output of the LM335Z temperature sensor is connected to the A0 (Analogue 0) pin. LM335 operates from -40ºC to 100ºC, has accuracy ±2ºC and gain of 10mV/K. The figure bellow provides the schematic of the sensor circuit.


·  A1 pin (Potentiometer)

The wiper terminal of a 10KOhm potentiometer is connected to A1 (Analogue 1) pin making thus a voltage divider circuit with output voltage 0V to 5V (ideally). The potentiometer has 20% tolerance and 50mW power rating.


·  A2 pin (Photosensor)

An LDR (Light Dependent Resistor) is connected as a voltage divider circuit to detect the light intensity. The resistor of the LDR decreases with the increasing light intensity. We used the GL5528 LDR which has 1ΜOhm dark (at 0 Lux) resistance and 8 ~ 20 KOhm light resistance (at 10 Lux). The diagram bellow is taken from GL5528 datasheet giving the LDR resistance vs. illuminance.

Taking into account the values from the above diagram, the dark and the light voltage can be calculated (calculated for 1 Lux and 100 Lux).


The schematic diagram is given in the following figure: 


·  Pin 2 (Relay)

This pin is connected to the relay and should be configured as output in order to turn ON/OFF the relay. We used the LEG-5 miniature relay which is able to drive load of 10A/120VAC or 10A/24VDC (resistive load). The figure bellow depicts the schematic diagram of the circuit and the terminal connections of the shield.



The following table describes the how to drive the relay and its state. Normally, while the pin is set to logic LOW (0V), the relay is turned OFF which means that the COM terminal is connected to the NC terminal. Applying a logic HIGH (5V) at pin 2, the relay is turned ON and connects the COM terminal to the NO terminal.


·  Pin 3 (Servo motor)

Pin 3 is connected to the servo motor connector to drive miniature servo motors. The schematic circuit and the connections of the motor are given bellow.

    



·  Pin 4 (Switch)

Pin 4 of the Arduino is connected to the ON/OFF switch and must be configured as input. The following figure gives the schematic of the switch circuit and the table the Arduino pin 4 values corresponding to the switch state. 



·  Pin 5 (Buzzer)

Pin 5 is connected to the buzzer and should be configured as output or PWM to drive the buzzer CEM-1205C.


·  Pin 6, 9 and 10 (LED pins)

Arduino pins 6, 9 and 10 are connected to a red LED, green LED and blue LED respectively. To turn ON the LED logic HIGH (5V) should be applied to the corresponding pin.



·  Pin 7, 8, 11, 12 and 13 (Buttons)

Pins 7, 8, 11, 12 and 13 are connected to pushbuttons and they should be configured as inputs to the Arduino.


2.  Configuration

There is no any specific configuration required to operate the shield but there are some jumpers attached to the SPI signals of the Arduino (pins 10, 11, 12 and 13) which can be placed or unplaced in order to connect and disconnect the BLUE LED, the DOWN button, the UP button and the CENTER button. This might be required when another shield is attached to the Arduino system which uses the SPI pins as communication port. In this case, the four jumpers of the IES-EDU-ARD should be disconnected in order to allow the additional shield to function correctly.  

              1                                2                                3                                 4

Fig. 3. Jumper configurations:

  1. Connect/Disconnect CENTER button
  2. Connect/Disconnect UP button    
  3. Connect/Disconnect DOWN button
  4. Connect/Disconnect BLUE Led


3.  Additional pinouts

The shield provides some additional pinouts for prototyping to connect external components. Pinout P11 provides the buttons CENTER, UP, DOWN and the BLUE Led connections as shown in Fig 4. 

Fig. 4. P11 pinouts


  P12 pinout provides the SPI signal as shown in the following figure:


3.  Software tools

   

The shield can be programmed using the Arduino IDE or any other development environment for AVR microcontrollers like Atmel Studio.


4.  Board dimensions

All dimensions are in mm.

story:
Based on the good reputations of the last generation Matrix Mini-i Pro, we are planning to carry out a big upgrade of Mini-i series products. This is a DAC and headphone amplifier combo, within its small stature, it contains a superb digital-analog decoding capabilities and a powerful headphone driving force. The aptX ® supporting Bluetooth module transfers the Hi-Res music stream from the player to the DAC (the player also need to support aptX ® technology).

  • Brand New Design: A combination of aluminum exterior and anodic oxidation process gives it a superior touch on the surface, newly designed aluminum body has a higher strength and radiating performance.


  • The tempered glass at the front panel produces better display and makes it more scratch-resistant. Embedded OLED has better vision, and the optimized user interface displaying a variety of information more intuitive, clear, and easy to operate.

  • Wire free: aptX® has been the best kept secret of the professional audio industry for many years. Now music lovers can enjoy the rich listening experience that only aptX® can deliver: pure wireless sound that doesn’t compromise on audio quality.
  • ESS SABRE Ultra ES9016S is an 8-channel audio D/A chip, 4 D/A unit parallel output for each channel, the CPLD cooperate with double oscillator, effectively reduce the jitter to ensure the digital signal integrity.
  • The powerful headphone amplifying circuits with a 40% improvement from the last generation, which can provide 210 milliwatt distortionless power under 300 ohm load, so that it can drive high fidelity headphones. In the meantime, we use ultra-low noise LDO chip to help reduce heating and improve power usage. The optimized heat radiation design and power management help reduce the power consumption by 30%, and half of the temperature rise of the previous generation. Mini-i Pro 2 can effortlessly drive most of headphone models and maximize their potential even with high impedance and low sensitivity.

  • Strong Combinations：Despite a similar design of Mini-i Pro 2, it encompasses the powerful digital amplification technology, which provides a driving power of 120 Watt in each channel, THD+N less than 0.002%. To match with Mini-i Pro 2, they can easily build a Hi-Fi source management and amplification system, to provide purest and best audio signal playback.

  • Mini-i AMP has two working mode, you can use the RCA cable connection to make it work in stereo mode, one Mini-i AMP drive two speakers, the driving force can be obtained to 120W per channel.

    You can also use an XLR cable to make it work in BTL mono mode, one Mini-i AMP drive one speaker, the powerful driving force for single-channel 450W, enough to drive various speakers.

    Meanwhile Mini-i AMP with intelligent thermal management system, an internal MCU will continue to detect the temperature of the power amplifier module to determine whether to enable the auxiliary cooling fan, it will run real-time adjustment of the fan speed, making Mini-i AMP remain quiet work state, you no need to worry about the  noise from cooling fan.

Matrix Audio is a young team from China. We have been making efforts in the Hi-Fi field for about a decade. In the past several years, our products obtained a good reputation in Hi-Fi circles of China and other countries and regions. We hope we can provide an excellent new product, providing more power, convenience and affordability for the audiophiles.

Even if you are unable to support us financially at this time, we would kindly appreciate your spiritual support. Share the URL of our campaign page to your friends, let more and more people know our idea, and help us engage the project.

When will my order be shipped?

We plan to begin shipping Mini-i Pro 2 at the beginning of August and have all backers received their orders by the middle of August 2016.

We plan to begin shipping Mini-i AMP at the beginning of September and have all backers received their orders by the middle of September 2016.

How much is shipping?  

We provide free shipping to worldwide.

When will my order be shipped?

We plan to begin shipping Mini-i Pro 2 at the beginning of August and have all backers received their orders by the middle of August 2016.

We plan to begin shipping Mini-i AMP at the beginning of September and have all backers received their orders by the middle of September 2016.

How will my order be shipped?

We will ship your orders using suitable express company according to the actual situation of the destination, FedEx / DHL / or EMS.

How can I select the color of my items?

An email survey will be sent once we have collected your orders from Indiegogo.  This typically gets sent out 7-10 days after the end of the campaign date.

How do I contact Matrix Team?

Feel free to contact us via email at idgg@matrix-digi.com

story:
Hello

  Owner idea is simple to get the people more accessible price for the lightning cable. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need a budget to make the project viable for every one, and after my calculation the budget is like 5000$

The top feature of the product:

- bout sides have access to the USB of the PC

- build with high quality material and tested with news IOS 9.x upgrade version

- 2 in 1 functionality data sync & charger cable

- USB 2.0, 3.0 compatible

- Compatible with iPhone 5, 5S, 5C, 6, 6S, 6Plus, 6sPlus,iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad Mini,  iPad Mini 2, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 4

- Available color Blue, Green

The material selected for this project are the best and the high quality for the a bigger life othe product.

story:
A REVOLUTIONARY NEW REVERSIBLE MICRO USB CABLE WITH LED CHARGING INDICATOR LIGHT.

USB cables play an important role in modern everyday life. They are used to charge up our phones and cameras and to transfer data from one device to another. There is, however, one flaw with most of the USB cables currently available - they can only be connected to a device one way. Think about how many times you have fumbled around trying to connect your USB cable to your phone, risking damage to the connectors as you try to force it in the wrong way up.


This is a problem for many people. The solution is LedFlip. This revolutionary new cable has a reversible end so can be inserted in any direction, giving users fast, reliable charging. LedFlip fits any micro USB portal without the hassle of an adapter, conveniently offering unrivalled functionality, ease of use, and maximum charge time. The reversible end means that the pins on the connector will fit either way up, so you no longer have to worry about turning the cable over and over to insert it into your device. LedFlip also eliminates the problem of having the incorrect fitting on the end of your USB cable - quite literally, one cable fits all. This is particularly useful when charging your smartphone, as Windows and Android users currently require a different type of USB cable to those compatible with other smartphones. LedFlip is therefore a cost-effective and environmentally aware product, as just one USB cable can be used to power multiple devices. This saves you money and hassle, preventing you from having to buy a new cable for each different device you own.

Uniquely, LedFlip features an innovative LED light at the end of the connector, to allow the user to see at a glance that the device is charging correctly. This is particularly useful when devices are being charged up at night, and prevents the user having to constantly check the device for connectivity. The LED charge indicator feature is available only on LedFlip, making it the market leader in reversible micro USB cables.


The makers of LedFlip are an innovative London-based team, who believe that even small changes to technology can have huge rewards for the public. A survey of 2000 people in London concluded that -

- 97% of those asked preferred the reversible cable WITH the LED charging indicator, to a reversible cable without one.

Those surveyed felt that -

- the light gives an immediate indication that the device is charging

- the light helps when using or charging the device at night

- the idea of an LED light is fresh and innovative

- the LED light is stylish and makes the user feel good about their choice

LedFlip has set the standard for the next wave of micro USB cables, with its exclusive LED charging indicator feature. The first prototype is almost ready to be delivered to the world, but in order to improve quality, design and functionality for the general consumer market, we are looking for $5000. Can you help support a project which will revolutionise technology and improve the lives of device users everywhere?

story:
The Qi3 (chee-cubed) wireless charging station

 The differentiating aspect of this product is the spatial freedom it offers the user. Until now, no other inductive charging product has provided the placement freedom that Poweryt has created. The design provides a 7-position configuration and a ledge style retention which will accommodate most cellular handsets in all seven of those positions.

The unit has LED user feedback in an artistic manner via the retaining ledge lighting system. This lighting is controlled by an ambient light sensor based on environmental light. In addition, if the light is obtrusive to anyone it can be simply shut off by the switch above the USB ports to disable the light. There is an on-board micro to control everything from ambient lighting to the fan driven cooling system. The micro also allows for flash updating of the unit should a field update be needed. Powered by a in line power pack the unit takes the clutter away from multidevice charging scenarios.

POWERYT a company born from necessity... 

Poweryt is a provider of wireless charging solutions for phones and other electronic devices and is committed to advancement of the wireless charging standards through innovative and compelling products. Maker of the Qi3 Multi-Device Wireless Charger that charges up to three devices wirelessly and two others via integrated USB ports.

We are ready for your feedback...

We have joined Indiegogo now to bring the first production pieces to the community and kickstart the momentum behind our mission, to rid the counter of charging clutter! Join us in making the next push to mass production a reality.

We need your help to get to the next level…

We are selling the first run production parts to offset our development costs and bring us to the next level of production. Our tooling is completed all electronic components are retained we need to build capital back up to launch the next phase of this project. We currently can only sell in North America but intend to broaden that certification as we go to full production. You backing will help in that mission.

 

FIRST RUN PRODUCTION HAS BEGUN!!!

 

WE ARE SHIPPING NOW IN THE US & CANADA!!!!

No need to wait to get the product in hand we have units ready to ship today.

story:
Short Summary

Pegg Electronics are a UK and US based team who are passionate about providing innovative and creative electronic touchscreen devices.

Our devices and accessories are based on enhancing touch screen App experiences generally.

To date, our products have not just improved  mobile gaming experiences, but have also provided greater success with business apps/contract procurement.

 

What We Need & What You Get 

We are looking to raise a further $420000 (on top of what we already have banked!). This will cover final research and development costs, prototype production, tooling, product manufacture and the global marketing campaign. Our team have been working hard to get to this point and are confident that the cost outlined will allow this exciting product to become available for release 1Q 2019.

The Impact

In our three year existence we have grown to successfully dispatch our products to over 50 countries around the world.

All of our products have (since 2015) had patent pending status, with grants imminent.

We absolutely pride ourselves on product quality and innovation, but more importantly on customer service, and customer care.

Since our seven speed ‘Turbo 7’ was released in 2017 we have continued to listen to our customers and fans, and this has led us to the move from a single point tapper product, to a multi-point, multi-speed, multiuse tap or swipe device.

Pegg Hubb will add an entirely new dimension to stand alone (re-chargeable) automated touchscreen tapping. It will provide complete control with up to 4 tap pod placement positions, each with completely independent adjustment of position and speed/tap rate. Not only will it incorporate our unique super quiet operation technology, but as with all previous products, there’ll be no need to be tied down or restricted to plugged-in mains – we’ll be incorporating our very successful long life re-chargeable batteries for continued freedom to roam.   

Risks & Challenges

We recognise that we will have challenges as we move from design to prototype, and to production, but our team has a proven track record – successfully delivering all existing Pegg products, while continuing to provide customers with a reliable and trustworthy after sales service.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our story with your friends, subscribe to our social media channels and website to see how things are progressing.

story:
Short Summary

We are Stealthcom Corporation U.S.A., and Stealthcom Labs EU, subsidiaries of publicly traded UISC. Our parent company is known for its unique in-vehicle Navigation System UIS, and building off of this applied knowledge, Stealthcom is emerging as a leader in the secure communications sector.

We have extensive experience in hardware and software design which has enabled and driven us to create a new and much needed Secure Communications Smartphone platform that we call AEGIS Stealth TS© (True Secure) 

For years, familiar smartphone functionality appreciated in Android based secure platforms and other systems has been synonymous with the collection storage and use of your data by third parties including hardware and software manufacturers for the benefit of others. AEGIS Stealth© frees you from these privacy and security breaches, without sacrificing the familiar functionality of modern smartphones. AEGIS is specifically designed to protect the privacy of the user. AEGIS Stealth© is for us all.

In 2016-2018, we extensively invested in the development and production of the first working models of AEGIS Stealth© We now are at the threshold of introducing these first units of AEGIS Stealth© via this campaign and once the preliminary market response, we will rapidly move toward the full production  of the product introducing AEGIS to the world.

Both Stealthcom/UISC companies strive to invent technologies that meet or exceed expectations, fundamentally believing that satisfied customers will be their main business driver. Our AEGIS Stealth TS© smartphone addresses deficiencies with competing systems and simply offers a better solution. AEGIS Stealth© represents a significant point of departure from the ODM/OEM brands and after-market providers.

AEGIS Stealth© ensures your security through use of two (2) independent and custom Linux and Android based operating systems, which have been stripped at the basis level of any reporting protocols to parent companies. This means no reporting to Google or others on your location, statistics, metrics, searches, and communications data - a feat that no other phone can claim. We have changed the paradigm on smartphone security. With AEGIS Stealth©, your data is not stored on any server.

In addition to state of the art encryption, your AEGIS provides you with additional security by a unique Blockchain private/public key pair, for which there is not enough computing power on earth to unencrypt without your personally held private key which is completely unique to you - not even Stealthcom will know it. 

In short, AEGIS Stealth TS© will not allow anyone to spy, steal, store, use, or sell your data. It is not designed with that as a possibility. 

AEGIS Stealth TS© offers two secure and hardened OS’s, and the entire suite of AEGIS security applications protected by state of the art multi-level encryption, and is focused on the exact operational needs of the users, allowing integration, remote locking, wiping functionality, all while simultaneously ensuring your rights to privacy. 

AEGIS Stealth© Features: 

  • Two hardened and independent OS’s which along with their supporting apps are additionally protected by multiple levels state of the art encryption
  • AEGIS Stealth  is the bootable OS
  • The second hardened OS (among the first custom designed, functional Android OS's without Google-reporting protocols) can be activated by the user at any time for convenient functionality
  • Simple, and clean UI’s
  • ​A 6.1”- 1080 X 2160 FHD Amoled Display, Narrow Bezel 2.5D in a metal casing design
  • Featuring QUALCOMM SD 660 platform with a 6 GB RAM and 64GB of internal storage
  • CPU  4*2.2 GHz + 4*1.9 GHz (A73+A53) Octa core. GPU Adreno 512 
  • 20 MP Front Camera and a 20+16 Rear Camera.
  • B-Tooth – 4G Note: Disabled, on Aegis Stealth© mode
  • Wi-Fi 5 – GPS, AGPS
  • Finger print activation
  • Unique Block chain ID code designed for System Updates and Patches
  • Communication Bands are: GSM, TD-CDMA, WCDMA, TD-LTE, and FDD-LTE ** 
  • CE and RoHS and GMS certified                                        

The Campaign

AEGIS Stealth© through its secure proprietary function will be an important tool through which your personal and professional communications and data will 'stay' as your own. AEGIS Stealth© will not allow anyone to to spy, steal, store, use, or sell your data. It is not designed with that as a possibility. 

Our target customer base is comprised of the public sector, the corporate, the financial, the world journalist community, the health care industry, humanitarian organizations, and government/security forces sectors. Our campaign is focused on raising the next round of required funding needed to complete production of AEGIS Stealth©smartphones for the for the market. 

AEGIS Stealth TS© is a technology that our world needs and soon to be a reality. As such, we're offering a variety of great perks, with each contributor to our campaign receiving discounts of up to to $435 USD per phone, when purchasing 4 (four) AEGIS Stealth©, to be delivered April 2020.  Join our Crowd Funding campaign and  be among the first to own an AEGIS Stealth© - the world's only true secure smart phone platform.  

We welcome you in taking part in the introduction of AEGIS Stealth© smartphone introduction, and we encourage you to use the Indiegogo share tools to pass the word about AEGIS Stealth© to your associates, contacts, family, friends and neighbors. In this way assisting us into bringing AEGIS Stealth© smartphone to the world. AEGIS Stealth© is for us all.

https://www.stealthcomus.com

Copyright © UISC/Stealthcom Companies 2019- All Rights Reserved

story:
RIGOAL USB4 cables features not only 100W Fast Power Delivery, 5K@60Hz Display, 40Gbps Data Transmission, Compatible Thunderbolt 3, these powerful functions, and the tough design are also fascinating. 

Metal encased tips and is covered by a thick Aramid-Fiber Braided material, ensuring your cable is long-lasting and tangle-free. No more dreaded splitting or bent ends. Stop wasting your money on cables that don't last.

We've heard numerous complaints about charging cables:

  •     They are cheaply made! 
  •     They break too easily! 
  •     They are too short! 

Here are RIGOAL Cables we want to change things with our World’s Strongest & Powerful Aramid-Fiber Braid USB4 Cables.

The USB4 specification has four key traits, These include:

  • Two-lane operation with up to 40Gbps operation (over certified cables), using the USB-C connection;
  • More efficient sharing between data and display protocols;
  • Compatibility with USB 3.2, USB 3.1, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, and even Thunderbolt 3;
  • USB4 offer intelligent Power Delivery at up to 100W. The Power Delivery over USB4 is bi-directional, allowing power to flow to and from a connected device.

Up to 40Gbps Transfers Speed

RIGOAL USB4 cable can transfer data at up to a staggering speed of 40Gbps. You can transfer music, movies, or entire seasons of TV shows in seconds. High volume data capability makes the 40Gbps ideal for high definition video.

Single 5K or Dual 4K

RIGOAL USB4 cable support crystal clear HD dual monitors at Single 5K (5120 x 2880) @ 60Hz or 4Kx2K(4096x2160) @ 60HZ video resolution. Single cable docking solution to connect a Dock then drive 2 displays.

Samsung DeX Desktop Experiences

Turn your Samsung Galaxy S10/S9/S8/S10+/S9+/S8+ Note 9/8, Huawei Mate 10/10 Pro/20 Connect your smartphones to a monitor, for a desktop experience powered by your phone. So you can turn any place into a workplace. 

NOTICE: Please update to Andriod 9 System first, then can use the Samsung Dex function (system running configuration).

RIGOAL USB4 cable is the perfect travel companion. Allowing you to pack only one cable that fulfills all your needs. Charge you phone, listen to music, play videos from your phone to a TV, transfer photos to your computer at maximum speed. Charge or update your GPS device and many other uses.  

Support 5A/100W

It supports power delivery up to 100 Watts, providing fast charging for your MacBook Pro.

MacBook Pro (13") is charged to 65% in 30 minutes.

One of the few cables on market to support up to 100W Power Delivery & Laptop charging @ 5 Amp 20V = 100W. 

FAST CHARGE YOUR USB C PHONE

CHARHE YOUR PAD

Built-in E-Mark Chip

Without E-Mark Chip, USB-C to C cable CANNOT to negotiate up to 100W Power Delivery.

NOTE: Some TB3 cables may be rated up to 60W charging only.

ULTRA TOUGH ARAMID-FIBER REINFORCED

Each cable is woven with Aramid-Fiber Braid to increase durability and shield from heat. The flexibility of these fibers adds protection and structure without compromising movement to endure years of daily abuse.

Crafted With Only Durable Materials

USB4 brings data transfers at speeds up to 40Gbps over USB-C, enabling a superset of standard USB-C to truly enable one compact port that does it all  delivering the fastest, most versatile connection to any dock, display, or data device. For the first time, one port can connect numerous Thunderbolt devices, any display, and billions of USB devices (additional adapters may be required).

Coaxial cable

Rigoal USB4 cable used Coaxial cable which allows the cable's copper core to transmit data quickly, without succumbing to interference or damage from environment factors and ensure loading safety.

ULTRA TOUGH ARAMID-FIBER REINFORCED

USB-C to USB-C cable built-in 56 Ω Pull-up Resistor and 22AWG thick copper cores to ensure loading safety. 30,000 times plug test and 30,000 times bending test ensure maximum durability. 5X durable Nylon-Braided cable combined with aluminum alloy shell ensures solid and tangling-free. Excellent choice for a durable and cost-effective USB-C to USB-C cord.

Certified  Chipset

RIGOAL USB4 Cable use Convenient Power CPS8821 which is certified by USB-IF (Test ID 4244) PD E maker. It is a high-performance USB-C passive cable electronic label chip (E-marker), which support the latest USB PD3.0 V2.0 version and USB4 features, which is helpful for getting wider-spread support for high capacity USB power delivery. Which is helpful for getting wider-spread support for USB devices.

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt: Short Summary Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:  Introduce yourself and your background. Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you. Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.  Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?   What We Need & What You Get Break it down for folks in more detail:  Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.  Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited! Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.    The Impact Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:  Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world. Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one). Make it real for people and build trust.    Risks & Challenges  People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.  Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles. Describe your plan for solving these challenges.    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Everyone's got

#SomethingToShare

Other Features Include:

Barcode scanning, Batch adding, Photo Suggestions, Predictive Text Suggestions, Sending Reminders to Friends, Rating Items, Using Your Own Photos, Sending Automated Emails When You want Items Back, Lending, Borrowing, Editing, Viewing Friends Collections, Custom Categories, Fixed Categories, Lending Money and Predictive Search. 

To see more about what BleBlo does for you, please go to www.bleblo.com

 

We are the Brewskis and we thank you for your time and contributions


Help us by sharing the hashtags:
#CrowdFunding #BleBlo #SomethingToShare and the link bit.ly/bbindie 

 

 

Terms and Risks to Some of the Features and Commitments:

  1. Requires you to use Facebook connect to find your friends' collections
  2. Showcase page only if the campaign is 100% funded.
  3. There might be some unknown issues with the eBay API that I'm not sure about yet, everything looks fine but there is no way to know with full confidence that there won't be any issues until development is underway using new 3rd party APIs
  4. and 5. Custom names for showcase pages will be served on a first come, first served basis. If the campaign does not reach 100% funding your reservations will be stored for when showcase pages do eventually become available.
  5. Although these specific minifigs will only be made available for Indiegogo supporters I might make them available for other purposes if there is a surplus minifigs available; for contests such as an Instagram minifig photo contest etc.

story:
Hello IndieGoGo! Today we, are pleased to introduce a new revolutionary design direction for portable speakers! Tired of always trying to find and make extra space for you to carry the current market's 'portable' speaker designs? The solution, is right here! We not only created a TruePortable speaker design, but we also bring great sound at the very palms of your hand. We strive to create a product that will make every day problems become an advantage.

The Impulse is a unique phone case engineered with two pairs of speakers, a rechargeable battery, and it can be controlled via wifi with the Impulse app(soon to come)! We integrate 4 high quality speakers ensuring smooth, loud and undistorted sound. It also implements the use of the kickstand, to expand the usability for desks, tables, and etc!

 The rechargeable feature will allow you to keep that sound going without depletion of the batteries and the miniUSB to audio jack will enable music anytime, anywhere even when the battery is dead! The case also has a dynamic bass function to enable ultimate bass performance. Have surround sound at the palms of your hands while watching movies, and videos from your mobile device! The Impulse is also created with a microphone, to allow for Skype, FaceTime, and conference call capabilities! So the uses of this case are absolutely endless, keep that premier sound quality when you blast your music to full volume. 

 The Impulse also allows users to express their personalities through a variety of different colors, and designs that are available! Users will be able to go onto our website and be able to mix and match their own case with our integrated design program, enabling you to choose your preferred color-ways, designs, or even make your own artwork! Once the case arrives in your hands you will be able to show off your cool designs to your friends and family.

Manage your audio with ease today!

The case is only a thickness of 25.9mm! This making us the slimmest and smallest speakercase design to come on the market. 

CURRENT PROTOTYPE phase :

PLEASE KEEP IN MIND, YOU CAN PURCHASE ANY ONE OF THESE EVEN IF YOU DONT HAVE IPHONE 6 or 6S. PUT IN YOUR NOTES WHAT PHONE YOU NEED IT FOR AND WILL WILL GET ONTO MAKING A MODEL FOR IT! 

PLEASE CHECK THE FACEBOOK GROUP PAGE FOR MORE PICTURES OF THE PRODUCT! www.facebook.com/speakercaseprojecttoronto 

Thanks for taking the time to look at our campaign, and thanks to all who have pledged! If you can't, you can still help us by sharing our campaign!

This campaign will not only help us create a prototype, but it'll also get our manufacturing process started so we can start mass producing as well as a website( to allow for preorders and to give you access to the design studio!), and also the first line of products from manufacturing! Be the very first to own this masterpiece by pledging today! We only are able to support iPhone 6/6s currently but with your help in funding we will be working hard to cover most of the popular phones ! be sure to email us what phone you have, and the ones with the most amount of submissions will be worked on first! We will work our way down the submissions shortly after!PLEASE KEEP IN MIND, YOU CAN PURCHASE ANY ONE OF THESE EVEN IF YOU DONT HAVE IPHONE 6 or 6S. If you can't, you can still help us by sharing our campaign!

story:
Hey everybody! My name is Nick Morgan, maker of any and all things awesome. A number of years ago I became fascinated with working metal which has landed me here in front of you here today on Indiegogo. I bring to the table a new brand of product I call Aux Vape ™. Aux Vape ™, short for Auxiliary Vape, is a USB powered mechanical personal vaping device. I'm launching this campaign on Indiegogo because I need your pledges to help pay for tooling and equipment to ramp up into full fledged production. Each and every one of your donations will put us one step closer in the quest to create a truly American made product with as many materials locally forged here as possible.


By hitting our funding goal will be in a position to fund the tooling and machinery to get this product up and running. Your pledges will go to funding the tooling and equipment in order for this product to hit the marketplace. In return you, the people of Indiegogo, will receive high quality American made products at a discounted rate. The funding will also go to some new machinery that I will need to purchase in order to go into a production style environment. Every donation pledge makes a difference and will get us one step closer to where we need to be! If we do not hit our goal we will still do our best to make Aux Vape ™ happen.

Perks!

Literally, a 10 dollar bag o' metal chips. I'll mail you some metal chips from our production once we are up and running in a production format. If you'd rather not have the metal chips mailed to you and would much rather contribute to the campaign I'll graciously thank you for your donation! The materials will be brass or copper depending on what we are machining that day. Otherwise, you'll get some metal chips as a novel thank you for helping to establish a truly American made product! We're really doing it here!


The Aux Vape ™ Belt! ($25)

This pledge gets you (1) Aux Vape belt branded product from us that is completely functional and is something that you can use every single day. By selecting this perk you get classic style in a true Aux Vape form and helps us out getting us one step closer to our goal! The Belt is 54" Standard and is adjustable to fit anyone. I've wore one every day for 6 years and is still going strong! Thanks for the support!

The Aux Vape ™ Shirt! ($25)


By pledging this perk you will get an Aux Vape ™ Tee featuring our Copyrighted logo on the front of the shirt! We will need your details on the size shirt that you would like! Logo pictured above, when we have renders of the shirt on hand we will post them up.

The Aux Vape ™ USB Vape Early Bird Special! ($79) MSRP $139


By selecting this perk you will get (1) Aux Vape USB powered mechanical Vape at a very special Early Bird rate! Please note that this device needs to be ran with a 1.2ohm coil as noted in our campaign. We will only be offering 500 of these devices at this deeply discounted rate.

The Aux Vape ™ USB Vape – Indiegogo Campaign price


By selecting this perk you will get (1) Aux Vape USB powered mechanical Vape. Please note that this device needs to be ran with a 1.2ohm coil as noted in our campaign. If you missed the early bird rate, sorry. There will be another opportunity to catch another worm!

The Aux Vape ™ Shirt, Belt, and (1) USB Powered Aux Vape Combo ($150)

By selecting this perk you will get (1) Aux Vape USB powered mechanical Vape. (1) Aux Vape Belt, and (1) Aux Vape Tee. Please note that this device needs to be ran with a 1.2ohm coil as noted in our campaign. Bundle it up, wear and use our brand of products every day! *Image of the shirt will be posted with our logo when we get our rendering in.

For the shops! The Aux Vape ™ Vape Bar! ($700) Indiegogo Intro Price!

Are you a shop owner? Check this out! While traveling across the country to different vape shops, we noted that there appears to be something that could be incredibly useful in your shop to free up your time to spend with your customers. Are you a shop that uses battery powered mods for all of your juices for customers to come in and test out to find out their favorite flavor? Are you tired of constantly having to leave behind the counter to go change a battery out for a customer to try a new flavor of juice? Are you tired of batteries being stolen out of the mods? We've got a solution for you!


This is the Aux Vape ™ Vape Bar. The Vape Bar gives you six fused powered auxiliary jacks, plus two courtesy USB ports on the front of the box which serve as a charging station for your customers' phones while they hang out at the shop finding their perfect juice. The Aux Vape ™ Vape Bar features 1/4” Phone jack plugs connecting Aux Vape ™ with a proprietary junction box that only will function with that box. If the device is stolen, it is rendered useless without the power supply being attached to it. This gives you peace of mind, as theft happens everywhere and is an unfortunate part of business.


For the shop, that wants some Steampunk style and Flair:

The Aux Vape ™ Bar and Table setup. ($1100) Indiegogo Intro Price!

By selecting this perk you will receive (6) Aux Vape mechanical vaporizers with one our Aux Vape power distribution boxes, featuring (2) USB courtesy power output jacks for charging a mobile device. You also get a hand crafted vape bar table styled in true Steampunk style with burned gears, gold leafing of the Aux Vape logo, along with the mod stands and all of the hardware to assemble it yourself. This is the pinnacle of true functional art, designed and intended to last a life time.


Take note as to how this device functions!

This device is specifically designed to run at 1.2ohms, which is a common coil for the Kanger Subtank! Aux Vape ™ will also work with an herbal atomizer, so long as the coil is between 1.2-1.8ohms.

We specifically designed Aux Vape ™ around the Kanger Sub-tank, which is a socially accepted norm within the industry that functions flawlessly. Aux Vape ™ features all copper contacts with a self-adjusting industry standard 510 threaded top cap. Coupled with a side-firing mechanical switch, copper main tube, as well as brass end caps. Aux Vape ™ by Steampunk Vaping is composed of the highest quality materials, which are all locally forged in the United States. The device performance is dependent on the power supply to which the USB input is connected. Standard USB outputs on a laptop or desktop computer provide 5 volts and 2 amps of output current, or 10 watts, which is plenty of power for the device to function properly. The device will also work with herbal atomizers, as long as the resistance of the coils on the atomizer are at or above 1.2 ohms. We do not suggest running the device below 1.2ohms on a computer based power source.

Our goals - Where we need to be!

Our ultimate goal at Steampunk Vaping is to inspire our generation to support affordable American Manufacturing. Today, it seems like we're constantly waiting on a boat to show up from overseas full of our most wanted desires that are stocked on retailer's shelves across the country. The days of having many skilled artisans and people who are capable of making something out of what appears to be nothing are slowly fading away. This is why we have founded the new division of Steampunk Vaping LLC with our new product, Aux Vape ™.

With your help we can make this happen!

This is where you, the people of Indiegogo, come in. We have been researching and developing this product for the past year and are in our final stage of research and development with several functioning prototypes featured in this campaign. We want to inspire a new generation of affordable American manufacturing by creating jobs and supporting our local economy here in the States as much as we possibly can. We simply cannot do this on our own.

If you can not afford to contribute to your campaign please share it amongst all of your friends, family, and anybody within your social networks. We want to make this happen! If you have any questions please ask us! Thank you so much for your support!
