story:
Somos un equipo de tres mujeres curiosas y emprendedoras.


 

En septiembre 2013 nos marcamos una meta: crear un proyecto que aporte valor al conjunto de la sociedad y a la vez crear un motor de crecimiento que pueda ayudar a muchas personas. Así nació este proyecto que hoy presentamos. 

00 Limits es una solución para personas que se desplazan en silla de ruedas. A través de una aplicación móvil cualquiera puede consultar las infraestructuras y geolocalizar todos los sitios accesibles que necesiten en sus momentos de ocio y tiempo libre. Queremos desarrollar este proyecto en España siendo nuestra lugar piloto Las Islas Canarias. En el pasado mes de Diciembre hemos recibido un reconocimiento por parte del Ayuntamiento de Madrid http://www.compromisoempresarial.com/carrusel/2015/05/startup-madrid-10-cooperacion-publico-privada-para-impulsar-diez-emprendimientos/

Nuestra visión es crecer ampliando la información de nuestro directorio y llegar a muchas personas alrededor del mundo. Estamos convencidas de que este proyecto social, que apuesta por economías colaborativas, va a ser capaz de concienciarte y animarte a formar parte de la Comunidad 00 Limits. 

El segmento de personas discapacitadas es cada vez mayor.  Los cambios sociodemográficos y en los estilos de vida hacen prever un crecimiento continuo (accidentes tráfico y laborales, envejecimiento de la población y enfermedades).


¡Apuesta por 00 Limits y conseguirás ayudar a mucha gente que te rodea!


DIFUNDE NUESTRA INICIATIVA Y ASÍ DEMOSTRAREMOS ENTRE TODOS QUE NO HAY IMPOSIBLES, HAY IMPROBABLES. 
 Por eso te pedimos ayuda. Necesitamos hacer realidad este sueño y demostrar que de verdad NO HAY LIMITES  en la accesibilidad. 

El dinero recaudado se va a utilizar para integrar personas, tecnología y conocimiento.
 Vamos a construir un instrumento útil: una aplicación móvil que convierta el día a día de estas personas en un camino sin obstáculos. 
 

Nos hacen falta 40.000€: 

 10.692€ se destinará para contratar a un especialista que gestione la información de nuestro directorio accesible. Esta parte es importantísima porque ofreciendo una información completamente útil y actualizada seremos capaces de ayudar de verdad a la Comunidad. Para ello vamos a contratar a una persona en silla de ruedas, ¡quién si no lo va a hacer mejor!.

25.184€ serán para implantar tecnología en nuestra app móvil. En estos momentos necesitamos, entre otras cosas, mejorar partes de 00 Limits para que uses nuestra solución móvil de una manera más intuitiva y eficaz. Estos avances  van a permitir ahorrar tiempo y esfuerzos a la hora de organizar cada salida en nuestro día a día.

4.124€ para realizar una campaña de promoción en las asociaciones de personas con discapacidad física de la Comunidad de Madrid. Necesitamos el dinero para la impresión de flyers, desplazamientos y acciones ( participación en reuniones, eventos, congresos...), que nos ayuden a promocionar nuestro infalible instrumento.

Es importantísimo que nos ayudes a difundir esta campaña. Somos conscientes de que ahora mismo la situación económica no está en el mejor momento pero eso no  va a frenar nuestros planes para hacer una sociedad inclusiva.

                                             

También te damos otra opción para colaboraciones no dinerarias: conviértete en nuestro        

           

                       EMBAJADOR 00 LIMITS

                                    

Necesitamos aumentar nuestra información para que nuestro directorio crezca y convertirnos en un referente de accesibilidad. Solo tienes que decirnos los lugares accesibles que sueles visitar en tu barrio, pueblo, ciudad, provincia... y nosotros nos encargaremos del resto. Hacer esto es muy fácil: dirígete a nuestra web http://www.00limits.com/ y en la pestaña de inicio  (desplázala hacia abajo con tu ratón porque es como un pergamino) verás                                           

                                "¿Quieres añadir tu sitio favorito?".

                          

Para compensar tu esfuerzo hemos pensado en unas recompensas útiles y originales para ir por la vida sin límites. Alguno de estos regalos lo han elaborado personas con discapacidad. Ayudando a 00 Limits también estas ayudando a personas que lo necesitan de verdad.

A continuación tienes nuestra selección de recompensas.

 

*English Version*

Adela, Juana and Claudia are our names, and this is our story. We are three curious women that like undertake our ideas.


In september 2013 we set ourselves a goal; create a project that would contribute to the rest of society and at the same time start a motor that would grow helping people. We ended up with the project that we introduce today.

00Limits is a solution for people sitting on wheelchairs. Using a mobile app anyone can check out infrastructures and geolocalize all the accessible places needed in their free time or vacations. The project is being developed as a first experience in Canary Island, Spain. 
Last December 2014 we have received a recognition on behalf of Madrid´s Hall http://www.compromisoempresarial.com/carrusel/2015/05/startup-madrid-10-cooperacion-publico-privada-para-impulsar-diez-emprendimientos/ 


Our vision is to be able to grow adding info to our directory and reach many people around the world. We are convinced that this social initiative, that bets on social economies, will get a lot of people envolved in the 00Limits community.

Supporting 00Limits you are going to help a lot of people surrounding you. 
The segment of people on wheelchairs is growing bigger. Social and demographic changes and our way of life are showing a continuous growth (car and working accidents, population aging, wars and diseases). 


We want to get far, do you want to come along? 


This is why we are asking for your help. We need to make this dream real and show there are no real limits in accessibility. 
The money we raise will be used to integrate persons, technology and knowledge. 
We are building a very usefull instrument; a platform that will serve on a daily bases to reach anywhere without obstacles. 

We need 40.000€.
10.692€ will be destined to hire a specialist in this environment to manage all the info of the accessible directory. This is one of the main elements, because offering a complete useful and up to date information, we will be able to truly help the community. The person to be hired will be someone using a wheelchair, we could not think of somebody better.

25.184€  is the budget destined to technology for our mobile app. Right now what we are in the need of developing the app in a intuitive and easy to use way. All this development will make real our target in time and effort saving when we decide to plan our journey. 
4.124€  is the sum we have destined to promotion in associations of people with this kind of problems. We will use this amount to print out flyers, journeys and events (such as meetings, events and congresses) to introduce our tool.
We feel it is very important to spread out this campaign. We are aware of the economic situation, but it is not going to stop us in making an inclusive society. 
Spread out the word about this initiative and so we will prove that if everyone gets involved we will be unstopable. 
You can also help us just by acting as our ambassador. No need to give out any money. 


We need to increase our information flow, to make our data base bigger and so we wil become a reference in accesibility. You just need to tell us which places are accesible in your neighborhood, town or city. We will do the rest. You can do it using our web site www.00limits.com and in the landing page you will find "Add your favourite place". 
As rewards for your effort we have thought about some presents.
story_txt:
Somos un equipo de tres mujeres curiosas y emprendedoras.
 En septiembre 2013 nos marcamos una meta: crear un proyecto que aporte valor al conjunto de la sociedad y a la vez crear un motor de crecimiento que pueda ayudar a muchas personas. Así nació este proyecto que hoy presentamos. 00 Limits es una solución para personas que se desplazan en silla de ruedas. A través de una aplicación móvil cualquiera puede consultar las infraestructuras y geolocalizar todos los sitios accesibles que necesiten en sus momentos de ocio y tiempo libre. Queremos desarrollar este proyecto en España siendo nuestra lugar piloto Las Islas Canarias. En el pasado mes de Diciembre hemos recibido un reconocimiento por parte del Ayuntamiento de Madrid http://www.compromisoempresarial.com/carrusel/2015/05/startup-madrid-10-cooperacion-publico-privada-para-impulsar-diez-emprendimientos/Nuestra visión es crecer ampliando la información de nuestro directorio y llegar a muchas personas alrededor del mundo. Estamos convencidas de que este proyecto social, que apuesta por economías colaborativas, va a ser capaz de concienciarte y animarte a formar parte de la Comunidad 00 Limits. El segmento de personas discapacitadas es cada vez mayor.  Los cambios sociodemográficos y en los estilos de vida hacen prever un crecimiento continuo (accidentes tráfico y laborales, envejecimiento de la población y enfermedades).¡Apuesta por 00 Limits y conseguirás ayudar a mucha gente que te rodea!
DIFUNDE NUESTRA INICIATIVA Y ASÍ DEMOSTRAREMOS ENTRE TODOS QUE NO HAY IMPOSIBLES, HAY IMPROBABLES.  Por eso te pedimos ayuda. Necesitamos hacer realidad este sueño y demostrar que de verdad NO HAY LIMITES  en la accesibilidad. El dinero recaudado se va a utilizar para integrar personas, tecnología y conocimiento. Vamos a construir un instrumento útil: una aplicación móvil que convierta el día a día de estas personas en un camino sin obstáculos.  Nos hacen falta 40.000€: 

 10.692€ se destinará para contratar a un especialista que gestione la información de nuestro directorio accesible. Esta
parte es importantísima porque ofreciendo una información completamente útil y
actualizada seremos capaces de ayudar de verdad a la Comunidad. Para ello vamos a
contratar a una persona en silla de ruedas, ¡quién si no lo va a hacer mejor!.
25.184€ serán para implantar tecnología en nuestra app móvil. En
estos momentos necesitamos, entre otras cosas, mejorar partes de 00 Limits para
que uses nuestra solución móvil de una manera más intuitiva y eficaz. Estos avances  van a
permitir ahorrar tiempo y esfuerzos a la hora de organizar cada salida en nuestro día a día.
4.124€ para realizar una campaña de promoción en las
asociaciones de personas con discapacidad física de la Comunidad de Madrid.
Necesitamos el dinero para la impresión de flyers, desplazamientos y acciones (
participación en reuniones, eventos, congresos...), que nos ayuden a promocionar nuestro
infalible instrumento.
Es importantísimo que nos ayudes a difundir esta campaña. Somos
conscientes de que ahora mismo la situación económica no está en el mejor momento
pero eso no  va a frenar nuestros planes para hacer una sociedad inclusiva.



                                             

También te damos otra
opción para colaboraciones no dinerarias: conviértete en nuestro        
           
                       EMBAJADOR 00
LIMITS


                                    
Necesitamos aumentar nuestra información para que nuestro directorio crezca y
convertirnos en un referente de accesibilidad. Solo tienes que decirnos los
lugares accesibles que sueles visitar en tu barrio, pueblo, ciudad,
provincia... y nosotros nos encargaremos del resto. Hacer esto es muy fácil:
dirígete a nuestra web http://www.00limits.com/ y
en la pestaña de inicio  (desplázala hacia abajo con tu ratón porque es
como un pergamino) verás                                           
                                "¿Quieres añadir tu sitio favorito?".

                          
Para compensar tu
esfuerzo hemos pensado en unas recompensas útiles y originales para
ir por la vida sin límites. Alguno de estos regalos lo han elaborado personas
con discapacidad. Ayudando a 00 Limits también estas ayudando a personas que lo
necesitan de verdad. 





A continuación tienes nuestra selección
de recompensas.

story:
A Simple Innovation against Overuse of Smartphone! 


<NEW!!!>

iPhoneジャケット、寺本エディションが追加されました！

この商品は、日本の画家寺本和純氏(モンテカルロ国際美術賞展やアメリカ美術賞展などで 受賞)とのコラボレートモデルです。

氏の代表作の一つ”ロータスの池”をジャケットにしました。

この商品には機構部分は入っていません。

iPhone 6,6plus,iphone 5,5s向けになります。後日希望機種をメールで確認いたします。

（目標額不達の場合にもこの商品は発送されます）

We added new perk which is a collaboration model that we created with one of famous artist in Japan "Kazuyoshi Teramoto"(for iPhone 6,iphone 6plus,iphone 5,iPhone 5s).He won  “Illusional Gold” Prize at "Prix International d'Art Contemporain de Monte-Carlo" (Monaco) in 2006 and was selected as representative from Japan for "Salon International de Paris" (Paris) in 2008.




Libero: The phone case that puts your phone to sleep when you shouldn't be using anyway

Libero is a smartphone case that prevents excessive use, and the use of smartphones while walking.


Do you ever worry about your kids?

In the year 2012, 284 American teens pedestrians died and another 10,000 were injured.  
About 38% were caused by use of phones while walking.
According to this article by Safe Kids Worldwide.

New research shows smartphone use is linked to depression

 A study from Northwestern University revealed that the more time people spent using a phone, the more likely they were to suffer from depression. 


This is NOT their fault

But OUR problem.

Now is the time for action!



We strongly hope to eliminate these harms of smartphone.

Libero phonecase presses on/off button of the phone to puts the phone to sleep in several situation.

Our solution is the only way to save the children from side effects of smartphone!

Because Apple and Google do not allow developers to control OS.

Our solution provides another level of control and integrity that has not been achieved by phone applications and software to date.


Who is the Libero Phone Jacket for?


For Your Children

While smartphones and tablets are great for your child’s education and development, too much exposure to smartphones and tablets during this crucial period may affect your child's social and emotional development and can be a cause of depression.

Give your child a smartphone in the Libero Phone Jacket and you will be able to moderate your child’s screen-time, even when you’re not around.





For Yourself

Do you feel ‘lost’ without your phone?

Do you want to start spending your free time more constructively? 


The Libero Phone Jacket not only looks cool as a phone case, it’s designed to help you with habit correction and to help you live in harmony with technology.



Function: You can configure the following limitations

1. Total time

You can configure your case to allow the user (you or your child) anywhere between 30 minutes to 24 hours of phone use in a day.
The phone case has it's own electronic circuitry that can count the phone's time used. This is reset every day.

2. One session

 You can also configure your case to allow the user anywhere between 5 minutes to 1 hours of phone use in one-session. Users can't keep on using the phone more than configured duration.  This is reset every day.

The case will operate a mechanism that puts the phone into it's sleep mode and preventing you from using it further, once time the phone has been used for reaches the amount of phone use that you've configured.

3. Remote control

 You can put your child's phone to sleep with your smartphone application's Blue tooth communication!!←NEW!

Time and occasion

4. Timezone

You can also configure no-use time zones for the phone. This is useful for preventing phone late at night.

5. Walking

You can also configure limitation of using smartphone while walking. This may prevent accident.


Compatability

The Libero Jacket is compatible with iPhone and Android smartphones.

Libero for

iPhone (4, 4s , 5 , 5s , 6 , 6plus)

Android ( Galaxy S4 , S5 , SC Series)

 are available now!


mechanism-free case

The harm of smartphone is a huge problem that until now there has not been a solution for.

For those who sympathise with our cause, but don't have any children or a necessity for the device themselves.
 

 Be sure to purchase our Jacket only case. 



In pursuit of simplicity and beauty, we've put the belt loop inside!





Choose Your Color！！




Small and Light

-Libero itself is not heavy (90g~130g).
-Not thick (2mm〜4.5mm)
-Not wide (〜9mm),Not tall(〜9mm)

Features and Specifications

- Lock it and leave it
The Libero Phone Jacket is designed to be locked with the phone inside, so the phone or configuration settings can not be touched without damaging the case. Rest assured the phone will be getting used the way you configured it.
- Dual Charging
The Libero battery charges whenever the phone is charging, so it will never run out of batteries before your mobile phone. The Libero battery is rather small so the overall charge time will remain more or less unaffected.
- Walking Smartphone Protection
The Libero Phone Jacket is equipped with motion sensing technology that will distinguish when you are walking and can be configure to switch your phone to sleep when detected it is being used while walking.
- Music playback and Phone calls are Uninterrupted

Since the Libero functionality is achieved by pushing the phone's power button, music playback and phone calls will be unaffected.

The Libero Phone Jacket can be configured to allow the user to make or take phone calls at any time.







Risks & Challenges

The Libero Phone Jacket has been developed up to a second-prototype. This has given us confidence to prove the concept works and can be completed.
Following a successfully funded IndieGOGO campaign we anticipate that we will face many risks and challenges in the months to come.
The dual-charging facility of the Libero Phone Jacket is a key design criteria that maintains the integrity of the safety elements of the device. This is one design element in which we must include in our final design of the product. A poorly developed dual-charging technology may hinder the charging or sync ability  of the iPhone when connected through the Libero Phone Jacket. As such, we must endeavor for a  design that has no affect on this, but allows for dual charging through one wall charger.

About us (Momo.inc)

We are a band of technology enthusiasts who have adored it since it’s very origin.

MOMO.inc has been founded to challenge issues that arise from technology. Our projects will use our expertise and our unique ‘Millennial Generation Y’ experience to tame aspects of this information overloaded world, and reform technological designs that contribute to anti-social behavior.

Our team name ,’Momo’ originates from a fantasy novel by Micheal Ende.

The story is about time-thieves who stole time from village people, and a child; Momo, who brought the stolen time back to the people.

Help Momo help other like-minded non-for-profit organizations!

We will donate a portion of our profits from your pledge amount to the-minded organization of your choice! Your donation information will be reported publicly on our facebook page.

Thank you for reading such a long text!!
We hope to hear from you :)

story:
www.FitPouch.com

We are giving you the opportunity to Pre Order your Fit Pouch and be one of the first people in the world to own one, to reward you for your support we are offering you a 30% discount off the normal retail price.

Fit Pouch is a protective, sweat proof neoprene phone case that uses magnets to secure your phone anywhere around your waisteband. This means you can position your phone anywhere to suit your workout, Keeping it safe and out of the way!

Fit Pouch Features;

  • Designed specifically for Exercise
  • Super Strong Magnetic Clasp
  • Protective Neoprene Case
  • Sweat Proof
  • Unlimited Range of Movement


WHY FIT POUCH...?

We designed Fit Pouch so that you can still use your phone whilst working out, you can skip between songs or even track your training progress.

Whether its Weight Lifting, Body Building, Cross Fit, Running, Cycling or just all round keeping fit we all like to listen to music while we train, in fact it has been scientifically proven that listening to music whilst working out improves both strength and stamina.



Having your phone in your pocket or even sports bra whilst training is at best awkward and can often result in a damaged or broken phone, In fact many fitness shorts and leggings do not even have pockets. 

Currently your only option is a fitness armband, big bulky things that limit movement and often fall off. These also make skipping songs and changing volume impossible.



For Running or Sprinting - You can even use your Fit Pouch on the inside of your waisteband, giving you further protection and preventing your phone from swinging while you run.


WILL MY PHONE FIT...?


Fit Pouch is available in 3 sizes designed to fit 99% phones on todays market;

The Regular Sized Fit Pouch has been designed to fit:


WHERE ARE WE NOW...?

We have spent the last 6 months prototyping and refining Fit Pouch to ensure it is the best it can possibly be. We have tested it to destruction in all aspects of fitness including Crossfit, Body Building, Running and even Rock Climbing.


The first batch of Fit Pouch are now being manufactured and and are nearly ready to be shipped. We are giving you indigogo supporters the opportunity to be one of the first people in the world to own Fit Pouch at a one off discounted price!

We have also included free international delivery as we think Fit Pouch should be available to all!


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP...?

We know that contributing to the campaign isn't always a possibility for everyone- so if you believe in our product and the brand we are building, please contribute in other ways! We love all of the support we can get.

  • Share this project on your Social Media Profiles, Walls, Forums, Pages etc
  • Email your friends and family members that may be interested
  • Write to online tech sites and ask them to feature our campaign
  • Send us a message of support and encouragement

PRESS & WHOLESALE ENQUIRIES ...?

For all press and wholesale enquiries please contact us through our website.

Send us a message of support and encouragement




PRESS & WHOLESALE ENQUIRIES ...?For all press and wholesale enquiries please contact us through our website.

story:
Nulaxy is covered on:

And more...

Why Nulaxy?

As smartphones and tablets become more powerful and faster, people want more efficient typing and navigation experience on touch screen devices. Bluetooth keyboards and mouse, which utilize cordless technology, have become the primary way to achieve that. However, most of them are not idea and comfortable if compared to your home and office full size USB keyboards and mouse, which you have been using for year.

That’s why we want to create Nulaxy adapter, which could upgrade your regular USB keyboard and mouse to wireless Bluetooth keyboard and mouse. We do not expect this could be a killer to current Bluetooth keyboard and mouse industry; but our technology will save you money, and most importantly, reserve more comfortable typing experience for you.



The Impact

Innovation is the spirit of our enterprise. With your support, Nulaxy will:

1. Convert your current USB mouse and keyboards to Bluetooth ones;

2. Save your pocket, but reserve familiar and better tying and navigating;

3. Upgradeyour old equipment; less production of Bluetooth keyboards and mouse will help save the planet.


Project has been completed, you can purchase directly on Amazon:

http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00T5YXNL0/keywords=Bluetooth+keyboard+mouse


×××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××××

FAQs


1.  It is only for mouse and/or keyboard?

This device is designed to convert any of your home & office wired USB keyboard and mouse simutaneously to Bluetooth ones; however, if you donot connect a wired keyboard to the adapter, the mouse won't be able to connect individually.

2. Is it also possible plug in USB Stick and read the data via bluetooth? Is it also possible to use USB Hub pluged to the device and all USB devices pluged in?

That is a brilliant idea. We have not worked on that function; after we finish the project, we will think about how to realize other data communicaiton through Bluetooth.

3. How does it charge?

You can power it through regular micro USB cable, or you can two AAA batteries to power it. We recommend not using batteries unless you are travelling. It doesn't contain lithium batteries, so it is safe for tranportation.

4. Is there any possibility of multi-pairing and quick-switching between devices?

This doesn't work as a switch; once connected to keyboard, it acts just as a basic  Bluetooth keyboard.

story:
VisionCube is an affordable, compact, cellphone controlled (HD) LED projector. You can take it with yourself anywhere. Thanks to its built-in battery, and the WiFi, it can be used without disturbing wires.

Partying with friends, family armaments at home, in a meeting, or just for fun, you get out VisionCube, and you can show your images, videos, or even play. Your friends will love not only its knowledge, but it stylish design, too. Easily travels VisionCube beautiful design from the kitchen , to the pool , to the camp site ... Wherever you need a boost of ultimate FUN !

Its price isn’t extravagant, the full package will cost in stores around 100$. You don’t like any edition in store? Unique colored edition can be ordered too.

Full-color RGB LEDs light source deliver astonishing image quality with superior color saturation.

The projector lies in an elegant, resistant, metal box, that is available in 5 different colors. Thanks to its stand, you can set even the angle of projections.


VisionCube has only one button, and it lights in the dark. Here you can turn it on, and then it spreads the WiFi signal in 10 meters range. The full set up of the projector, and its controlling can be done by its cellphone application. The app will be available on iOS, Android, and Windows Phone, and not only on cellphones, but on tablets too.

At first it will be available in 5 different languages (English, German, French, Chinese, Hungarian), but the list will grow.

VisionCube not only compact , but also extremely energy -efficient . The battery life of up to 4 hours of continuous play time blockbuster movies , or up to 6 hours for continuous playback.


The length of projection is from 20 to 200 cm, and its LED light can last 20000 hours thanks to the power save mode, and because of the LED technology it doesn’t heat up. Sharpness can be changed manually and automatically too. On the back it has a jack connect, or where you can attach even speakers, but if you didn’t have any, it can use your phone’s or tablet’s speaker. There is an USB spot on the bottom. At the same time it’s a docking station and the connection to the stand. For the safer pitching the two surfaces have magnet. You don’t want to use WiFi? With the help of the stand and a microUSB wire, you can connect your phone. The package contains a microUSB - HDMI inverter, so you can use HDMI, too.

Because of its small size, you can take it anywhere, you don’t need cord, or socket. It hides perfectly  in a briefcase or even in a belt bag.

As soon as the campaign started, I’ll keep you updated about our process. We can be followed here and on the Facebook, Google+ and Twitter page of VisionCube.

There will no doubt be some surprises during the product development, but we are an experienced team and we will address and resolve any engineering or production issues as they emerge. Our goal is to deliver the best quality product to you in a timely manner.

I hope this campaign will end successfully, and I can give VisionCube to the world as a gift.

Thank you for your attention!

story:
JOIN THE AIJLE ANYANGLE CAMPAIGN     

Geekview – “SUPER COOL for smartphones”

SOHU – “Still use the selfie stick? Come and try this IPHONE mobile phone holder”

Global Technology Report – “AIJLE anyangle phone holder is a new type”

Tech News Point – “The AIJLE Anyangle conforms to any angle”

Features

This is the first mobile phone holder with a 360-degrees friction hinge.

Each product is made of aircraft-grade material lightweight aluminum.
The surface of each product has been oxidation colored.
AIJLE Anyangle is an  durable product (at least for 2 years).the magnet and silicone joint action, will make the phone more firmly fixed on the phone holder.

It is only a quarter of the volume of general car phone holder, half the weight, but the load is doubled. The maximum value is 800g While silicone and magnets acting together.Iphone6 plus is only 180g.


Flexibility to any angle

In the car

AIJLE Anyangle is the first mobile phone holder that can be dust-free when it is not in use.

Will not block the drivers or passengers' line of sight

Allow you to recharge mobile device while driving

High precise design, with durable material, and elegant appearance

Excellent portability and you can easily put it into your pocket.

Unique, elegant, and practical. When it is not in use, nobody will regard it as a phone holder. It's very cool.

Settle your devices within a minute and no tools needed.


Better than any similar products, its 360-degrees friction hinge can be locked to any angle.

DO NOT WATCH VIDEO WHILE DRIVING!

AIJLE Anyangle is the first cellphone holder that can change its shape and allow different combinations to achieve different functions.

For example, placing two cell phones together and combining them like Lego Magnet.

The coolest mobile phone holder

It is not just a phone holder or a good toy.

Record your life

By placing it any area,  AIJLE Anyangle will be the prefect holder for you to take a self portrait or a video and record your life.AIJLE Anyangle has some features that self portrait pole doesn't have. 

Get better selfies than using selfie stick




On the refrigerator

It is the first phone holder that can be used as a fridge magnetic sticker.

It is easy to take and leave with. You can take a self portrait or video by placing it on the refrigerator.


Diana Wang decorated the first AIJLE Anyangle with delicate diamonds which was all handmade with 4A level 3kt natural sapphire. It is the most expensive phone holder whose price is 650 dollars and is more expensive than the Apple iphone6. Moreover, we can engrave your name or any words you want on the holder by laser. The diamonds-decorated and words-engraved AIJLEs are two worldwide limited edition .


What colors do you offer?

What's inside the package?

   Please recycle packaging materials

FAQ

  1. Who are AIJLE Anyangle made for?
         Anyone who uses smart-phones and wants to enjoy its convenience. 
   2.  How do I fix AIJLE Anyangle in my car?
         Very simple. Just post a small stainless steel iron discs onto your            console.
    3.  How do I assemble fix Anyangle if I use it on my table?
         Open then use it.
    4.  How much weight can it support?
          400 gr. /16 oz. (when the magnet and silicone joint action)
          260 gr. /  8 oz.  (when  only the silicone )Modern smartphones weigh 5 oz. on average
    5.  What can I do with a pair of AIJLEs?
          Just as what we have illustrated in the picture above, you can use 2 Anyangle and have more fun.
    6.  Does AIJLE Anyangle fit all mobile phones?
           Yes. AIJLE Anyangle fits all kinds of mobile phones.
    7.  Is AIJLE Anyangle water-proof?
           Yes.
    8.  What colors do you offer?
          We offer Golden, Silver, and Grey AIJLE Anyangle.
    9.  Can I charge my cellphone when using AIJLE Anyangle?
          Yes.

What We Need & What You Get

We are really excited about this and we hope so you are. Now we need your contributions for us and we will bring a new phone holder into your pocket.

As a supporter, you will get your AIJLE Anyangle at a very special price! So please consider backing our project and sharing it with your friends and family. Our price includes your delivery cost.

If you find a new feature of the AIJLE Anyangle, please take a photo and send it to us, We will put it on our website and a special gift will be mailed to you.

Challenges

AIJLE Anyangle has the same dual damping shaft as IMAC 2002. But I redesigned the shaft and made it even smaller than a coin and the damping intensity is also adjustable.
It has a unique dust-proof design, This dual adjustable 360-degrees friction hinge may be the smallest in the world, which takes me a lot of time to design and test it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you appreciate our project, please consider sharing it with your friends and family by clicking the share buttons under the video. It will help us a lot to spread the word!

Thank you!

Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
Help stand for FREEDOM!

Are your excited about and cherish the very freedoms that our forefathers intended you to have?  They made an enormous sacrifice, some giving their lives, so that we can enjoy the freedoms that we have.

Do you feel them slipping away?  Tired of the constant scandals, ethics charges, and downright deceit in politics today?  No, I'm not talking about the federal politicians; I'm talking about our great state of Alabama.

Will you help us gain Ballot Access so we can run good, constitutionally minded candidates?

What We Need & Why

It's pretty simple:

  • Petitions
  • Event Volunteers & Support
Major party candidates are nominated by the state primary process. Independent candidates are granted ballot access through a petition process and minor political party candidates are nominated by convention along with a petition process; one must collect 3% of the total votes cast in the last election for the specific race or 3% of the total votes cast in the last gubernatorial election for statewide ballot access. The figure for 2018 statewide ballot access is approximately 36,000 good signatures. 
Be aware that the validity of signatures generally means that 20-30% more signatures will need to be collected to ensure that the goal is achieved. To retain ballot access a minor party has to poll 20% in a statewide race and it will retain statewide ballot access through to the next election.

The Impact

This signature threshold is the second highest in the country for statewide office and among the highest for any political office.

By helping the Alabama Constitution Party gain ballot access you:

  • Give citizens in Alabama more than the "lesser of two evils"
  • Give citizens a true constitutionally conservative choice on the ballot
  • Will sleep well at nigh knowing you are supporting constitutionally conservative candidates!  :)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute you can still help by volunteering to:

  • Work an event booth
  • Collect petitions
  • Share your video or picture editing talent

Visit our candidate petition site at VoteCP for downloadable petitions and other information.

Visit our web site Alabama Constitution Party for more information about our party.

story:
Sharek what is it ?

Sharek is a file transfer app who allow user to transfer data between android devices , iPhone devices and PC/MAC  

WHY Sharek?

Sometimes people got problem to transfer data (photos, video, music, files and app) between devices. Bluetooth is slow and obsolete Bulky cable Slow data transfer Sharek can help you to solve this problem. With sharek you can transfer data quickly and easily without use a cable. Now forget about cables, slow Bluetooth, apps that have to use your mobile data and tools that need you to install software on your computer.

some screenshot


Easy to Use


You can transfer files up to 8 devices.


Connect Anyone Anywhere


Risk And Challenge 

The typical challenge when building a mobile application is finding the right people to design and build the application. We have already designed the application, and have employed an amazing team to build it.

We have also bootstrapped most of the funds needed for the mobile application, and need your help for the final push to get the app better.

The reality is that whether we get funded or not, we already launch the app. However your support is tremendously appreciated to help us and all our amazing users.

story:
----------------

Order Here

or get in touch with us

----------------


About Us?

We have implemented lots of innovative projects for industrial and academic purposes. We have more than 10 years of experience in coding and hardware implementations. Our startup company is called Innoesys and our objective is to bring innovative ideas to life.

What We Ask?

We ask you to help us implement our idea. Some of our products can be found online (check them here). Others are parts of large scale projects for bigger companies.

Why Help?

Are you an Arduino lover? You like new ideas? You want to help small startup companies to make a difference? You are just a kind person? Then you must definitely help!


Overview

DEVO-4DAC+ is an Arduino shield based on MCP4728 12-bit, quad channel DAC from Microchip and provides four analogue buffered or un-buffered outputs. Each output is capable of providing 15mΑ in operation without the output buffer or 40mA when operating with the buffer circuit. Each output can be separately configured to operate in buffered or un-buffered state while the voltage gain is set-up using the corresponding potentiometer from 1 to 11. The output buffer is a voltage amplifier with external power source up to 26V. The maximum achievable amplifier output voltage is External power supply – 1.5V. 


For a single channel, the output voltage (Vdac) is given to the DAC in steps of ≈1.22mV (maximum DAC output voltage of 5.0V). Vdac can be amplified using the onboard voltage amplifier by selecting the desired voltage gain (Gain) and applying the required external power source. Note that amplifier output (Vamp) can reach the Vext voltage minus 1.5V (Vext – 1.5V). For example, if the desired output voltage is in the range of 0V to 12V, Vext should be set at 13.5V (12V + 1.5V) and the Gain must be set to 2.4 using the onboard potentiometer. In this particular example, the output voltage steps are ≈2.93mV. The user can select which voltage output (Vdac or Vamp) is routed to the actual board output terminals by using the onboard jumpers. Some useful equations for the voltage outputs are given below.


Board description

Connections

DEVO-4DAC+ is controlled by the I2C bus according to the commands of MCP4728 DAC which hare sent from the default SCL and SDA pins of the Arduino board. The output voltages are routed to standard 3.81mm terminal blocks along with the amplifier power supply. It provides additional configuration pins for setting the board parameters as will be described in next section.


DEVO-4DAC+ pinout description:

Pin

Location

Direction

Required

Description

5V

Header

Power

YES

DEVO-4DAC+ power supply

GND

Header

Power

YES

DEVO-4DAC+ Ground

SCL

Header

Input

YES

I2C bus clock signal

SDA

Header

Input/Output

YES

I2C bus data signal

PB0

Header

Output

OPTIONAL

Digital output pin

PB1

Header

Output

OPTIONAL

Digital output pin

PB2

Header

Input

OPTIONAL

LDAC signal of MCP4728

PB3

Header

Output

OPTIONAL

RDY signal of MCP4728

A0 – A3

Header

Output

OPTIONAL

Analogue output pins

OUT1

Terminal

Output

OPTIONAL

Channel 1 output voltage

OUT2

Terminal

Output

OPTIONAL

Channel 2 output voltage

OUT3

Terminal

Output

OPTIONAL

Channel 3 output voltage

OUT4

Terminal

Output

OPTIONAL

Channel 4 output voltage

VEXT

Terminal

Power

OPTIONAL

Power supply for the voltage amplifier

GND

Terminal

Power

OPTIONAL

Ground for the voltage amplifier

DEVO-4DAC+ requires the power supply signals and I2C bus signals in order to be operational. The rest pins are optional in terms that they are used depending on end application requirements.

·  5V and GND (Header) pins

The power supply pins for the DEVO-4DAC+ shield. The 5V pin is directly connected to the MCP4728, so care should be taken when applying the power source in order to not exceed the maximum supply voltage (5V) of the MCP4728. 

·  SCL and SDA pins

I2C bus signals which are directly connected to the MCP4728 IC.

·  PB0 and PB1 pins

PB0, PB1 pins can be used for testing purposes and are connected to an on-board LED through 3-pin jumper.

·  PB2 pin (LDAC)

PB2 pin is connected to the LDAC signal of MCP4728. LDAC is used to transfer the to transfer the contents of the input registers to their corresponding DAC output registers and to select a device of interest when reading or writing I2C address bits.  When the logic status of the LDAC pin changes from “High” to “Low”, the contents of all input registers (Channels 1 - 4) are transferred to their corresponding outputs and all analog voltage outputs are updated simultaneously. If this pin is permanently tied to “Low”, the content of the input register is transferred to its output (OUTx) immediately at the last input data byte’s acknowledge pulse. For more information regarding LDAC pin and updating the output voltages please refer to MCP4728 datasheet.

·  PB3 pin (RDY)

PB3 pin is connected to the RDY signal of MCP4728.This pin is a status indicator of EEPROM programming activity. This pin is “High” when the EEPROM has no programming activity and “Low” when the EEPROM is in programming mode. It goes “High” when the EEPROM program is completed.

·  A0 to A3 pins

These pins can be used for debugging purposes when they are configured as analog inputs on the Arduino board. The pins are connected via jumpers to the MCP4728 output channels.

·  OUT1 terminal pin

Channel 1 output voltage terminal pin. It is routed either to the amplifier output or directly to the MCP4728 channel 1 output by a 3-pin jumper.

·  OUT2 terminal pin

Channel 2 output voltage terminal pin. It is routed either to the amplifier output or directly to the MCP4728 channel 2 output by a 3-pin jumper.

·  OUT3 terminal pin

Channel 3 output voltage terminal pin. It is routed either to the amplifier output or directly to the MCP4728 channel 3 output by a 3-pin jumper.

·  OUT4 terminal pin

Channel 4 output voltage terminal pin. It is routed either to the amplifier output or directly to the MCP4728 channel 4 output by a 3-pin jumper.

·  VEXT terminal pin

The (external) power supply for the voltage amplifier when an amplification of MCP4528 output(s) is desired. This pin should be connected to voltage source of 3V to 26V. NOTE that the maximum amplifier output voltage is Vext – 1.5V.

·  GND terminal pin

Ground connection for the voltage amplifier. 


Configuration

DEVO-4DAC+ provides different configuration options that could be set depending the application requirements. There are configurations for the output terminals, the on-board LED and the DAC output loop-back connections. The only required configuration in the connection of the output terminals. The rest configurations are optional.

·  Output terminal configurations

There is a single configuration for each output channel which is done using a jumper. The configuration sets the output connection of a single channel to the amplified voltage output or to the DAC output. Fig 3 describes the configurations for the four channels in the amplified and non-amplified versions. For the amplified version, jumper should be placed at the AMP position while for the non-amplified configuration the jumper should be placed at the NAMP position.

·  Digital output configuration (PB0 & PB1)

Using a single jumper (P5), the user can use the on-board LED for testing purposes by connecting it either on pin PB0 or PB1 of the Arduino board.

Using a single jumper for each channel, the user can route the outputs from MCP4728 to the analogue inputs A0 to A3 of the Arduino board. The table below describes the connections for each channel. Note that outputs from the DAC are connected to these pins, not the amplified versions. Fig. 5 shows the jumper placement for connecting channel 1 output (DAC output) to the A0 Arduino analogue input. 

Jumper

Channel

Analogue input

OUT1

1

A0

OUT2

2

A1

OUT3

3

A2

OUT4

4

A3

Voltage amplifier settings

The on-board voltage amplifier can be used in case amplification is required to the voltage outputs from MCP4728. External power supply should be connected to the VEXT and GND terminal pins. The amplifier gain can be set separately for each channel using the on-board potentiometers while the corresponding channel’s jumper should be placed at the AMP position. The gain is decreased by turning the potentiometer clockwise and is increased by turning it counterclockwise (Fig. 6) and could be set at any value between 1 and 11.  


Electrical characteristics



Software tools

For Arduino board, there are many resources for the MCP4728 IC:

http://forum.arduino.cc/index.php?topic=51842.0

   

Board dimensions

All dimensions are in mm.

 


Connection examples

·  4 channels without amplification

 

·  4 channels with amplification and maximum output voltage 12V

 

·  Channels 1 & 2 with no amplification and channels 3 & 4 with amplification and maximum output voltage 24V
story_txt:
----------------Order Hereor get in touch with us

----------------

About Us?We have implemented lots of innovative projects for industrial and academic purposes. We have more than 10 years of experience in coding and hardware implementations. Our startup company is called Innoesys and our objective is to bring innovative ideas to life.

What We Ask?
We ask you to help us implement our idea. Some of our products can be found online (check them here). Others are parts of large scale projects for bigger companies.



Why Help?Are you an Arduino lover? You like new ideas? You want to help small startup companies to make a difference? You are just a kind person? Then you must definitely help!
Overview
DEVO-4DAC+ is an
Arduino shield based on MCP4728 12-bit, quad channel DAC from Microchip and
provides four analogue buffered or un-buffered outputs. Each output is capable
of providing 15mΑ in operation without the output buffer or 40mA when operating with
the buffer circuit. Each output can be separately configured to operate in
buffered or un-buffered state while the voltage gain is set-up using the
corresponding potentiometer from 1 to 11. The output buffer is a voltage
amplifier with external power source up to 26V. The maximum achievable amplifier
output voltage is External power supply – 1.5V. For
a single channel, the output voltage (Vdac) is given to the DAC in steps of ≈1.22mV
(maximum DAC output voltage of 5.0V). Vdac can be amplified using the onboard
voltage amplifier by selecting the desired voltage gain (Gain) and applying the
required external power source. Note that amplifier output (Vamp) can reach the
Vext voltage minus 1.5V (Vext – 1.5V). For example, if the desired output voltage
is in the range of 0V to 12V, Vext should be set at 13.5V (12V + 1.5V) and the
Gain must be set to 2.4 using the onboard potentiometer. In this particular
example, the output voltage steps are ≈2.93mV.
The user can select which voltage output (Vdac or Vamp) is routed to the actual
board output terminals by using the onboard jumpers. Some useful equations for
the voltage outputs are given below.

Board description
Connections
DEVO-4DAC+ is controlled by the I2C bus
according to the commands of MCP4728 DAC which hare sent from the default SCL
and SDA pins of the Arduino board. The output voltages are routed to standard
3.81mm terminal blocks along with the amplifier power supply. It provides additional
configuration pins for setting the board parameters as will be described in
next section.

story:
INTRODUCING SMARTCUBO

We are really proud to announce you the SmartCubo Concept!
SmartCubo will be THE FIRST Cube Shaped Device with 5 Super AMOLED 3.9 inches touchscreens, Android Operating System and High-End hardware , ready to be your next favourite Gagdet!



SMARTCUBO FEATURES 

SmartCubo will  be a device for Internet Browsing , Social Media , Media Playing and everything a smartphone can give you expect Calling! 

It will not replace your smartphone!

Actually it will be designed having the ability to work paired with it ,too! 


SmartCubo will be the device providing the REAL MULTITASKING experience , by setting the displays you want Active , you can control 1 to 5 apps simultaneously!



ALL YOUR NOTIFICATIONS "INSIDE THE CUBE"

As mentioned above SmartCubo will have the ability to keep you updated to your your mobile device! 

Paired with you Favourite Smartphone via bluetooth 4.0 all your notifications will be ''inside the cube".




SMARTCUBO SPECIFICATIONS



SmartCubo will come with 16Gb built in storage,  Android Marshmallow , 3Gb of Ram , High End Processors ( Graphics & Central ) and software designed to work as expected with our 5 displays setup! 
User will also have the ability to swap apps between active displays with gestures and turn on displays with a triple tap !   



" A CUBE HAS 6 FACES "

SmartCubo Will be designed with 5 displays , sixth face of the Cube will be used for the rest of the device's components!

Bottom of the device is still under analysis !  Although we plan to place an 2.5 audio jack a nice quality speaker , micro sd card slot and a high deifinition 16 Megapixels camera ! We are also planning to place magnetic charging surface but it is still to early to know!



HELP US START ''BUILDING''

In order to start The SmartCubo Prototype Development we need your donations.
GET READY FOR THE SMARTEST CUBE EVER MADE !

story:
This is the Smart Strap from Smart Of Sweden


We have been working to bring a product to the world that helps us to make life a little bit easier.
The Smart Strap is not only a design fun gadget for your mobile phone, it has three main functions that will help you to handle your mobile phone.


  • Smart Strap will help you to never drop your phone again
  • It works as a table stand
  • You can use it as a car holder
  • It is also reattach-able  
  • Smart Strap comes with 2 years warranty 




We have chosen material's very carefully so the Smart Strap can last for many years to come, that is why we are offering 2 years warranty.

The Smart Strap is made with NANO tape, and you can remove and paste it as many times you want, if the NANO tape take gets dirty you can easily just rinse it with water and it will be new and good to go.

Smart Strap is very handy and adjustable, it allows you to accurately and securely use your phone with one hand. 

The Smart Strap comes in many different colors so it can match your phone or personality.

You can attach your Smart Strap to any smartphones on the market.


This provides you with the ability to do more throughout your day. Besides, the Band is with 3 grooves that can be adjusted accordingly to the thickness between men and women's finger. 



After you use it it will be hard to use your mobile phone again without it.
We want our Smart Strap to make life little bit easier throughout the day for you.


No more hanging car holder that blocks your view with your Smart Strap

                 
                    Choose your favorite color


                       Our Timeline



Thank you so much for watching and reading our campaign, we hope you will enjoy it as much as we do, we are four friends that loves gadgets and we have always wanted to create a phone gadget that we would use on daily basis.
This is our creation that we have worked with for a year now, and now we need your help to start manufacturing The Smart Strap, we need to order in bulk so we get the manufacturing price down so we can offer The Smart Strap for a competitive price.


Risks & Challenges

We have faced our challenges by now and we need your help to start manufacturing the Smart Strap, we are in time with our timeline and we will deliver in time.

Share our campagin if you like our Smart Strap like we do :)

story:
Designed with children age 5+ in mind, Pocket Racing is wholesome fun that will spark dad’s nostalgia and his son’s imagination and excitement.  Just launch a Pocket Racing game on your iPad or Android tablet, and place a car on the screen to get into the race. 

Pocket Racing can be played in both single player mode, as well exciting multiplayer mode. Bring the family together for some wholesome fun by facing off on the virtual racetracks, and see whose Pocket Racer is first to go flying in a spectacular crash!


Play at any angle you want! Pocket Racers’ specially designed micro-suction pad adheres to your tablet’s screen.  But don’t worry - the car is just as easily removed without leaving so much as a smudge on the screen!
story_txt:
When Hot Wheels ® meets the “iThing” generation, introducing Pocket Racing, the first of its kind new toy that combines the “old school” fun of yesteryear with the excitement of a truly unique digital gaming experience. There’s nothing else like it!
Pocket Racing provides a first of its kind gaming experience that combines the timeless fun of real toy cars with 21st century tech and “cool factor.” It fuses real toy cars with exciting racing games for iPad and Android tablets. Watch as the car responds in real life to the on-screen action! !


Designed with children age 5+ in mind, Pocket Racing is wholesome fun that will spark dad’s nostalgia and his son’s imagination and excitement.  Just launch a Pocket Racing game on your iPad or Android tablet, and place a car on the screen to get into the race. Pocket Racing cars respond in real life to the onscreen action, bouncing up and down over bumps in the road, flashing their lights, even changing color as they speed down the track. But try not to crash, or get hit by an opponents missile - because your Pocket Racer will literally go flying!Just install the app from the Apple Store or Google Play, active your car by placing it on the iPad, and you’re off to the races. !Pocket Racing can be played in both single player mode, as well exciting multiplayer mode. Bring the family together for some wholesome fun by facing off on the virtual racetracks, and see whose Pocket Racer is first to go flying in a spectacular crash!


 

Pocket Racing is compatible will all iPad models (Mini, Air, and Pro) as well as any tablet powered by Android. 

Play at any angle you want! Pocket Racers’ specially designed micro-suction pad adheres to your tablet’s screen.  But don’t worry - the car is just as easily removed without leaving so much as a smudge on the screen!
Pocket Racing 2.0 adds even more tracks, features and effects including new weapons, more challenges with the new online multiplayer mode, and new types of cars and shells

story:
Because we live in a world where music and smartphones are essantials to our daily life and that is why we wanted to create a down jacket that is easy to wear and that matches our lifestyle, we are to present to you the 1st and only down jacket ultralight connected and fashionable.


How this STORY start:

Ice-Watts Corp. is a company that was created by two friends passionate about fashion and technology. Numerous trips abroad enabled Avi to notice several times how essential some accessories are to daily life.

 After losing a dozen earphones and after repeatedly forgetting them when leaving for work, Avi decided to go see his friend Ari, a fashion specialist, to find a solution to this problem.

 During their meeting on this topic Ari told Avi he was having the same problem, but with his phone battery.

 Together they got to work and created after 6 months the first ultralight and fashionable down jacket in the world with integrated Bluetooth/jack earphones that are impossible to tangle up or lose, and with an integrated solar power bank.

There you are, you know everything!

 With this Avi and Ari really hope to make your life easier.



Our team is made up of fashion designers and entrepreneurs with over 20 years of experience. The creation of ICE-WATTS has been an ongoing challenge that has enabled us to obtain a high quality, fashionable, reliable and comfortable product that can be worn every day by anyone, anywhere, anytime. To achieve this, we had to surround ourselves with the best manufacturing and design factories for all the materials and the top range technology of the ICE-WATTS. For this reason we are able to guarantee delivery and quality of our products and offer a 5 years warranty. The models that will be delivered will be very close to the prototypes that we are presenting to you (logo on the Bluetooth adapter, logo on the zipper tag, security hologram sticker on the box) you will have the pleasure to discover the comfort and the ergonomics of the ice-watts. Our factories have the capacity to produce more than 50,000 pieces per month and this has been for us a priority to not disappoint you on delivery date. Thank you for your trust.

EXCHANGE POLICY : 

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets, vests, and hoodies will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices on Indiegogo, we won’t be able to accept returns.

WARRANTY :

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE 5 YEARS

WE’RE CONVINCED YOU WILL LOVE OUR PRODUCTS

PARTS ACCESSOIRIES: For the period of 5 years from the original date of purchase and subject to the limitations of the warranty, manufacturer will supply at charge, new or rebuilt replacement parts in exchange so long as (1) the customer has applied for the following warranty at www.ice-watts.com/warranty within the first 12 months of purchase (2) provides proof of purchase during warranty application (3) has done so within the first 12 months of purchase, and (4) manufacturer must determine the equipment is defective. 
PARTS DOWN JACKET : For the period of 1 year from the original date of purchase and subject to the limitations of the warranty, manufacturer will supply at charge, new or rebuilt replacement parts in exchange so long as (1) the customer has applied for the following warranty at www.ice-watts.com/warranty within the first 12 months of purchase (2) provides proof of purchase during warranty application (3) has done so within the first 12 months of purchase, and (4) manufacturer must determine the equipment is defective. 
It does not cover defects due to improper handling, handling and general misuse or improper or unreasonable use of the product. Also excluded are damages due to maintenance or disassembly performed by anyone not authorized by ICE-WATTS person, modifications or alterations to the device, damage resulting from inadequate packaging when returning a device or the results of an accident. This warranty is invalidated automatically if the label bearing the serial number has been removed or deleted. To qualify for the commercial product warranty, it is imperative to keep the purchase invoice of the product.

The models that will be delivered will be very close to the prototypes that we are presenting to you (logo on the Bluetooth adapter, logo on the zipper tag, security hologram sticker on the box) you will have the pleasure to discover the comfort and the ergonomics of the ice-watts. Our factories have the capacity to produce more than 50,000 pieces per month and this has been for us a priority to not disappoint you on delivery date. Thank you for your trust.EXCHANGE POLICY : If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets, vests, and hoodies will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices on Indiegogo, we won’t be able to accept returns.WARRANTY :100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE 5 YEARSWE’RE CONVINCED YOU WILL LOVE OUR PRODUCTSPARTS ACCESSOIRIES: For the period of 5 years from the original date of purchase and subject to the limitations of the warranty, manufacturer will supply at charge, new or rebuilt replacement parts in exchange so long as (1) the customer has applied for the following warranty at www.ice-watts.com/warranty within the first 12 months of purchase (2) provides proof of purchase during warranty application (3) has done so within the first 12 months of purchase, and (4) manufacturer must determine the equipment is defective. PARTS DOWN JACKET : For the period of 1 year from the original date of purchase and subject to the limitations of the warranty, manufacturer will supply at charge, new or rebuilt replacement parts in exchange so long as (1) the customer has applied for the following warranty at www.ice-watts.com/warranty within the first 12 months of purchase (2) provides proof of purchase during warranty application (3) has done so within the first 12 months of purchase, and (4) manufacturer must determine the equipment is defective. It does not cover defects due to improper handling, handling and general misuse or improper or unreasonable use of the product. Also excluded are damages due to maintenance or disassembly performed by anyone not authorized by ICE-WATTS person, modifications or alterations to the device, damage resulting from inadequate packaging when returning a device or the results of an accident. This warranty is invalidated automatically if the label bearing the serial number has been removed or deleted. To qualify for the commercial product warranty, it is imperative to keep the purchase invoice of the product.

story:
Our smartphones play a key role in our daily lives; but as we demand more from them, we find that battery life simply cannot keep up. 

icaZE is the one battery case to rule them all.

With more battery life, more memory, wireless charging, and Bluetooth connectivity, you’ll never have to worry about that little red light popping up as you go to take that gorgeous shot.


icaZE is the ONLY Battery Case you will ever need! 


Here's how icaZE will change your life!!!


  • icaZE extends your battery life by up to 100%. 
  • Add extra Memory via an SD Card Slot up to 128GB.  
  • Enjoy Wireless Charging. 
  • Embedded NFC with enhanced payment wallet capability. 
  • Bluetooth Connectivity for seamless file sharing. 
  • Lightning Port + Micro USB Port for Smart Charging.
  • Best of all you can CUSTOMIZE your icaZE to match your STYLE!!!







  • All icaZE are shipped out with a generic Black Skin.  You can then Order a customized Skin from the icaZE Online Store.  
  • You can also upload your own image through the Online Store to create your unique icaZE Skin




icaZE allows you to add extra Memory to your Phone.  Most Battery case with integrated Memory Storage are not very versatile.  They have fixed storage capabilities and quite static.

Why you need this?

icaZE reThinked features allows you to use any Micro SD Card instead from your different devices and offers even more flexibility in terms of Storage.

Use a 8GB Micro SD Card or a 128GB Card, it's your call. icaZE adapts to your needs.  Use a SD Card from another Device to access your files directly on your Phone via your icaZE.

For example, use your SD Card from your camera and slide it inside the icaZE and VOILA you can easily access all your pictures in a breeze



icaZE has integrated Wireless Charging feature which allows you to charge both your icaZE and your Phone simultaneously.  You can use any QI Compatible charger to charge your icaZE.

Why you need this?

No wires means less hassle. No harassing tangling wires around your phone. You can use your phone with even more freedom and enjoy it with no string attached. Wireless charging is even faster than conventional charging 

Once you place your icaZE on a compatible Charger, it will start Charging automatically.  The LED will illuminate GREEN and both your icaZE and your Phone will start juicing up!

No more Wires, no more hassle. BE MOBILE!




Use payment wallet functionality with

icaZE embedded NFC connectivity

Why you need this?

You want to use your phone to its full potential. No Restrictions whatsoever. Our integrated NFC Chip gives you and your icaZE even more flexibility.  You can now use the payment wallet function  with a wide range of third party service providers.  You can also use the NFC function to scan and read NFC Compatible tags.

icaZE unleash your phone!



Why you need this?

Because you do not always have your wires and cords with you.  Imagine you are at your friend's house and you need to transfer/share some files to you icaZE real quick. 

It's quick and easy with icaZE. No need to plug-in. Send files to your icaZE from other Bluetooth Compatible devices and store your files directly onto the SD Card. 

It's all-in-one with icaZE




Why you need this?

You never know what kind of adventures you might get yourself into.  You might need to juice-up your icaZE and your Phone anytime and we want to make it EXTRA easy for you to do so.

icaZE gives you the flexibility of two ports; you get your usual Lightning Port and an additional Micro USB Port to smart charge both your icaZE and your Phone at the same time.

You can use both ports to SYNC your Phone and your icaZE at the same time.

icaZE: reThink what a Phone Case can do!









Team icaZE

Behind the Scenes

XOGG is the African Startup behind the icaZE.  We started officially mid 2016 even though the idea of the icaZE started tickling our brain cells much much earlier. We are located in Mauritius... Mauritius? Where's that? 



We might be the very first Mauritian Tech Startup to come up with such a product and we really want to prove ourselves. 

We have worked very hard to get icaZE off the ground and we know we still have many challenges ahead.  

Bringing icaZE to Indiegogo is one of them.  We want to show you that African Startup can really create great products and most importantly; DELIVER!

The Team




Which phones are compatible with icaZE?

icaZE is compatible with iPhone 6 and 6S during our crowdfunding campaign. Based upon demand, we may also release the icaZE for 6+ and 6S+

When will the icaZE be delivered?

We anticipate delivery by end of October 2016

When will the icaZE App be released?

The icaZE app will be released alongside our online store launch through end of September 2016 as soon as mass production starts.

When will the icaZE Online Store be launched?

The icaZE Online Store will be launched alongside our icaZE app at the end of September 2016

How much extra battery does icaZE provide?

The icaZE provides an additional 2400mAh battery for iPhone 6/6S, which is equivalent to more than 12 hours extra talk time, 10 hours extra video play, 10 hours extra game time and 8 hours extra internet time.

How can I know the Battery Status of my icaZE?

You can check the Battery Status on the icaZE app.  You will also receive a Low Battery message when your icaZE reaches below 10% Battery Charge

What is the Battery Button on the side of the icaZE for?

You can use Battery button to juiced up your iPhone when your phone’s battery is getting low

Do I have to charge my icaZE and my iPhone separately?

Nope. You can charge both at the time.  Once you’ve plugged in the Lightning Cord or Micro USB or even if you are using a Wireless Charger, your icaZE and your iPhone will both Smart Charge.  You can still charge them separately if you want to do it the hard way!

How do you charge icaZE?

There is a 3 ways to charge your icaZE and your iPhone, you can charge both simultaneously using;

  1. Wireless QI Charger
  2. Your usual iPhone Lightning Cord
  3. A Micro USB cord

How long does it take to charge icaZE and the Phone?

 It takes about 1h45min to fully charge the icaZE, and 3.5hour to fully charge the Air Case and the iPhone together. 

Wireless charging via the QI Charger is even faster.

How do I use the Wireless feature on my icaZE?

The Wireless feature on your icaZE is always active.  Once a compatible charger is available, it will be automatically detected and charging will start right away.  You will also notice the Battery Charging icon on your phone screen.

Where can I get a Wireless QI Charger?

You can purchase the original icaZE wireless charger through our Online Store. You can also you any QI Compatible Charger, we are OK with that.

How thin is icaZE?

icaZE is only 13 mm (0.51") thin. With all the features packed inside, it’s the thinnest of its kind! More than just a phone case, it’s an extension of your phone and you will not even notice it’s there!

Can icaZE also protect my phone?

Yes, although icaZE is thin and sleek, it is very robust. The outer shell bumper and the case protect your phone from all-around, making it shock-proof.  Our locking mechanism also ensures that your iPhone remains securely locked inside the case and prevents the phone from sliding out of the case accidentally.

What is LED on my icaZE for?

The LED is one of the many cool features on the icaZE.  It basically tells you the MOOD of your icaZE.  The LED illuminates in GREEN, WHITE, RED and BLUE depending on what you are doing with your icaZE.


How do I Connect/Disconnect my icaZE from my phone?

Connecting your iPhone to the icaZE is very easy.  Make sure the iPhone is Turned OFF.  Pull out the top by pressing the two locks at the top of each side of the icaZE, slide your phone in and make sure the Lightning Connector of the icaZE is fully inserted into the iPhone.  . Put back the lock on and press, you should hear a Click Sound.  Power On your iPhone. The icaZE LED will blink GREEN to show that you’ve done it properly and VOILA!

Disconnecting the icaZE is even easier.  Power OFF your iPhone. Remove the top lock. Slide your iPhone out gently and you are DONE!

Can I Still Sync my iPhone with the icaZE on?

Yep.  You can still sync your iPhone even if the icaZE is on.  Easy! You can even send files to your icaZE when its connected to your PC. You also have to choice to connect with either your usual Lightning Cord or the do-it-all Micro USB Cord.  You are also charging both your icaZE and your Phone while doing that.  It does not get any better than that

You have Bluetooth too! How do I use it?

You can use the Bluetooth feature to receive files from a Paired Devices.  You can pair up to 3 devices with your icaZE.  There is  a button on the right hand side of the icaZE to allow quick Device Pairing.  Once a Device is paired, it will display on your icaZE App.  You can start sending files to your icaZE as you normally do with any Bluetooth Compatible device.  Once a file is received, notifications will pop-up on your phone screen.  You will also receive a message in case you do not have sufficient memory of the SD Card to accept a file.

You can change your icaZE name to any name you want and manage your Paired Devices from the icaZE app.

At the moment you are unable to send files from your icaZE using the Bluetooth.  This feature will be enabled later on.

How do I insert/remove my SD Card from my icaZE?

You will find the SD Card slot on the left hand side of the icaZE.  Just remove the protective cover and insert the SD Card gently inside the slot.  The SD Card will be locked inside the slot.  If you want to remove the SD Card, please ensure that your iPhone is powered off, press the SD Card in and it will pop out of the slot.

How do I manage my files on my SD Card?

The icaZE app helps you manage all your files on your Micro SD card.  Create folders, organize files, delete unwanted files and more from the icaZE app.

What kind of memory card should I use with the icaZE?

You can use any Micro SD Card up to 128GB

How will I use my icaZE as a payment wallet?

icaZe uses it’s embedded NFC feature.  We are actually working with International Card issuers VISA® and MasterCard® for a wallet feature to be integrated in our app.  We have also been contacted by Digital Wallet Companies who wish to incorporate icaZE’s payment feature to their app

What else can I do with NFC feature on my icaZE?

You can also scan RFID tags, for example when you are shopping, to get Special deals information on different products. You can also use the NFC feature to scan IC cards aka Smart cards.

How to I customize my icaZE?

Customizing your icaZE is really easy.  You just have to slide in our proprietary icaZE Printed Card inside the icaZE and you are good to go.

You can get all kinds of designs from the icaZE Store and the best part is that we can also print-on-demand.  You can have anything you want on your icaZE. We match your Style!

How much is shipping and handling?
Shipping is $10 for 1 icaZE and $5 for any additional icaZE on same order
