story:
cradl's patented engineering changes the way you interact with your phone.

Our case's drop-down sides provide uninterrupted, side-to-side swipe access to your screen, maximizing your device’s versatility and design.

 

 

 

At it's thickest, a cradl case adds just slightly over 3mm of thickness to your phone.

With regard to being lightweight? Our 6/6s/7 case weighs 14 grams. Light as a feather...

 

raised corners

Raising the corners of the case offers screen protection while the phone is face-down even with the sides of the case dropping down for full screen access.

 

 

flexible outer shell

The outer case is made of flexible, impact-resistant materials that absorb and disperse shock away from your device when dropped. The strong grip also helps you avoid drops and keeps your phone from sliding off smooth surfaces.

...and is co-molded to the sturdy inner skeleton...

card storage

Our Bubbles & Blocks cases were carefully designed to ensure a snug and safe fit of a couple cards. Allows you to leave your bulky wallet or bag at home. Travel light...

 

easy access to ports while also providing protection

Our case design makes the headphone jack, charging port, speaker and microphone easily accessible while keeping these important features better protected from dust and dirt than cases that have one opening. These small openings were designed to allow use with most off-the-shelf charging cables and headphones.

Easily plug different headphones into your headphone jack. (Because isn't it frustrating when you get home with your new headphones and they don't fit through your case??)

 

...and when you drop your phone...and you will because you're human...

 

We had a series of certified drop tests performed by D.L.S. Conformity Assessment in Illinois. Look at this phone after 25 consecutive drops from at least 4 feet onto all different angles of the device. There's no damage to the screen and the phone functioned perfectly afterwards. The materials being used for the landing area, per drop-test requirements, are a thin layer of plywood backed by a cement base. 25 is a lot of drops...

 

...do you recognize that stomach-clenching feeling you get when your phone slips out of your hand, or slides off a table...?

 

 

 

Our cases combine protection and art into one remarkable product. Our commitment is to continue bringing fresh and artful designs to you with every new device case we introduce to the market while never compromising its durability.

Style, protection and confidence: that's cradl.

That's you, too.

 

Spring 2017 Colorways

 

We loved being featured in a spread alongside Otterbox and Bark. Keeping good company...

 

 

We thought if we were creating a case especially for an Apple device that one of the artful back designs should have a tree with a branch for Apple's fruit to hang from...

 

Our manufacturer, Avid Product Design, in Loveland, CO has helped to reinvent injection molding. This new breed of unique molding machines features exciting, award-winning, patent-pending technologies that offer an alternative to the way injection molding has been done all over the world since the 1950s. These machines consume about 90% less energy then conventional injection molding machines. cradl is the only cell phone case in the world currently made with this new technology!

 

 

 

cradl has been issued two utility patents by the United States Patent Ofﬁce for our unprecedented full-screen access case design, which allows edge-to-edge swiping without comprising protection. We also have additional utility, design and international patent applications pending. We've been issued our registered trademark in the USA and Japan.

 

 

At cradl we believe in in the power of giving back.

We utilize a “Capital Gift” strategy. Through this approach, we can gain a better understanding of the needs and goals of those organizations we are giving to. As opposed to a flat donation, which in our experience can create logistical and budgeting issues, Capital Gifts lay out a specific funding goal. Once that goal is met, we move on to our next non-profit partner. $0.50 of every case cradl sells goes toward this program.

 

 

Have a friend who would like cradl? Want to share our story? Please do! Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker.

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.

let's do this.

 

 

We ship worldwide. In-stock iPhone 6S/6 cases will ship immediately. We expect to ship the iPhone 7 cases in late April. 

 

 

Have a question that you can't find the answer to? Contact us at support@cradlcase.com.

about us…

What is it?

cradl cases are iPhone cases that both inspire and protect. They are ultra-slim and lightweight while also providing drop-tested, rugged protection. Our carefully designed cases allow for edge-to-edge swiping, great for access to your notification center along with any “landscape” apps, maximizing your device’s versatility and design.

Who created it?

cradl was started by a mother and daughter in Boulder, Colorado.

Where are the cases manufactured?

cradl cases (and packaging materials) are manufactured entirely in the United States.

How much does it cost?

The MSRP for the cradl iPhone 6s/6 case is $32 and the iPhone 7 case is $34. See the perks above to get great savings on a case for the iPhone 6s/6 and 7!

Do you have a website?

 Please visit us at www.cradlcase.com.

 
Why are you on Indiegogo?

We've had an outpouring of requests for a cradl design that fits the iPhone 7 and also other devices. This campaign's success helps us to finish the iPhone 7 molds that are underway and due to be finished later this month and begin manufacturing them right away. Reaching our stretch goal allows us to begin the molds for the Samsung Galaxy S8 in April and deliver those pre-orders during the summer.

 

about the case…

Will it fit on my phone?

cradl cases currently are manufactured for the iPhone 6s/6. We will have cases to ready to ship for the iPhone 7 pre-orders in April.
Do you have more than one design?

Yes, our iPhone 6s/6 cradl cases are offered in a bubbles, blocks and tree design. Each design has multiple color combinations. Please visit our website at www.cradlcase.com to see the available options for each design.

Note: the iPhone 7 cases will be available in the bubbles and tree designs, only. The Samsung Galaxy S8 case will allow us to introduce a brand-new classic cradl design for the back of your device that provides awesome, artful protection.
What colors are available?

There are SO many choices! Visit our website at www.cradlcase.com to see them all. After all, a picture is worth a thousand words...
Will a cradl. case protect my phone?

Yes. We had a series of certified drop tests performed by D.L.S. Conformity Assessment in Illinois. They dropped a working phone with our case on it 25 different times from all different angles from at least 4 feet onto all different angles of the device. Afterward, there was no damage to the screen and the phone functioned perfectly. The materials being used for the landing area, per drop-test requirements, were a thin layer of plywood backed by a cement base. 25 is a lot of drops...

Is the case slim?

Very. At it's thickest, a cradl case adds just slightly over 3mm of thickness to your phone and weighs just 14 grams.

What comes with my order?

Each pre-order of the iPhone 7/6s/6 in the perk above will include a tempered glass screen protector.

Will I have to take the case off to access ports?

No! All ports are easily accessible without removing your case for most after-market charging cords and headphones. (In fact, we didn't test one that didn't fit.)

 

shipping information…

When will my case ship?

In-stock iPhone 6s/6 cases will ship immediately. We expect to begin shipping the iPhone 7 cases in April and Samsung Galaxy S8 cases in the summer.

Do you offer worldwide shipping?

 Yes!
How much is shipping?

Shipping charges will be available at checkout.

Would I be able to be a reseller or distributor for cradl?

 Hell, yes. Please contact Elizabeth Dining at elizabeth@cradlcase.com for more information about this.

 

 

customer support…

Is there a warranty?

Yes, all of our cradl iPhone cases come with a Lifetime Warranty. This warranty covers manufacturing defects in the case. It does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout it's lifetime that is to be expected from normal use. We do not 100% guarantee the protection of your iPhone, no phone is unbreakable!

What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?

 See these steps on How to Request a Refund.
What is your return/exchange policy?​

 

We want you to be happy with your purchase! If you receive your product and you aren't satisfied for any reason, you may return it within 30 days for a full refund (refund does not include shipping fees). For more information contact support@cradlcase.com.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

 You can check the status of your pre-order by logging into your Indiegogo account or emailing support@cradlcase.com.
story_txt:
cradl's patented engineering changes the way you interact with your phone.Our case's drop-down sides provide uninterrupted, side-to-side swipe access to your screen, maximizing your device’s versatility and design.   At it's thickest, a cradl case adds just slightly over 3mm of thickness to your phone.With regard to being lightweight? Our 6/6s/7 case weighs 14 grams. Light as a feather... raised cornersRaising the corners of the case offers screen protection while the phone is face-down even with the sides of the case dropping down for full screen access.  flexible outer shellThe outer case is made of flexible, impact-resistant materials that absorb and disperse shock away from your device when dropped. The strong grip also helps you avoid drops and keeps your phone from sliding off smooth surfaces....and is co-molded to the sturdy inner skeleton...card storageOur Bubbles & Blocks cases were carefully designed to ensure a snug and safe fit of a couple cards. Allows you to leave your bulky wallet or bag at home. Travel light... easy access to ports while also providing protectionOur case design makes the headphone jack, charging port, speaker and microphone easily accessible while keeping these important features better protected from dust and dirt than cases that have one opening. These small openings were designed to allow use with most off-the-shelf charging cables and headphones.Easily plug different headphones into your headphone jack. (Because isn't it frustrating when you get home with your new headphones and they don't fit through your case??) ...and when you drop your phone...and you will because you're human... We had a series of certified drop tests performed by D.L.S. Conformity Assessment in Illinois. Look at this phone after 25 consecutive drops from at least 4 feet onto all different angles of the device. There's no damage to the screen and the phone functioned perfectly afterwards. The materials being used for the landing area, per drop-test requirements, are a thin layer of plywood backed by a cement base. 25 is a lot of drops... ...do you recognize that stomach-clenching feeling you get when your phone slips out of your hand, or slides off a table...?

 


 
 
Our cases combine protection and art into one remarkable product. Our commitment is to continue bringing fresh and artful designs to you with every new device case we introduce to the market while never compromising its durability.Style, protection and confidence: that's cradl.That's you, too. Spring 2017 Colorways We loved being featured in a spread alongside Otterbox and Bark. Keeping good company...  

We thought if we were creating a case especially for an Apple device that one of the artful back designs should have a tree with a branch for Apple's fruit to hang from...
 

Our manufacturer, Avid Product Design, in Loveland, CO has helped to reinvent injection molding. This new breed of unique molding machines features exciting, award-winning, patent-pending technologies that offer an alternative to the way injection molding has been done all over the world since the 1950s. These machines consume about 90% less energy then conventional injection molding machines. cradl is the only cell phone case in the world currently made with this new technology!


 
 


 

cradl has been issued two utility patents by the United States Patent Ofﬁce for our unprecedented full-screen access case design, which allows edge-to-edge swiping without comprising protection. We also have additional utility, design and international patent applications pending. We've been issued our registered trademark  in the USA and Japan.
 
 

At cradl we believe in in the power of giving back.
We utilize a “Capital Gift” strategy. Through this approach, we can gain a better understanding of the needs and goals of those organizations we are giving to. As opposed to a flat donation, which in our experience can create logistical and budgeting issues, Capital Gifts lay out a specific funding goal. Once that goal is met, we move on to our next non-profit partner. $0.50 of every case cradl sells goes toward this program.

 

 


Have a friend who would like cradl? Want to share our story? Please do! Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker.The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.let's do this.  We ship worldwide. In-stock iPhone 6S/6 cases will ship immediately. We expect to ship the iPhone 7 cases in late April.   Have a question that you can't find the answer to? Contact us at support@cradlcase.com.about us…

What is it?
cradl cases are iPhone cases that both inspire and protect. They are ultra-slim and lightweight while also providing drop-tested, rugged protection. Our carefully designed cases allow for edge-to-edge swiping, great for access to your notification center along with any “landscape” apps, maximizing your device’s versatility and design.


Who created it?
cradl was started by a mother and daughter in Boulder, Colorado.


Where are the cases manufactured?
cradl cases (and packaging materials) are manufactured entirely in the United States.


How much does it cost?
The MSRP for the cradl iPhone 6s/6 case is $32 and the iPhone 7 case is $34. See the perks above to get great savings on a case for the iPhone 6s/6 and 7!


Do you have a website?
Please visit us at www.cradlcase.com. 



Why are you on Indiegogo?
We've had an outpouring of requests for a cradl design that fits the iPhone 7 and also other devices. This campaign's success helps us to finish the iPhone 7 molds that are underway and due to be finished later this month and begin manufacturing them right away. Reaching our stretch goal allows us to begin the molds for the Samsung Galaxy S8 in April and deliver those pre-orders during the summer.

 about the case…

Will it fit on my phone?
cradl cases currently are manufactured for the iPhone 6s/6. We will have cases to ready to ship for the iPhone 7 pre-orders in April.


Do you have more than one design?

Yes, our iPhone 6s/6 cradl cases are offered in a bubbles, blocks and tree design. Each design has multiple color combinations. Please visit our website at www.cradlcase.com to see the available options for each design.
Note: the iPhone 7 cases will be available in the bubbles and tree designs, only. The Samsung Galaxy S8 case will allow us to introduce a brand-new classic cradl design for the back of your device that provides awesome, artful protection.



What colors are available?
There are SO many choices! Visit our website at www.cradlcase.com to see them all. After all, a picture is worth a thousand words...

Yes. We had a series of certified drop tests performed by D.L.S. Conformity Assessment in Illinois. They dropped a working phone with our case on it 25 different times from all different angles from at least 4 feet onto all different angles of the device. Afterward, there was no damage to the screen and the phone functioned perfectly. The materials being used for the landing area, per drop-test requirements, were a thin layer of plywood backed by a cement base. 25 is a lot of drops...


Is the case slim?
Very. At it's thickest, a cradl case adds just slightly over 3mm of thickness to your phone and weighs just 14 grams.


What comes with my order?
Each pre-order of the iPhone 7/6s/6 in the perk above will include a tempered glass screen protector.


Will I have to take the case off to access ports?
No! All ports are easily accessible without removing your case for most after-market charging cords and headphones. (In fact, we didn't test one that didn't fit.)

 shipping information…

When will my case ship?
In-stock iPhone 6s/6 cases will ship immediately. We expect to begin shipping the iPhone 7 cases in April and Samsung Galaxy S8 cases in the summer.


Do you offer worldwide shipping?
Yes!


How much is shipping?
Shipping charges will be available at checkout.


Would I be able to be a reseller or distributor for cradl?
Hell, yes. Please contact Elizabeth Dining at elizabeth@cradlcase.com for more information about this. 


 customer support…

Is there a warranty?
Yes, all of our cradl iPhone cases come with a Lifetime Warranty. This warranty covers manufacturing defects in the case. It does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout it's lifetime that is to be expected from normal use. We do not 100% guarantee the protection of your iPhone, no phone is unbreakable!


What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?
See these steps on How to Request a Refund.



What is your return/exchange policy?​ 

We want you to be happy with your purchase! If you receive your product and you aren't satisfied for any reason, you may return it within 30 days for a full refund (refund does not include shipping fees). For more information contact support@cradlcase.com.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
You can check the status of your pre-order by logging into your Indiegogo account or emailing support@cradlcase.com.

story:
Hudly is in stock and available for purchase at www.gethudly.com. Hudly is a heads-up display (HUD), much like pilots use to keep critical info in their line of sight. Access your own critical info through your favorite apps as your phone’s screen is seamlessly projected right to your windshield.

 

Heads-up displays (HUD) were originally developed for military aviation, displaying information on transparent screens so pilots could keep their heads up while flying.

We're now excited to bring this technology to your car with Hudly. Hudly projects your phone's content directly in your line of sight while driving, allowing you to use all of your favorite mobile apps. Now you can stay connected without taking your eyes off the road. Hudly is comprised of a projector, transparent glass combiner, and wire that plugs into your car's OBD2 port. The projector, mounted near your sun visor, projects your mobile apps onto the glass combiner positioned on your windshield. This results in a full-color image that floats on the road ahead. 

We have chosen to use a Flexible Funding route on Indiegogo because we are fully committed to Hudly since we had such a positive response from our launch. The team at Hudly was thrilled by the support we received and we were able to negotiate more favorable payment and production terms with our manufacturer. We want to make this project a reality and the team has also invested more of our personal funds into the project.  With this news, we are excited to officially begin production in October!

 

 

 

Get the Fastest Route with the Best Navigation Apps

Here we have Waze running on night mode, which clearly highlights the information you need. Using Waze you can get the best route, every day, with real–time help from other drivers. Your alerts for police, accidents, road hazards or traffic jams are displayed within your field of view, reducing distractions. We love how Waze looks on Hudly.

 

Easy to Follow, Slick and Minimal Interface 

Navigational apps like Sygic have a HUD mode and work great with Hudly. The simple and elegant design displays your route, speed, speed limit, and direction arrows. The minimal interface reduces visual clutter allowing you to stay focused and follow directions better than ever before. 

 

Automotive Vitals When You Need It

Auto enthusiasts will love the use of Torque's gauges on Hudly. Instead of large physical gauges, you'll have a seamless heads-up display of all your car performance stats like HP & Torque, 0-60mph timing, and more. The layouts are customizable so you can display whatever stats are most important to you. 

 

A Familiar Interface Means No Learning Curve

The power and simplicity of Google Maps is now available on your windshield. You’ll always have the most up to date road conditions since Hudly runs natively from your phone. Your texts or notifications will also show up as they do on your phone. Siri and Google can help you read back and reply. All you have to do is ask and you never have to look down at your phone.

 

Large, Clear and Beautiful Aesthetics

 

 We have partnered with DigiHUD, Ulysse Speedometer, Speedview and other applications to help improve the heads-up experience. You'll never need to look away from the road for your speed and even have visual notification of speed limits! These apps have great interfaces and look even more amazing on Hudly. We will continue to develop great heads-up tools with these partners. 

 

Hudly is Visible Even in Bright Light

Hudly works great under bright sunlight. A light sensitivity sensor automatically adjusts the projection brightness. The special optical glass helps improve reflection and reduce glare. 

Customer Impressions

 

#1) Plug Hudly into your car’s diagnostic OBD2 port or cigarette lighter adapter. This powers Hudly and connects the device into your car. 

#2) Use the included paper guide to align the projector and plug in the USB and HDMI cables.

#3) Use the included paper guide to align the glass optical combiner. This places Hudly in the optimal projection range and in your line of sight for proper heads-up use. For phone mirroring, connect wirelessly with Miracast on Android or wired using an AV out adapter for iPhone.  

 

A powerful projector capable of 14,000 nits

Impressed right? Let's just say that there will be no issues seeing Hudly in the sunniest of days. 

 

An Optical Glass Combiner 

Part of the secret sauce which makes Hudly's image so crisp. A special coating and curved lens improves optics and displays a virtual image size of 10.8" which appears as if it was 7 feet ahead. Really high-tech stuff.

 

Line of Sight Awareness

When used properly, a heads-up display will be the safest way to access notifications, navigation and vehicle information.  Hudly uses your cell phone to project the information you need to a transparent glass on your windshield. The resulting image safely appears in your line of sight as if it is 7 feet ahead, limiting your need to adjust focus. 

 

Hudly Works With All Cars & Phone Apps

Hudly works in any car with an OBD2 port or cigarette lighter adapter.  It connects to the OBD2 port to retrieve vehicle information like speed, RPMs, fuel, etc. All cars manufactured after 1996 have an OBD2 port. If your car does not have a compatible port, you can use a cigarette lighter adapter to power Hudly.

Hudly uses an HDMI input to receive a video feed from your mobile phone. iPhone 4 and newer will connect with an Apple AV adapter (Not included). Android phones running OS 4.2 and newer can connect wirelessly with a Miracast adapter (Not included). If desired, MHL capable Android phones may also connect with an included cable to charge your phone while connected. MHL compatibility can be checked here. Hudly is an open platform so it will project any app on your phone.

Connect to Your Car's Diagnostic Information

Hudly grabs vehicle information from your car’s diagnostic (OBD2) port when it is available. Your speed, remaining fuel, fuel efficiency (MPG), outside temperature, etc are displayed as large, clear visuals. 

Product Specs Review

  • Works with iPhone 4 and later models, Android devices running OS 4.2 or later
  • Includes OBD2 wire or cigarette lighter adapter
  • Micro USB port & Mini HDMI port on Hudly's projector
  • Built-in speaker 
  • Light sensitivity sensor
  • HDMI + USB input (For video and charging)
  • Please note that the iPhone lightning digital AV adapter and Miracast unit is not included. 

Our first update from our manufacturer is extremely positive as we are on-time and may possibly be able to finish early! We will have the bulk of our order ready by November 11th which will be plenty to cover backers. Our freight forwarder has confirmed that shipment will be able to arrive on December 23rd.

First sets of Hudly!

A peak inside the hardware. 

Molding for the top cover of Hudly's projector

 

Moulding for the base of the Hudly projector

Hudly's aluminum housing

We aim to be completely transparent and update backers as soon as we have any new information. Delays are annoying, but being kept in the dark is worse!

We are committed to delivering our product on time and will work with backers to keep them satisfied!

 

How can I use Hudly in multiple cars?

The most seamless way would be to have one in each car but for our more budget-minded consumers, Hudly's projector slides in and out of a holster attached to your windshield. We are working with the manufacturer to get pricing on a kit of extras like the cables, holster and glass combiner so you can easily swap the projector between cars.

Is the projector removable?

Yes. Hudly's projector slides into a holster attached to your windshield. Consumers can remove the projector and place it in their glove box so it is out of sight when they do not need it.

What are the dimensions of Hudly?

The projector stands about 2.7" high, 2.9" wide, and 3.4" long. The optical glass piece is about 2.7" high by 5.9" wide.

Does my phone charge while connected to Hudly?

Yes, it does! When connected by wire Hudly will be able to provide a charge to your phone.

Does it work with my phone?

Hudly will work with any phone capable of video output. With iPhones this is generation 4 and older using an Apple AV adapter. Android phones using a wireless Miracast Adapter will work with OS 4.2 and later. For Android with MHL compatibility, the phone can be directly connected to Hudly where it will also charge.

story:
PRO-mounts

PRO-mounts is a small GoPro / Action Camera accessories brand which found it roots 3 years ago in Amsterdam. Build from frustrations about the current (expensive & poor serviced) GoPro accessories we decided to launch our own, highly serviced, accessories range in where we now see as our ultimate goals te create new innovative 'needs'  for serial GoPro / Action Cam users.

Based out of liberal Amsterdam we slowly spread our message in the market and raise good reviews. 

With a personal background in International Sales & Marketing we see Customer support one of our most important foundation to build our Company on.

With a GoPro reseller experience of over 6 years we learned what the serial GoPro user is looking for and how we kan keep them happy. Customer support, large assortment and instantly availability is what people praise us for (customer feedback still stands on 9.2/10). With this new PRO-mounts Scuba Filter Kit we know we are offering THE Diving Filter solution for many Pro-sumers & frequent divers. We offer the solution to only need to buy 1 Filter Kit with 3 Filters and compatible with ALL GoPro camera's. By backing this Campaign you not only secure this great product for your personal use but at the same time you contribute to make our Story bigger.

We can tell you words, we can show you video's, but only by using it yourself you can convince others it is THE solution for Divers, especially if you plan to purchase a new GoPro (Hero5?) shortly. 

With this campaign we aim for 5000$, why $5000? the answer is simple, we don't know!

But the one thing we do know, this PRO-mount Filter Kit is coming this summer, whatever happens. With the funds raised we can finance the tooling and keep improving our product.

Do you owe 1 or more GoPro's and did you invest is various Filters already? what happens when you buy the new Hero5, or the smaller Session => will you buy new $30 each filters again? or will you consider to buy the PRO-mounts Filter Kit with 3 Filters and Mounts for all mentioned GoPro cameras + on request we post you FREE of CHARGE the new Hero5 mount . Promise is Promise as we speak about 1 set fits all.

As seen on video & Photo, the product has passed testing phase and (mass) production is started, these Filter Kits ARE COMING! We offer Single Red, Single Polariser or the Filter Kit with 3 Filters. See our rewards for pledging our Campaign, no risk here as we are a operating Company for many years and the Kits are under production.

 

LIFE TIME WARRANTEE !

we believe in what we do, for this reason we Warrant our product for a LIFE TIME period!

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Are you not a Diver, are you not a GoPro users but you like what we offer, please share with friends & family and be part of our success.

Do you owe 1 or more GoPro's and did you invest is various Filters already? what happens when you buy the new Hero5, or the smaller Session => will you buy new $30 each filters again? or will you consider to buy the PRO-mounts Filter Kit with 3 Filters and Mounts for all mentioned GoPro cameras + on request we post you FREE of CHARGE the new Hero5 mount . Promise is Promise as we speak about 1 set fits all.
As seen on video & Photo, the product has passed testing phase and (mass) production is started, these Filter Kits ARE COMING! We offer Single Red, Single Polariser or the Filter Kit with 3 Filters. See our rewards for pledging our Campaign, no risk here as we are a operating Company for many years and the Kits are under production.
 
LIFE TIME WARRANTEE !
we believe in what we do, for this reason we Warrant our product for a LIFE TIME period!

Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Are you not a Diver, are you not a GoPro users but you like what we offer, please share with friends & family and be part of our success.

story:
Our product is our service. With the custom computer market largely being a modification market we seek on pushing the boundaries of technology by 3D printing computer cases for our customers. Our services will be divided into three tiers, Unique, General, and Ur-Own.  If all 200 of the Sustainable Tier Demand perks are sold, we'll make that four tiers.

Most of the equipment needed to start this business of printing your computer cases is already readily available. Except the most important part, the industrial scale 3D printer. This isn’t your simple desktop 3D printer that you can buy online for a few hundred bucks, we’re talking about something that would cost $30000 to buy from the market. Good news though, we already have a solution lined up for this problem, and the parts list for the designs total out to about $1500 at most. That's actually a very low number considering the market. Getting to that $1500 for the printer is the interesting question. If we get 165 people to reserve a print job for $10 each we have a printer, meaning we start printing. 

As of November 11, 2016 we currently have a sample printer, and will soon have the capability to print test samples and then products for our customers.  This isn't the end goal, we need to go bigger, we need to go better.  Just like Steve Jobs and Bill Gates we are starting in a garage, but potential is vast.  Join our adventure!

Once we reach our goal we will keep you posted on the build and test process of our first printer.  From there is it a matter of getting through all of your orders.  With 3D printers, each print job goes a little differently, each design asks for different levels of finesse to cater to your request. Thus we will maintain a steady means of communication with every customer on their order via email newsletters on their build order, about the design, about the print process, about the finishing, and about the shipping. Newsletters isn’t enough though, we want to go further, make something that makes your heart jolt with excitement about your order just as much as we are excited about it. Each print job will have its own video log available for public viewing for current and future customers to see how print jobs progress and the different caveats of each computer case. This is your computer case we are talking about, why not know how it was made?

Our team is a small one.  Comprising of a few active members and up to a dozen more on standby, awaiting the event that this campaign is a success.  Each member has their own talents in customer service, digital media, robotics, engineering, technology, marketing, accounting, 3D design and 3D printing.   Due to the nature that this team is spread across the globe communications is a challenge, yet with today's technology, we can manage that challenge.  Help us grow our active team by making our campaign a success.

Map template courtesy of wikimedia 

Be one of our first customers! You can make an order for a case design and we'll start working on it for you, and we will walk with you the entire way.  If you purchase the campaign code kit perk we will also provide you an up to 20 kg computer case, if you sell the codes provided to 200 supporters. Don't forget to tell your friends that we can help them too! Like us on Facebook and subscribe to us on Youtube, and together we will make our computer cases the way we want!

 

All media presented is under the copyright of Ur-Computer LLC 2016

Ur-Computer.com is property of Ur-Computer LLC

Ur-Computer LLC will not ship or conduct business with persons in:

Iran, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, Belarus, Burundi, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iraq, Lebanon, Russia, Somalia, Former Yugoslavia, Yemen, Zimbabwe, Ukraine, Crimea, Central African Republic, South Sudan, Libya, and Venezuela.
